Reviews.Title: Now I can play from my NAS
Reviews.Author: For Real "HAND"
Reviews.Content: When I was buying this at my local Apple retail store, the rep told me it could play directly from my NAS (network-attached storage). When I got home, I realized she had either lied to me or simply hadn't got a clue.  The Computer part of Apple TV only streams from iTunes software on Mac or PC.However, with the help of a free app called MoliPlayer HD -- I first used this app last year on my Nokia Windows Phone -- and the wonderful AirPlay, it's a cinch to network-play my files on my NAS, a Diskstation product.  MoliPlayer HD can access any server or computer on your LAN (local area network), and play pretty all the video and audio formats out there.  The free version doesn't allow you to password-protect the app, but otherwise has all the major functions.  I just launch MoliPlayer HD, go to Nearby on the left, and it accesses my DiskStation as well as my Windows workgroup immediately. I then turn on AirPlay to send the media content to my Apple TV.The Apple TV is truly simple and elegant, and it just works.  I went through several Android-based media players but they were all difficult to use, froze frequently, not to mention anything from Google is reported to spy on you and your family.  On the Apple TV I can rearrange the app icons just like on iPhone or iPad. I can easily get rid off unwanted icons through the Restrictions settings. For instance, I don't have cable at home, so I remove things like HBO and ESPN and Disney channels.  Everything just works so well and so smoothly, even the screensaver is so well done.  AirPlay is indeed awesome!!  I plan to get an AirPort Extreme and AirPlay-ify all my media hardware.

Reviews.Title: Best Price
Reviews.Author: Linh H.
Reviews.Content: Easy installation. Already had the apps I wanted on there. Couldn't beat the price of $84 versus the price in-store. Dad loves it!

Reviews.Title: An inexpensive way to Upgrade your TVs
Reviews.Author: Richard S. Butwin
Reviews.Content: I all of a sudden have these all over the place. 2 in my office and 3 in the house. Mirroring any Apple device on the TV is great. In the office I share work on my TV or TV in the conference room. At home mostly Netflix plus some other channels. Also great to throw up pictures. Great to mirror TV stations from websites you don't get from your provider such as the local news station during a storm which I do not get on DirecTV. iTunes Radio, etc. This gives you a small taste of where TV is probably going in the future.

Reviews.Title: Love Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Jckinyon
Reviews.Content: I just received my Apple TV box and I love it.  I already have an iMac and an iPad, so everything is compatible.  I use it to put anything I find on my iPad up on the big screen.  Last week, I put up a college wrestling meet from the PAC 12 network. The picture was perfect as was the sound.  I found that anything I want to share with someone else in the room is easily readable when put up on the TV.  I can also send my music collection easily out through the TV sound system.  So far, this product everything I hoped it would be and more.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: John Simonds
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy using this product.  It has met my expectations and I look forward to further offerings through this device.  I ordered the product on a Sunday and it was in my mailbox before the end of the work week!One thing I did note was that it was impossible to access the micro-USD port after connecting the HDMI cable.  Due to the size of the unit, there doesn't appear to be adequate spacing to be able to utilize both ports.  I do wish there was Bluetooth capabilities which would allow the device to play audio wirelessly through a Bose Soundlink or Big Jambox.

Reviews.Title: It's Apple for sure!
Reviews.Author: boeser14
Reviews.Content: Apple means different things to different people.  I personally love apple products, but I don't live completely in the Apple ecosphere, meaning I have a windows laptop and use google for a lot.The major plus of this devise is Airplay!  I have a iPad, and iPhone, and I would say 85% of the time it works perfectly.  There are occasional hiccups getting it on the TV, content will randomly decide not to work on Airplay.  Overall I love this dongle technology stuff!I primarily use it to stream content from a NAS drive I have hooked up to my home network.  Of course the NAS drive has an iOS app which lets me Airplay it to my TV via the Apple TV.  Fantastic!The downside is that it's not an end all solution for television.  I dropped TV service completely so I've tried every other alternative, including watching TV shows through websites.  Netflix and other apps are supported here, but they don't have everything, so beyond that its out of my hands whether or not a website will let me Airplay to the Apple TV.  iPad mirroring is cool, but the aspect ratio is different so streaming full screen video isn't full screen on your TV (I don't like that).However if you're looking for TV solutions consider this: the average TV service is about $50 per month.  On Apple TV you can buy a full season of a TV show for about $30.  So in a year's time, you could own a full season of 20 different shows for the same $600 you would have spent on cable or dish.  I say that plus an antenna is good enough for me.  Of course you have to have good internet to make this work, so factor that in.

Reviews.Title: So Good
Reviews.Author: Oldbarrows
Reviews.Content: Simple to hook up, beautiful interface, great to send music over from our iPhones or content on the laptops.  Great for watching HBOGO, Netflix, etc. etc.

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: JimB
Reviews.Content: We have used this several times since our purchase. It is easy to set and to use. So portable that you can move from one TV in the house to another if necessary. It has been great for streaming Amazon Prime videos.

Reviews.Title: It changes the way you watch TV (but not in the way you think)
Reviews.Author: James Altemus
Reviews.Content: We like our Apple TV. The setup was easy and we were quickly able to connect to the iTunes account on our main household computer. The thing is, it might change the way you watch TV. If you are a person who is used to watching their television "on demand", and have Netflix and Hulu Plus subscriptions, this product is for you. If you are a "passive" TV viewer, like me, it does fundamentally change how you watch TV, and I haven't decided whether that is for the better.Sometimes you just want to put on a channel and watch a series of programs without having to do anything. With Apple TV and other similar devices (or YouTube for that matter) you have to select each program individually. You can build a playlist, but you're still picking everything. It takes away the ability to just leave the TV on in the background while doing other things.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Mivici
Reviews.Content: I can now watch all of the HD movies I've downloaded in iTunes on my 55" HD TV.  I'm now renting movies in iTunes, instead of OnDemand through my cable company.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV Provides a Great Front End to Netflix and Amazon Prime and other Services with Aiplay as a Bonus for Apple Devices
Reviews.Author: Stephan A. Henry "Kansas_Traveler"
Reviews.Content: I bought this unit primarily to access Netflix and Amazon Prime  (using Airplay).  It works great for both.  The Apple TV interface for Netflix is much better than the one provided with my LG Blu-ray player and streaming is more reliable.  It is also great for viewing your photo library on TV and accessing music on your networked computer with iTunes.  With Airplay you can mirror on your TV pretty much anything you can display on your iPad or iPhone and it works great.  There are quite a few other supported services and features that I have not used.  Using just one of the supported services would justify the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Get rid of cable tv!
Reviews.Author: Doug2
Reviews.Content: Great unit at a reasonable price. Would buy this unit again!This unit defines the words plug and play. Thank's!

Reviews.Title: Apple Tv...cool product
Reviews.Author: TheWolfTc
Reviews.Content: This is the 4th Apple Tv I have in my home and as the others it works perfectly. No complaints at all and it is easy to install and set up. I have run out of places for them now so unless I add on, this is the last one I will buy...LOL

Reviews.Title: I have 5 of these and counting
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I purchased my first one 3 years ago to be able to stream Netflix movies in my living room and to also steam my music.  Then a few months later I got one of those Blu-Ray/DVD/Digital movie packs of "Bedtime Stories". So I downloaded the digital copy to my iTunes account and was instantly wowed with the fact I could stream my digital movie collection to my apple TV, in essence, my very own Netfilix.This go me thinking about my second ATV, this one was going into my child's room because I was always finding DVD's laying around in the room that was previously watched but never put back, (Probably due to the fact I had a 400 DVD Changer).  This began my search, no my quest to figure out how to rip my movie collection to digital copies from the DVD so that my child could stream them to the TV in that room.  Eureka, I figured it out and I was off to building my very large digital movie collection and now not having anymore damaged dvd's I can save these in the cases to always come back to them if needed.Now, because my child had there own ATV, I figured...heck I should have my own for my room.  So, I got one for my room to enjoy the contents before bed.  I love these ATV, if I was watching a movie in one room and wanted to continue where I left off in another room, YUP it does that.  I love having the ATV remote app for my phone too, it makes it easier finding the remote with my phone then looking for that tiny silver remote that comes with it, so those are stored away as well for backups.I have since expanded my ATV to 2 other rooms in my house and I have a whole different network for my camper with its own ATV setup to use while on camping trips when its either too cold out or raining.If you are a Apple fan, you will love these small black boxes of joy.  I sure do!!!

Reviews.Title: Apple TV vs. Chromecase
Reviews.Author: S. Law "healer of hemaphrodites"
Reviews.Content: I bought a Google Chromecast for another TV in our home after having two Apple TV boxes elsewhere.  As the price of the Google product was approximately one third that of Apple TV, I wanted to see if there is a significant difference.  Disclaimer: all of my computer/tablet/phone products are Apple and that may bias me as the interfaces for Apple TV and Apple products are seamless.The set up of the Chromecast was simple enough using the app, however I was really disappointed as to how slow the streaming of videos were either through youtube or netflix.  I put the Chromecast on one of the two HDMI ports on my TV and then Apple TV on the other while timing how long an one hour long episode in HD would take to start streaming.  Needless to say, Apple TV was exceptionally faster and appeared clearer without pixelation that was seen on the Chromecast.Bottom line for Apple users: you get what you pay for.  Simple to install with clear GUI and integration with other Apple devices.  I'm not certain if I would be so critical of Chromecast if I had an Android device.

Reviews.Title: Great Device
Reviews.Author: Damon
Reviews.Content: Apple TV brings everything together in one place for easy of use.  From HBO, to Hulu, Netflix, ESPN to streaming the latest movies. Small enough to take with you when you visit family and friends. Setup was simple and easy, just purchase your HDMI cable and connect that to your TV and enjoy.

Reviews.Title: Nice product, wish there were more channel options
Reviews.Author: EHall754
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Apple TV for my mom and she loves it and I really enjoy using it whenever I am home visiting. The controller and device are sturdy and feel like quality products like most of Apple's branded products.Pros: Usability and functionality are nice. It interfaces seamlessly with Apple products.Cons: Apple proprietary, so no go on other wireless devices, which for any Apple user should know this anyways. Limited amount of channel options such as Netflix, Hulu, etc. This is why I gave it 4 stars. The price is a little steep to have such a limited selection compared to Roku, but the quality of the product is better. Don't forget you have to buy a HDMI cable for this product!

Reviews.Title: Works better than SmartTV
Reviews.Author: EJ
Reviews.Content: I purchased Apple TV so I could stream my laptop to the TV as second monitor.  Works really well with the iPhone app as well.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV is bomb.
Reviews.Author: 2k
Reviews.Content: Not only was this apple tv cheaper on Amazon than other places, but it shipped in only two days to my house. It was easy to install and a great way to enjoy our netflix, iTunes, and Hulu accounts on our flat screen.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful product!
Reviews.Author: Marlon
Reviews.Content: Easy set up and use. Integrated controls using iPad or iPhone. Wireless access anywhere at home to movies and music on any device. Needs more apps but we have other devices that cover the channels it does not have.

Reviews.Title: itv
Reviews.Author: grn46
Reviews.Content: It cost more then the other similar electronic however it has a lot of feature that you don't get with the cheaper one I have two of them.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for work AND play!
Reviews.Author: foreveryoung
Reviews.Content: As always, Apple delivers!  Quality product that works seamlessly with our phones, tablet and computers!  We plan to use the streaming features to show our clients their wedding photographs during the ordering process!

Reviews.Title: A must have!
Reviews.Author: Cesar Perez
Reviews.Content: You can't go wrong getting an Apple TV. With HBO Go and ESPN, airplay, rent and buy movies, shows, songs, etc. This will definitely be used at any dinner party. Anyone with an iDevice can stream their media.

Reviews.Title: Must have if you enjoy Apple products.
Reviews.Author: John Schonacher
Reviews.Content: It's an amazing small piece of technology. Very portable and when used with your laptop iTunes it's really cool. It's a bargain too.

Reviews.Title: Great product, easy to use
Reviews.Author: Chino
Reviews.Content: Great product.  Very easy to set, just plug the cables in and connect to internet....then enjoy your media content. Recommended!

Reviews.Title: I love AppleTV
Reviews.Author: Jason Huang
Reviews.Content: This little thing started it all - now there are a bunch of products that mimic the original.I have 4 in my house and about to add a 5th, one for each TV.Some may like having a TV with smart capabilities instead to access Hulu and Netflix, but I have 99% of all my media bought from iTunes, which pretty much makes an AppleTV a necessity.Interacts with all my 6 iPhones/iPads in the household plus a Mac Mini media server.  People knock the closed wall of the Apple ecosystem but if you're in it, there's no easier way to do things as long as you don't want to interact with other technologies.

Reviews.Title: The family loves it
Reviews.Author: D. Sheffield "D-very"
Reviews.Content: I use it to watch/catch up on my favorite TV shows.  My daughter loves it because she has a library of her favorite shows (Handy Manny, Pinky Dinky Doo, Doc McStuffins, etc) that she can select from.  This is perfect for after dinner: she watches a 20-25 minute episode and then we get ready for bed. This is also good for those days where you are stuck home and you want to select what she watches.

Reviews.Title: Another great Apple product
Reviews.Author: TimS
Reviews.Content: Apple is know to have user friendly products and this is also seen in the Apple TV. Extremely easy to connect and use. This product is everything I was expecting.

Reviews.Title: Very usefull.
Reviews.Author: Steve "Steve"
Reviews.Content: Works great. My wife loves FaceTiming with my son in 55" HD ....lol..  It will be nice at the pool this summer to let other people choose the music we have playing.

Reviews.Title: Amazon rocks!
Reviews.Author: TJ Grunfelder
Reviews.Content: Great device and great fast shipping. Apple TV meets my needs since I have all Mac and Apple devices. I enjoy streaming my MacBook screen to the tv.

Reviews.Title: Aweomse product
Reviews.Author: Tenzin L. "<(*.*<)"
Reviews.Content: This is a very awesome product, it works smoothly and is beautiful.  It comes with a small elegant remote, it has a sort of that aluminum unibody feel to it.I don't understand the point of SmartTV gimmick that come with all these new TVs.  I was looking at Chromecast, but I have experienced Android woes and felt that the additional $60 dollars in cost was justified for quality.

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: Leon
Reviews.Content: Like it, play YouTube 1080p videos on my iPad even everyday. And many apps such IGN on iOS device also support the airplay function, it is easy to use and bring a very good experience of watching videos on portable device.

Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: Austin Hylton
Reviews.Content: This thing is great. A cost efficient way to stream Netflix as well without smart equipment or playstation/x box for much more money. The only downfall is that you cannot add apps. What it has is what you get. The only way to receive more is through Apple updates.

Reviews.Title: Worth it...
Reviews.Author: Edward Sadler
Reviews.Content: Awesome and very easy to use. Wish it had more free apps, but worth it. Excellent price and plays nice with iPhone and iPad..

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Houtan Khosrownia
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV is great for a household like mine where everyone owns Apple products.  Many people have stated how their Apple TV does not work for them.  I had an issue where whenever I would mirror a device, my home's Internet would restart.  That was due to a router setting.  With some research, that setting was tweeked and the Apple TV does everything that it's supposed to.

Reviews.Title: My 3rd One
Reviews.Author: J. Williams
Reviews.Content: I love the apple tv.  I used to use my wii to watch Netflix but it wasn't in HD.  This is so easy to pick up and move from room to room when necessary.  Got a great price on it too.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Never imagined the quality of this thing
Reviews.Author: Sherif Khateeb
Reviews.Content: As I received this device I was first impressed by the quality of it. it was even packaged in an impressive way. I loved the easy setup and its software. I had many of the applications in appletv already on the PS3, but the truth is I never experienced that quality of service from the same apps on the ps3. for example the Youtube app in ps3 compared to the appletv sucks!!.I would recommend it for everyone, I can't see a reason why someone should not have this device.

Reviews.Title: Perfect. I use with monitor
Reviews.Author: jenna
Reviews.Content: I don't have a tv yet and have been using this with an hdmi compatible monitor and some external speakers. It's been great. Will probably get another soon.

Reviews.Title: Great for Apple owners
Reviews.Author: Jeep Man
Reviews.Content: It's nice playing my itunes collection on the TV with this device.  The only bad part is the price but apple products are always expensive.  You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Apple Does It Again
Reviews.Author: Ryan E Langston
Reviews.Content: Im still learning this product, but it works great for what I was wanting to do. Press a few buttons and you are instantly watching Netflix or checking out music and apps. You will love this Apple TV. I do.

Reviews.Title: Slick!
Reviews.Author: inside the granfalloon
Reviews.Content: A very clever little box, seamless setup and interface.  I've barely scratched the surface of what it can do.  I only wish Apple would make a smart TV/Receive that integrates everything and takes home entertainment out of the 90s where it seems to be stuck right now...

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: I am glad I read reviews.  It was very easy to operate once we figured out how to synch it up with our tv.  Totally worth the money.  We paid $80 on Amazon but it costs $90 @ appletv.com...

Reviews.Title: Works great and easy set-up.
Reviews.Author: Victor
Reviews.Content: My Apple TV worked perfect and was unopened and brand new right out the box. It  works fine and as described. No complaints.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Sara Lewis
Reviews.Content: Very fast delivery after ordering. I bought this for my son's tv in his bedroom since he doesn't have cable in his room. He's able to watch his YouTube, Netflix , and listen to his music. Awesome product to turn a basic TV into a smart TV.

Reviews.Title: This may be one of my most favorite things I own!
Reviews.Author: Annette M. Harris
Reviews.Content: This is the second Apple TV I have purchased. I bought a second one for the bedroom cause I love the first so much! I am an iPhone and iPad user so this is perfect for steaming music and movies to. You can also mirror the images from your screen onto the Apple TV. This was worth buying alone just for Netflix!!

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Mary Sullivan "Mary"
Reviews.Content: Received quickly. Easier to use than the built-in Samsung internet connection. Plus you can remotely use with your iPad on DVD recorder or TV with built-in tuner.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Z. Thompson
Reviews.Content: This is the most current Apple TV model, at the best price I have seen it offered for. Make sure you pick up an Amazon HDMI cord, and you'll be good to go. I can operate the Apple TV with my iPhone and iPad, it plays music from my iTunes match account, the Netflix and HBOgo apps work perfectly with 1080 picture and Dolby 5.1 sound...it is simply an excellent device. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: LOVE it
Reviews.Author: Thomas G.
Reviews.Content: Typical apple product -- simple, easy to set-up, impressive. I just wish it had a direct icon for Amazon Prime, like what is displayed for HuluPlus, Netflix, etc.Easy to use. The Apple Radio and Internet stations for music are a great feature as well.

Reviews.Title: Easy
Reviews.Author: Gina Yoon
Reviews.Content: Apple is know to have very user friendly product and this is also seen in the Apple TV. Extremely easy to connect and use. This product is everything I was expecting.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Keith Robertson
Reviews.Content: Wonderful product! Works seemlessly with my iPhone and iPad, I can mirror them both through Apple TV to my HD TV which is very nice. Must buy for those without one.

Reviews.Title: xmas gift for my daughter
Reviews.Author: Debrah Nida
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter and her family for xmas....as they didn't have cable/satellite....just plain old rabbit ears and can't afford to buy cable/satellite TV. They had heard of it before I had and had mentioned it. And they just LOVE IT !!! They said it's better than any TV subscription they had ever had before and have access to Netflix...hulu...and many others. Their kids love that they can watch cartoons or movies anytime instead of waiting for it to be aired like regular TV.  It was the best investment I have ever made, when it comes to TV products!

Reviews.Title: As advertised, great product
Reviews.Author: Sean Taxter
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is a great product, bought it for my parents for Christmas and they love it, highly recommended to anyone, especially if you have Netflix/HBO Go

Reviews.Title: So good
Reviews.Author: Jordan
Reviews.Content: My room mates and I love our Apple TV.  So many movies to choose from.  My only down side is that you can't add applications.  I think the quality of Roku and other devices is pure trash, so I would never change, but I wish you could add apps to the Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: I just love this device!!
Reviews.Author: Kent Scott
Reviews.Content: This device was a gift to me. It's simply amazing!!!  I now play music and videos from my iphone and from my itunes acct, directly on my TV.  "So much fun!!"

Reviews.Title: Xfinity won't work.
Reviews.Author: puroy
Reviews.Content: The bad thing is...it is not compatible for xfinity live streaming. You need to upgrade the atv to 6.02 for mirror-feature to work on ipad and iphone.

Reviews.Title: A must have!
Reviews.Author: Margaret A. Potter "mp"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for the use of Netflix in the home.  We placed this in the living room but will buy another for my daughter;s bedroom!

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: Why pay more? Same thing for less money! Hooked it up in just ten minutes and it works very well

Reviews.Title: Like it!
Reviews.Author: Karen T "Karen Arizona"
Reviews.Content: This particular Apple TV was purchased as a gift. Our son and his wife are not TV people, but live movies as well as certain TV shows. We knew from our experience that this product is perfect for just that. They tell us they use it often and love it!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: John B. Affleck "JBA"
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I hoped for: a cinch to watch Netflix, Youtube, etc. on the big screen, to look at photos from the iCloud, and to mirror the iPad or Mac.  One downside is that streaming still not as good as Blue-Ray:  movies jump a little, but this is not Apple's fault.  And really a bargain at $99.

Reviews.Title: Better than Roku or any streaming box
Reviews.Author: O. Guzman
Reviews.Content: Here's what I love about the Apple TV.1. AirPlay....it's worth it's money alone.2.  AirPlay mirroring...it will mirror your Mac with ease....very useful for streaming video.  If you watch a PPV via Stream online...you can now watch it on your TV.3.  Uses very little power4.  Very small, you can tuck it anywhere.5.  NHL Game Center Live games run at 60 fps as opposed to PS3, Xbox, or online which run at 30 fps, this will really make you feel like you're watching it via Satellite/Cable.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV-It is great, what else do you expect
Reviews.Author: SoonerBorn "Sooner"
Reviews.Content: Like all Mac products this is awesome.  Easy to set up, simple to use.  My TV always seem to drop signal to the wifi, tried boosters which still did not work.  This cured my problem.

Reviews.Title: Great fun to use!
Reviews.Author: Susan B Kahn
Reviews.Content: My friends recommended this Apple TV, and it lived up to expectations. If only I had more free time to enjoy it!

Reviews.Title: Worth The Money
Reviews.Author: recliner648
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and definitely worth the price.  Use it every day and am actually thinking about purchasing more for other TV's.

Reviews.Title: Works Great! Easy to Setup!
Reviews.Author: sean
Reviews.Content: This item works great, sets up in seconds and has so many features I'm still only now beginning to fully utilize them all!

Reviews.Title: Apple
Reviews.Author: Irene Gray
Reviews.Content: My son got this for Xmas and is very happy with it & so is his daughter. Who does not like more programs

Reviews.Title: Excellent system
Reviews.Author: Donald Bunch
Reviews.Content: Great system.  Works well and my son stated he was enjoying it as well.  Syncs to apple devices very well.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: RMRA
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd time purchasing an Apple TV. I love it! The interface is really easy to use and the setup is pretty simple.

Reviews.Title: Love Apple TV!
Reviews.Author: BernerMom
Reviews.Content: This is the easiest most intuitive device that turns any TV into a smart TV. I have 3 and have gifted 3. As far as I am concerned...if you have an iPhone and an iPad...you can't do better. Roku and the like just don't offer the ease of use.

Reviews.Title: now we have 4!
Reviews.Author: Susan Mendoza "cakes under the table"
Reviews.Content: maybe we don't need 4, but each one of us has an Apple TV on our TV....we love it! Easy and Fast!

Reviews.Title: Apple TV, best purchase ever!
Reviews.Author: christina
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is great! I love having a smart tv without the price of one! I have access to Netflix, Yahoo, YouTube, etc on this device. I bought it for my 21 year old brother as a Christmas  gift and he loved it! He has an iPad & iPhone which he mirrors to the Apple TV and uses the ipad/iPhone almost as a remote control, it's a pretty neat little invention. When it goes idle on your tv it starts playing a slideshow which is pretty cool, could be random pictures or you can stream your iCloud and your personal pictures would come a cross the tv screen. Best thing is it's small and doesn't take up much space at all! all you need is a HDMI cord to connect it to your television because it's not included in the packaging! After seeing how much he liked his I decided that I wanted one for myself! best purchase ever, Apple has never let me down.

Reviews.Title: A+++
Reviews.Author: Clement
Reviews.Content: Device is great.  Simple setup, easy to use.  Video streaming is good even connected with wifi.  I love this box!!

Reviews.Title: Simple and effective product if you have an iPhone or iPad to share content
Reviews.Author: rajeeva79
Reviews.Content: Love the simplicity of use. I frankly use the device 80% of the time streaming videos off my iPhone or iPad to the Apple TV. It is the best and most convenient. I've used Roku before, and frankly speaking it seemed to have a lot of "bloat-apps".Apple TV has the bare minimum number of Apps of which some are free and for others you need a cable subscription or know someone who has a cable subscription with the channels that are on there (ESPN, HBOGO).Practically every video streaming website I've used (Youtube, Yahoostream, etc) has Apple TV support - so you're pretty much covered there.In the event there is NO support, then simply use the "Mirror" option on your idevice.Cheers.

Reviews.Title: Roku 3 is better
Reviews.Author: podarski
Reviews.Content: I own two of these as well as a newly required roku 3.  I'm tired of apple locking Dom their devices so you can't access the competitions apps on them.  Vudu let's you access everything including amazon instant video and vudu which apple doesn't.

Reviews.Title: Great HD Streaming Device
Reviews.Author: Erik K. Hill "international traveller"
Reviews.Content: My favorite feature is being able to use AirPlay from my iPhone.  AirPlay allows me to stream what I'm seeing on my phone to my TV.  This is pretty handy if you own an iPhone.  If you don't own other Apple products to use AirPlay with then there are other streaming devices that will get the job done.  If you love Apple products, Apple TV doesn't disappoint.

Reviews.Title: I love my Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Kelly Turnage
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and easy to install.  I recommend because it's a great productAccessing Netflix account was quick and easy

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Mac
Reviews.Content: Saves you a ton of money from having to buy a Smart Tv. I couldn't think of a day where I don't use it.

Reviews.Title: Great addition to our TV
Reviews.Author: Frank Koller
Reviews.Content: This item was slightly less in price at Amazon. It arrived quickly and works great. We have a Apple laptop and iPad so this is a great addition for intertwinement options.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Too busy to return it
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift and my son demonstrated it for us on Christmas Day. If you take a lot of photos with your iPhone and like to show them off, this is a must have. Great for Grandma and Grandpa to show off the a Grand kids. If your not familiar with the tech, have the kids hook it up for you and show you how to use it.

Reviews.Title: Great App
Reviews.Author: Sandi Weir
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is another great from Apple, just like everything they put out. Very easy set-up. No problems with connection or use.

Reviews.Title: LOVE it!
Reviews.Author: Shoppergirl
Reviews.Content: Bought as a Christmas gift for my hubby.  He likes what he can do with it and his iPad.  Great gift!

Reviews.Title: Content on the TV
Reviews.Author: Oscar Martinez Anzola
Reviews.Content: It is really good to be able to watch the content of my iPhone and iPad on the TV anytime.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing Product
Reviews.Author: Jennae Miler
Reviews.Content: Apple TV. Everything you love about Apple, plus TV - right? WRONG. Takes forever to download ANYTHING. We actually rented Star Trek this evening. PAID to rent it! It took at least 1 hour to "download" the movie, then quit an hour and a half in - said it needs another 8 minutes to "catch up." This is absolutely ridiculous. Any program you try to open also takes a very long time to open. Netflix was far easier to navigate on our Wii, a lot less moving around from screen to screen, back and forth between seasons. Don't waste your money unless you have paid for all the extra Apple TV amenities, like sports and news channels. It's true that watching youtube and vimeo is nice but not worth the stress of the rest of it.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money, Airplay can be spottey
Reviews.Author: Robert P De Lara
Reviews.Content: Great product, but it can be difficult/trying at times to connect it to your iphone via Airplay.  YOu have to always turn off airplay, then turn it back on again on the apple tv

Reviews.Title: Money saver
Reviews.Author: outlaw323
Reviews.Content: Hello Apple TV. Goodbye cable. We're saying money every month and enjoy tv more. We bought a hd antenna so we could watch basic channels. Between hulu and Netflix were set. I wish they would add more options for the news.

Reviews.Title: Great streaming box.
Reviews.Author: IT-Jon
Reviews.Content: I have bought into the Apple eco-system and so decided to go with the Apple TV instead of a Roku 3. I actually did have a Roku 3, but realized quickly that I was really only going to use it for Netflix, and not much more. While the Apple TV allowed for more flexibility within our household. Two iPhones, two iPads, and regular use of iTunes for media management. Plus, Comcast supports the HBO Go app on Apple TV, while they don't (as of this writing) support it on Roku. We use the Apple TV for Netflix, HBO Go, and iTunes media access. I have a hard wire internet connection which provides buffer free viewing of HD content through those services.The design is dead simple, all the way down to the box it came in. I was honestly really impressed with the simplicity of the box/packaging design. And that was before I even plugged the unit in. Once I did that, I continued to be pleased with my decision. It just works. There is some authentication/signing in for the various apps, but once that's done, the device just works and works well. I do recommend making use of the Remote app for iOS during setup. Entering usernames and passwords is much nicer on the keyboard on the iOS device instead of the onscreen keyboard.I honestly don't have any complaints about this device. I even love the remote. It is sleek, simple, and easy to work with.

Reviews.Title: Would definitely recommend
Reviews.Author: teresa morrow
Reviews.Content: It has exceeded our expectations. Easy to set-up and use. Good value for the price and gives us a lot of choice.

Reviews.Title: Worth the upgrade from 2nd Gen. Apple TV. Works beautifully with Apple ecosystem.
Reviews.Author: Charles E. Bouldin "Macs"
Reviews.Content: I've had an Apple TV since gen 1, and just upgraded from the generation 2 device, so the first comment is:1080p is -so- worth it. I didn't think I would notice as much difference as I do, and the 1080P programming on iTunes is just gorgeous. I'm re-watching things like the scenes in Breaking Bad with those gorgeous New Mexico landscapes and the detail and picture quality is wonderful. I'm on an old Sony HDTV, which is 1080P, although only 60 hz, so I expect the picture quality may be even better on newer TVs. So, a big thumbs up for the 1080p picture and ITMS programming content.The other big plus with this device, is that if you are in the Apple ecosystem, everything just works. iPhones and Macs can copy their screen content to this gadget with a single click. Simply wonderful. Last summer I used my iPhone and the previous Apple TV to watch the Tour de France using the NBC iPhone app and streaming it to the Apple TV. For $15, I got commercial free, near-HD quality live from the Tour. It was the best TdF coverage I've ever watched and a bargain.Apple has added many services to ATV: PBS, Hulu, Smithsonian, etc, but you don't get all the choices of something like a Roku. However, between Netflix, iTunes, PBS, Smithsonian, Comedy Central I have more programming than I can watch, and it's quality stuff, not the BS of 300+ cable channels that I never look at.ATV let me cut the cable cord years ago, and I've never missed it.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Scott D. Vignassi
Reviews.Content: It is great and we use it a lot.  What a great tool to watch tv shows!  Very easy to use also.

Reviews.Title: I wish I'd bought this sooner.
Reviews.Author: Bwana
Reviews.Content: It's so easy to watch purchased videos, to rent new videos, browse YouTube, or even any of the videos on my home computers. When I find something I like on my iPad or iPhone, I can send it to the Apple TV effortlessly, and enjoy it on the big screen. I've also enjoyed using iTunes Match with this, so my entire music collection is also accessible at any time through any of my devices, including the Apple TV.The device also supports a number of video services, such as Netflix, Hulu, Crackle, HBO Go, ABC/Disney channels, Crunchyroll, and other upload choices like Vimeo. It doesn't support Amazon Prime Streaming Video.Though I use the USA Apple Store, I'm living in Japan, some of these other services do not allow access because my physical IP address is outside the USA, however all the content in the iTunes Store works fine.

Reviews.Title: It's average
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: Sometimes it runs the sound through our TV and auxiliary system, and sometimes it fails when streaming a movie from our Mac. We find we have to reset more than we like. When running a DVD through our Mac to the TV, there is not a lag in picture with sound or any streaming issues. When streaming from the Internet, it can have lags -- for example, the video is running fine on the computer screen, but it is frozen on the TV while the streaming is trying to catch up. This is bothersome and disappointing. We have high grade HDMI connectors and super fast Internet speed, so neither of these are an issue - it's the Apple TV. However, it is very nice for putting pictures up on the TV screen for people to see, etc.

Reviews.Title: Mirroring!
Reviews.Author: gaylemichel "oochie"
Reviews.Content: I saw a friend's Apple TV and didn't realize until then all the things it could do, especially mirroring my iPad. It's GREAT!

Reviews.Title: A great upgrade to the original
Reviews.Author: ral1375
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace my faulty Apple TV version 1. It is a definite improvement in all functions. It is smaller, uses less power, and has an auto-off function that I don't think version 1 had The programming options are many, although similar to all the other boxes out there. It hooks up seamlessly to my network and is a no-brainer if you have an iPad or iPhone, because with Airdrop you can stream easily from either device to the set.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: If your an iPhone / iPad user Apple TV is a must. On one hand Apple does isolate their products but on the other, they provide components like Apple TV that allow intervention of music, photos and videos to be shared with some of the most user friendly software and components on the market.

Reviews.Title: Love it so much.
Reviews.Author: R. Windsor
Reviews.Content: So Apple TV is pretty awesome. It's fast, easy to navigate and is constantly adding new contents partners. So what is a downside of Apple TV? Honestly there is not much but a few things you should think about before buying one.If you are just wanting Netflix and could care less about viewing photos, mirroring displays, renting or buying movies and TV shows or playing music then Chromecast might be a better option for you. It's also less then half the price of an Apple TV.There are other options out there such as Roku. Roku is more open and has access to a bit more content, but that content is more obscure for most people and Apple TV has all the big players on board.  Where Apple TV is better then a Roku IMHO is interface and usability.  Roku is great but the interface can at times be slow and annoying. Apple TV has it's issues here and there as well, but using both for the last few years I get far fewer issues with my Apple TV, and Roku is very slow to update when issues arise.  So if you are the kind of person that has to have every single content provider under the sun a Roku is a damn fine device. If you are looking for all the best mainstream content with a lot of extras and a smooth interface then Apple TV may suit you better.

Reviews.Title: Hit Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Sarah Carlson
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV was great for a christmas present t o my mom and dad. It came quickly and was packaged really well. The shipping box had a large bubble wrap to ensure that it didn't rattle one bit. The apple packaging was pristine as well. It works great and is extremely easy to set up and use. Be sure that you buy an HDMI cable, as it does not come with one. However, the Apple HDMI cable is fairly inexpensive and widely available. If you're looking for one of the best TV, photo, video, music streaming and computer home sharing devices, I strongly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Love the concept
Reviews.Author: Brian Groenig
Reviews.Content: Sometimes won't "connect to the server" when all my other connected devices are working just fine. Not an internet issue. Of course if you want apple tech support you have to pay for that too

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Vanessa
Reviews.Content: I have a Roku and an Apple TV.  I like both of them but I prefer the Apple TV.  It's so much faster than the Roku and the picture is substantially clearer.  The Roku was then moved to one of the bedrooms and the Apple was moved to the living room.  I liked it so much I also bought one for my father who also then moved his Roku to his bedroom and put the Apple TV in the living room.  He also preferred the Apple TV over the Roku.It's also easy to install and to use.  If you prefer streaming content over watching cable, then this is an awesome device for you.  Many people think you have to have Apple products in order to use Apple TV properly.  This is untrue.  You do NOT need an iPhone or Mac.  I don't have a Mac and my father doesn't have an iPhone or Mac and he loves this device.Another plus, the remote is durable.  I washed my throw blanket and didn't realize the teeny tiny remote was tangled up in it.  In fact, the remote is so tiny I didn't even notice it until after I heard it clanging in the dryer.  After I made my discovery I removed the battery, put the remote on top of some rice and let it sit for a few days near the window.  I couldn't believe it when I tried the remote and it worked perfectly fine.  It doesn't even have a nick on it.BTW - I'm not one of those people that thinks Apple can do no wrong, but this is one product that I absolutely love and stand by 100 percent.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Probably the most handy little box you could buy. It pretty much turns your regular dumb TV into a smart TV. The interface is very user friendly as most Apple devices so it’s easy for anyone to use. I wish it had access to an app store. Having a Pandora app would be great but you’re able to mirror other apple products so you can access Pandora that way.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Rita Campos
Reviews.Content: It works  great with the iPhone I would recommend it to anyone with the apple product. It's easy to connect to the TV.

Reviews.Title: Great way to keep your digital movies at hand!
Reviews.Author: Busy Mother of Two
Reviews.Content: We have had this product for over a year and we love it use is everyday.  We keep our digital movies on our iTunes account and can access them regularly.  My husband uploaded photo's to it, so when we are not using it, or are listening to the radio we have our family photo's displayed on our TV as a screen saver.  The Apple TV gives you links to Netflix, Radio, Hulu and several other apps automatically so it's a one stop shop for digital users who have multiple accounts .  The only down side is you must have an internet connection even to watch your purchased digital movies.

Reviews.Title: Good product with nice features, but some are redundant
Reviews.Author: Carmen T. Verenna "cverenna"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product solely because I wanted a better way to watch Netflix.  I did have access thru my computer and an older Wii, but I wanted to get HD quality.  For the most part, Apple TV does work fine and is easy to operate.  If you are connected to a cable network, the other uses for this product are unnecessary in my view.  The newly released movie rentals are more expensive than my cable network charge, the other uses are for apps like youtube and internet radio, which again you get with cable.  The one feature that I have used that is useful is Airplay.  That feature allows you to take content from your  home computer or other portable device and show it on your TV.If you want nice quality movies thru Netflix (based on your internet service) I would recommend this product.  It's reliable and not overly expensive.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Kirby Marshall
Reviews.Content: It works well with the new Apple operating system but for the price there are a lot of cheaper options that work well for a lot less.

Reviews.Title: Great Content
Reviews.Author: Deltalifestyle
Reviews.Content: Love all the content and ease of use.Would give it 5 stars all day except for ....1 major problem I've noticed is that movies don't stream sometimes at all or stream very slow.I compared Netflix app to the Netflix app on my PS4.Several times in the past week I couldn't stream Netflix movies on my Apple TV. I know it's not my internet connection because my PS4 streamed the very same Netflix movies quickly and cleanly.I'm calling Apple today to find out why this is happening.Overall a great product once they get that figured out!

Reviews.Title: Flawless
Reviews.Author: Cynthia R. Peterson
Reviews.Content: Pros: easy to setup, even for the less talented.60 days Apple support.Small footprintDoes as promised, and as with other Apple products, playing with it gives you even more.Amazon has a better priceEverything is sealed in the package ( as is Apples policy) you absolutely know this new and the real thingI assure you this is the newest version, the older version is higher priced because it can be ""jail broke" which makes it able ( with geek experience) to stream things out of the Apple intentions. You don't have to be concerned with that detail or you wouldn't be reading this.With 1020 picture capabilities, the picture is stunning.I use this with my iPad. You can fiddle around and find what you want somewhere.Con: no Prime Amazon streaming vids. Apple, you will have to make nice with Amazon or you are going to lose customers. I do get Prime Amazon streaming vids on a app on the iPad. I will just have to get by with that until they get that settled.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Dr. Oceanfront "Oceanfront"
Reviews.Content: My son told me to order this and it will upgrade an older TV set I have.  I had no idea what it did, but am I glad I listened.It was simple to hook up, and to my surprise, I now have access to all the cool channels that people get with their new televisions, like Netflix, Hulu, and all those applications.I love that I can now get netflix in the bedroom.  Now if I can just figure out how to hook up my pining library, I will be all set.  ;-)

Reviews.Title: Good addition to your TV watching options
Reviews.Author: Bill Ford
Reviews.Content: This is a great product if you want watch videos you have on your iPad or want to stream from Amazon or Netflix. Setup is easy an operation is intuitive.

Reviews.Title: Great Gadget!!
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: Amazing little gadget from Apple! Stinks that you have to pay $25 bucks to use the cloud app on it or else you have to have your apple pc open while using it though :( Sort of defeats the purpose! But overall great purchase! Husband loves it!!

Reviews.Title: Depends on your needs
Reviews.Author: K. Logan "Mr. Shush"
Reviews.Content: I got Apple TV as a gift for Xmas this year.  It is a great little box.  Very sleek looking, uses little power, and integrates with all your iPhones and iPads.  The quality of the video is awesome.  Mine is streaming over 5ghz wifi without a hitch.  Perhaps those that complain about video quality do not have the proper router.  Regardless, mine streams perfectly.Here is why this works for me: I subscribe to DirecTV.  I have two set-top boxes (one in the family room and one in the living room).  Each of those TVs also has an Xbox 360 and a blue ray player attached.  The TV in my bedroom has no set-top box, no 360, and no DVD player.  It simply pulls in beautiful free HD over the air.  Enter Santa and my Apple TV.All in all I am happy with the unit.  The Netflix app is not as user friendly as the Xbox app, however, it gets the job done.  I like that I can pull content from iTunes and or my networked computer.  Air Play is really cool.  Where it is lacking is APPS!  I would like Flixster, Amazon Prime, and just more content.  I will use ESPN, MLB, NETFLIX, and the Disney apps when the kids come in and snuggle with my wife and I on the weekends.I like the unit and am glad Santa brought it.  However, it may not work for your specific needs.  The Roku may be more of what you are looking for.  They need to crank out more apps!UPDATE 1/6/2014:I bought a Roku 3 as well.  Both are great boxes but I think I actually prefer the Apple TV.  I ordered another unit and just canceled Direct TV.  I have the best of both the Roku and Apple TV.  Prefer the Apple TV for the integration with my iDevices and AirPlay.

Reviews.Title: A great buy
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: Bought one for my living room and it's the greatest thing ever. It hooks up to my iPhone iPad iPod and my Mac just fine. Love my apple products

Reviews.Title: Airplay is its strength !!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It's a very good media streamer to Tv, it's biggest strength Is airplay and mirroring for any ios device like iPhone or iPad to Tv. Literally it's like having all the ios apps on Tv. Although I miss CEC feature of automatic Hdmi switch which chromecast has. Mirroring of games is not that smooth on tv, occasionally it jerks. It's must device for anyone having any other apple device.

Reviews.Title: keeps freezing
Reviews.Author: netshopper
Reviews.Content: I mainly bought it to use it with AirPlay, mirroring local video files on my MBP.  After a few minutes of usage, keeps freezing.  Tried several times and the issue is consistent.  Couldn't be bandwidth issue on my local network/router, as all other devices are working fine when this issue is occurring with Apple TV.  Just returned it.

Reviews.Title: Love it !
Reviews.Author: Joe Dombrowski
Reviews.Content: My wife & I can't believe we waited so long to make the switch from cable. Nothing compares to the amount of access you have for the cost. We have reduced our monthly home entertainment bill by $200.

Reviews.Title: A solid contender
Reviews.Author: Chris Holliday
Reviews.Content: In a sea of media streaming, network ready, HD capable devices on the market, this Apple product is a solid contender. If you are an Apple person, with the ipad's and the iphone's and such, then this should be your media device of choice mostly due to the inherent compatibility with this unit. And the extra Apple feature of Airplay, to throw anything that is on your mobile device onto your big screen TV. We are enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: Buy Roku 3 over this.
Reviews.Author: J. Marshall
Reviews.Content: This is an okay box and works great for pairing with other apple products but is very limited in channels and speed compared to the Roku 3. I would recommend the Roku over this if you want great free channels, Pandora,  slacker, TuneIn, etc and a better interface.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for a tv without a cable box
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV is a useful gadget. I bought it for my girlfriends bedroom when she first got a tv. She does not have a cable box, DVD player, or game console in her room. This device made it possible for her to do quite a bit, and she is extremely pleased with it. She mostly used it do netflix, but there are many other useful apps. She often uses the remote ability to play her iTunes from her computer through it as well. The only issues she ever has from it are a result of her outdated and slow internet connection.The device itself is visually appealing. It is very small and has the signature minimalist Apple design. The remote included is also very impressive. It is simple with limited buttons, but does everything needed. It is made out of metal and feels like a quality product. For the sake of comparison, holding the remote feels a lot like holding one of the older generation iPod Nanos. I believe the one in mind is the third generation that was tall and skinny, and came in various metallic colors. The remote has a nice weight to it and the buttons seem durable.After a year of owning the Apple TV, my girlfriend still loves it. I would state however that other options may be just as good at a lower price. The Roku players are a very similar product that are cheaper than apples version, and I'm sure she would be just as happy with one of those.

Reviews.Title: With Apple TV, I am very close to cutting the cord
Reviews.Author: Father Of Two Girls
Reviews.Content: This is my second Apple TV. Our family now watches more streaming content then live TV. If it was not for live sporting events I would drop my cable service (and keep the Inter net of course).

Reviews.Title: What's not to like
Reviews.Author: MS "MS"
Reviews.Content: Ok,I could say that I would really like to be able to add apps directly myself.  Would like pandora for example...yeah I know it is a direct competitor to iTunes Radio, but it has better content choices right now.  Use it a lot with Netflix and iTunes purchases,  also use iTunes Radio some.  I get around the pandora issue by streaming pandora to it from my phone.  Streaming is super easy from and apple device,

Reviews.Title: It's Not As Good As Most But, It Does Have Airplay!
Reviews.Author: Angel Ryu
Reviews.Content: Only true reason to buy this other than the others that support streaming services would be the airplay which was why I bought it. I like being able to see my ipad on big screen.

Reviews.Title: Content Purchases Suck
Reviews.Author: Jello
Reviews.Content: You have to buy everything to use it.  I got it for airplay compatibility.  Hardly anything in the apple store to see for free.  Quite disappointing when it kills your internet from direct streaming.  I have to download to my mbp or iPad, to save from streaming from anything but the wifi transfer from my machine.  That part is very sad.  Otherwise you just end up feeling like other people have different experience than you.

Reviews.Title: It's a must!
Reviews.Author: Joe Ramirez
Reviews.Content: I found myself buying 4 of these each for four of my T.V's in the house. Just had to have access to my iTunes  account when I wanted to watch my movies. If my wife was in the family room and my daughter in the living room I can run to the back bedrooms to watch my movies or see other apps and what's playing on them in peace. Everyone who has an iTunes account should get these. My whole house is apple and they are wonderful products to own.

Reviews.Title: Excellent all around music, pic, Youtube, movies player
Reviews.Author: Jen C.
Reviews.Content: I love this little thing.  It was a snap to set it up & I hooked it up to my Bose 321 system.  So now I have excellent music coming out of my Bose speakers because of this product.  I can listen to all my music from my iPad, iPhone, or iTunes.  This is the best thing I bought for myself & everyone in the house can use it too.  Incredible little thing.  Pictures looks great too on a bigger screen TV, along with videos.  Plus it doesn't take much room at all.

Reviews.Title: Love airplay
Reviews.Author: ars
Reviews.Content: It is a great product. I mostly use the airplay feature and love it.It does not have the limitations of other products like chrome cast.

Reviews.Title: Amazing! Apple never disappoints!
Reviews.Author: Gena
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is amazing! It's so easy to use and such a great purchase. We love being able to pull up anything off of HBOGO & Netflix and syncing our iPhones is a great feature! We are even thinking of getting another for another room. Apple never disappoints with a quality product!

Reviews.Title: Apple tv
Reviews.Author: Kathy Hall
Reviews.Content: Great product! This little box has saved me a ton since I was able to discontinue my cable service. Easy to use. Lots of features.

Reviews.Title: Birthday present for friend and she loves it!
Reviews.Author: Lexie Kentros
Reviews.Content: I got the Apple TV for my best friend and she loves it. Very simple to work, simple setup. I got it for her dorm so the airplay doesn't work but she uses it for Netflix all the time which works great and YouTube and it has tons of features.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!! Must buy. Better than a smart TV.
Reviews.Author: Chaitanya Deshpande
Reviews.Content: Purchased this product. Brand new. Excellent. Amazing packaging. I would highly recommend this to a friend. Easy to setup and use. High quality HD video quality. Processor speed is ultimate.

Reviews.Title: Can't go wrong with Apple
Reviews.Author: DCarnahan
Reviews.Content: This is my second Apple TV.  This one is going in the living room.  I went with this because it will work effortlessly with itunes on my iphone, ipad, Macbook.

Reviews.Title: Dated interface
Reviews.Author: Adam Glowacki
Reviews.Content: You must have this if you own an iPad or iPhone. Airplay feature is worth it alone. I like all the channels apple is slowly adding however the current interface makes this interface way too cluttered. I hope they update this system soon... maybe in march. This apple TV is a gift but I would like to buy a new one for myself.

Reviews.Title: So easy to set up and get started!
Reviews.Author: M. Knaus
Reviews.Content: So far so good. SO easy to set up! We were literally watching one of my itunes movies in under 10 minutes. We were previously streaming netflix and hulu plus through our wii but its not HD compatible. This is full HD. Love being able to stream movies and tv shows from itunes. And the remote is MUCH easier to use than the wii remote!

Reviews.Title: Pretty Cool Gadget
Reviews.Author: Henree Garcia "HG"
Reviews.Content: Not a bad choice for streaming anything to your TV. With the correct apps, you can even stream from your Android. I love it!Great choice self. Thanks self! *hug*

Reviews.Title: Nice Apple product
Reviews.Author: mille
Reviews.Content: Good Apple product, extremely easy to set up.  It's nice to have, I use it to watch movies, shows and it's really handy to watch any videos you take from your iPhones.  I video my son wrestling and we come home to watch it/review technique.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I needed, multiple uses but perfect for NETFLIX!
Reviews.Author: daniel.chapa
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love it, the best gadget I have bought in a long time.  Multiple uses but perfect for watching NETFLIX.

Reviews.Title: Great buy for avid Apple users!
Reviews.Author: Ren
Reviews.Content: So glad I bought this! Overall, no big complaints. The only reason I give it a 4 is because of the lack of apps (compared to a Roku or something of that nature) Hopefully a new update comes that makes the Amazon Prime videos easier to access. I can watch them on the Apple TV if I mirror my MacBook, which is just a little of a pain.Overall, it works seamlessly with all your Apple products and any iTunes purchases. When you scroll, it is quick and smooth and I am definitely a huge fan already.

Reviews.Title: Love it!  If only it browsed.
Reviews.Author: Jena Thompson
Reviews.Content: I LOVE my apple TV.  The only complaint I have is that it doesn't have browsing capabilities.  Would recommend for the i-tunes, movies, and netflix.

Reviews.Title: Glad I bought it!
Reviews.Author: Dennis Tennant "dtshooter"
Reviews.Content: With a house filled with Apple devices, I figured it was time to get this one too. I like the forum and function and am able to watch a large variety of visual media from my iTunes movie collection to YouTube videos.

Reviews.Title: Great interface great product, great features.
Reviews.Author: Greg Zinn
Reviews.Content: What can I say, when we decided to to finally part with Cable TV our daughter and son in law both said they thought we would really like Apple TV.  I didn't understand what they were saying.  All I can say is I wish we had simply purchased two Apple TV units and left it at that.  The usability, convenience, and compatibility with what we already were using around the house has been amazing.  In particular nearly any video whatever it is alway gives us an option to view them on Apple TV which is great,  Much easier to view something on a TV than an iPhone.  We like the Apple TV unit so much that we are thinking of getting an Apple TV to use with a Smart TV we purchased.

Reviews.Title: Thank you Amazon for another great purchase with free shipping!
Reviews.Author: Ken M. Jones
Reviews.Content: This was a great deal and works really well.  I would highly recommend this product to anyone who want's a great deal at a great price!

Reviews.Title: Another great Apple product.
Reviews.Author: H. Kenagy
Reviews.Content: We use this thing constantly since we're an Apple family. So easy to use and so fast. Works great to stream movies from iPad or Mac. Love it!

Reviews.Title: He loves it....
Reviews.Author: LindaNY
Reviews.Content: A gift was for my husband, who is an apple lover.  He loved it. The instruction were easy and installation a breeze.

Reviews.Title: Love this
Reviews.Author: JMS
Reviews.Content: I love Apple TV!! I love streaming my music from iTunes and my movies. I really think this is a remarkable item.

Reviews.Title: Why the cumbersome alpha/numerical entry mechanism?
Reviews.Author: H. Waters
Reviews.Content: I would have given it a 5 star rating if it didn't have such a cumbersome way to enter passwords and user ids. A regular keyboard would be find.

Reviews.Title: Great content and performance; easy to use
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Great performance and UI, 1080p and Netflix 'superhd' playback is awesome, tons of content. Get an Apple TV and ditch satellite/cable!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Sean Lloyd
Reviews.Content: While I wish Apple would add some more apps like Amazon Streaming, I am able to stream video's off my computer, iPad or iPhone and it is great....

Reviews.Title: No Amazon Prime Access
Reviews.Author: RUreading? "RUreading?"
Reviews.Content: Once again Apple makes a great product for streaming movies, music, photos and radio to your TV. I love my AppleTV. However, I wish Amazon would have an icon for streaming like Netflix, and iTunes since I have an AmazonPrime membership.

Reviews.Title: Very nice value and selection!
Reviews.Author: Wendy Summers "Ginger"
Reviews.Content: We think the Roku was a little easier to use but nothing compares to the selection and quality of our Apply TV! I'm so happy that hubby got this for our home.

Reviews.Title: And the winner is............
Reviews.Author: C Nagorski
Reviews.Content: Okay....I'll admit it.  I'm an Apple Fan.  I have a MacBook, iPad, and iPhone.  BUT when deciding to get rid of our satellite TV to try a more affordable option, I was really unsure which to go with, the Apple TV or Roku.  I read countless reviews.  Both had pros and cons.  I ended up buying both.  The Apple TV for our main television, and the cheaper Roku LT for additional TV's in our home.After trying both....... I'm still an Apple Fan.  What Apple TV lacks in 'pre-set' channels, can easily be streamed from my MacBook, iPad & iPhone to the Apple TV through AirPlay.  (Except NFL!!  But I can't figure out how to watch from the Roku either)  My husband 'settled' for NFL rewind (at a nominal fee) but it can only be viewed on the iPad.  He's semi-satisfied.  Amazingly enough, the minute you attempt to airplay it, it shuts down the stream.  The NFL has their controls!!The Roku has more flexibility to add or remove channels (including 'private channels') or use Plex Play.  I really haven't found any incredible private channels I can't live without.  Plex Play is kind of a pain to set up.  I had to do a lot of browsing/reading to figure it all out.  If you're an Android fan, I believe there is now an App that works with many Roku Models for streaming from Android devices.  At this time, it's not available for the Apple devices.In my opinion, Apple Products are well made.  The cute little Apple remote is metal, not plastic.  It's easy to set up and easy to use (even for my anti-tech Husband)If you have Apple devices, simplify your life and stick with the Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV: Nice device with room for improvement. See my WISH LIST below
Reviews.Author: FLmiami
Reviews.Content: The device itself is very nice, fast, and with the most recent firmware updates (HBOGO and iRADIO) is even better than it was originally. I'd give it a higher stars rating if it offered additional functionality:WISH LIST ITEMS1. A native APP to watch AMAZON PRIME videos.Currently (Dec 2013), it is possible to watch AMAZON PRIME videos by streaming them from an iPhone, iPad, iPod to the Apple TV via AirPlay, and while that's an improvement over the original feature-set, it is not as convenient as a native APP just like NETFLIX or HBOGO.2. Improved and expanded Apple's "Remote" APP functionalityThis app allows the user to control the Apple TV from an iPhone or iPad or iPod similarly as the remote control that comes included with it... In other words, you need to turn your TV on, and select the desired icon from those displayed on your TV screen. To some degree, that is OK if you want to watch a movie. What if you want to listen to iRADIO? It should be possible to select that icon right on the iOS device screen without having to turn on the TV. So, what I am proposing here, is for the Remote APP to show the same menu options on the iOS device screen as on the TV.3. Capability to turn on an A/V receiver automatically when streaming music via AirPlay to the AppleTV, and have the receiver select its input automatically to whichever HDMI port the AppleTV is connected to, and start playing the music "with just one click". This is what takes place if you start streaming music from an iPhone or other Apple device to receivers with built-in AirPlay capability such as Denon or Pioneer, and it would be particularly helpful with ONKYO's receivers which don't have built-in AirPlay capability at this time.

Reviews.Title: Awesome for every TV in house.
Reviews.Author: Stow Fresh
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this device. Keeps getting better with more apps, and upgrades in Apple services. I am getting one for every TV in our house. Great for Netflix and HULU, but Airplay is the real winner.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: tuan
Reviews.Content: I love apple tv. Because I don't  need a smart tv. I use apple tv search everything on line or NetflixI used it just like smart tv.

Reviews.Title: Great if your music and movies are on itunes
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: This is probably one of my most used electronicsIf you have a bunch of music or movies on your itunes then i would suggjest this product over and overyou can't beat airplay if most of your library is on itunes.BUTA roku might suit others needs better especially if they don't use airplay

Reviews.Title: Love the apple tv
Reviews.Author: QueenV
Reviews.Content: Great way to get additional programming on my tv and share from my other apple devices!  All we need is Showtime! AirPlay is fantastic and access to iTunes movies. Downside is no Amazon instant. If that's important to you or you don't use other Apple products, get a Roku (unless you want You Tube as its not available on it yet). We have a Roku on another TV and love it, but the Apple TV is great with our macs and iPads, iPhones.

Reviews.Title: Macbook Pro users beware...
Reviews.Author: Andrew J. Szalla
Reviews.Content: I bought this specifically for the airplay/screen mirroring. We wanted to watch what was on the computer screen on our 55' inch TV. Unfortunately, the quality of tranference from the AppleTV from my Macbook Pro is very low. It lags, takes awhile to load and doesn't sync properly. After looking around online for a solution, it seems everybody with a Macbook has the same issue. Thankfully my roommate has an iPad and it works flawlessly with that and his iPhone5.

Reviews.Title: Cut your Cable Cord
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: Great replacement for cable when you add Hulu+ and NetFlix. Other streaming boxes are comparable, but if you are a primarily Mac household, then this device is a no brainer. Recent additions of the Disney Channels, and Smithsonian make it even better.

Reviews.Title: Great Item
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Been looking at these for quite a while - I'm glad I purchased it.  The video quality is amazing and it's so simple to use from the remote or my phone.  Wonderful purchase, I shouldn't have waited.  Well worth the money for streaming video on apple products.

Reviews.Title: Always improving
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "cube"
Reviews.Content: Constantly finding more uses for it as apple "tweaks" the Apple TVs functionality.  Bought this version for a HDTV and shunted an earlier Apple TV version to an analogue TV to  give the TV a longer "functional life"  (using a Sabrent HDMI to Composite/S-Video Converter 3RCA DA-HDRC to connect the HDMI from the apple TV).

Reviews.Title: A Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: n.e.
Reviews.Content: I purchased my Apple TV a few years ago and it was so simple to active that I have purchased others. The Apple TV walks you through the setup and is very simple. It also connects to my WiFi from long distances (I guess if you have a good wifi). Enjoy this item.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Daniel R Blair
Reviews.Content: This is the best product I have purchased in years. Brought me, and my music collection into the 21st century.

Reviews.Title: Superior Apple TV add on!
Reviews.Author: vince ponciano
Reviews.Content: It plugged in just fine, found my LG  TV, and was up and running within 5 minutes. Good quality picture and sound. Pandora and IHeart radio work great.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: L. Webb
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love being able to stream iTunes purchases from both mine and my husband's accounts directly from our TV. Extremely easy to set up and use.

Reviews.Title: Nice addition to our viewing options
Reviews.Author: Toy Picker
Reviews.Content: I've never used a device like this as I have always just used cable boxes.  I wanted to be able to access YouTube on my television as well as Netflix.  This device was easy to install and set up.  The network connection has dropped twice in four months but I don't know if this is related to the device.  I am running a wireless-n network.  Not a big deal, simply unplug the device and plug it back in to reconnect to the network.  Ironically, this is the same fix for a lot of PC issues, eh?  Anyway, it's a nice little addition to the home entertainment setup and I use a Harmony 900 remote to control this guy.

Reviews.Title: Good Stuff
Reviews.Author: Caballo "Jorge"
Reviews.Content: This is good as it gets. I had an apple tv now for a year and couldn't be happier. This product has only gotten better over time because Apple keeps adding more apps and improvements to the device. I believe that Apple will only continue to add better apps and more content because of its rumored interest into the tv market. I love being able to access all of my itunes music and playing it on the surround sound, the free itunes radio is decent too. I also hope that once more apps are created for the device that the user will be aloud to move and delete apps like on the ipad.

Reviews.Title: Great product for Apple users
Reviews.Author: Peter James Schauer
Reviews.Content: Let me preface this review by saying an Apple TV will really only be fully beneficial to you if you already own an Apple product, specifically a Mac computer/laptop or iPad. The Apple TV was given as a gift to my fiance and I and we absolutely love it. I have some experience using them at work, but I didn't know it's full functionality until I had one at home.From the Apple TV, we access our Netflix account and stream content to the TV and also watch movies that we have stored on the laptop. Through both Apple Mirroring and the home sharing, we're able to put the movies on my hard drive into iTunes, which is connected to the Apple TV. No more watching movies/tv shows on my 13" MacBook Pro!You can also rent and buy movies and have them stored on the iTunes cloud directly from the Apple TV, which is another awesome feature.The best thing about the Apple TV was that it was really easy to set up. I literally plugged it in, connected the HDMI from my TV to the Apple TV, went to the appropriate input, and the directions came up on the screen and it was smooth sailing from there.I'd highly recommend the Apple TV to anyone, especially if you already own Apple products.

Reviews.Title: Great device that will probably be built into a future apple tv
Reviews.Author: jim
Reviews.Content: I had an apple tv now for a year and three months and couldn't be happier. This product has only gotten better over time because Apple keeps adding more apps and improvements to the device. I believe that Apple will only continue to add better apps and more content because of its rumored interest into the tv market. I love being able to access all of my itunes music and playing it on the surround sound, the free itunes radio is decent too. The only thing I wish it wasn't missing was an NFL app. I also hope that once more apps are created for the device that the user will be aloud to move and delete apps like on the ipad.

Reviews.Title: Good for our purpose
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Ruppert
Reviews.Content: This device contains quite a few programs. Some of which require a subscription. Thus far we only use it for Netflix. It does allow us to stream and the picture quality is good. However, it is awkward to search. It is awkward to rewind or fast-forward.The remote does not have an on/off switch and there is not a notation in the manual that shares how to turn it on and off. I assume when you turn the T.V. off, Apple T.V. turns off. To turn it on one must press menu on the remote.

Reviews.Title: Great Streaming, not a HTPC.
Reviews.Author: Christopher
Reviews.Content: If you have any Apple products the Apple TV is a must.  Airplay allows you to stream videos to your TV.  Great for Youtube, Netflix, and HBO go.  I traded in my Apple TV for a Home Theater PC, the only reason was because I wanted to DVR live TV.  If you have lite streaming needs the Apple TV will meet all your demands.

Reviews.Title: Very good.
Reviews.Author: K. Han
Reviews.Content: It does what it's supposed to do very well. Set up was quick with no issues. I love being able to watch various channels and listen to iTunes Radio. Kids love Netflix and Disney channels. We bought it mainly for Netflix and iTunes music. Disney channels turned out to be a wonderful surprise.

Reviews.Title: Love it, but with one drawback.
Reviews.Author: Timothy E. Raborn
Reviews.Content: Great little streaming box with a simple-to-use interface.  I can't give it 5 stars since there is no Amazon Video app.  I'm sure it's because Apple doesn't want to compete with Amazon for purchasing and renting streaming movies.  I bought this as a present for my daughter and I'm considering buying one for myself, but due to the lack of Amazon app, I will be giving more consideration to some of the more popular competitors.

Reviews.Title: Will never watch tv without it again!
Reviews.Author: Megan
Reviews.Content: I love the Apple TV. Just like all other apple products, it is extremely user friendly. It is the smoothest and easiest streaming device I have ever seen. Also, not only can you stream Netflix and Hulu, you can watch YouTube videos, movie trailers, various sports, and much more. And it is so inexpensive! A must have!

Reviews.Title: Love the Apple TV!!
Reviews.Author: Troy T DeLorenzo
Reviews.Content: Love the Apple TV! One of the best purchases I've made from Apple! Love watching Netflix and my iTunes content on it! Apple continues to release more apps!

Reviews.Title: Life Changer!
Reviews.Author: Christina D.
Reviews.Content: We bought this to stream amazon through our TV and catch up on shows via apps (HBOgo, etc). Seriously a life changer. One important note that I didn't catch in the reviews is you must have an HDMI to HDMI cable in order to hook it up; it does not come ready to go out of the box.

Reviews.Title: best $100 i ever spent
Reviews.Author: dang nguyen
Reviews.Content: this is the best $100 i have ever spent.  i used every function in apple tv and  have no need for the apps in my smart tv.  it does a good job up converting everything to 1080p. airplay is awesome too!

Reviews.Title: YES!
Reviews.Author: Shannon Nanan
Reviews.Content: i want to buy two more ... its that good! i recommend this for all users... it almost converts any regular TV into smart TV

Reviews.Title: The Perfect TV Companion
Reviews.Author: Randall G. Rich
Reviews.Content: Best TV companion, has all the popular services and more plus you can share videos from you PC or MAC.  With support for Airplay you can broadcast to one or more Apple TV equipped TVs at the same time. I have one on every TV.

Reviews.Title: Only way to use AirPlay to share screens from iPad or iPhone.
Reviews.Author: Guerry
Reviews.Content: Typical Apple device - does what it was designed to do very well, but (so far) this generation is hack-proof so you can't modify the software to add capability to it (like Plex). If you've got an iPhone or iPad and want to share that screen on your TV, this is the (only easy) way to do it.
