Otherwise Roku can do everything this can do cheaper and easier, and can also do a lot more.There's a reason the previous generation devices sell for more than $100 more than this generation on EBay - you can hack them and modify the software. I just wish someone would find a way to do that to this device. Apple just doesn't want you to be able to modify anything they sell. It makes tech support easy, but limits the capabilities of their devices.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Device
Reviews.Author: Joseph Perez
Reviews.Content: Love it, use it almost daily.  As a result we are seriously considering "cutting the cable".  I especially like the new OS that allows me to mirror anything I'm watching on my computer (not only movies, but web surfing windows also) straight to my 56" TV with the click on one button. I think I'm on my third gen Apple TV and I've gotten most of my family members to get one also.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV is Awesome
Reviews.Author: Patriots Fan
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy this device.  I should note that my family has many other apple devices that work with Apple TV, and as many other reviews have stated your experience with apple TV is likely to be more enjoyable if you already have a macbook, iphone, ipad, etc…What do I use apple TV for?  Personally, I use Apple TV for watching TV, Movies, and for airplay (mirror what’s on my iphone or ipad right onto the tv).  However, the device offers far more options that I have not yet taken advantage of.How do I watch TV and Movies?  Well there are mainy ways to do so with Apple TV.  Here are the ways that I’ve tried and enjoyed:1) HBO GO channel:  If you subscribe to HBO already, this is a fantastic way to watch HBO content.  This is one of my favorite uses of Apple TV and probably worth the cost of the device in and of itself (for me).2) Netflix Instant:  Another great channel and you can set it up so there’s a designated area for kids or adults.  We have it set up so the kids have one channel with only acceptable content.  We use this a lot.3) Airplay: I sometimes use this to mirror what’s on my iphone or ipad right onto the tv.  Great for pictures or videos I may want to show family members.  That’s mainly how I use this feature, but you could do more with it (like watch movies or shows).4) Other Channels:  Youtube, Disney, and a few others I use on occasion.5) Itunes:  I rarely rent or purchase shows or movies from itunes, but easy to do from Apple TV.  Plus it’s easy to access old content you may have purchased.Other Information:Set-up:  I thought the set-up was easy. Opened up the package, connected device, and it turned on.  It took a few minutes to log-in and link to my wi-fi, but pretty straight forward.Remote:  Small and simple to use.Apple TV Device:  Very small and looks exactly like the picture.Cords:  Comes with HDMI connector.Picture:  I’ve had no issues.  Everything seems to work just fine for me, but I imagine this could be a factor if I had a very slow network at home (glad I don’t).  Something to keep in mind though.Automatic System Updates:  This is a plus since there are periodic updates (adding channels or features).  Like other apple devices this runs smooth.I’ll update this review as I try more features, but overall I haven’t noticed anything that’s made me regret purchasing this.  Based on my 5 star review I would recommend buying.

Reviews.Title: If your eco-system has any Apple in it this is PERFECT
Reviews.Author: makoman50
Reviews.Content: Requisite Warning; I am NOT an Apple fanboy. I own several of their products. I own many windows products too. I build my own servers and workstation. I love iOS and can't stand OSX.Simply put, this device is easy, fast and intuitive. I have one of these connected to both my TVs, rather than buying a smart TV I would happily get one of these.Pros;Ability to easily and quickly play Netflix, Hulu Plus etc...Easily and quickly plays any content you've ever bought from itunesCan easily stream anything in your library over wireless. (This works very well for TV shows you happen to put into your itunes library but didn't buy from itunes per se)Attractive enclosureEasy set upCons;Doesn't play Amazon Instant Video. This isn't it's fault but I really wish it did.A tad pricier than other streaming boxes (but so much more polished)Probably wont work all that well if you do EVERYTHING outside of the Apple eco-system. But really, if you have an iphone you are already in the walled garden.

Reviews.Title: cant beat it
Reviews.Author: vrooooom
Reviews.Content: for 99 bucks... im contemplating cutting off my cable. runs netflix nice, hulu, espn. very sweet and hope that they continue to add content like they have been doing

Reviews.Title: Such a cool device!
Reviews.Author: Steven Moore
Reviews.Content: We are using this device in a corporate mid-sized conference room.  Connected to an A/V tuner/receiver, we can now provide Apple devices with a convenient way to reach the projector.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Blueskies
Reviews.Content: stream netflix over hdmi, stream from your computer - awesome!  just know that when we took it to a hotel it didn't work because the wi fi needed web authentication so it didn't work.  great purchase!

Reviews.Title: Finally ready to cut the cable cord
Reviews.Author: KT
Reviews.Content: Really love the endless availability of TV shows, movies and music. Would have given 5 stars if it wasn't for having to pay for each show but there is the option to use the hulu plus or netflix feature for only 7.99 a month. The airplay mode using apple products with ios7 works great. You can throw anything you have stored on your iphone or iPad up onto your TV.

Reviews.Title: Works really well.
Reviews.Author: Enigmaview
Reviews.Content: Like other Apple products it performs as advertised. Little to no setup its ready to go out of the box and it does everything from your personal stuff to the commercial stuff. If you have other Apple devices get this.

Reviews.Title: Love it Xs 3
Reviews.Author: Rilee James "Rilee"
Reviews.Content: I've purchased three Apple TVs over the past few years & have loved them all. I've given one to my parents & one to my sister none who are tech savvy, but they love how easy it is to use. To be fair I own a Ruko & Netgear Net-Neo as well and have found myself using the Apple over the other two. It's simple, no useless buttons and pretty much idiot proof for me :) The best feature in my opinion is the ability to add your own movies, tv shows and music to box. I've added home movies, purchased DVDs and lots of other stuff I can't add to the other streaming boxes. Plus I love using my iPhone, iPad or iPod to stream music, videos or whatever so easily. The pictures comes out clear, the sound crystal and no hiccups in the streaming. Also with the Apple TV you have the ability to block certain content if from nosy ankle bitters or Tweens. It's a fantastic way to gather the whole family for movie night without the hassle of driving to Redbox or a video store. Yes, the rentals are a bit higher, but you save time, milage and gas by simply staying at home.Now with the new update Apple offers more channels than ever. Channels I actually like & will watch. Disney, The Weather Channel, Sky News, HBO Go, Smithsonian, You Tube, and more. I cut the cable cord and honestly can't say I miss it. The monthly subscriptions to Netflix & Hulu Plus cost me less than twenty dollars a month. My dishnet work bill ran about 150 a month. Granted I can't watch new TV episodes until the next day, but really it's not a huge deal. If you're torn between streaming box sets it all comes down to this : Are you a Pro Apple person? If so get Apple TV. If not Ruko might be the best choice for you. Ruko allows you to stream movies from Amazon Prime, but you have to pay the 79 a year for the privilege. As for as streaming movies from your computer to the Ruko I haven't tried it so I don't know if it's possible.All in all I can honestly say Apple TV is my first choice when it comes to streaming TV.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV MD199LL/A
Reviews.Author: Virginia
Reviews.Content: The apple TV is fantastic. I can see everything I want in the TV. It is a good product. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: What You'd Expect! A Great Set Top Device.
Reviews.Author: Joshua T. Ebert "Ebes"
Reviews.Content: Great! I've had an Apple TV for a while, and I was due for an upgrade. The newest model doesn't offer a ton more, but it's still solid and has some worthwhile improvements. For me, the full 1080p is the most noticeable aspect. You can really see it, and it allows you to play more media types (e.g. if you have a library collection with lots of 1080p vids).I'm an Apple-enthusiast, so keep that in mind. =P

Reviews.Title: Ultimate in streaming entertainment!
Reviews.Author: unclespoon
Reviews.Content: Finally the perfect device for watching Netflix, Hulu Plus, and even streaming things like NFL Sunday Ticket over Airplay from my iPad or iPhone! It's plugged in via ethernet so it's super fast. No complaints at all!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Jonathan G.
Reviews.Content: Awesome product. Streams a lot faster than mi wifi tv. Highly recommend to anyone that is looking for entertainment. Yes!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: David J. Wild
Reviews.Content: Although the channels are more limited than the Roku, both the menu system and the picture quality are far superior. iTunes Radio makes this a no brainer.

Reviews.Title: Return of the king
Reviews.Author: Robert B. Keys "a very handsome gentleman"
Reviews.Content: Apple is the best digital delivery system period. The future of TV the future of information transmission is here. Top design and performance. I also have a Roku and though both work I would place the Apple TV head and shoulders over Roku better design better interface faster delivery

Reviews.Title: Fantastic product, works perfectly and is my new home media standard
Reviews.Author: Joe Church "Joe Church"
Reviews.Content: I love AppleTV after waiting for years to try it, I recently gave it a shot and love it!  I did have to convert all my home media to Apple MP4 or M4V format, but once done I am very happy with it.  The Netflix client is fast and easy to use, visitors no longer have trouble using my home media devices and having AirPlay to stream content, like movies, videos, or even just music is super convenient now.  I don't know how I managed before the AppleTV came along.  I highly recommend it to pretty much anyone, but if you have a lot of content in other forms (home media) converting it all over is a pain.  So its not for everyone.  But in any case, this is a great product, it can handle super huge HD Media files and even 3D.  I'm very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Updated to be the best (at least for me)
Reviews.Author: Jon Folkers
Reviews.Content: Until the recent updates, I preferred the Roku XS because of its versatility. It could do Amazon, Angry Birds, Pandora, and a lot of other "underground" video services. AppleTV could do a very nice Netflix client, Apple iTunes purchases, and in-home streaming, as well as AirPlay from iOS and OSX devices.Now that it can do HBO Go natively and Amazon Streaming via AirPlay in addition to everything else, I think it's the way to go, at least for me. It's beautiful and easy to use. It's OK that it doesn't play Angry Birds.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Brenda Schmid
Reviews.Content: Apple always has great products, and this is not exception.  We ditched cable TV after a tornado that knocked out our cable for 3 months, as we were spending over $1,000 a year on it. We bought the Apple TV device. It is very small and easy to install. We also got the Bose all in one speaker. Now we stream Netflix, and are very happy with how the Apple TV works for us.

Reviews.Title: Must have for iPhone or iPad users (especially college students)
Reviews.Author: mmcrae2
Reviews.Content: I use my appleTV everyday to watch netflix, listen to music from my iPhone, or study homework on from my iPad. It's a great source and easy to use. I highly recommend it, especially if you don't want to pay for cable and just want to use netflix and Hulu or watch movies from your iPad

Reviews.Title: Added Apple TV to new I Pad
Reviews.Author: Jimmy
Reviews.Content: The Apple apps are great.  I like the music best, radioAnd Vevo.  I also added Netflix after canceling cable.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV is the Bomb!
Reviews.Author: T.B.
Reviews.Content: We love this thing!  Very easy to set up and operate.  The list of available programming seems to grow every week.  I only wish our cable provider was more cooperative so we could take advantage of HBO GO and similar providers.

Reviews.Title: The Bomb
Reviews.Author: Mr Slim
Reviews.Content: Using playon app and filmon app and Crackle App on my ipad and ipod touch I can mirror over 800 free channels on my 50" plasma. Bye bye  cable tv. Now all of my friends are saying goodbye to cable and buying apple tv and using the iphones as a remote to get hundreds of free channels. Apple TV is the best device I have used in a long while and I am now sold on everything Apple. Using Apple TV and an over the air hdtv antenna paying for cable tv is a thing of the past.

Reviews.Title: The best
Reviews.Author: Liam mcdonough
Reviews.Content: All of your media form iTunes, all device screen push, netflix, hulu... who needs cable now?  Not me thats who!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Mr. Average Guy "Waytogogto"
Reviews.Content: Out of the box and working in 15 minutes, its that easy. We mainly stream music and watch youtube and dabble with some of the other apps. It all works great.I was told it was possible to stream Amazon Prime from the iPad through Apple TV but that is NOT the case so this is not the device for you if Prime is what want. This is not an issue in our home because we stream Prime through a Playstation 3.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!
Reviews.Author: vherrera
Reviews.Content: It's a great device. Video, pictures, music in streaming. Very easy to conect in the network. Full HD, great image in the TV!!

Reviews.Title: must have for those with multiple apple products.
Reviews.Author: Stephen V. Le
Reviews.Content: I recently bought a macbook air (already own a few ipads, and iphones) and this product really makes viewing movies on my TV easy. Previously, I was using a Western digital WebTv HD with a jump drive to stream movies. It was a little cumbersome having to load the movie onto a jump drive or hard drive before I can watch a movie. Now I can just stream it right off my laptop, iphone, or ipad. Also the user interface is easy to navigate and use my HBO Go account.

Reviews.Title: It's better than I thought
Reviews.Author: 40 Something Dad
Reviews.Content: I have an apple centric set up so it was natural for me to choose this over the competing Roku3.  I was worried though as I obtain my movies via DVD and BR rather than through iTunes.I adjusted my ripping process to target the ATV standards and along with iFlicks I have a great workflow for my content.  For playing back the device is great.  Airplay from my iOS or iMac works better than I expected and this makes up for the lack of Amazon Prime on the device.I took a star off because the device does not support DTS or higher audio standards and it also is not capable of transmitting 3D, so I still have to use my PS3 and 3D bluray disks for that.  If it did, I could place my entire collection on my media server....

Reviews.Title: Using as a replacement for cable/satellite
Reviews.Author: A. Russo
Reviews.Content: I'm currently using the Apple TV as a replacement for cable or satellite TV.  I'm currently running the Apple TV through a Pioneer AV receiver and a Samsung 65" LED TV.  I couldn't be happier with the Apple TV's picture quality.  The sound quality is also superior, but it is limited to a 5.1 output.Without cable, I'm using an off-air antenna to provide local channels and supplementing with Netflix and iTunes through the Apple TV.  I'm thinking about adding Hulu Plus as well.  I've used the built-in apps in my Samsung TV and a PS3 to stream Netflix before.  While I had good results using the PS3, I prefer to use the Apple TV.  The Apple TV also allows me to access iTunes, which is great for shows which are not on Netflix.  I'll gladly pay $40 for a season of a show that I want to watch vs paying $80+ every month to the cable company.When using iTunes, the picture is a full 1080p.  The streaming is very smooth and it takes almost no time to buffer.  My internet connection is through AT&T; U-Verse and is 18MBPS.I also subscribe to iTunes match, which allows me to play all of my music through the receiver which is hooked up to the Apple TV.  It also runs very smoothly and is fully controllable from my iPhone or iPad.  Additionally, I often stream Pandora from my iPhone via AirPlay through the Apple TV.  The Apple TV even displays the album cover art when listening to Pandora in this fashion.Overall, I'd say it's an excellent replacement for cable.  The setup was easy (HDMI cable hookup and the software walks you through getting it connected to your WiFi).Pros - Excellent quality picture and sound, full access to the Apple universe, streams/mirrors iPhone, iPod, and iPad, easy setup, great Netflix interface.Cons - Limited to 5.1 surround sound, can't download apps (as of yet).

Reviews.Title: Issues
Reviews.Author: robert
Reviews.Content: Not easy for streaming videos.  Selections using remote are painfully basic. Jury is still out though, will give it more time to get used to before it gets tossed.

Reviews.Title: Great and Simple way for Streaming on TV
Reviews.Author: Cooper
Reviews.Content: I bought the Apple TV for my parents who love watching shows/movies on Netflix, but don't have a game consol/wifi capable dvd player that allow streaming.  Apple Tv is great for all them because it is so simple and what it does, it does great.The apps that work with Apple TV are great, my favorites are HBOGo and Netflix, but the ability to wirelessly stream any apple device to the TV is Apple TV's best function in my opinion.Now for a couple negatives. the apps on the device are great but there could be more. You have to purchase an HDMI cord or digital optical cords separately.A few little complaints aside, Apple TV is a great way to stream movies, shows, or music through your TV via apps or your own Apple devices.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: K. Thompson
Reviews.Content: Could not be easier to use!  Recently added ESPN and Hulu plus.  Will be perfect when they add Amazon Prime.

Reviews.Title: Well done.
Reviews.Author: Brent Faunce Welch
Reviews.Content: They should read the instructions with the remote first and thoroughly.  It meets all expectations as I have Iphone, Ipad and IMac and now ITV.

Reviews.Title: Its Apple TV Silly
Reviews.Author: Dan M
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this product especially the remote functionality with my ipad and iphone.  Mirroring and airplay are very convenient if you are an owner of other iProducts.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV rocks
Reviews.Author: J. Silvia
Reviews.Content: I use this primarily to connect my PC to my TV. With this device you can access all of the content you have stored in iTunes on your PC or Mac right on your television. Of course, the apps are nice too and being able to purchase or rent (and then stream) movies and television shows from iTunes is wonderful. I highly recommend this product if you're looking to bridge your TV and PC.

Reviews.Title: One Box to Rule Them All
Reviews.Author: Kristofer Bolz
Reviews.Content: I. Love. My. AppleTV.  Plain and simple.  It's easy to use and intuitive, it integrates flawlessly with my MacBook and my AirPort, and it's become the only peripheral I even use anymore.

Reviews.Title: Great little device.
Reviews.Author: venus_smrf
Reviews.Content: A friend recently purchased this as a gift, and though it's a little expensive and not something I would ever have bought for myself, I have to admit that I enjoy it immensely.  It's easy to install, even if I had to go out and buy an HDMI cable that wasn't included, and it's very easy to use.  It also doesn't take up much space, which is always appreciated.  The box is maybe a little bigger than a baseball.The device comes with access to a variety of programs--Netflix, HBO, and a whole lot of sports channels I don't care about--but most of those need subscriptions.  People with HD TV's probably wouldn't need Apple TV at all, as most of those come with the TV, but this makes access easier.  It also comes with YouTube, and who wouldn't love watching "Ghost in the Stalls" on the big screen?I believe there's also a way to hook up an ipad to the box so I can have the contents of my ipad on the television.  I haven't gotten around to doing that yet, but it doesn't seem difficult and would make purchasing one of these worthwhile just for that.All in all, there are easier ways to gain access to what Apple TV provides, but it's still nice to have them all on one convenient box rather than having to fight Internet connections and all the other nonsense that goes with.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Daniel P Lynn
Reviews.Content: Works great, got it in no time. Works perfect great for entertaining the kiddos. Easy to use, easy to set up

Reviews.Title: Typical Apple ease of use
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: Set up is very easy and fast. Very intuitive interface. I also bought a Roku-3 for another room. The Roku has the advantage of being able to stream Amazon Prime videos. Also the Roku has the remote with the headphone jack which is a great option. If your a big I Tunes user this is the unit to but. If not I would recommend the ROKU-3. Both ran great and easy setup.

Reviews.Title: Greatest Streaming Media Player
Reviews.Author: Bartolo Vargas
Reviews.Content: My iTunes content streams in Full-HD, Netflix interface is extremely responsive as is the Hulu +. AirPlay is convenient for streaming your own local content on iDevices. Super fast connectivity with wireless n and connect through ethernet for an even better experience. It's a extremely stylish(sexy) piece of hardware as is the apple remote. I don't see a need for other applications offered by likes of roku because of AirPlay! Also content on iTunes well I've found everything I've ever wanted on that store! Because it's an apple product it works great of course.using airplay limits viewing but can be fixed by using zoom option on TV! I enjoy the benefits of NBA app as well. I'm so buying more for my other tv's. hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: if you like to watch online programs, this is the probably the best out there
Reviews.Author: T. Zhao
Reviews.Content: I don't like Apple products in general because I hate the simplicity in design and likes more control. However, Apple TV is the exception here since it does its only job very well: watch TV. Of course, searching youtube for a particular video can be pain when you need to type something using the awful control pad to search each character at a time.If you are Chinese or like to watch Chinese programming, Apple TV provides great access to a large libraries of Chinese programming for free.

Reviews.Title: Excellent ; Hugely improved
Reviews.Author: pingufreddy
Reviews.Content: We previously owned the prior iteration of Apple TV circa 2011.  It was slick but had a very limited range and was effectively useless in our wireless setup. We switched to a dual band ROKU 2 XS and had improved results.  The ROKU was not that reliable, however.  It frequently dropped signal and most of the time played back in a format well below HD.  The device does not tell you the bandwidth directly but provides a range of one to four dots with all four being HD.  We almost never never got four dots. Most of the time we got three dots, sometimes 2 or even 1.  Still, it worked.We bought the new Apple not expecting any improvement in signal or resolution but merely to watch shows on HBO GO.  It turns out that the suits at ROKU, DirecTV (our service provider), and HBO could not agree terms to stream HBO GO.  So, we were able to watch HBO GO on ipods and pads and computers but we could not watch it over the ROKU on our TV (figuring this out by the way took forever; its a fact that all of the parties involved seem to want to keep well hidden).  Needless to say this was frustrating since we were paying for the service through the HBO subscription.Anyway, the new Apple TV was an unexpected delight in every way. The signal streams in HD almost all of the time.  It is fast, way faster than the ROKU, and you can rewind and pause without dropping the stream - a common event with the ROKU.  It is simply a much more powerful device than the ROKU. Build quality is typical Apple but at the high end of what they do.  It is a solid, heavy and robust feeling piece of gear.  Compared to the Apple the ROKU feels light and cheap. The milled aluminium remote is a delight to use and is far nicer than ROKU's remote which is really quite nice itself.  Presentation is sleek and navigation and setup are a breeze.  The exception is accessing a computer library through the network.  It doesn't bother me because I have a dedicated stereo and have no desire to listen to music through the relatively poor Sonos speakers attached to the TV.  Others may disagree.All of this was totally unexpected.  I had anticipated range problems and was hoping that APple had stepped up and fixed the issue.  They had.  I am not an Apple fan generally but on this piece of kit I think they knocked it out of the park.  On a functional, aesthetic, and build quality basis I would expect this to be $300 - $400 piece of gear.  Either ROKU is reaping huge profits or Apple is taking a hit to position itself for the full blown Apple TV ecosystem rumored to be in the pipeline.  I think the latter.  For $99 this is an incredible deal.  To say that an Apple product is underpriced is even more incredible but, however strange, its true here.I have to give this five stars on all counts with the obvious caveat that it would be nice to access one's Amazon library from Apple.  A really great little piece of kit and a nice surprise.  Well done Apple.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Tom D.
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, the kids love it. We can review the entire week with the family on Sunday evenings with the entire family. Everyone has an I-phone so we all get together and share pictures as a family. Havent used all the capabilities yet, we are still learning.

Reviews.Title: Excellent....If you use Apple products
Reviews.Author: Roux
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd Apple TV device, and if they come out with a newer version, I will probably buy it too.  I am heavily invested in "iDevices" in my household - iPhones, iPads, and iTouch music players.  I have my iTunes library that controls all the devices tied to my main PC that is in the office of my house.  I use iTunes as my digital entertainment hub for all of my devices.  iTunes has all of our music, music videos, and digital movies (including digital copies that come with my blu-ray movies that I buy).  I was looking for a way to take all of that digital media and play it in the family room where the home theater is set up.  I chose the Apple TV device.This box is about 3" x 3" x1" and is barely noticable.  Hookup is very simple - power cable, and HDMI cable to the receiver (or directly to TV).  Setting it up takes all of 10 minutes.  It can be connected to your network using a wired connection or wireless.  I use wireless in my house, so I had to set up the wireless on the Apple TV.  Once the Apple TV is connected to the internet, you will put your Apple ID and password in.  Everything you have purchased from Apple is now right there at your fingertips.  I also wanted to tie this device to my media collection that is stored on my PC in the office.  This requires you to turn on Apple's Home Sharing option.  Once you turn that on, the Apple TV will find your media library in iTunes, and make it available.There a few pre-seeded apps on the device (Netflix, HBO 2 Go, You Tube, etc.), plus access to all of the content you have in the Apple ecosystem.  Everything is simple to operate, the user interface is easy to understand, and if you have an HD TV, the quality of video is excellent.Again, I would recommend this to anyone that has a lot invested in Apple content and products.  Since this is a direct competitor to the Roku, Boxee, etc., the form factor of this is very similar to the others.  The only difference between these boxes is user interface and media options - for instance, a Roku box will not play anything you have controlled through Apple's iTunes, and vice versa.  Bottom line, this is made for people invested in Apple for their digital music, digital TV, and digital movies.  If you get your music from Amazon, use Prime Instant Movies, or buy music from Google play, this box will not work for you.  You will need to look at the Roku or other similar device.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Daniel J Martin
Reviews.Content: works as expected. Little slow on macbook. Works great with IPAD and IPHONE. Don't ask for more words when customers are taking time to review.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Farhan Bhatti "Farhan"
Reviews.Content: This is a great product and will only get better when the new OS X comes out within the next two months (Fall 2013).  OS X Mavericks will let you use Apple TV to connect wirelessly to your HDTV and use it as a 2nd (or 3rd) display for your computer.  That will be fantastic.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: R. A. Moore
Reviews.Content: i got this after trying out the google chromecast and i fell in love. i can play all of my movies and music off of my multiple computers via itunes and it is always hd quality and never laggy. the interface is extremely easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Delayed screen... cannot use for work
Reviews.Author: Hardeep Singh
Reviews.Content: Delayed screen on Wifi... cannot use for work purpose. Good for watching movies. You will notice delay what you type and what you see on screen.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: mooseswamp
Reviews.Content: I love AppleTV. This thing gets way more usage than our cable box or any other system. Watch Netflix, HBO Go, Hulu, and stream content from your iTunes.

Reviews.Title: Makes streaming easy
Reviews.Author: J. Keller
Reviews.Content: I used to watch movies, and other media on my iPad, but now I effortlessly stream them onto my TV. Content is endless, and movies stream in high definition,even on my non-high def TV. The Apple TV box is really small, and the remote is even smaller, so make sure you remember where you put it down, or it is likely to disappear. Searching content with the remote can be tedious, but no worries; the remote app for the iPad, makes it easy.

Reviews.Title: A must have addition to your home theater solution
Reviews.Author: Kelub
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV is a fantastic, affordable device to add to your home theater setup. It allows you to:- Rent and purchase from Apple's vast digital library of movies and TV shows;- Play music from streaming radio stations (of which there are hundreds to choose) or your own music if you sign up for iTunes Match;- Browse your pictures from photo stream (quick tip: create a "shared" photo stream titled "apple TV" and add pictures from your phone or iPad that you want used as a screen saver, then set the Apple TV to use that stream for screen saver purposes);- Setup a home media library and have all of your movie collection at your fingertips (GREAT for kids, no more scratched or lost discs, and material can be censored with parental controls);- Use AirPlay to stream audio or video to your TV effortlessly (great for playing services like Spotify or watching video stored on an iPhone or iPad);- Use NetFlix, HBO Go, YouTube, Hulu, or any number of other supported services directly from the device with clean, easy-to-use interfaces and 1080p & surround sound support.There's no question that if you don't own any Apple devices the value of the product diminishes a bit. There are other devices that will play NetFlix, HBO Go, YouTube, etc., that will stream home library content (although most of those don't allow for parental controls if they're using DLNA as their backbone technology), etc. But if you have just one Apple mobile device - a phone or a tablet - the Apple TV is hands-down worth purchasing. It seamlessly integrates into your environment and allows you to enjoy the Apple ecosystem on your television, and AirPlay is such a convenience.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: R. Stewart
Reviews.Content: I bought it to interface with my PC and IPad for displaying pictures video etc on my TV. Works well with Netflix Hulu etc. the ATV3 works well with HD HDMI CABLE IS NOT INCLUDED so 1 make sure you have HDMI connectors on your TV and pick up the cable.

Reviews.Title: I have two and love them
Reviews.Author: W. Stoneman "Bill"
Reviews.Content: Great alternative to TV and very useful for netflix.  Need to add Amazon Prime.  As usual Apple is a little stingy with products that do  not send money directly to their bottom line.

Reviews.Title: I like it!
Reviews.Author: Aleksandr Nechiporenko
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I like Apple TV! It is very convenient and easy to use like all Apple's products! recommend it for you!

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!ul
Reviews.Author: Jbird
Reviews.Content: We use it for EVERYTHING!! Netflix, Hulu, HBO Go, iTunes, Pandora!!!! It works far better than our Blueray player, which is how we used to stream... This little puppy is AWESOME!!!!

Reviews.Title: apple ROCKS
Reviews.Author: Mols
Reviews.Content: I don't think there is one negative thing to say about any Apple product. This Apple TV is the perfect example of that. I love this! Anything that is on my iTunes, I can now get on my tv, not just movies and shows, but music and pictures as well. This Apple TV was delivered to me in less than 24 hours!!! It was awesome. It also came with two Apple car decals! Make sure you have an HDMI plug because it is not provided with the Apple TV, so maybe one negative thing but not that big of a deal. I am extremely happy!

Reviews.Title: MUST have for apple users
Reviews.Author: Patrick Roche
Reviews.Content: IF you have a Macbook, iPhone, iPad, or any other products this is a MUST HAVE, its no roku but it will give you more use from your products and well worth the purchase. I would recommend this to anyone that likes what apple makes, and it even comes with apple care for the first year for free with tech support to assist with any issues. BUT!!! i would recommend that you buy a High Speed HDMI cable as none others will work and cause issues. amazon sells some for much cheaper than anyone and they are just as good.

Reviews.Title: Great Device
Reviews.Author: Kyle J.
Reviews.Content: This device is awesome. If you have apple products, it is a must have addition. All you need is a wireless connection.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Device!
Reviews.Author: elcaballo
Reviews.Content: My wife & I have enjoyed the Apple TV since we purchased it from Amazon in June 2013. After having it for a while I can say we have enjoyed it very much. It has great content, features, and I even did a Keynote presentation on it from my iPad using the AirPlay Mirroring feature. I cannot compare it to other competing devices, but it's hard to go wrong with this device. My only real complaint is that you cannot customize where the apps are on the screen...meaning I'd like to have the Netflix app closer to the settings app. Not a real problem, but would be nice. I recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: best item with mac and iPhone
Reviews.Author: Steve Young
Reviews.Content: the best item with mac computer and iPhone.it works well and the Wifi system is so simple to use.

Reviews.Title: Not as many appa/channels as other devices but covers the essentials.
Reviews.Author: harmono
Reviews.Content: Sorry for the comparative review,but Ii have a Roku 3,Roku 2xs, the Apple TV and Sony Internet TV with Google TV.  So I should be able to compare them. I purchased Apple TV, because I wanted to be able to use it io view my iPad, and the Roku does not have A Youtube channel. I find myself mainly using the Roku, but probably because I cant have Hulu on both devices.Even though I like checking the Roku app store, I rarely watch anything that Apple TV does not have. The Apple works smoothly, and was easy to set up. I have not had enough time with the Sony TV to comment, but I bought the Sony because it has Google chrome, and Google TV! which might be less expensive for renting, or buying titles. Since the Sony has so many options, and channels, and apps, if it works smoothly it might completely replace the functionality of the Roku, but not the Apple.  The one thing about Roku 3 is that you have the headphone jack on the remote. So I am finding that all three devices are great, I don't have cable TV so I have gone wild with these things. If you are an Apple person you should get one. If you don't have a Mac or iPad, it is great, but you might want to wait until the verdict is out on the Sony, or the Roku 3 for a less expensive, yet robust, mature experience, Or if you are saving a bundle, not paying for a landline and cable etc., then if the Sony turns out as good as the price, get both the Apple TV, and the Sony w Google TV.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: Skleathers
Reviews.Content: I have canceled my cable since I got this... Rent movies from iTunes, have Hulu and Netflix... The one disappointment is no amazon prime...

Reviews.Title: It changed my entire TV experience
Reviews.Author: Can Sarisozen
Reviews.Content: I have an old Sony Bravia LCD TV, and it doesn't have a wireless connection. Well, it didn't. As soon as I connected Apple TV to my TV, I was able to use Comcast remove app with my iPhone because my TV got connected to the wireless network through Apple TV. So right now, in addition the great benefits of Apple TV, I can also control my TV from my iPhone, which allows me to get rid of at least one remote controller... I recommend this to every Apple user...

Reviews.Title: Best streaming and mirroring device
Reviews.Author: Tam
Reviews.Content: Let me start out by saying I am comparing this product to other products I personally own.  Apple TV is still the best streaming and mirroring combo device.  If you own an Apple product like the iPhone, iTouch, iPad, and Mac, you can seamlessly stream video and audio content to the Apple TV on iOS devices and mirror your screen on Macs.  This is probably the most powerful feature of the Apple TV and why I love it.The problem with the Apple TV 3rd generation is that it is currently not able to be jailbroken and has not been for some time, that is why I do not use the Apple TV to its full potential, however I do on the 2nd generation.  With 1080 over 720 on the 2nd generation, sometimes I wish the 3rd gen can be jailbroken then it will truly deserve a 5-star rating and can be crowned the best media streaming device, period.

Reviews.Title: LOVE this thing
Reviews.Author: P. Arceneaux
Reviews.Content: We have one of these at church for our projector for our Pastor to use with his iPad.  I loved it so much, I now have one at home!

Reviews.Title: Very nice product
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: I ordered this after I cut my cable. I have had no problems installing or using this product. Kids enjoy it as well.

Reviews.Title: super easy to set up
Reviews.Author: Jason Hull
Reviews.Content: i bought this specifically to use in a slideshow picture frame. incredibly easy to set up and get going. had it running & showing pictures in less than 20 minutes. highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: It's an apple product.
Reviews.Author: Austin Milam
Reviews.Content: Like in the title, it's an apple product which says it all. It's easy to use, looks great, and has a sleek design. Anyone who wants the ability to have Netflix and other video streams without wanting to buy an expensive blu ray player or buy a gaming console should definitely get one. I don't even watch cable anymore and I have the elite package from xfinity.

Reviews.Title: I bought two at one time.
Reviews.Author: Allen Mu
Reviews.Content: I had a 720P one at home and found it so good to watch anything I like. It uses more than anyother similar devices. I also found it a good gift, so I bought two new 1080P version, one for myself and one for my friend. Like it!

Reviews.Title: Apple TV MD199LL/A
Reviews.Author: Bill Suda
Reviews.Content: I bought this device in order to watch my YouTube videos on my HDTV.  I have Time-Warner Turbo Internet service and so streaming videos from YouTube works very well for me.  Set-up was straight-forward following the instructions provided.  Be aware that Ethernet & HDMI cables are not supplied, but the included remote contains an excellent battery.

Reviews.Title: Love love love this product
Reviews.Author: Michelle Huang
Reviews.Content: Love the product.  I instantly show my videos, movies and pictures on my tv. It's so much easier to watch videos this way than on my iPad. It's great how apple makes all their products work seamlessly with each other.Be sure to update the product once you receive it. There are more apps available now.

Reviews.Title: Works 4 me!!
Reviews.Author: Reese
Reviews.Content: Well this is my 1st streaming product. im not into the streaming box phenom, i have cable so i really dont see the need in it. My main purpose for getting the Apple TV is because im all to in the Apple ecosystem...iPad (full size & mini), iphone, imac, mac air, ipod nano (that i lost last week) i got it all.  However, i normally play my movies on my ps3 thru the ps3 media only problem is CINAVIA yes the block for pirated movies. I did my research and got the Apple TV to remedy the problem and save HD space on my ps3.  And boy can i say this remedies the problem and i love it. however i really have no other use for it but for watching movies so all the other apps are useless to me so wouldnt be able to review also i do love loooove looooooove the airplay that is so cool and one day im going to test how i can take my apple tv and my iphone to a friends house and watch my movies. i give this 5 stars well worth it. Very beautiful UI better than ps3 convient and easy breezy set up. Now if only Apple will bring the retina iPad mini. Good Luck guys!!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Raoul Duke
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up.  The hardest part is going to the internet gateway and finding the wireless access password.Portable.  I went to my in-laws yesterday.  They don't have a lot of channels for kids.  We were going to be there for a few hours and the kids have always gotten "bored!" in the past despite our best efforts to keep them entertained.  Who wants to pull out toy after toy and hear the complaining while we're talking and eating dinner and playing cards? So I took Apple TV with us.  The cables (two of them) and the box fit in a grocery bag.  I hooked it up to my in-laws TV and the kids watched cartoons and their junk while the grown ups did our thing.  After dinner I went on YouTube and played songs for my 75 year old father in-law that he hadn't heard in years, that he loved, etc. etc.  He loved it! Then we watched clips of sporting events on YouTube.  He loved them.Portable is a HUGE pro for this product.  Other products like the Roku will be portable as well but this is so easy to set up, so easy to use (my six year old can easily navigate the interface), and just so...great!Be advised that you'll need a HDMI cable.  We bought an Amazon brand 6.5 foot cable for about $6 at the same time as when we bought this Apple TV and I had it hooked up in under five minutes.  Love it.  Chef recommends!

Reviews.Title: Good ! Can be better!
Reviews.Author: Sath
Reviews.Content: Got the Apple TV and started updating it. Completely shut off and no connection. Then i had to actually purchase a MicroUSB cable to connect it to the computer so that i can restore it through i tunes. I think if APPLE wants us to restore through computer should have included one. Limited channels but i can see few more channels like Willow Tv and some international channels through AIRPLAY. This is a must have if you own an ipad or iphone. Otherwise Roku 3 is a much better choice.

Reviews.Title: Love this thing
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is truly awesome.  I love the apps and content that can be streamed or shared.  Quality product as always from Apple.  Going to get another one for the living room.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Product
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: I have now had Apple TV for nearly 2 years. We got Apple TV to watch Netflix instant on it. But it's been so much more. We now rent movies from iTunes at least 2 times a month, plus we listen to music, watch YouTube videos, and now it includes HBO Go and Watch ESPN!

Reviews.Title: Great great great
Reviews.Author: Ibrahim  Badr
Reviews.Content: I love it ,i love it...... This item is very cool and we used it every day to watch our iphone-ipad,iPod and my iTunes in our big screen tv.. Love it yes i recommended

Reviews.Title: Great gaget
Reviews.Author: salman rashid
Reviews.Content: For a relatively low price, I think this is a great gadget and does a lot of neat things. Remote control is not good.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Lily Nomie
Reviews.Content: IT IS VERY EASY TO FOLLOW......SIMPLE.....THE APP IS VERY GOOD TO THE EYE...EASY ACCESS IN AND OUT OF APP..WILL RECOMMEND IT

Reviews.Title: Apple TV review
Reviews.Author: Anthony Yu
Reviews.Content: It is a very good product but not much free service from apple. It is very expense to operate the apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Product
Reviews.Author: Korey
Reviews.Content: Pros: Great little product. Extremely easy to use. HBOGO application was added with the last update (must have an HBO subscription to use). Watch ESPN app is great. Mirroring from an iPad or iPhone is still incredibly cool. Downloading the remote app for your iPhone or iPad is a MUST.Cons: It really hates to be hard wired to the internet. I have no idea why, but have given up on that. It runs great on WiFi.Updates sometimes take a couple of attempts. You can obviously skip updating, but you will miss out on awesome new features and improvements (like HBOGO).The app selection is still a little thin.

Reviews.Title: Should have bought it long ago!
Reviews.Author: Carlon Haas
Reviews.Content: I love this device.But then again, I own an iPad, iPhone and Macbook Pro.It plays nice with all my devices.The thing I like most about it is that I have A LOT of iTunes music.If you have iTunes match and want to listen to all your music through your TV/stereo, it's totally worth it!I've heard some people say they wish it had most content, but I beam other content like Amazon Instant Video through my iPad so I don't feel like I'm losing in the content department.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: L. Kim "L Kim"
Reviews.Content: I'm pleased with this version of Apple TV. However, I may not be the best source for a comprehensive review (yet) since we've only used it for airplay from our ipad to stream programs - this part does work quite well.

Reviews.Title: Small size, and a lot of media opportunities
Reviews.Author: MasterReviewer05
Reviews.Content: This product can fit anywhere in your living room. It only requires 2 cords in order to work. There is no power button on this device. It is always on so when you need it, it will be ere for you. If you own an apple device, you can stream media to the tv in a matter of seconds. Very impressed with this item. One thing I don't like is that it can be slow when opening up an app. I still recommend is item to apple users.

Reviews.Title: This is pretty cool
Reviews.Author: J. Williamson "JBW"
Reviews.Content: I would like it better if it allowed the ability to use it as a second screen more. The fact that it just mirrors the existing screen makes it a little less enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: Apple tv
Reviews.Author: JK
Reviews.Content: Works well, my old tv is not a smart device this apple gadget complements that divise nicely. The remote and its buttons could be a tad larger,

Reviews.Title: Great Product -wish it included Amazon Prime
Reviews.Author: David J. Martin "Opera Lover"
Reviews.Content: We now have four of these little beauties. One we use when we travel.  The other three are in our house and work fine together in the same environment.  You just give them different names.  While our most used feature is Netflix, we also stream directly from our iPads.  You simply select the Apple TV box you want the iPad to connect to.  They install easy and work flawlessly.  But they don't (won't) have an App for Amazon Prime.  That's our only complaint, as sometimes the program we want to watch is not available on any other service.

Reviews.Title: its oaky
Reviews.Author: T. Whitney
Reviews.Content: first week a had it totally used all my data plan up on verizon. now just plug it in when i want to use air play which works great. wish it could cache movies so wound't have to download them every time for playback at least the last three or something.

Reviews.Title: I use it alot but...
Reviews.Author: Jesse
Reviews.Content: It's great to stream all of my kids movies off of my iMac to my daughters tv but I have to restart it constantly. Almost every time I start a new show for them I get the infinite loading circle and have to restart the AppleTV. If it didn't do that I would rate it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: It was a gift so I can only speak to process
Reviews.Author: Buddhasmom
Reviews.Content: This was a graduation gift.  He was very pleased.  He sent me a note saying he's already using it.  The local delivery piece got hung up a bit but I was very pleased with how it turned out. I really like the local delivery option.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Ronald F. Hicks
Reviews.Content: Though I am still learning all that this product can do, I already love it. The best feature thus far is that it allows me to play the music on my computer through my home theatre system. So, I get great sound when watching tv programs or when listening to my music.

Reviews.Title: A must if you are a Comcast customer
Reviews.Author: Apple phi
Reviews.Content: Comcast will not allow their customers to access HBO Go on the TV unless you are an Apple owner and have an iPad or similar device to project movies downloaded from the Internet to the Apple TV device.  It works great

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: KAO
Reviews.Content: I've got everything Apple, so I figured this is the next step and I'm very happy with it.  Super easy set up.  Haven't hooked up with Netflix as yet, but I will.  But music and photos are a breeze!

Reviews.Title: Great technology
Reviews.Author: Designer 92101
Reviews.Content: I don't know why I have waited so long to get Apple TV. After installing in my main homes living room I quickly ran back to the computer and ordered another one for our 2nd home as well. Awesome for sharing videos, pictures, and business presentations and documents. I work from home and clients love when I push documents and charts to the 50" screen. Great for personal use and business! If you have a Mac or iPhone/iPad this product is a MUST!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Matt Pridgen
Reviews.Content: I love Apple TV, it is much quicker/easier to navigate Netflix and other features then other streaming devices I have seen.

Reviews.Title: Like
Reviews.Author: khaim korii
Reviews.Content: Neat. Minimalistic. Cool. Would probably get lost in a move it being so small but nicely built. Probably get another

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: corsue
Reviews.Content: I was unsure about this product when my husband got it, but it works great! The internet works better through it than my TV or DVD player and I love showing my iPod screen on my TV. Excellent purchase!

Reviews.Title: A great companion for the Apple enthusiast
Reviews.Author: Kevin Wong
Reviews.Content: This little device has made entertaining friends such a delight. The two features that make the best impression are the Photo Stream screen saver and AirPlay. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Need easy access to your entire library and other streaming services?
Reviews.Author: Kevin Dalpiaz
Reviews.Content: Then Apple TV is the way to go.  Simple setup, simple usage, simple decision.  If you already use Itunes for your music needs, then Apple TV is a no brainer.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product
Reviews.Author: Cathi Lee
Reviews.Content: My whole family loves Apple TV. We use it on a daily basis to watch all of our favorite shows. We also use it to connect with the ipad and iphone to play music.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly!
Reviews.Author: Edward Welsh
Reviews.Content: I have had the Apple TV for about a month now and absolutely love it. It works seamlessly with our iPhones and iPads through the airplay functionality and I love that it streams any purchases from the Cloud rather than taking up memory on the devices.It is a must own if you have apple tablets/phones.

Reviews.Title: Best Gadget Ive Bought for $94
Reviews.Author: Thrive Tech
Reviews.Content: Like Movies? Like Music? Do presentations? Like Netflix? GREAT, This gadget is for YOU! I suggest the mount option for cool but discrete mounting on back of tv. I like using the iPad with Remote App, the included remote kinda sucks for navigation.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: fsu142
Reviews.Content: A must have for anyone with an apple product (i.e. mac book, ipad, iphone). Basically integrates your tv with almost every app out there. MUCH BETTER than using a smart tv that requires a clumsy remote.

Reviews.Title: Great but don't lose your remote!
Reviews.Author: Tom Hulina
Reviews.Content: The remote is a cool device but a bit small for larger hands.  We lost it in the recliner because it fell into a crevice because of size and slipperiness.  I used my iPad to run the apple tv.  iPhone works also with free app.  You must set up your apple tv though with the original remote before you can use them to control unit. Did finally save both remote and recliner and did not have to spend $20 for a replacement. This is important because there are no buttons on unit to interface without a remote.Apple tv is pretty cool.  Like the hi def and choices so far.  My in laws saw it and bought one also and are happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Syble Jean Garrison
Reviews.Content: The apple tv worked extremely and we are very pleased.  The instructions provided were not as helpful as they could have been and assumed an above average level of computer literacy.

Reviews.Title: Work as expected
Reviews.Author: OB
Reviews.Content: I bought this for only airplay but have found the YouTube and NBA to be great. What I don't like about it is that the movies are expensive - there should be some free movies. Also, instructions do not mention that the software update should be done via wifi, and not Ethernet connection.

Reviews.Title: It is OK
Reviews.Author: T. Accomando ""part-time chef""
Reviews.Content: I am disappointed with the limited availability apple TV offers.  The interface is excellent and it is easy to use however.

Reviews.Title: Good but...
Reviews.Author: Tigeress7
Reviews.Content: I have this and a roku. The reason I have roku is because Apple TV doesn't support Amazon video. LAME!!!!! Apple needs to stop being like this and let people use their products how we want to after we buy them.

Reviews.Title: Good iPad Extender and Not Much Else
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: I had a reasonable idea of the limitations of the Apple TV from reading the reviews.  I decided to pick one up anyway just to replace my composite video cable adapter that was busted.  That cable costs around $40-$50 and I was able to get the Apple TV for $75.  So instead of hooking a cable from my iPad to the TV, I transfer the video/picture/audio to my TV via the Apple TV and the Airplay function.  When I bring up my video on the iPad, a rectangle with a triangle under it shows up.  If you click on that, my Apple TV shows up and I select it.  When I hit play, the video is transferred via the wireless router in my house to the Apple TV and from the Apple TV to my TV.  As a wireless extension to my iPad, Apple TV seems to work well.  That's worth a solid 3 stars.However, the Apple TV has pretensions of being a multimedia player.  At that, it fails miserably unless your primary source of video and music is from iTunes, Netflix, or Hulu+.  Quite a few folks have raved about the Apple TV menu.  The reason it is reasonably clean is due to the lack of options.  You cannot watch any of your own content unless you have purchased it from iTunes or have it reside on your computer iTunes account.  I knew about this limitation before purchasing this box but I was still shocked with the lack of functionality.  One nice feature is the ability to display your Photo Stream from your Apple iCloud account on your TV as a screen saver.  All in all, I give Apple TV perhaps 1/2 a star on the Photo Stream support but nothing else.So if you are looking to extend your iPad/iPhone/iPod to you TV without wires, this is a nice box (though you need to have a wireless network in your house for it to operate).  If you don't need that wireless extension, don't pick up this box unless you are a big iTunes user.

Reviews.Title: Used to love it
Reviews.Author: Perry
Reviews.Content: I used to love the Apple TV for one reason, early movie releases.  I could buy movies sometimes as much as two weeks earlier than the physical version and while I didn't buy many, I could rent others.With Apple TV you have a very simple device that pretty much plays movies, music, YouTube videos, Netflix, and TV shows.  Yes this is cool and the interface just works but, it is seriously lagging behind other devices in the market.  For instance, my Google TV has Hulu Plus, Netflix, Play Movies, Crackle, Amazon Prime Instant Video, Flixster, Vudu, Amazon MP3, Pandora, slacker, play music, and a whole host of other options as well as the ability to manage my whole entertainment experience.The first problem is obviously, flexibility and other devices with Google TV or Roku boxes have way better options available to them.  The second issue is that Loyalty isn't rewarded with Apple!  You see, Apple feels that their exclusive product is worth more for rentals over shorter periods of time than the competition.  Both Amazon and Google deliver their rentals at lower prices and Amazon actually gives you twice as long to watch the movie.So, I honestly have to say that you should pass up the Apple TV until Apple gets their head out of their sphincter!  Mine is sitting here where I cannot sell it because I have too many movies that I stream with it (About 30) but, I won't give them any more of my money until they start Rewarding Loyalty instead of Taxing It!

Reviews.Title: Why did I wait so long?
Reviews.Author: John L Rumler
Reviews.Content: Well, I finally made the leap and purchased an Apple TV unit. And I must say it was absolutely simple to hook up and sync to my iMac. It works like a dream. I absolutely love using Netflix on it.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: J. Millar
Reviews.Content: You can watch anything from you tube to Netflix on your regular tv. All purchases from iTunes can also be viewed with this devise.

Reviews.Title: Good product..
Reviews.Author: James A Bottom
Reviews.Content: We really like the apple TV and the price was good...but it doesn't come with a HDMI cable that it needs to work...they could have told us that!

Reviews.Title: Awesome compliment to your other apple devices
Reviews.Author: Robert A. Suarez "Shadax"
Reviews.Content: Airplay is easily the coolest feature of Apple TV.  You tap the airplay button in spotify or any other app that supports it (youtube, videos, you name it) and it's instantly on the screen.I have it hooked up to my surround sound via optical, so even if my TV is off and I'm doing housework or hanging out in the backyard, I can adjust the volume and track right from my phone.Other than airplay, the entire system is smooth and intuitive.  You can sync a bluetooth keyboard as well for easier browsing.  I recommend the Kensington keyboard.

Reviews.Title: great quality
Reviews.Author: Ryan Knudson
Reviews.Content: somethings I would change, nothing that is worth writing about.  More than anything, this product has great quality!  I've been streaming Netflix from my Xbox 360 for two years now and even though it's only capable of 720p, my TV is only 720p anyways.  However, the sound and picture was dramatically better and noticed within the first ten minutes of watching.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup and works like a charm
Reviews.Author: Diptesh
Reviews.Content: Just got Apple TV delivered today and took less than 5 minutes to go through initial setup including connection to our wireless network. Tested with iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, and iPad 4...all work like a charm! To be more specific, I tested viewing photos, mirroring, and viewing videos (both stored on my device & streaming from internet sites).

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Chidi
Reviews.Content: I thought it would give me more access to free TV and Movies.I like the gadget because I can port things from my iphone to it.Yes, I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Seems to have glitches
Reviews.Author: A. Mancheski "A Yooper"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this Apple TV for my parents to hook to there Sony Bravia tv via hdmi cable but connection goes in and out. Have updated the tv, updated the Apple TV, tried numerous different hdmi cables and no luck getting it to stay connected picture goes in and out. The voice talking on the Apple TV is by far one of the most annoying I have heard and at first even after I turned it off still kept going. After trying 6 different hdmi cables finally got one that for now seems to work with it. Will see how it goes and hope the issue I had initially is no more. Both junk hdmi cable and funky glitches in Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: A well designed product
Reviews.Author: William Brunkan
Reviews.Content: We used this to watch Netflix, rent movies or listen to music--the quality of the streaming is generally excellent, better than our usual cable transmission. We also use Airplay to send music or pictures from our iPad.  (We have an Apple airport router) It is simple to use, takes little space, and the remote is easy for anyone to learn.  (With a bit of effort, the Harmony remotes will work with it as well, but the Apple remote is so simple and effective that we prefer it )  Beautifully designed.  We have two and have not noticed any problems with both being used at the same time.  Please note that it does require the use of HDMI but does not require any other apple products.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Lance
Reviews.Content: Was ripping my hair out trying to stream videos from my PC to my living room.  I had tried XBMC, PS3 media server, and Plex.  I believe all three of these say they can do on-the-fly encoding, which is what I was really looking for (I have a lot of HD movies in MKV format).  None worked very well, although Plex seemed to be the closest to what I was looking for.  But it just wasn't able to handle the HD MKVs and it was driving me crazy, so I just grabbed an AppleTV and spent a weekend converting all of my movies in handbrake.  Handbrake is free and easy to use and once you get the movies into a format that you can add to iTunes streaming to the AppleTV works flawlessly.  I thought having all of my movies and TV shows in iTunes would be a pain but it's actually pretty convenient letting iTunes do all the organizing.  However if you're using Windows and don't have a great PC then iTunes may very well be a deal-breaker.  My PC is pretty beefy so I don't have much of a problem.The interface is sleek and intuitive, as you would expect from Apple, streaming works great, connects via HDMI (although it also has an optical audio port which is nice).

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Lucy
Reviews.Content: Great product however I just realized I would need aHDMI cable when trying to install it. The vendor shouldhave specified that the cable is not included.

Reviews.Title: Great product. Effortless integration with other apple products
Reviews.Author: HD Enthusiast
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product primarily for the purpose of hbo go streaming. Although hbo go does not have a standalone apple tv app yet I found it to work very well with my iPad. It does not freeze at all and streaming hbo go and Netflix is so smooth. It never buffers. The interface is also very well layed out and easy to use. I also own a roku hd which has the standalone hbo go but constantly locks up and has choppy streaming. The only thing better about the roku is that it has more apps/ channels. Hopefully Apple TV will gain more channels such as amazon prime, showtime, and starz in the future

Reviews.Title: exactly  what we wanted !!!
Reviews.Author: ljm
Reviews.Content: This streaming TV from the internet  gives us exactly what it claimed.  This is the future.  On top of that is all the money we will save.  LM

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: TheGonz
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my brother who is a graphic designer and has Mac computers all over his house.The Apple TV works very good and now he streams the videos in his libraries (laptops, iphone, etc.) and we can all watch them in his TV.As soon as he connected the device, it was recognized in all his Apple devices and was ready to work!I have read that it may have some buffering issues but my brother hasn't experienced any problems in this regard yet.

Reviews.Title: This thing is awesome
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: I ordered this so I could watch all of my iTunes movies & TV shows through the box. I already had Netflix through PS3, but accessing Netflix through AppleTV is much smoother. It is completely silent VS the hum of the PS3, and load-up time for the AppleTV is 40 seconds for Netflix VS 1:20 for PS3, so thats a huge plus right there. Worth the buy, hopefully they can get NFL on here sooner rather than later.Update: I just found out I can stream all sports games from my MacBook Pro using AirPlay, so not only is this thing awesome, but it also completely removes your need for cable. Quit living in the past, buy AppleTV!

Reviews.Title: Great and easy to use
Reviews.Author: Shaina
Reviews.Content: I have had my Apple TV for several months and love it! I use it mostly for Netflix and Hulu. The only thing I don't like about it is the tiny remote. We lost it a long time ago, but that is fixed very easily with the "remote" app. It works very well also.

Reviews.Title: Worked fine
Reviews.Author: Ron Marshall
Reviews.Content: $100 one time fee vs $95/month to Dish Network. And that's with no movie channels. Here are 5 more words.

Reviews.Title: Apple all around best product!
Reviews.Author: Leticia Villagomez
Reviews.Content: Love My Apple TV! It was a must have for all my other apple products. Love the air play with all the apple products.

Reviews.Title: I Absolutely LOVE this Thing!
Reviews.Author: Rusty Schucklefurd
Reviews.Content: Great product.  HOWEVER, a couple of useful tips:  You need a good wireless router, and, itunes should be your main storage source for your music, films, and photos if you want to fully utilize all the features this product has to offer.First, the router I had just didn't have the strength, so I got Apple's Airport Extreme which did a superb job.  Very few drops or buffering issues when streaming.Second, I love the features it has in regard to itunes - once you sync it with your itunes account, any movies, music, or photos you have on your computer can be streamed onto your TV with your Apple TV.  It also has a screen-saver feature which will "slide show" any picture collection you want to show up on your TV screen.  It also gives you multiple ways to present those photos in your screen-saver mode.You can also set up music files through itunes to play through you TV.  Very nice for dinner parties, holiday season, or just want to have music going on in your house while you do chores or whatever.It will only work for one TV so you will have to have an Apple TV for each television you want to stream on.  It does stream Netflix and Hulu Plus, but not Amazon.  It also has a "movie-clips" site from which you can view the latest movie promos.Overall, a very nice quality product - if you are committed to itunes.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Little Box
Reviews.Author: Dottie
Reviews.Content: All I can say is my family and I love it. Since we don't have cable tv it allows for is to watch tv show from our apps for free. I love how we can listen to music too and look at our home videos and pictures. If you can afford it buy it. Only complaint is it does not come with an HDMI cable.

Reviews.Title: great gift item
Reviews.Author: Elsa Alexis
Reviews.Content: i would recommend this to anyone. great gift item. great for movie lovers, quick and easy to install and use

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Theresa L Johnson
Reviews.Content: This is the greatest product I have bought in awhile, great price. I love airplay. It is so easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Godd device
Reviews.Author: Chris Seeke
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised.  Not a lot of apps.  Air Play is great! . . . . . . . .

Reviews.Title: Nice box
Reviews.Author: Great
Reviews.Content: Love the functionality of this. Netflix, share screen with Mac and more..simply all you need in a streaming box. Had the Apple TV 1 , an updated to the new version.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product, just one thing...
Reviews.Author: T. Lewis
Reviews.Content: Excellent product.  Very happy with the quality of the device, quality of the video, the interface, and the video offerings.  I would give it 5 stars, if Apple would allow Amazon to utilize airplay.  Currently you can't use airplay within the Amazon Instant Video App, which is disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Great if you are an Apple family, missing some openness
Reviews.Author: Jeff Krueger
Reviews.Content: We already have a Roku and 'smart' tv's, but when are 3 year old cracked our LED TV, we went low end on the replacement and needed something for Netflix, etc.  Since we already own MacBook Pro's and Ipads (and Iphones), we went with the Apple TV.  For the most part, we've been satisfied and love the integration with Itunes.  However, the fact that Apple limits the third party apps causes some issues.  For instance, no Pandora App.  No Amazon Prime Instant app (not surprising I know).  The roku is much more open and would be my first choice due to the lower cost.

Reviews.Title: For the price, why not?
Reviews.Author: R. Borkman "consumer"
Reviews.Content: Slowly becoming an Apple fan.  The UI is typically intuitive.  Syncs up quickly to AirPlay, multiple devices.  Considering dropping my satellite provider.

Reviews.Title: No Amazon Prime watching on this baby!!
Reviews.Author: JLeeB
Reviews.Content: I really like this product a lot. I can stream my class lectures (using downcast) on my phone and mirror them to the TV!! I also like that you can watch netflix or hulu plus. The only reason for the 4 star .... I wish I could watch my Amazon Prime movies/tv shows using the Apple TV device. Even if you try to mirror it you can watch the trailers but it does not allow you to watch the movies. Very disappointed about that and I am not sure if that is an amazon or apple thing.

Reviews.Title: It does what it's supposed to do
Reviews.Author: SandyNYC
Reviews.Content: While I had to call Apple to set it up since the directions are almost non-existent for a person who is less than computer savvy, once it was set up, it did pretty much everything it said it would....perhaps some things not as good as I would hope due to the speed of our internet connection I would imagine...what we did find out though is that we could have gone through life happily without it...it seems like everything we thought might be free, costs (even things we have free on our regular cable on demand cost here) but we've got it and we will use it to whatever degree we will.

Reviews.Title: Love this product!
Reviews.Author: Andrea Finney "Doodlerah"
Reviews.Content: I can not emphasize how much we love Apple TV. It's so simple to set up and use. Not only does it stream movies and television show, but music, photos even facetime. We liked this so much that we gave them as gifts to our adult children for Christmas this year. They have been just as pleased.

Reviews.Title: Love the Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Graphx
Reviews.Content: I use my apple tv everyday. I watch netflix all the time. Also, that you can use your Ipad and display your images on the tv. Slides shows and more.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertized
Reviews.Author: E. Butler
Reviews.Content: Hulu has been added which is very nice.  This thing works great with my iPad and iPhone as well.  I am extremely happy with it.  For 99 bucks it is a great deal.

Reviews.Title: just keeps getting better
Reviews.Author: Kevin Mongru
Reviews.Content: over time newer updates come out that make it more responsive and more content availalble. ive owned google tvs which annoyed me due to slow updates and not feeling like a quality product .. for 99 bucks or less this is a great deal and personally i like the interface better than the roku .. but the roku is cheaper but loses iphone \ ipad functionality

Reviews.Title: Wish it had more apps
Reviews.Author: kjmij
Reviews.Content: I love streaming my music, movies, and TV over Apple TV. But I wish it would also allow non-Apple streaming services (i.e. Amazon) on the device without having to use laptop mirroring.

Reviews.Title: Netflix + iTunes music & video access + photo streaming
Reviews.Author: LPDDS
Reviews.Content: Lots of great features, but probably the two that are most fantastic:- getting to see the thousands of digital pics streamed from my PC on a regular basis, family is regularly mesmerized- getting to easily stream itunes music to the living room, finally all digital music available around the houseThen the perhaps more commonly thought of access to iTunes movies and Netflix is just great. Love not paying cable company more and this product has brought me to the edge of canceling video cable.

Reviews.Title: Great Addition to the electronics we already have
Reviews.Author: D. Vina
Reviews.Content: This is a great gadget.  Love all the features.  Not one problem with it! Love being able to access Netflix and all the music.

Reviews.Title: Seamless technology
Reviews.Author: James Wood
Reviews.Content: A must for anyone who uses iTunes. Easy to use, very convenient for media streaming. You won't regret it. Promise.

Reviews.Title: amazinG!
Reviews.Author: sebastian alvarez
Reviews.Content: I really like this product. never had one , i think i will by one for each tv in home

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Nakeidra
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased the Apple TV and absolutely love it. We do no have cable but I am able to play TV shows on the TV for my kids to watch  from my ipad, while I'm still surfing the net, which I think is a great feature. I would highly recommend this product to anyone with apple products.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: p4knyc
Reviews.Content: not the best, as you are locked into the the apple ecosystem. Ability to airplay from ipads, iphones via ATV is HUGE!limited apps, netflix,hulu+, wish i could add more apps like PBS.....

Reviews.Title: It's fine
Reviews.Author: E. Bernard
Reviews.Content: This product is good for people who enjoy Apple items (like my husband). He likes Apple TV well enough, but finds it somewhat limiting with what can be rented vs. purchased (it would be nice to rent movies and not necessarily buy them). Perhaps it's a licensing thing, we don't know, but it's still a kink in the system.

Reviews.Title: Another awesome apple product
Reviews.Author: Conner
Reviews.Content: I give it 5 stars. It is exactly what I expected it to be. It also comes at a reasonable price

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: What a wonderful item to have! We can watch shows of all types like netflick (7.99 monthly).  Easy to set-up and use!  We just love it!

Reviews.Title: Apple tv
Reviews.Author: ALFONSO A. MUNOZ MONTERO
Reviews.Content: With Apple there are no middle terms, or you love Apple or you hate it.Since i am in the first group of people and i have many apple products at home, Apple tv is a must specially when you use the Airplay function.

Reviews.Title: Good Stuff
Reviews.Author: Kendeno Knowles
Reviews.Content: The apple tv works perfectly. I was skeptical about buying this from another retailer outside of apple, but it works fine.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Sol
Reviews.Content: Very good and easy to use , The remote is a little weak , but for the price and watching netflex and youtube was easy

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Agustin Pablo Costa
Reviews.Content: For the price (100 bucks) it's one of the best devices you can hook up to your TV. I've never seen netflix run faster and/or with such good quality (tried it on my PS3, computer and ipad).

Reviews.Title: Love it but...
Reviews.Author: Raeann
Reviews.Content: I love that I can mirror from my iPad and iPhone onto our tv.  You can't mirror everything...Amazon Prime movies being one.The thing I guess I wish it had?  More to do.  I wish that there were apps specific for Apple TV that could be used via phone or remote.  I wish I could go onto safari without having to use my other i devices.UPDATE - March 2014Sorry it has been forever.  They have updated it and it now has HBO for those with HBO.  There are many more pre-installed "apps" and things to do.  I enjoy it more now.I stopped using it for a couple of months because it was kind of boring but once more content was available and mirroring is allowed via more sites, it is great.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Fit.
Reviews.Author: Dr. Benjamin Smith
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my girls room. Play Netflix and Pictures on it for my kids, easy to setup up, wireless connection works great.

Reviews.Title: Great for an Apple Family
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: My wife finally decided she wanted one for Christmas--mostly to show pictures and video from the iPhone.  We have been very pleased.  Using Airplay couldn't be any easier with our phones (the family has 4...) and showing pictures from our Windows computer was also easier than before.  Compared to the Streaming BluRay (we had an LG and now have a Panasonic), the Apple TV starts much faster, has better and faster menu system, which delivers a more pleasant streaming experience.  Purchased shows from iTunes are about the same price as Cable VOD, but better quality.One trick worth mentioning--When we facetime my daughter, I mirror the image from my iPhone to the TV screen, place the phone on top of a speaker just under the screen, and two of us talk to my daughter on the big screen.
