Works great, and its much more pleasant that trying to pass the phone back and forth or cram into the picture.We use it mostly for sharing pictures, and streaming Netflix.  Its been well worth the money just for the pictures.  We could share pictures on the TV before, but it required more hassle, and we only did it on special occasions.  Last week I took some quick shots and video of a warehouse on fire near my office, and showed them to my wife on the big screen before we watched a TV episode.If you are an apple family, its well worth the $100 to share photos on the TV with incredible ease.  But I would say its not a good purchase if you don't have apple products.  We can do most of the same things through a Streaming BluRay player--just takes more steps and time.

Reviews.Title: Great.
Reviews.Author: J. Hurley
Reviews.Content: No complaints. Airplay Mirroring gets used regularly and the built in menus are nice and responsive. This is now my 3rd device (TV + PS3) for Netflix and it is easily the best.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Ralex420
Reviews.Content: Plug n play perfection! (Requires iPhone, iPad or Mac) or really doesn't get any simpler!I understand that it's proprietary... Wish I could use it with my windows products..

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!!
Reviews.Author: L. Cheek "army wifey"
Reviews.Content: Living overseas has us out of the loop a lot of the time. Ive been listening to the radio on the apple tv, everyday!! I love it! Its pretty funny to listen to the commercials from other states, back stateside. Looking forwards to trying out more of the features!

Reviews.Title: Perfect as always
Reviews.Author: RealWorld "Jymn"
Reviews.Content: I have three of these and each has been perfect. Bought the amazon five dollar Hdmi cable and had it going in minutes.

Reviews.Title: Great product from Apple! Kudos
Reviews.Author: Kumar Kuchimanchi "KK"
Reviews.Content: This is a product I cannot live with! I have 2 of them. One for my family room TV and other for my basement home theater. The streaming is so fast and perfect. We use mainly to stream Youtube videos, Music, photos, videos from multiple iphones, IPADS during a party. If you have any Apple product this is a must have. Lot of people don't know much about this product until they use it. AppleTV surprised many of my friends and they ordered the first time when they saw this at my place :). Only addition if apple can add a bluetooth receiver to this to stream music from any other devices other than apple devices and provide an audio jack other than just HDMI to connect to any stereo system, all the bluetooth audio receivers will go out of business.

Reviews.Title: 2nd one and counting
Reviews.Author: DBW
Reviews.Content: This is my second Apple TV.  I loved the first and wanted to add another to the bedroom.  I love the mirroring and ability to watch movie clips before purchase.  It is super simple to hook up and never has in issue.  I downloaded the free remote app from itunes so I can control it from my iPad or iPhone.  Now the Apple TV device sits out of site and it can be operated without a direct line of sight.  COOL!

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: LJ
Reviews.Content: This product changed my life. I don't even need cable tv anymore, so I cancelled my Time Warner subscription and save $150 a month. Not bad, eh? If I want a show, I can buy it on Hulu. And I watch films on Netflix. And I can airplay from my MacBook Pro. What more could you want? Everyone needs an Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!
Reviews.Author: reviewer
Reviews.Content: We got in our Apple TV and set it up instantly! The apple TV allows for access to Netflix and Hulu from the device through an app on there. I also found it was cheaper to just buy some of the seasons I love on iTunes than to have a bigger Dish package just to have that one channel so it has allowed us to save something like 200 dollars a year by looking at what we could buy or rent through iTunes and the channels and shows we currently watch. Hulu has access to tons of shows including the CW. We did have a slight hickup in doing the airplay from my MacBook Pro 2012 with the updated software. The CW website was having serious lag problems when it came to the TV screen. YouTube was also a little lagging from the computer to the TV screen through AirPlay. That is before I found the part where there's a YouTube app on the apple TV so you can simply search and show stuff through the device itself. I highly recommend looking at YouTube for people showing the device before you buy just so you know what it can do.In order to do AirPlay we did have to upgrade out software on our Macbook Pro 2012 but our "New" iPad's are already compatable and do the AirPlay brilliantly. One other addition when the iPad was hooked up the "shown screen" or the picture we were getting on the TV screen was smaller than the computer and when we just used the product itself. We have a wide screen TV. So it shrunk our TV quite a bit. You do have to pay for Netflix and Hulu if you want to use the services. Also I'll add in how the iTunes works. All your purchases are on there and accessible, but if you buy a season pass the show will show up one day later to be able to view. For example, my guilty pleasure Beverly Hill Housewives show's on the television on Monday's but I can't watch the show through iTunes until Tuesday. I think it's Tuesday at like midnight or early in the morning but it's always the next day even for American Horror Story. Hope this helps those that are curious about the apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Good Streaming media player -- Youtube, Vimeo, airplay...
Reviews.Author: J. Spurlin
Reviews.Content: I've been pretty happy with Apple TV so far -- I have it installed with HDMI cable to the TV, and a TOSLINK fiber-optic audio cable to my receiver.  Simple to install, works right out of the box.  I've not had the buffering issues that some reviewers mention, and the router we are using (Linksys 802.11g) is perfectly fine to give me good signal strength.Works well for YouTube, works well for Vimeo, works good with Airplay.  EXCELLENT with NetFlix, also-- the interface is better than on several Blu-Ray players I have seen.Integration with other apple devices is seamless -- you just suddenly have the "send to AppleTV" option on your phone or iPad.If you have other Apple devices, and a decent wireless setup, this will be a good addition to your media devices.

Reviews.Title: A Must Have For Wired Homes
Reviews.Author: Grant
Reviews.Content: I added Apple TV to my Mac, Macbook, Ipad (X2) and Iphone (X2) home. It's a great addition that pulls all the technology together. For the cost it really can't be beat if you are running mac products.

Reviews.Title: Great seamless design
Reviews.Author: JWT84 "JWT84"
Reviews.Content: It's perfect small size packs a lot in what entertainment it can provide. It is amazing with the iPhone 5 mirroring options the best video quality on such a small device.

Reviews.Title: Great tech purchase
Reviews.Author: msquire
Reviews.Content: This is one of the better tech purchases I made this year. I can mirror from my iPhone or iPad mini, stream Netflix and Hulu plus or listen to music from iTunes. With the airparrot app I can mirror my PC which is great for streaming. I highly recommend the Apple TV

Reviews.Title: Good, but could be better
Reviews.Author: Emerald Black
Reviews.Content: This allows you to watch things from your laptop, but it requires iTunes and thus is limited. If it allowed you to display anything from your laptop, it would be better. Also, Apple recommends that this "wireless" product be hard wired to the internet. Ok for me because I store it close to the router, but that could pose as an inconvenience if you wish to store it elsewhere because it tends to lose the internet connection more often than usual.

Reviews.Title: Worked as expect BUT requires additional WiFi Access Point
Reviews.Author: S. Tompkins
Reviews.Content: Wanted to use this as a single device to drive an HDMI flat panel from an iPad. Turns out you need a separate AP to make the connection. I thought I had researched it thoroughly but alas I did not. So, with the addition of an AP I was able to mirror my iPad's screen to the flat panel. Still have to fuss with screen size but over all happy.

Reviews.Title: Sucked me into the world of Apple
Reviews.Author: Eric Tello
Reviews.Content: My first Apple product was an iPod nano many years ago. I enjoyed it (still do), but it wasn't until I bought an Apple TV that I began to realize the greatness of Apple. It brought Internet connectivity to my tv in a simple, elegant way. Is it perfect? No, but it does so much that you're willing to overlook its shortcomings.Plug in 2 cables, and you're done: power and HDMI. It's pretty simple to setup wifi, and then you're up and running. You have access to iTunes movie and tv show purchases through the cloud, you can access iTunes media from your computer, Netflix, Hulu plus, Vimeo, YouTube, and internet radio stations. There are other streaming video services available, but I haven't used those yet. Personally I'd like to see Amazon instant video and UFC made available, but those aren't available just yet. I'm keeping my finger crossed though.Another great thing about Apple TV is its smooth integration with other Apple devices. You can have it mirror your Mac computer screen, or stream music, videos, and photos from any iOS device. I love mine so much that I bought one for my brother and two for my mother. We love our Apple TVs, and we're slowly but surely becoming part of the Apple family.

Reviews.Title: A super addition to our entertainment center
Reviews.Author: Sandy D. Scott
Reviews.Content: I am simply getting a ton of enjoyment out of this little device.  I enjoy being able to interface my iPad to my HD TV displaying my photo albums, playing games, etc., etc.  It was also the catalyst for my subscription to NetFlix through Apple TV and I am currently enjoying the free month offered by NetFlix.  I also enjoy streaming my music collection through the device to the large screen and audio system that I have hooked up to the TV, and also enjoying the endless radio stations available through Apple TV.  One of my best purchases in a long time!

Reviews.Title: APPLE TV! WEEEEERQ
Reviews.Author: Adam "CHANGEMENT"
Reviews.Content: So much better than Smart TV. I just wish the Apple TV would have HBOGO on it! But other than that, it's flawless. And amazon shipped it REAL quick. HA!

Reviews.Title: If you're a couch potato
Reviews.Author: maui1015
Reviews.Content: I just got this product and for the price you'll won't be disappointed. There's like millions of movies and shows to choose from. But you do have to rent or purchase certain movies. For example: If you purchase nexflix for $8.00 a month you'll get to choose from hundreds if not thousands of movies and tv shows. Then there's another I think 15-20 more apps on there. You tube is free, I've only used it for about an hour so I can't tell you too much. I forgot to mention one important thing, you need to have a internet service wireless or hardwired.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Todd Porter "the snuffy"
Reviews.Content: I own 2 Roku devices and decided to give the Apple TV a try. It is a great device and I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my techie husband who says it's a 10/10.  Exactly what he wanted, works exactly as described--"perfect."

Reviews.Title: Apple TV for Christmas
Reviews.Author: Arlo
Reviews.Content: Got the Apple TV, plus Amazon HDMI and audio cables. The setup was easy, and mirroring our apple devices allows us to get more value out of our big screen tv. We are not into paying extra for subscription services, but our kids used their subscriptions for Hulu Plus and Netflix, and the device worked as advertised.  We mostly will just use this for mirroring. Great for showing a group your photos on iPhone or computer. BTW, a program called AirParrot is great for getting older macs mirroring capable without the risk of an OS update.

Reviews.Title: I own three...
Reviews.Author: Thomasj106 "Thomasj106"
Reviews.Content: This is a great product.  I own three and they all work flawlessly.  I stream movies, music, and pictures from one iMac to all three and they all work perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Todd Smith "gadget man"
Reviews.Content: Received as a gift after contemplating for quite sometime.  Works great with my current iTunes library.  If you own "I" devices, you need this product!.

Reviews.Title: Mind change
Reviews.Author: Pam Davis
Reviews.Content: Just before I bought my husbands Christmas gift he came home talking about this and since he is an electronics buff I ordered it and he loves it. It arrived quicker than I expected, too.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: kb
Reviews.Content: Bought this for christmas for my husband and kids and they love it! I was going to purchase it through the Apple store but I always check Amazon before I buy anything because it tends to be cheaper. I was surprised to see that it was being that generally Apple products are the same price everywhere. Even got the HDMI cable through Amazon together with the Apple TV and it was cheaper than purchasing just the Apple TV through Apple!

Reviews.Title: Apple tv
Reviews.Author: Miles
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is great, as long as you have media to use it with. (iTunes, hulu, Netflix, ect.). I have many purchased items from iTunes, and I can stream them on Apple TV without downloads. This thing is great when u use it right.

Reviews.Title: Must have for apple users
Reviews.Author: shiniqua carter
Reviews.Content: I bought this after purchasing my iPad 3 and I absolutely love it! Easy to use out the box. You are able to stream true 1080p movies from iTunes. My favorite feature is the ability to use my photos on my PC as a screensaver and still play music.  It's great when I host parties.  My guest enjoy looking at the thousands of photos of family and friends.  The mirror feature for the iPad is also wonderful.  I recommend this product to anyone with an apple mobile device.  A++++++++

Reviews.Title: Needs improvements
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: While it fills the needs I had as far as streaming from my iTunes library, renting and Netflix go it still needs some serious software improvements.  Having to have every computer you plan to share from being in the same home sharing network seems excessively confusing.  Also having both movies and music from shares computers be under the computers menu instead of the respective music or movie category on the home screen seems dumb.  Also the home screen needs work so it is more like iOS and less its own amalgamation.

Reviews.Title: Apple tv for netflix use
Reviews.Author: N. David
Reviews.Content: Excellent performance from this unit main use is for netflix use and works excellent, easy setup and performance from a unit so small yet packed with performance

Reviews.Title: Perfect if you have Apple products
Reviews.Author: Thereviewer54
Reviews.Content: Let's face facts, Roku has more options and gives you more bang for your buck. However, if you own any iProducts or a Mac the screen mirroring makes it worth the extra cash. Plus, your iTunes purchases are readily available as well.My wife and I are in college and while juggling that with taking care of our son, watching our lectures broadcast to our larger tv than on our laptops is convenient to say the least.

Reviews.Title: How Fun is This!!!
Reviews.Author: D. Guthridge "Ring-a-Ding-Ding"
Reviews.Content: Crazy fun.  So very cool to throw YouTube from your iPhone over to the Apple TV and have it play on your system with the big screen and big speakers.  Download movies that you rent or purchase.  It will only keep getting better.Plays off your home's wireless network.  Can pull iTunes from your home computer.  For those of us who grew up with 8 tracks, this is pretty amazing stuff!

Reviews.Title: This is a really fun product
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: This is one of those things that gets a lot of use when people come over.  We use mirroring feature a lot.  It is a very good Netflix player.  Just wish they would expand the available apps a bit.  I get that they are competing with Amazon, but it would be really nice to have an Amazon Instand Video app.  If they expanded the library a bit, this would be my favorite media player.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: a.quezada
Reviews.Content: The special feature to AirPlay what is on my iPhone or iPad is superb. I now do my presentations wireless

Reviews.Title: Pretty good device if you own all Apple products
Reviews.Author: Eric Celedonia
Reviews.Content: You get a lot of features for $100 here if you own all mac products. The missing star here is the technical limitations for more experienced users and a far too simplified interface.And for all you non-geeks, make sure you read up on what you can and can not airplay. Far too many people buy this device thinking they are going to airplay NFL games or HBOGO. Not the case. I knew this before purchase, but it seems many people did not.Mac people, you'll want to look into buying an app for your computer called AirParrot. Solvs a huge second screen/mirroring issue.

Reviews.Title: Must have for a IOS household
Reviews.Author: JohnnyVermont
Reviews.Content: This product is simple, straight to the point a must for all apple users.Caution for those living in the past, it does only have HDMI output for video.

Reviews.Title: Great little unit
Reviews.Author: Patrick Campbell
Reviews.Content: For watching video streamed to your tv. But the thing I don't like is that you can't turn it off with a power button selection.

Reviews.Title: I love my apple tv!!!
Reviews.Author: whitey33
Reviews.Content: Apple TV works great with my iPhone 5, my ipad and my Mac Book pro.  I would recommend this device if you have a lot of other apple products.  It works great together.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I got this. I use it daily and it is so much faster at loading Netflix than the bluray player I was using before. It is also well integrated with other apple products

Reviews.Title: Great Little Device!
Reviews.Author: Kathy Green
Reviews.Content: With this little device, I am able to watch a lot of free TV shows on the web. The picture quality on HD content is very good.

Reviews.Title: Like it a lot, wish Roku had YouTube
Reviews.Author: Jeffery C
Reviews.Content: I bought this because the Roku does not have YouTube.  That's all I use it for.  It works very well.  It is nicely designed as any Apple product I have ever dealt with.  If you have trouble signing into YouTube through the interface, you may have to go to your email settings and 1) turn off 2 step verification or 2) set an application-specific password.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful supplement to my 1st gen Roku box-consider adding AppleCare that will cover your newer Apple routers too!
Reviews.Author: CityGal "khcalgal"
Reviews.Content: I have owned a 1st gen Roku box almost since they were released and I use it nearly every day.  As an Apple heavy household (MacBook Pro, iPad, iPhone, and two Apple AirPort Routers, etc) being able to mirror those devices onto he Apple TV was very appealing. It is wonderful and was easy to set up. For other Apple households I highly recommend it. It may be somewhat less interesting for PC homes, especially if without any iOS devices.But the following is why I'm writing this review:I just bought a refurbished Apple TV from Apple last weekend. I had a hiccup getting Photo Stream to work and called Apple Tech Support. Along with their world class tech support from the Canadian tech I spoke with (we solved the issue quite quickly), she told me something that is not well known. If you buy AppleCare for your Apple TV, the coverage extends to any AirPort Extreme or AirPort Express routers you may have, as long as they are less than two years old. (Of course all Apple products have 90 tech support from date of purchase.)AppleCare, for some reason, isn't available for the routers on their own, but being able to get it via Apple TV was wonderful news. For $29.99 (list price) you can ensure you get two years of tech support for any networking issues you may develop. Since a one time tech call for products out of tech coverage is also $29.99, why not cover all your bases at the start, and for as many issues that arise?My original AirPort Extreme router was over four years old, so I decided to upgrade to the newest dual band version a couple of days ago.  Although I did call tech support to walk me through the set up, it couldn't have been simpler with the AirPort Utility App that is included in Lion and Mountain Lion as well as on iOS 6 devices (iPhone and iPad, for example). Again I received world class service. Last night it turned out I needed to fine tune one setting, and the Canadian tech I spoke to also suggested investing in AppleCare for the Apple TV for the reasons I've just given, and I have done so.This "wrap around" coverage to the routers also come from Apple iMacs, MacBooks, MacBook Pros, and iOS devices. For some reason this isn't commonly known, but it should be.  Networking issues can crop up, and having someone troubleshoot them for you can be very expensive. They also drive me crazy with frustration and knowing I have Apple to lean on is a huge relief. Their support is incomparable and North American-based. Every time I've ever had to call (and not many that) I am more impressed by their level of training, their patience and good will. They are my tech angels!

Reviews.Title: Apple TV is an awesome product!!
Reviews.Author: Arnaldo Toledo de Aguiar
Reviews.Content: Product is perfect! I deferentially recommend it.  If you want a High Definition and Interactive TV you should buy it.

Reviews.Title: Apple tv
Reviews.Author: Chereb
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love my Apple tv. Love the airplay feature. Can stream music straight from my phone via surround system that is connected to aplle tv. Good choice of movies to rent as well.

Reviews.Title: Apple tv thumbs up
Reviews.Author: Javier Mendez
Reviews.Content: Love it. Connected to my iphone , ipad, and itunes. Very easy to use, like all apple products. Wish it had more apps but who knows what updates are coming.

Reviews.Title: Typical Apple product -Great!
Reviews.Author: P. Roberts
Reviews.Content: I wanted to be able to group large numbers of digital pictures on my Mac, add music, and send the finished product to my large screen tv.  The Apple TV does the job simply and perfectly...now I just need to take better pictures!!!Setup was relatively easy and, after a few trial/error attempts, I believe I have it mastered.  I have yet to test the other features (e.g., Netflex movies), but the product does what I expected and does it well.  No more memory sticks or burning CD's.

Reviews.Title: Now that it has Hulu, cut your cable!
Reviews.Author: M. Friedman
Reviews.Content: We finally took the plunge and cancelled out cable service. And surprisingly, not only do we not MISS cable, but we're happier without it. Knowing that we're not throwing $1200 a year at a cable company makes us incredibly happy!

Reviews.Title: Really like the capabilities
Reviews.Author: Pingthis "Pingthis"
Reviews.Content: Really like the capabilities, but I am seriously thinking about hacking it. You have to wait for Apple to get new apps. So, no Amazon Prime videos, which is weird they have Netflix and Hulu Plus. Oddly you get no notifications when they put a new app up. Hulu just showed up one day. Kind of limiting, thinking about getting Boxee or something similar.

Reviews.Title: I love just about everything about Apple TV
Reviews.Author: VictoValdes
Reviews.Content: This is my second apple TV and the only one that has done it for me. I really love Mirroring. I love how everything looks and operates. The only problem that I have is that my TV is not big enough at 26inches.

Reviews.Title: Simple. Fast. Grandparents loved it!
Reviews.Author: Tram Truong "cuegeee"
Reviews.Content: Initially I got this for the family to use with all our Apple products.  Seeing how simple it made viewing videos, movies, photos...I gave it to my grandparents to use and they LOVE IT!  It was so simple compared to a WiFi Samsung DVD player they had, that I bought another Apple TV for their bedroom.They enjoy watching youtube music videos with the Airplay, my kids love Netflix when they are visiting, the rest of the family can relax and not have to mess with troublesome apps/connections/UI to port media to the TV for viewing.Happy Grandparents = Happy Grandkids & Great Grandkids!Since I bought 2, I give it 10 Stars.

Reviews.Title: It's Apple...'nuf said!
Reviews.Author: Connie H
Reviews.Content: Nothing quite compares with Apple TV - the mirroring feature is what puts the apple TV above all other competitors. If you have an iPad...you need Apple TV to go with it...you won't regret it :)

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Shiloh Kremer
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is sleek and and very easy to set up. However, the channels are limited and currently (11-26-2012) it does not have Amazon installed. Although the Netflix option is nice, Amazon offers more recent TV show episodes and unfortunately is not included in this version of Apple TV. I actually just ordered the Roku device because of this issue.Overall, Apple TV is a nice product with a few good features but is limited in content compared to Roku.

Reviews.Title: Good as always
Reviews.Author: Steven M Alexander
Reviews.Content: Great product. Easy to use and does everything promised.  One two three four five six seven eight nine ten words!

Reviews.Title: Fun Little Gadget
Reviews.Author: HappyCow
Reviews.Content: I bought this without really reading into what it does. I originally just wanted to stream shows and music videos from Youtube from my Ipod. Imagine my surprise when I finally figured out it comes with it's own apps for those things installed. I've had this for a few months now and I enjoy it. Make sure to buy an HDMI cable since it doesn't come with one to hook into the TV. It's easy to set up even without a keyboard. No complaints so far. Don't lose the remote!

Reviews.Title: Just another Apple product
Reviews.Author: Hans Müller
Reviews.Content: If you have ever had any Apple product, you know there is no middle ground... It is love it or hate it.I had a chance to compare (on daily use) this product with a similar, from a different brand, and it became obvious to me how superior the product was.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: B. Neilly
Reviews.Content: I watch all my tv through the apple tv now, all my videos are stored on an external drive connected to my mac, with itunes open my apple tv can read all the videos on the drive and plays them just fine.  I also use netflix occasionally and was even able to watch the presidential debates live on the wall street journal app that it comes with, also enjoy podcasts, specifically the rachel maddow one.  who needs cable when you have an apple tv.

Reviews.Title: go-To tv
Reviews.Author: Krista Cubicleblindness "CubicleBlindness"
Reviews.Content: When I first purchased my apple tv. I didn't even hook it up for 6 months or so, not knowing how it would be any different than my Ipad or Roku.  But when I eventually did get around to hooking it up to see what my choices were I was very pleasantly surprised and it quickly became my most used product for watching shows on.It is different than the Roku because it does offer access to the Apple Itunes store, so I can purchase movies and watch them immediately right from my TV. But on the other end it's very similar to the Roku box because I still get to access my Netflix and Hulu accounts as well.Perhaps my favorite thing about the apple tv is that I can connect to any of my computer itunes databases through the homesharing feature. So any items that I previously purchased through Itunes can be played directly to my tv no matter where they are stored...and I have purchased and downloaded (from places other than itunes) many, many items.I rarely find a moment when I cannot find something to watch. It has a very clear picture and I have never had any problems with it stopping on me mid-way through my searching or watching of movies (I have had this happen to me with my cable box, and my roku box)

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: lkwaugh
Reviews.Content: I own an apple tv and a roku. Both have their strong and weak points.Apple TVPro:Airplay musicEasy to usePhoto Stream from your iPhoneYouTubeCon:Can't Mirror Play older macs or iPhonesNo ability to add appsRemote must be aimed at the apple tv (unlike roku)Overall, I would recommend Apple TV if you would like to Airplay/Mirror Play with your Apple devices.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Box
Reviews.Author: Christopher J. Livengood "Christopera"
Reviews.Content: This fits into my apple household seamlessly. I love that I stream my movies/music right off my iTunes and on to my TV in HD. I do not pay for HD cable, but the second I power up my Apple TV i get instant HD access to all of my owned content plus some extras.It's a great little box and I hope in the future they expand its capabilities because it really could be much more. That said, it works excellently and without flaws.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: HattieLou
Reviews.Content: I've just recently got into the Apple universe with my iPhone 4S and my New iPad.  I truly love how well they both work with the Apple TV.  The only thing Apple doesn't have that i use is Amazon Primr, but otherwise I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: It Just Works
Reviews.Author: TandemCaptain
Reviews.Content: Set up was easy. It links to my iMac seamlessly, letting us watch our favorite shows on iTunes on the big screen. The remote is very simple -- if anything it is too simple. I have a Blu-Ray player that supposedly connects to Netflix, but usually just reports "Network Failure."  But the AppleTV seems able to connect to NetFlix even when the other player cannot.

Reviews.Title: New Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Myron M. Persoff, M.D.
Reviews.Content: Remarkable device at very affordable price.  Setup is a snap, and it opens up a whole world of music,streaming movies, shows, and events as well as subscription services such as Netflix, blockbuster, Hulu, and many more.  It networks with your computers songs, video, and  photo libraries, and is less than half the size and weight of its original counterpart.  Worth every dime!Apple TV MD199LL/A [NEWEST VERSION]

Reviews.Title: My third apple tv
Reviews.Author: okiedan "Pro Bono Publico"
Reviews.Content: Love these little devices.  Enables me to watch Netflix on all my large screen TVs.  Also use MLB Premium to watch my favorite games.  They are easy to setup and integrate with my iTunes account via iTunes match.  All of my movies, tv shows, and music is available on any tv.Streams great using my wireless network.  Has no problem picking up my Airport Extreme throughout my 3,000 square foot house.  (I do have a airport express plugged in on one side of the house to boost the signal)All in all for what Apple calls a hobby device I could not be more pleased.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic and fun to use!
Reviews.Author: R. Wagner
Reviews.Content: I ordered the newest version of the Apple TV and absolutely love it. I had the first generation Apple TV and this is replacing it for all the new features (like Netflix streaming and Air Display). My OLD Apple TV still works and rents movies from iTunes but its much larger, runs very hot, wont stream netflix, and is overall just a bit clunkier than the new model. The NEW Apple TV is small, quick to start up, consistently pops open when you touch the remote button and swaps from room to room quite quickly. The AirPlay feature is quite nice and allows me to play my Spotify playlists through my tv/stereo and even pops the name of the songs on screen. My only grips about the product might be the streaming speed. The old Apple TV had a hard drive where the rented iTunes movie would download directly and play - this has a flash memory that temporarily stores the movie for playback... if you start an HD movie then stop it so you can finish up the movie later, you seem to have to wait for the buffer to start the download again (like it never fully downloaded the movie the first time. I only noticed this when downloading an HD movie off itunes (which are quite large anyway) and have not noticed such a lag when watching HD Netflix streaming movies. Other than that minor quirk (which may be addressed in a future upgrade - or may just be wifi speed related) I love this thing and actually am considering buying another for our other room so I dont have to keep moving it back and forth.

Reviews.Title: Apple strikes again!
Reviews.Author: IgnoringMyWife
Reviews.Content: This is a great media streaming device that works great over wi-fi.  Use it as an audio source to stream your lossless music from your Mac, stream video like Netflix, stream all your photos from your Mac, or use AirPlay and your iPhone to share about anything.  If you do have an iPhone or iPod Touch, you can use the free Apple "Remote" app to control the Apple TV... genius!

Reviews.Title: Nice Little IP TV Box
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Valladares
Reviews.Content: This is the second Apple TV I purchase. Both are exactly the same model (3rd gen, I think, which is the latest so far) and were purchased from Amazon within a year period.Both, when I considered purchasing the first one, and then the second one, I had in mind the following:1) I wanted a Hi-Def A/V IP tv box (no more standard-def through the Wii console Netflix), and work with HDMI cables (less cable clutter)2) It would have to be able to handle Netflix, YouTube, and then some3) Aesthetics were also relevant, so it would have to look sleek (if it was only really possible!), and have a small footprint and overall dimensions4) Finally, the deal-breaker would be if I couldn't find enough available content for it to show, since I spend many months every year outside the USA, and some video and music services (ie Rhapsody, Amazon Prime and many others) do not work outside the USA, but iTunes Store does.At the end it all came down to two serious contenders: the newest AppleTV, and the latest ROKU box.Having the iTunes Store content available overseas, on top of Netflix, was what tipped the balance in favor of the ATV, for the first time, and having had such a good experience with the ATV that time, set my mind into favoring the ATV unit for the second time as well. AirPlay from my kids ipods, and ipad, also proved to be a very nice feature. Hopefully with the coming OS upgrade, ATV might have some Apps capabilities coming into it soon.My internet connection is supposed to be 10 Mbps, and it measures up to 8-10 Mbps most of the time, and with that speed, I get good video and sound quality, without noticeable stuttering or long buffering times, so I'm satisfied with it.Amazon delivered on time, with super-saving free shipping, and the purchase price itself both times was marginally lower than Apple's official list price, so it proved to be a good deal for me. Hope you enjoy yours as well.

Reviews.Title: Loving it!
Reviews.Author: Baimeinhvn
Reviews.Content: As it is with all products made by Apple, this was very easy to set up. It took my boyfriend like probably all of 3-5 minutes to set it up and have Netflix streaming over our Wi-Fi network on the TV! How awesome! The Apple TV is compact, really small for what it does, not that it makes a difference because it's kept in our cabinet. But anyway. The remote is super sleek though I do wish it had additional functionality while watching movies. But overall for what the product does, it is great and is just what we had been looking for. Thank you Apple!

Reviews.Title: Nivel product
Reviews.Author: Juan Picon Cordero
Reviews.Content: Well spent money, I use it  to watch Netflix and have got what just what I wanted and it is so easy to use that my 5 years old daughter can choose by herself what she wants to watch

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Streaming Media Device!
Reviews.Author: Introspective Falcon
Reviews.Content: I've had this product for about three days now and have to say that I love it!  For starters, all the TV shows, movies, and music I've purchased through iTunes is available through this device via "the cloud."  I can also access through "the cloud" music stored on my computer (I haven't purchased from iTunes) via the "iTunes Match" Service.I just watched the season 5 finale of BREAKING BAD on this device. I did not have to wait about 15-20 minutes for the 2 GB file to download to my computer. It was available immediately for instant viewing through Apple TV!  Another great benefit of this device is that you can stream videos from Netflix and Hulu!  Picture and sound quality is outstanding(I have a 720p HD TV).I love the fact that I can also control my Apple TV through a "Remote" app on my iPad.  So, if I ever break or lose my Apple TV remote, I can still use my iPad! Apparently, you can also use your iPhone and iPod touch as well. There are a lot of other outstanding features of this product; I  encourage you to read other reviews and the product description.This product is yet another reason why Apple is so successful and why they're recognized as a tech giant.  I prefer the word "juggernaut!"  Anyway, if you love Apple products and you have invested a good amount of money in iTunes content, you gotta get this product!

Reviews.Title: Using it non stop!
Reviews.Author: Casey Smigelski
Reviews.Content: I had the original hard drive based apple tv and was disappointed by it. Too much syncing/buffering. Quality of video was good, not great. And no services other than iTunes video.This has all changed. Netflix, Hulu, NHL, well you know the rest. Tons of streaming subscription services built in and then iTunes pay as you go to fill in the rest.Plus AirPlay from my iPad is AWESOME. just had a fantasy football draft and mirrored the results to my big screen from my iPad.I usually leave my tv on in the background when I'm sitting around and it's nice to play music through my surround sound and have the photo stream screen saver pull up all my photos from the last 30 days or just coming across a random Internet video or highlights from last nights game and being able to have them play automatically on the TV is nice.VERY happy with this version, thinking about picking up another one for the bedroom! Great device for cutting the cord and breaking free of cable/sat!

Reviews.Title: Handy little gizmo
Reviews.Author: Retrostarscream
Reviews.Content: This device has proved invaluable to my streaming arsenal & provides plenty of content via the ever so useful "AirPlay" feature. The Netflix interface could use a bit of a facelift however it is still useable. Overall a good value for the price, more than worth it. Definitely recommend to those that own an iPod Touch, iPhone (4 & above), iPad (2 & above), Macbook Pro (2011 or above) &/or a combination of any of these devices.For those running Macbook Pros older than 2011 could use a program known as "Airparrot" to airplay to your big screen via Apple TV as opposed to using Mountain Lion's 10.8 native airplay feature since it will not run on the older hardware."Airparrot" performance will tax your CPU and not be as eloquent Mountain Lion's native airplay, however it will get the job done albeit a bit choppy.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Content: If you have all elements in place IE: HDTV internet access this thing performs flawless out of the box set up takes less than 5 minutes. I recently dished dish network and the countless channels that I had to get this. I put it in myson's room so he could access my Netflix account granted there are not a lot of channel selection with this however, for the reason I bought it the unit gets five stars for it's quality speed and no loss of service great unit and with the ability to share from your iTunes under home sharing and push from i-cloud can't be beat I don't even leave feedback's that often but had to on this one and no I don't work for apple I am a blue collar worker with a white collar lust for products that work like this.  Thanks, Patrick

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: ash
Reviews.Content: I was really wanting to get a roku for the past few months but then I found out about the Apple TV and started looking into it. Even though there isn't all the games or apps that other devices have the Apple TV has Netflix and Hulu Plus...which are all I need it for! Very please with the device only problem is when I use my remote I have to stay away from my macbook pro other wise Itunes will turn on.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: AZB
Reviews.Content: I got ATV 3 after getting rid of horrible D Link DHD 131 and I could not be happier. Biggest negative about ATV was the lack of apps ,well they just added hulu app yesterday and launch of amazon videos app on iPad makes me beleive that amazon video app will follow suit. As far as the graphics and streaming quality goes its top notch. I use my laptop as server and stream all my music (including FLAC files) using audiogalaxy app which works very well. Same for all the movies in different formats (.mkv, Divx etc) works great with online conversion. Those are two great things (besides obvious airplay etc) that i like about apple tv. I have my entie music library availabe to me without actually storing any music on iPad and i stream it to my Home Theater System..Would definately recommed this product over roku , D Link (not even close) .

Reviews.Title: Rock solid with wonderful interface - also comparison with Roku
Reviews.Author: Nuknuk
Reviews.Content: The newest version of the Apple TV is a wonderful piece of hardware.  It is a beauty in every detail.  I have a WDTV, a Roku and Apple TV.  The WDTV is the older version which doesn't support streaming, only your own content, so it is not comparable to the other two.Both system can be controlled with an App if you cannot find the remote that came with it.  They have great WiFi reception (I don't have any problem with interruptions, only very few occasions),  but this really depends on location and house construction.  Netflix is my primary source for both players.Here are the comparison:Apple TV:- 1080P- wondeful interface, easy navigation.  I love the similar movies suggestions.  Searching is a lot easier.- Airplay mirroring, for those with an iPad2/3 or 4S, this is a biggie- YouTube and Hulu- great construction, fine in every detail- aluminum remoteRoku LT:- smaller and lighter, easier to transport- Amazon Video on demand.  (but AVD now plays on iPads.  Will AppleTV be next?)- some form of Facebook functionality. I enjoy watching friends' videos on Roku.- separate analog audio out, I can play it to my multimedia Epson projector with a separate line feeding the home theater speaker system (a pair of Bluetooth Creative Zii and Bluetooth subwoofers).  Apple TV is HDMI with optical/Toslink.  Toslink is not very common with smaller portable devices like a multimedia projectors.- open to more contents, unless you jailbreak the Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: So easy to set up
Reviews.Author: dee
Reviews.Content: If this doesn't connect to your iPhone or computer right away just restart your home router or hub.Download a free program called handbrake to convert and video's you have that isn't an mp4, then add video to iTunes.If you don't have a Mac you can buy a program called AirParrot and you can mirror your PC to your TV, it's about 10 bucks.I love this thing and use it all the time to watch shows, movies and pictures from my iTunes or iPhone.

Reviews.Title: As good as the Gen II
Reviews.Author: Smith Family
Reviews.Content: I now have all three generations of the AppleTV and must say I really DO LOVE them.  We are an Apple family so we're pretty intertwined in the whole iTunes system.  Movies, music and such.  We have iTunes Match which works AWESOME with the ATV.  It allows you to watch all your movies and listen to all your music from the cloud.  IMO, it doesn't get any easier than that.  We don't buy DVD or Bluerays, because we can grab it on iTunes and play it on our iPhones, iPads, Mac, or AppleTV's.  Have you mirrored your iPad II or iPhone 4 and up to your ATV yet?  It's nice to be able to surf the net on your TV and show the other people in the room the same stuff.We're hooked...  Have been since 2004 when I got my first iPod.The AppleTV is NOTHING without the app to control it.  If you're using the remote it comes with, buy a used iPod touch at least so you can download the app and run it the RIGHT way.  Well worth it.Signed,Apple FanFamily.

Reviews.Title: Great for everybody but audiophiles
Reviews.Author: Macauley86
Reviews.Content: Great product. We use it for everything: movies, music, radio, podcasts, family picture screensaver. The only problem is for audiophiles; if you have your CDs ripped at 16bit/44.1KHz, the AppleTV 2nd and 3rd generation will up-convert your music to 48KHz, whereas the first generation Apple TV would keep the 44.1KHz rate.This problem will not bother most users in the least, but it's worth mentioning if you are an audiophile and are thinking of streaming your lossless files to the Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: GREAT!!!
Reviews.Author: srights
Reviews.Content: I don't have cable, and we watch our stuff on iTunes or NetFlix.  I wanted something for streaming to the TV.  I looked at the Ruku, which has more content and is cheaper, but after playing with a friends Apple TV, I realized how much nicer an experience the Apple TV is.  I have all Apple products, so that may have influenced me... but I like the product.  Small, clean, easy to use... perfect!  It runs NetFlix and iTunes very well... I wish it had Pandora... maybe they'll add that.

Reviews.Title: Required for every TV
Reviews.Author: JLN
Reviews.Content: I have 5 of these, one on every TV.  For $99, this is the cleanest and easiest way to access your iTunes & iCloud content, use Airplay from your iPhone/iPad.Really slick, and affordable techno wizardry!

Reviews.Title: If you own and iPad or iPhone This IS a MUST!
Reviews.Author: TooTall
Reviews.Content: I can play everything streaming from my iPad beautifully on the tv screen. And while the alternative choice to this has more stations, the amount of Apps that can perfectly stream video onto your tv is endless. Netflix, HULU PLUS, NBC, ABC, TED TV, NBC NIGHTLY NEWS, and Video file, PBS, ESPN APP (THE BEST!). Either way if you own apple you NEED this for your HD tv. Cable will never be needed again!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Jsn716
Reviews.Content: Great product, easy to set up and use. Use it daily for Netflix and music. Sharing capability between the apple tv, iTunes, and iPhone is very cool.

Reviews.Title: esika
Reviews.Author: Y. Ulcer
Reviews.Content: We were quite pleased with the product. The Ipad Iphone connection works pretty good and you end up having a smart TV.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV with HD
Reviews.Author: BPK
Reviews.Content: I did not have a previous Apple TV, but with the update it received this year I was intrigued enough (and $100 seemed reasonably low enough) to give it a shot.I like it quite a bit. I have liked it enough that I bought one for a relative whom I thought would enjoy it.I like being able to have all TV shows and movies purchased on my computer's iTunes immediately available to watch on my main entertainment system. I think in the past the Apple TV had a storage capacity but as far as I can tell this doesn't so much store things as instantly retrieve them from the iTunes store as soon as you ask for it.I have iTunes match so that means all my music, even stuff I didn't purchase from iTunes, is easily accessible to listen to through my main entertainment system.I like the AirPlay functionality with my iPhone.I use the Netflix and Youtube apps a lot, those are great. I use Pandora and Vimeo sometimes. I have experimented with the radio app which is interesting but haven't used it much.As other reviewers have noted, I would have liked to have the ability to add apps over time, and/or get things like Hulu Plus, which the Roku has. But, the smoothness of the presentation and easy integration with my existing iTunes stuff is pure Apple.UPDATE 9/5/12: As you probably know, the Apple TV has Hulu Plus now. That is a great addition! The only other thing that would be extra great would be Amazon Prime Video but I doubt that will happen due to direct competition between Apple and Amazon. I did hear that the iPad has some kind of Amazon Prime app, though, so you never know.I am continuing to use the Apple TV about 50% of the time that I have my main TV on now. I still have cable and will DVR network and cable shows that I want to watch as they are broadcast. I find the interface and remote for Apple TV more pleasing than that for my cable box. I use Netflix and Hulu Plus fairly often. I am using YouTube, with its channels and subscriptions a lot more than I ever thought I would.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Karen Hodas
Reviews.Content: I love the apple tv, it pairs seamlessly with other apple devices, such as the iPad, iPhone, and iPad and the iTunes accounts. It does not have the wide selection of apps that my Roku player offers (such as amazon prime movies) however it is very user friendly and the overall navigation is extremely simple. I have one for my main tv, and I also bought one for my not so computer savy parents that are mainly enjoying Netflix on theirs, they have a hard time doing much else on it since they do not own other apple devices.

Reviews.Title: a great product for a great price
Reviews.Author: aakay
Reviews.Content: a great product for a great pricei have been using the old apple tv (with the hard drive) and love that and still use it much more than than this new Apple TV.  The only reason I bought the new apple tv is because Apple has decided to stop upgrading the software for the old apple tv (since it wants to exclusively focus on this new apple tv).  Specifically, the new apple tv does the following which the old apple tv does not do:-- you can send video and audio directly from you iphone/ ipad to the new apple tv (for your old apple tv, you can send stuff only from itunes on your computer)-- the interface is much better on the new apple tv-- the old apple tv does not have netflix (not relevant to me because i do not have a netflix account since i watch 2-3 movies a year)As an aside, since Apple has abandoned the old apple tv, you cannot "send" music from the old apple tv directly to any air-tunes device (like the zeppelen air); you can only send music from the old apple tv to an apple airport express

Reviews.Title: love this!!
Reviews.Author: franchesska
Reviews.Content: i love this item i can watch any movie stop it, cut it off and it picks up where it left off and i can watch the lastest movies anytime i want.

Reviews.Title: Want a 2nd one!
Reviews.Author: Baron Barrett
Reviews.Content: I love all of my apple products!  Im actually writting this on my Ipad2.  I've had my apple tv for about two years, and I find myself bringing it from the bedroom to the living room because my wife and I use it so much.  I will eventually get a second, and would definitely recommend this for anyone who enjoys streaming movies, music, or games.

Reviews.Title: Best streaming player with lotsa useful features!
Reviews.Author: SacEagle
Reviews.Content: This one lives by the name of Apple! It is fast, interface is fastest, and has bunch of features such as Airplay, Remote App, etc. that are so handy if you have other Apple devices. Even if you don't, the remote is fast, sleek, and easy to operate as compared to other devices and so it makes searching Youtube and Netflix so much easier.  Although I bought this at Best Buy as I needed it right away, you can buy wherever you want. But, let me tell you....Don't get fooled into buying a blu-ray streaming player or Smart TV if all you use is Youtube and Netflix as this one can do it (and much more) so much easily and adds 1000 handy features for other Apple device owners.  The interface and remotes that come with other blu-ray streaming players don't even come close to APple TV! This one surely rocks. Usually I am very critical and don't become happy very soon but this one charmed me.

Reviews.Title: Apple tv
Reviews.Author: Gloria Farrell
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup, watch Netflix tv shows and movies on our tv. Makes it easy to look at our hundreds and hundreds of photos and movies.

Reviews.Title: apple tv
Reviews.Author: Daniel K. C. Au
Reviews.Content: Works great.  I love it.  Was easy to connect and use.  My grandkids love airplay from my iPad.  Waiting for snow lion to be able to steam from my iMac.

Reviews.Title: A+++ Product!
Reviews.Author: Peter N. Carey
Reviews.Content: The newest Apple TV for $99 ... great deal!  Service and delivery were outstanding and wicked fast.  Hook-up and programming were a piece of cake--after I bought the HDMI cable that doesn't come with the Apple TV.  Not a problem ... Amazon had the best deal going on the Mediabridge HDMI cable, too ($10).  I'm not a TV or movie addict, but I can see how Apple TV can turn you into one ... it just keeps getting better!

Reviews.Title: Great product if you know what your getting.
Reviews.Author: A. Tippetts
Reviews.Content: I've noticed a lot of people are under the impression that this little box could single handedly replace their cable/sat subscription.  In most cases it probably won't.  It does not give you channels to watch at your leisure, but it will provide you with an easy to access and easy to navigate way to access plenty of online content such as itunes rentals, Netflix, video podcasts, Youtube, and Internet radio, plus a few others.But where this box really shines is when you pair it with another Apple device such as an iPad, iPhone or iPod Touch.  When running on the same network you are able to use "Airplay" to mirror your device onto your TV quite seamlessly and without wires.  Want to play your tunes on the nice speakers while you clean?  Easy.  Share your vacation pictures on the big screen with no fuss?  Simple.  You can even play games with the big screen, however depending on your network speed there is about a half second delay.I can't count how many times the music in our house has been pumped through the Apple TV.  Our TV system has the best speakers so it makes sense.Want to entertain the kiddos?  Airplay your ipad/iphone and turn on the video camera and let the kids have fun seeing themselves on TV.  Trust me, this entertains kids for quite some time.For the price, its a no-brainer.  It's not going to give you local channels, or replace all of the content you get with Satellite or cable but its a nice complimentary device for Apple users to take advantage of and at the $100 price you won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: trlamb
Reviews.Content: Using the Apple TV is easier than connecting my iPod to my receiver, and the Apple TV was cheaper than buying an iPod dock for my receiver. Now I can use the TV screen to change music instead of the little iPod screen. Plus the Apple TV will apparently work with any brand of receiver. I had been streaming Netflix with Roku HD, but the Apple TV gives me more access to my account, so the Roku has been relegated to the less-used bedroom TV. I have my iTunes music on an external drive connected to my router, and I can listen to it without turning on my PC.The Apple TV and my Yamaha receiver's remote cannot be programmed to operate each other. So I have yet another remote. And Apple TV does not stream Pandora, but my receiver does.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: SJH AZ
Reviews.Content: Love the new pic quality, iPad  iphone smooth interface is great. Fast and bug free.  Like most Apple devices it just plain works.

Reviews.Title: All I need and easy to hook up
Reviews.Author: Patricia Brouillette
Reviews.Content: I got this for my living room. It was very eas to hook up to the tv, you will need to make sure you have the cable to go from it to the T.V.  The only other is it's plug. Then it is just a matter of hooking it up to your wifi, syncing with you iTunes library, and if you have a Netflix account imputing your account info. It is very easy to do. It comes with a remote, but if you have an iPad, iPod touch, or iPhone, you can use them as a remote. The menu is very easy to navigate and understand. Going through the music, movies and anything else that you have in iTunes is very easy to accesse and sort through and navigate.

Reviews.Title: Great Device for Streaming Video from my iPad 3!
Reviews.Author: Emilie
Reviews.Content: I have a Sony Bravia 32 inch flat screen in my bedroom that I often would use Apple's HDMI enabling cable (Apple $39.99) and physically link my iPad 2, so I could watch movies.  The downside was that my iPad was physically tethered to the tv and I could not read, check email or do anything while watching a movie.After my iPad 3 arrived, I decided to try the Apple TV 3rd Generation.  It took under 5 minutes to set up, both physically to the tv and to the wireless network.  I also downloaded the FREE Remote app from the App Store for the iPad and iPhone, so I can control the Apple TV from my iPad while wirelessly streaming movies.  I am thrilled to be able to read a book while I am watching a movie!  The Apple TV does exactly what I had expected.For those who experience problems make sure your software is up-to-date (on the iPad/iPhone/ATV/iTunes), that you have turned on Home Sharing on ALL devices and that your wireless signal is STRONG.  If all these are a "yes,"  then you will love your new ATV and what it can do!Network Specs:  ATV3, iPad3, Airport Extreme, AT&T; U-Verse

Reviews.Title: It would be great if it has Amazon Prime
Reviews.Author: J. Rubin
Reviews.Content: Amazon does so many things well so I was surprised that they sold a product which has so many widgets minus Amazon Prime.  Netflix works great but Amazon Prime is my other mode of watching tv.  If someone tells you that you can watch Amazon Prime by airplay through later generation iphones and ipads, well I tried this and the picture was grainy and the connection kept getting lost.  When Apple adds Prime, my rating will be upped to 4 or 5 stars.  In the meantime, I hope that many of you put some  pressure on Apple.  Think of it like this:  What would Apple be saying to Microsoft and what would be saying, as well, if itunes was not on Windows computers?

Reviews.Title: No Amazon Prime but other than that, excellent
Reviews.Author: Neil Flynn
Reviews.Content: iPhones and three of these Apple TVs.  We've migrated from Windows over the last few years, much to the chagrin of my Microsoft employed brother in law and are more than satisfied with the move.The home sharing feature allows us to access all of our photos and videos which are stored on our Apple Time Capsule.  We can also throw content to the big flat screen from our various hand held devices and of course, access our music library and the various on demand services that Apple TV does support including Netflix and Apple's own iTunes store.  These functions were the reason I purchased this since we already had a Roku which provided the same content and then some including Amazon Prime and is also a great device.The remote control is a work of minimalist art which allows you to navigate the user interface with just a few buttons.  This matches the design of the unit itself which is a simple hockey puck sized black plastic box whose light weight allows for it to be mounted discretely with just some adhesive backed velcro.  You can also use your iPhone as a back up remote once you install the app.Over all, this is a great unit to add to an Apple household due to its ability to let you share content, access your iTunes library, etc..  However, if this isn’t important to you a Roku might serve you better.  Google also has a new streaming device on the market that certainly warrants a look.

Reviews.Title: Does not play amazon movies/shows
Reviews.Author: Chris T.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to "mirror" web movies/shows from my ipad, specifically from Amazon Prime.  It does not support Amazon's streaming protocol.  I sent it back since it was an expensive device to show photos or play itunes content.

Reviews.Title: Good but...
Reviews.Author: Brandi
Reviews.Content: Until about a month ago, I totally enjoyed this product, but recently Amazon made it so that the Amazon Instant Video app on my iPad does not transmit video to it.  I suppose this is an effort to sell their Roku product, but it's disappointing since that was one of the main reason I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Good, but buffering issue prevents better review
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: The Good:Most features work as described.  Home sharing was incredibly easy to set up.  Now I can stream movies from my itunes library to the TV, which is my favorite feature.The Bad:I have been plagued by a buffering issue.  When streaming video from Netflix or my itunes account, the video freezes.  I have numerous devices that stream over my network only the AppleTV experiences this problem.  My home network is quite robust and I have tested for network interference as well.  The issue persists even after all other network devices are shutdown.

Reviews.Title: Least favorite Apple Product
Reviews.Author: CrazedMomof4
Reviews.Content: We own MacBooks, iPods, iPhones, and iPads all in a variety of versions.  The apple tv is my LEAST liked product. It is always losing connection with my wireless whereas nothing else seems to have that trouble. I have a roku as well and it NEVER loses connection to my wireless. The graphics on the screen, like the iTunes screen are fantastic I will say.  But that is a minor point. Also, the remote is so tiny. I've already lost one remote. I had to go purchase another one and they are pricey!  We are huge Apple fans, but I am just disappointed with the apple tv.

Reviews.Title: Only one thing lacking!
Reviews.Author: Matthew Hinman
Reviews.Content: Apple just needs to cozy up with Bezos over at Amazon and get the Amazon video on this device!  Then, it will be perfect!

Reviews.Title: Yet another stellar Apple product!
Reviews.Author: David Hermansen "Dave Hermansen"
Reviews.Content: Absolutely amazing product!Well made and truly connects your Mac computers to your TV. If you are a Mac person, the Apple TV is a must have product!

Reviews.Title: Apple TV or Blueray?
Reviews.Author: YS Sheu "ss"
Reviews.Content: I owned a Sony Blue-ray (model: BDV T58) with wifi function.  I recently purchased this Apple TV because I want to mirror my Mac Air and iPad screen to the Sony Brevia TV (no wifi function).  So, after comparing these two products, here is my observation.Sony Blue-ray has many more channels by 10 times compares to Apple TV, including the unpaid/no-need-for-subscription Crackle (ad. occurs every 15 mins).  Also, if you have Amazon Prime, you can watch Amazon Instant Movie on Blue-ray, but not on Apple TV.  The only movie channels on Apple are iTune and Netflix.  If you like TV shows, Apple TV also has Hulu Plus that costs just as much as Netflix online streaming.  But that is pretty much it for Apple TV.One huge advantage of having an Apple TV is that you can actually use keyboard to enter the name of the youtube video or name of the movie/TV shows or whatever.  If you own a bluetooth Apple keyboard, then you can easily connect it to your Apple TV (it is a no brainer, super easy to do).  Don't underestimate this feature, because a lot of people, including myself, have already given up on searching videos on YouTube or Netflix using a Blue-ray, because it is a pain in the neck to use remote control to enter each letter of the keyword or song/movie/video title.If you have subscribed to Netflix and have high-speed internet at home (download speed is greater than 10mbps), then Apple TV gives you super HD quality picture (1080) when you watch a movie.  The blue-ray I own is visibly not as great as Apple TV when it comes to HD movies on Netflix.  However, if your internet is slow when you use Apple TV, then multiple problems occur when you watch HD movies, including in-synchronization between audio and video, video stops frequently and screen turns black, video lags and so on.  One solution might be to use ethernet cable instead of wifi.The set-up for Apple TV is easy - all you need is a HDMI cable (purchase separately) and a TV that has HDMI input.  The mirroring function of your iPad/Macbook/iPhone/iPod to your TV can be done in less than a 1 sec.  There is no requirement for set-up.  All  you need to do is to connect the Apple TV to your TV and power, and the icon for mirroring function will automatically shows up on your other Apple devices.  I've had a lot of fun with the mirroring function with my cat, he truly believes now that there is a huge rat lives behind the TV screen because I played a lot of rat videos on my huge Sony TV through mirroring function via my Mac Air.If you have a PC and no Mac, then there is no question about it that you should choose anything but Apple TV.  I have a Windows 7 PC laptop, and I can stream movies to my Sony Blue-ray through the windows media sharing client function.  However, it does take a bit of effort and time to set up.  Not nearly as easy as Apple TV Home Sharing.  So, if you have a Mac and you want to stream movies or videos, then your best bet is Apple TV.  However, if you have a PC and want to stream videos, then you must use Blue-ray or other Windows compatible devices, unless you have purchase movies directly on iTune, then it is ok.Finally, Apple TV does not take blue-ray disk or any other DVD.  Also, to my surprise, if you try to play DVD through Airplay, it won't work either.  So, if you play DVD every now and then, then Blue-Ray is your best bet.After testing out both the blue-ray and Apple TV, I think these two devices aim at different population and they do several different things as mentioned above.  I am glad I got both and I do NOT feel like they are redundant technology.

Reviews.Title: Apple quality and easy AirPlay
Reviews.Author: Jason Berry
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these to use around the office for mirroring desktops on MacOS, iOS, and Windows 7 to large monitors.  This has to be one of the most effortless technology hoops that I ever had to jump through.  I was all prepped for having to do a bunch of research and trial & error, but it was about a 10 minute operation from unboxing to mirroring.  Wow.  Thank you, Apple, for making my life easier.  Thank you, AirParrot, for making it easy to run AirPlay off a PC.Now, as a media device, I don't like the dependence on iTunes, limited media file playback, or the lack of an Amazon Prime player.  I also find it annoying that the homes screen has extremely limited customization ... you can move some of the icons (!??).  But I did not buy these devices for media purposes (however most people will).  If you are buying these only for the AirPlay feature, then it is well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Good for those who have apple branded other products
Reviews.Author: Kirti Mandal "kirti mandal"
Reviews.Content: This is a good product. It goes without saying as it is branded as "Apple". But as far as utility goes, It is good for those who have an ipad, iphones and other apple products and its just useful for mirroring your other apple devices on your TV. Other than this, i think its not that much useful. There are other products worth 30$ approx available. I have an apple macbook pro but to be able to use apple tv airplay with pro, i am being told to pay $20 to update my OS version to be able to use apple tv which i think is ripping money off you and making you stick to only one brand. I like to be a free bird and I do not think I liked it when it comes to utility but the quality of the product is very good and it does the few jobs its suppose to do preety well.

Reviews.Title: Worth the price
Reviews.Author: Dore33
Reviews.Content: I have been going back and forth for a while now on whether or not to purchase the Apple TV. Now that I just received it I love it! The Picture is great, the portability is perfect. Easy to set up and now I can FINALLY watch my Itunes Movies on my TV. I do not really enjoy watching movies on my laptop or PC. I have 2 negatives about it.1. Not that many apps. Would like to see more added.2. More descriptions for what I get with each App. Example: MLBTV. It gives me 2 options to buy from but I am not sure what I get with each.Otherwise its a great buy and cheaper from Amazon than via Apple.

Reviews.Title: Latest Apple TV The Best
Reviews.Author: Mike McClain
Reviews.Content: For $95 this device is just amazing.  The Netflix interface is even better than Netflix itself.  It has groupings by Characters and the normal groups like on the iOS devices or direct internet link.  I bought an optical audio to coaxial cable converter (<$20) and connected that to a receiver so I can control music from the iMac/iTunes. I can even control the music via the Apple Remote app.  Another unsung feature is the ability to play movies from the iMac.  That works great.  Of course interfacing with your iTunes account directly is a possibility also.  The remote is the classic Jobs simplistic design and works great also.  It powers down automatically.  Nothing but great things to say about AppleTV.

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: jeffers.sandra
Reviews.Content: even with wired internet buffers a lot while playing netflix. Never happened with my xbox which is right next to it and is connected wirelessly to the internet. Airplay video playback on tv has very poor resolution. I don't know what I was expecting but performance was not upto my expectations.

Reviews.Title: As a Roku owner I prefer this device
Reviews.Author: Honest Abe
Reviews.Content: I have the Roku Player latest generation / Most expensive and while it is very good another 5 Star Item I find I prefer this for several reasons.1. This device has a manual sleep feature.2. This device does not get hot like the Roku Does.3. The quality of the streaming from Apple is second very good.4. The Quality of streaming from Netflix is Superb better than my Roku.5.Access to my Itunes purchases over the years very nice.6.Air Play and screen Mirroring very cool anything I can play on my laptop including instructional videos and materials for school can be placed on the big Screen.7. Built in UTube player very useful when looking things up.Things I do not like about the Apple T.V.1. The remote Apple likes to rely on style but it has exceeded itself this time Blending Style and being cheap have created a tiny  unwelcome easy to loose remote for the Device. The buttons are recessed into a thin aluminum rectangular remote that fits a child's hand better than an adults.2. Supply your own HDMI Cable one does not come with the Apple T.V.Things I like about the Roku Player better1. The remote is simply better it has earphone Jacks that allow you to watch T.V. without disturbing others.2. The remote feels like you actually have something in your hand and is great for playing Angry Birds with on the Roku.3. Unlike the cheapskates at Apple Roku includes not only earphones for it's remote but an HDMI Cable.4. Amazon Prime Video streaming. I guess greedy Apple does not want competition playing over their device. Too bad Apple tries to charge for everything I can only surmise that the only reason Netflix is available through it is that they knew they had nothing to offer without it.Overall worth purchasing.

Reviews.Title: Works well for ios mirroring.........and that's really the extent of its value.
Reviews.Author: Back to Brick -n- Mortar "Taxed Out"
Reviews.Content: Other than that, it's yet another device you can watch Netflix on, or rent movies with. Having an MCE PC, and the fact that this thing has no additional apps, I feel like I wasted a hundred bucks.It's a great idea, but very weak execution. Needs apps, sorely.

Reviews.Title: Works and inexpensive
Reviews.Author: SG
Reviews.Content: Pros:1. Design, no external power adapter (more than five star)2. very easy and simple to use3. Fits well with iCloud/iTunes ecosystemCons:1. Optical audio should have been hybrid 3.5mm/optical2. Missing bluetooth3. Amazon VOD is missing4. Limited software capabilities.

Reviews.Title: great little box
Reviews.Author: Daniel Tabor "djtabor"
Reviews.Content: we really like the apple tv.  the air play mirroring is amazing.  we are using airparrot to use air play for our mac book pro and of course our ipod and ipad has air play.  with our mac book we can watch hulu plus and amazon prime.  we love the podcasts and netflix content on the box.  the interface is great.  I cant wait to see where this goes.  I would love for some more apps on here.  apple tv is great if you have apple devices for the air play alone.  The only reason i am not giving this 5 stars is because of the fact you dont have hulu plus and amazon prime but with air parrot for your mac book you can!try the trial if you have a mac[...]we love it!

Reviews.Title: It's ok but very limited
Reviews.Author: Torontobound
Reviews.Content: I have had my apple tv since July/2010.  Here are the things I like-dislike about it:LIKE:- setup is easy- Video resolution is good(we are still on the 720p box)- the remote is built well and has been dropped a LOT without issues.- AirPlay is a nice feature- different options to play movies, I.E. from my computer, netflix etcDISLIKE:- apple movie rentals are TOO expensive.  A B movie from 1985 should not cost $4.99.  A good example is "re-animator".  Some use the excuse of "well it's just convienent to rent from home blah blah".  Say what you want, but the prices are TOO high and keep customers like myself from renting.  Here is a tip to apple:  If you rent movies at .99 cents(older movies) and I rent 5 a week, that's $4.95.  Now if you keep the prices of those same movies at $4.99 EACH, I personally will not rent anything.  I am also betting a LOT of other customers don't rent because of the same issue.  So you either keep prices the way they are and get ZERO or lower them and get more rentals.  Why would I "buy" a movie on there?  Its not a tangible object like real blueray or DVDs.- Netflix - even though it's a separate company, they are attached in apple tv.  I spent over 3 months last year trying to resolve a buffering issue with them.  My cable company pointed the finger at Netflix and vice versa.  Some changes were finally made(they never told me what) and it got better.  BUT..... If I play Netflix from my iPad or Mac, I never get buffer issues.  This lead me to believe the apple tv was giving problems.-  HDCP error -  boy this is annoying.  You go to watch a movie and 4 seconds later it freezes.  A minute later the infamous "HDCP" error pops up which makes you reboot apple tv.  I have followed all the suggestions to resolve the issue and still get this error about 2-3 times a week.- TV shows on apple tv - $2.99 a episode?  Yep you read that right, they are $2.99 for ONE 47 minute episode.  I cancelled my cable tv in June 2011 and got a antenna. Now I get 24 HD channels for free.  I don't get discovery channel, or AMC but the savings alone make up for it(was paying $165 a month for cable & Internet), now it's down to $60).- I tunes festival - I'm not sure how that option showed up because it just appeared one day without updates.  Kinda boring.- Hulu plus -  if you have a Netflix subscription, don't bother with Hulu.  Netflix(dare I say it) has a better selection.  We tried Hulu for 4 days and most of the selections were boring or not worth watching.  There was also a HUGE selection of Korean movies.  I personally don't speak Korean, so they are worthless to me.- YouTube is what it is.... Plays videos from YT.- the other options are really boring unless your into basketball or hockey.  And even then, you have to have subscriptions to both.  Can we say nickel and diming here......With the way companies break everything up and "give you more options" these days, what it really means is "we are going to charge everything we can for EACH item".  Again, see my "nickel and diming" comment above.My wife and I are currently looking for a Internet ready TV so we can get rid of the apple TV box.  It's quite sad because we moved ALL of our computers(4 total) from PC to Mac in mid 2010.  Being really happy with the move, we figured apple tv would be awesome.  Needless to say, it's mediocre at best.And don't get me started on the horrible podcast or radio options.......  One word for them:  CRAP!!!!

Reviews.Title: Lacks compatibility
Reviews.Author: Joe Ski
Reviews.Content: I have an older Roku at home and bought an apple tv as I expected the same functionality as the old Roku along with the ability to control it with my iPad and iPhone. I was shocked although it will play Netflicks Apple has chosen not  not support Amazon instant video which is my personal favorite. I am not sure if they have excluded others but I immediately sent it back when I learned that. What was really frustrating was that the only was I learned this was by setting it up. I found nothing in the on line product specs or on the packaging that shared this lack of comparability . The documentation says it plays your favorites.

Reviews.Title: Fraud
Reviews.Author: Nathan D Gunn
Reviews.Content: Totally fraudulent product. This should not be listed at such a high price. You shouldn't pay more than $99 for an AppleTV.

Reviews.Title: Problems with the Apple TV 3
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: I used to have an Apple TV in the past and loved it. That was part of the reason I purchased a new one. After receiving my new model I started having issues with the ATV dropping out of home share. While watching a movie it would drop like every 5-10 min. It was so aggravating. Doing some research on line I found that this was a common problem. Apple still has not come out with a fix. I have traced this problem to at least a year ago. Many people have complained about this issue with Apple. They still have come out with a correction to this issue.I loved this product in the past and would happily recommend this to others if Apple would get on board to fix the glitch. Right now my ATV 3 is a hundred dollar paperweight.

Reviews.Title: Stream from pc, not mirror
Reviews.Author: cmosha
Reviews.Content: Just wanted to let pc buyers interested in purchasing apple tv know that you can stream wirelessly from itunes, but you will not be able to mirror your pc. Only ios devices can.

Reviews.Title: Like tech stuff?  Just get one...
Reviews.Author: antiscian
Reviews.Content: Man I love this thing.  Not sure why I waited so long to grab one but lately I've been getting serious about ridding of cable.  Sure the AppleTV has its limitations, but that's really only because of limited deals with TV providers.  This will improve over time but the state of this device is still amazing.If you have an iPhone/iPad, using Airplay to stream your content to the TV is just amazing.
