From songs to podcasts to Youtube movies, it's awesome.  Using iPhone as the remote control for this device is the only way to go as far as I am concerned as my fat fingers kept hitting the middle button on the included remote by accident.Personally I am using Hulu plus, Netflix and I got a flat OTA antenna for the free OTA HD channels.  Homesharing - playing songs from your iTunes from your PCs - very nice.And for the guys out there I am just gonna say it - you can stream free porn onto your TV via Apple TV.  Come on you know you're going to do it.  Wife and kids is away shopping and guess what, you have the house all to yourself.  You gotta keep the pipes clean and keeping prime can prevent prostate cancer.  The porn streaming works really well but get ready with emergency volume control.  Come on you're going to do it - you know I'm right.

Reviews.Title: Probably the best $100 I ever spent
Reviews.Author: mlind87
Reviews.Content: I love the Apple TV. Works seamlessly with my iPhone 4GS and iPad for mirroring. Great if you have some friends over and want to throw up a YouTube video for everyone to watch. We even take turns with our phones controlling which video we're all watching. Kind of a fun party game.Also have Netflix and NHL GameCenter subscriptions, and very satisfied with both of them on Apple TV. For the NHL games, especially, you can go back and watch EVERY game throughout the entire season--both home and away broadcasts. Amazing, and no need to DVR 3-hour games anymore. As far as Netflix is concerned, I can't imagine going back to watching on my laptop now that I have this hooked up to my TV.**The only con/drawback I would say is that mirroring and video playback via your iPhone/iPod/iPad does depend on the strength of your WiFi network. I actually relocated my router closer to the entertainment room where my Apple TV is hooked up so that I can optimize the connection. Other than that, this is a great product and very satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: A Must-Have For Video Buffs Living In the Apple Ecosystem, But It Comes With Caveats
Reviews.Author: P. Colin McGraw "AV, Computer & EnviroTech Nut"
Reviews.Content: Apple arguably has the best-developed video ecosystem in the business. Their video rental selection is top-notch, you usually get iTunes digital copies with the Blu-ray combo packs you can buy, a good (not great) selection of TV shows are available, there's tons of great free content (news, vlogs, etc.) via Video Podcasts and Apple's developed a way to stream what's on your iPad 2/3 or iPhone 4S screen to an Apple TV via a technology called "AirPlay".I personally have around 100 iTunes movies and it's great to be able to sync them to my iPhone/iPad for my kids to watch when we're out and about, then come home and stream them to my TV with a push of a button.As you'd expect with Apple, the interface is top-tier. Sure every Blu-ray player and game system out there nowadays has YouTube, but usually the interfaces are clunky enough that you rarely use the feature. Apple TV's Netflix interface is also my favorite of the plethora of streaming devices I tried!If you have a lot of iTunes video, a Netflix subscription, rent a lot of movies (but hate driving or waiting for the mail), or watch any Video Podcasts, it's surely worth dropping $99 on this puppy.However, it's not perfect. First, while this is the first "1080p" Apple TV, you shouldn't expect Blu-ray quality (as is the case with any current media streamer). Blu-rays pump out up to 40 Mbps of data to your TV, while Apple suggests you have an 8Mbps connection for their "1080p" content. Thus, while the resolution is technically full HD, movies have to be so compressed that they lose a bit of color depth and sound quality in order to make streaming over the internet practical: in short, this device is about convenience more than quality.Also, while Apple TV supports a lot of content that no other media streamer can (iTunes video in particular), there are some services notably absent from the selection. For example, there's no Hulu+ and no way to download it since the Apple TV has no App Store.The good news is that you can partially overcome this limitation with the video mirroring "AirPlay" feature of iPad 2/3 or iPhone 4S. The bad news with these devices is that the experience is suboptimal. Using Hulu+ as the example, the first thing you'll notice is that the aspect ratio of the iPad and an HDTV is different, so you get black bars on the sides. The picture is also relatively low quality, but it does the job.Nevertheless, since a lot of Blu-ray players offer Hulu+ and even apps, it puts the Apple TV at somewhat of a functional disadvantage in some respects.However, even with its limitations the reality remains that Apple TV is my go-to device for Netflix, YouTube, movie rentals, iTunes streaming, video podcasts and even Flickr slideshows of family photos. What the Apple TV offers, it offers better than any other device I've tried.

Reviews.Title: Great for an Apple house
Reviews.Author: Dov
Reviews.Content: My excellent Roku 1 died last month after 6 years of wonderful service. I bought a Roku 3 last year for my second TV and it works incredibly well!! I was torn between replacing my dead Roku with another Roku 3 (which I know works extremely well) or getting the Apple TV so I can leverage my iTunes collection, and other Apple devices that I've accumulated over the last couple of years. Pros of Roku 3 and Apple TV:Roku 3 ProsExtremely fast user interfaceHeadphone jack on the remoteRemote easier to useApple TV ProsAccess to iTunes digital library - music, movies and TV shows (items purchased on iTunes)Access to "Home Sharing" on iTunes - music and photos (not purchased on iTunes)Access to iMovies program from laptopAirPlay feature for iOS devicesThe only thing missing from Apple is Amazon Prime. But I understand that you can use the iPad Prime App with AirPlay. I don't use Amazon Prime that much, so its not that big of a deal to me. If you don't have other Apple products, I would recommend getting the Roku 3. If you do have an iTunes library with Digital copies of movies, I would recommend getting this unit.

Reviews.Title: Still hard to beat
Reviews.Author: R. Duffy
Reviews.Content: Say what you will about Apple products but quality and ease of use will be two things.  I bought this for my 79 year old mother.  She connected it herself and watching her favorite movies right away. She uses her iPad to control the device and is saving money by canceling many premium cable services.  You can play with Android devices if you wish, but if you want to connect and use immediately, buy an Apple YV.

Reviews.Title: Just Too Limited to be Worth the Money
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Holt "Jeff"
Reviews.Content: I can definitely be labeled as an Apple junkie and generally have high regard for most of their products.  Sadly, the Apple TV doesn't reach the same high level of performance as the iPhone and iPad products.  After about three months, I converted from the Apple TV to a Roku 3 and have been very happy with the change.  The Roku simply gives you more channels, has a better interface, is faster, is simply easier to use.  I did enjoy being able to project my iPad or iPhone onto a TV screen using Airplay and Apple TV, but unfortunately, the only way that functionality works is when you are on your home network.  You cannot travel with an Apple TV and expect to use it in a hotel.  You can use your phone as a personal hotspot to establish a network and gain all of the Apple TV capabilities, but you will burn through your data plan very quickly.  If you try to establish your own network using a mobile router then you will quickly find that almost none of your Apple content is authorized to play.  All in all, this was biggest disappointment I have experienced with an Apple product.  Go with a Roku, you'll be much happier.

Reviews.Title: I love my Apple TV and my Roku 3!
Reviews.Author: Matt "movie/tv guy"
Reviews.Content: I love having both! They both have it's pros and cons. There are no which one is better, they both make me happy!

Reviews.Title: My TV may be too old
Reviews.Author: Heather P. Woltz
Reviews.Content: No one warned me that TVs that are 5+ years old often have distortions and fluctuations in reception.  Currently I'm having constant "blipping" in tv transmission and music - totally unacceptable!

Reviews.Title: Great Video and Sound. Easy to configure.
Reviews.Author: B. Franklin "Breklin"
Reviews.Content: We all have iPhones or iPods and Windows machines with iTunes on them. I installed AirParrot on my Windows Asus laptop and have had no issues whatsoever this this. The video and sound quality is stellar for Netflix, Hulu, iTunes (movies, radio and more). Plug it in, go through the setup and BOOM! You're ready to rock n' roll.Must have if you are already or plan to join in the Apple ecosystem.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for people with bad vision.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my mother to watch shows on the TV since it has a bigger screen. She loves it and would never go back to watching it via the computer or smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV is a hit!  Great altenative to Garbage on the air waves today!
Reviews.Author: Enzo Rat Racer "Enzo's"
Reviews.Content: Best little investment for crap TV programing that exists today!  Pick your own genre and never watch a hemmeorid commercial again!

Reviews.Title: If you're an Apple person, get this
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: If you own Apple products, you need to get this. It has the simplicity, reliability and clean interface of a typical Apple product. I wish I would have gotten this years ago. I read all the reviews particularly the ones comparing them to Roku III. but in retrospect, it was a wasted effort. Apple users prefer intuitive simple to use features with a clean interface. That's what this provides. I'm not a gamer. I'm not someone who can't afford to pay for items and needs to jail break an item to get free apps. I'm too busy to watch or need 1000 apps/stations/channels whatever you want to call it.  Yeah, the Apple TV doesn't have as many apps as the Roku but it has the only apps that you will really need. What you want is what I wanted. You want a device that won't lose connection. You want something that is easy to use. You want a clean interface. You want to be able to import your iTunes so you can play music over your television for when you have guests over or just provide a nice ambience in the home. You want to be able to view your photos and videos on your television.  This product does not deserve less than 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV does not support Pandora
Reviews.Author: Robert St Cyr
Reviews.Content: The user interface is better than Roku (I have that also). I am VERY disappointed that Apple tv does not support Pandora.

Reviews.Title: 2 main reasons why it doesnt get a 5 star.
Reviews.Author: Skyler LeGrande
Reviews.Content: Great product especially if you are apple lover and owner such as me. This will work great with apple products to easy stream thing to your tv fast.2 things that bug me at the moment but could be fixed.1. My apple tv makes a harsh, weird, and extremely annoying sound about every hour it still plays whatever is playing but with a incredible amount of distortion I cant seem to find whats wrong it does it on every app and evern when im streaming this makes me think its the box itself.2. Apple tv needs a app store just like the iphone app store the ipad app store and the mac app store come on apple why not?

Reviews.Title: Great Little Easy to Use Box
Reviews.Author: Raymond R. Jackson
Reviews.Content: The more I use this the more I love it. I am an owner of Roku boxes, the original Boxee Box, as well as the other common streaming options like a PS3, Smart TV, and Blu-Ray player.  Of all of the devices in our house the only one my wife uses is the Apple TV. I would say simplicity as well as reliability are the biggest reasons why she prefers it to the others.There are little things that I love about Apple TV that put it ahead of the competition. Let's start with the Apps first.  Apple TV has a very different interface for services like Hulu Plus and Netflix and it is in my opinion a superior one. Roku's Netflix App, for example, makes you scroll left to right with just a few titles in your instant queue showing each time. Apple TV shows all of your instant queue titles in one large screen. It is much easier to scroll down and find titles in the middle or bottom of a large queue.  Because of this different user interface all of the screens in the apps are easier to use and navigate.I also like that when you pick a something to watch it suggests several other titles that are similar to the one that you picked. This is very helpful in unlocking lesser known titles in the Netflix library.  Most apps do not come close to showing you all of the titles that are available for Netflix streaming. The suggestions open up the options to things you did not know were there. I love this feature as I have discovered titles that never show up in the main browsing menus.The other big plus is that the Apple TV always works. I cannot say this has been the case with the other boxes I own. I have lost track of the number of times I have had to reboot my Roku or Boxee Box to clear up a problem. This is more of an issue with Boxee but my Roku will often restart itself, lock-up in an app, or just be very slow in general navigation. I do not remember the last time I had to unplug the Apple TV for a hard reboot, if ever.I also love being able to push the up or down button on the remote to see where I am at in the program without having to press pause. I miss this function a lot on my Roku boxes. In addition to your place in the program this bar is useful when you are streaming Itunes related content. Apple TV has 8GB of internal flash storage and begins downloading an Itunes title when you start watching it.  This means you will not see a drop in image quality while watching a program even if your bandwidth becomes less. The progress bar shows you how much of the title is downloaded with a white bar.  If you are having streaming issues just pause the title and wait for the white bar to go ahead of your pause point. It is pretty rare when I need to do this but it is good to be able to see how much of the content is downloaded. If you do not finish a title and come back to it later the downloaded portion stays on the flash storage so streaming is always smooth.Of all the positives mentioned above I have not gotten into Air Play functions.  If you own an Ipad or Iphone, like my wife and I do, then this is another awesome feature. Simply put there are other options that offer more content but there are not many that do it in such simplistic and reliable fashion as this. If you own any other Apple products like a Macbook, Iphone, or Ipad then getting this little box would be a great choice. Even if you are not an Apple user there is a lot to love about Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV Packaging/Set-Up
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: In the box you get the Apple TV, which is a small black box measuring only 23mm x 98mm x 98mm that weighs just 0.27kg, a nice-looking aluminum remote with very few buttons, some setup instructions and a power lead. The Apple TV has exactly the same ports and connectors on the back as before. There's an ethernet port, an Optical Audio port and a HDMI port for connection to your TV. You'll also notice a Micro-USB port, but this has no use for the home user - it's just for Apple's Geniuses to use when diagnosing problems. The Apple TV processor has been upgraded to the A5 chip to cope with 1080p HD movie playback. iFixit has done a teardown on the Apple TV and found that the Broadcom 4330 Wi-Fi chip inside also supports Bluetooth 4.0+HS, although it currently makes no use of this technology - it's possible that the functionality could be added in a future update. The current Apple Remote uses Infrared, this requires line of site to your Apple TV, which can be a pain - a Bluetooth remote would be far superior.Connection to your TV is via a HDMI cable, but be aware that there isn't one in the box, so you have to purchase that separately.The first surprise with the new Apple TV compared to the previous generation is that once you connect it up to your TV is that it talks to you! A voice asks you if you'd like to enable the Voice Over feature by clicking a button on the remote three times.Voice Over reads out what the menu option you've currently got selected is, so it will be a very useful feature for visually impaired users who need extra help navigating the menu systems.Proceeding on, you set up the usual things like language then select a WiFi network - if you've never done this before then it will be your first encounter with the Apple TV's tedious way of entering text and numbers - you have an alphabetically ordered block of letters that you have to have to slowly manoeuvre around using the remote's click wheel. t's frustrating to use because the layout is so unfamiliar - having the letters arranged like a computer keyboard would have been more intuitive.Going through the process of painfully entering your WiFi password one character at a time using this input method only to realise you got one of the characters wrong and have to do it all over again is heartbreaking, especially when at this stage you just want to get on with enjoying all the great content your Apple TV promises. It's a shame Apple still use this input method because everything else about the Apple TV is so easy to use it stands in sharp contrast to other media streamers.

Reviews.Title: Amazing functionality, but amazingly unreliable
Reviews.Author: Goodheretic "GH"
Reviews.Content: I love Apple products, but this one needs work.  It is amazing to use Airplay to be able to mirror my screen on my TV and stream music through the big stereo in my room.  But, this device has some serious technical problems.  It regularly disconnects from the wireless network for no apparent reason.  It also constantly disconnects airplay from my computer and makes me turn airplay on and off through the menu of the AppleTV to get it to work again.  I have been stuck in bed after surgery twice in the last four months.  Each time, I used the Apple TV very regularly to stream music or watch movies.  I would estimate I had a problem about five times a day that required power cycling the Apple TV or turning settings on and off in menus because they randomly stopped working.  This product has a lot of potential if they can get it to be stable.

Reviews.Title: Must have for Apple users
Reviews.Author: Sid
Reviews.Content: This is now more than just a hobby for Apple.  I use it to watch video from my iPad or my iPhone all the time.  I rent movies on it.  I love using the Netflix and Hulu apps.  The HBO Go app has been great to watch my HBO series.  I can not wait to see what is added next.  It also is an Apple product which means it just works.  I plugged it in and a few minutes later it was working.

Reviews.Title: blows away the rest
Reviews.Author: DJ Walker
Reviews.Content: it may be more limited in some aspects, but as far as build quality and reliability there isn't anything else close.  if you already own apple products, this is a no-brainer.  plus, apple is set to add much more content in the near future (others are trying, but apple has the $ to pull it off).chromecast is a joke, even at $35, or whatever their latest "promo" is (google netflix promo, what a scam).  just a failed google tv stripped down.  don't believe me, google it.

Reviews.Title: No Amazon Prime???
Reviews.Author: Ojosv
Reviews.Content: I know a lot of folks who praise AppleTV and when my Panasonic streaming device crapped out...I thought I'd give it a try.  Yes, I should have looked over the product specs in more detail but there were two reasons I was forced to return it.  One, it doesn't support Amazon Prime.  Two, you have to use the TV in order to stream music.  I ended up getting a Roku and an Airport for the music.  Apple needs to get this figured out.

Reviews.Title: Just learning
Reviews.Author: steve noblett
Reviews.Content: We use this with a 50" tv in our office for meetings, etc.  My only disappointment is that my Macbook Pro is one half generation too old to work without using Parrot.  Parrot and my old Macbook don't run fast enough to provide some of the video or complex Keynote slides without either lower graphic quality or delay.  Others in my office with newer laptops have no problem, and everything works just fine.

Reviews.Title: Could be a lot better
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: When I first wrote this review I gave it 2/5.  I've since upped to 3/5.The good:+Easy to setup.+Airplay from OSX works great.  Super easy to get set up.  I don't have an iPhone so can't tell you how well it works from your phone, but imagine it's just as easy.+If you can play it in iTunes, you can easily stream it to your TV.+The remote is nice.The bad:-If you can play it in iTunes, you can easily stream it to your TV.  Yes I did list it as both good and bad.  The problem is that iTunes doesn't support really that many file formats.Want to play a video in MKV file?  It's a popular video format, but nope sorry.Want to play a FLAC?  It's open source and more popular than Apple's lossless format, but nope sorry.It makes for a really crappy user experience when you have to convert formats for the sake of Apple's prudness.  Converting audio is not that big of a deal.  However re-encode HD video in to an mp4, can take considerable time.  Although I've figured out how to encode the video to mp4, and the even faster method of remuxing the video (assuming it's using the proper encoding), it's still more time (and possibly cost) than the non-technical will want to put in to it.  Sometimes the Apple way, is not the best way.-The lack of apps.  It would seem that this is a killer time for Apple to dominate the living room.  However they haven't opened up the Apple TV up to developers, so don't expect to find specialty music apps like Pandora.  However you could always play such services via Airplay either on OSX or iOS.-Does not recognize different wireless frequencies with the same broadcast name.  I've always found this kind of odd, and it's the same way in OSX.  If you want to chose between 2.4 Ghz or 5 Ghz wireless you must name each differently.  If you're going to steam high def video, or use airplay to your tv you probably want the 5 Ghz band properly set up.-The interface feels old and dated.-Not all Macs or Hackintoshs support Airplay video mirroring.  Luckily an app like AirParrot will allow you to use it.  Airplay sound should work regardless.Conclusion:Overall it's a stylish little box, and you could probably do worse.  If you're happy with iTunes, and can deal with how Apple restricts you, or already have your entire media library in iTunes, then this is right up your alley and you'll love this.  If you buy content from the iTunes store and want a way to play it on your tv easily, you'll love this.  If you have an iOS device and can Airplay stuff to it, you'll love this.  If you're just a huge fanboy, you'll love this.For the rest the lack of choice seems less than ideal.  If you have a large media library that is not iTunes friendly you should spend your money else where.  Similar boxes, like the Roku 3 (but any Roku 2 box really) have a lot more apps, and can play nearly any music or video format with Plex media server.  A lot more choice and cost the same or less.  The Roku 3 should also soon support the non-Apple Airplay called "Miracast".After using the Apple TV it for a few days, I'm probably going to keep it.  I find enough uses for it, and have invested enough time in to it to figure out some of the technical hurdles.  I do enjoy Airplay, but wonder if it's really worth the cost of admission.  However that seems to be what this device is, it was meant for you to use some kind of other Apple device to interact with it.  It just, feels odd.  But when you think about it, it should bring unlimited possibilities.I find it hard to recommend.  I feel it's primarily aimed at non-technical people who don't know any better, like most Apple products.  However if you are on the more technical side and have the patience to deal with the technical issues it can also serve you well.  It doesn't seem to fit the middle ground so well.

Reviews.Title: Works flawlessly
Reviews.Author: J LeRoy
Reviews.Content: As always, Apple products deliver, works effortlessly. Would recommend to everyone, no skill level required to set up, just plug it in

Reviews.Title: With one exception, I love it.
Reviews.Author: Kate
Reviews.Content: **17Sept 2013 edit**. I just got an update for Amazon Instant Video this morning, and itis now available over AirPlay to Apple TV!  Hurrah!I opted for the Apple TV over Roku products because I'm an Apple user (I've got an Ipad2 and an Iphone 4s, both of which are Airplay compatible).  I'm also an Amazon Prime member who watches a lot of television shows through the Ipad app.  One reason I chose the Apple TV was because of Airplay with my Ipad, I could watch Amazon Prime videos (one feature of the Roku that I really liked.)  Well, it arrived last night, and the Amazon Prime app is not available to stream over Airplay.Well played, Amazon.  Well played.That being said, the Airplay function is worth it.  I used velcro to attach the small design to the back of my small television and the signal from the remote bounces off the wall behind it to the box, eliminating line of sight necessity for the remote.The remote app on Ipad/Iphone is seriously easy to use and cool.  I also tried out a flight simulater game that uses the Ipad as a control panel and the television as game screen (I usually don't play these types of games.  I just really wanted to try out this feature.)  It was fun!

Reviews.Title: Really Nice - if You Don't Want Amazon Streaming...
Reviews.Author: Strick1226
Reviews.Content: PRO's:--For an Apple device, it's surprisingly similar to prices of other, competing set-top boxes--It's small--Sips electricity when in use; incredibly low use when asleep--Dead silent--Generates almost no heat--Makes viewing Netflix movies with Closed Captioning possible, even if your TV's built-in Netflix app refuses to do it--Menus are pretty easy to navigate around--Supports 1080p content when availableCON's:--Hey, it's an Apple device--it's locked down, so you're stuck with the options they provide (unless you jailbreak it)--Remote is so thin it's actually a bit difficult to use--Range of default, included remote is limited to a fairly short line-of-sight infared; can't really hide the AppleTV from view due to this flaw--No Amazon Streaming or Rentals--more of a push towards Apple and Netflix servicesBOTTOM Line:  This is a nice little easy-to-use set-top box.  If you're planning to stream most of your content through one of the included service's apps, you're good to go.  You can stream media from OS X and Windows computers running iTunes.  The Apple TV 3 doesn't have nearly the same sort of selection of options and expansion capabilities of something like the Roku platform, but it's not supposed to; it does what it does, and what it does, it does simply and reliably.

Reviews.Title: A miniaturized remote? Why?
Reviews.Author: Ernie UMass
Reviews.Content: Apple is obsessed with miniaturization, but what they need to learn is that if the device is not made to be carried around with you, miniaturization is not always a positive. For example, the Apple TV remote is about the size of a stick of chewing gum, and only has 7 buttons. Sure, why would we need a variety of buttons when we can just hit these 7 buttons 16 zillion times every time we need to navigate through the user interface? I'm sure Apple sycophants are falling all over themselves saying how wonderfully intuitive the remote is, but Apple could come out with a device that stabs these people in the eye every 15 seconds, and they would be blogging about how wonderful and user friendly it is within minutes.Furthermore, I cannot watch Amazon Prime instant videos on it. Apple is always in a dispute with someone, so I am sure this is not a technical issue, but another Apple money grab. These people sue other companies for having rounded corners for crying out loud. EVERY OTHER STREAMING DEVICE WORKS WITH AMAZON PRIME!!! How can anyone say this device is superior when it is the only one that cannot do this.

Reviews.Title: Kinda Slow - But Still Nice
Reviews.Author: Book Reader "Book Reader"
Reviews.Content: ROKU LT vs APPLETV:The Good:AppleTV wins hands down on style.  The little box is about the same size as a ROKU LT, and a little heavier.  The on screen graphics are also laid out like ever other Apple product, clean, easy to understand.Roku on the other hand is much faster, have a bizillion types of content (even "hidden addable stations") that you can add later.  The UI is clumsy, sure - but so what when you have that kind of content made available to you for free!The Bad:AppleTV only allows a hookup with a optical interface or HDMI.  This would prove sorta tedious if your TV only has 1 HDMI port.  On ROKU you have a choice, HDMI or old school RCA (red, yellow, white) plugs.  AppleTV also seriously lacks any way to acccess any really cool information (apps)AppleTV:  NetFlix (paid) HuluPlus (paid) MLB.com (paid) NBA (paid) NHL (paid) Trailers (free) YouTube (free) Vimeo (free) Podcasts (free) Radio (free) PhotoStream (free) Flickr (free) WSJ Live (haven't checked this out yet)ROKU:  The world, literally!  You can add "unpublished" channels as easy as 1-2-3!The UGLY:AppleTV is slow!  I have it hooked up via HDMI and it buffers like crazy!  You can't listen to your iTunes music unless you pay $24.99 a year to mirror the music!  ROKU has a cool app called PLEX which will let you play all your iTunes music and Videos and other YouTube videos that you can "PlexIt" with the click of a button on your information bar!!  NO AMAZON PRIME?  WTF?ROKU requires a credit card for setup. It's also lightening fast compared to it's elder brother AppleTV.So, right now it's a toss-up with Roke edging out AppleTV to be my favorite, but I'll edit this review when I find out more.

Reviews.Title: Nice Edition to Our Media Center
Reviews.Author: Debra "Deb"
Reviews.Content: We received this as a Christmas gift and totally love it! Set-up was fast & simple, including the network connection to our home wi-fi. I love the AirPlay feature which lets us stream to our HDTV from our iPads. I like being able to stream photos and music for a screen saver; it's fun having a rotating slide show of our family, friends and favorite pics.  We have also used it to rent an HD movie from iTunes and the download time and play quality were excellent. We don't have a Netfix or HuluPlus account, so have not tried those options. However, we also have a networked Sony BluRay DVD player we use to watch TV programs and movies on Amazon Prime and find them similar in quality and pricing. The advantage of AmazonPrime is the free content, i.e., Downton Abbey seasons 1 & 2 are free on Amazon Prime, but you have to purchase them on AppleTV. We also have Comcast Xfinity and get free programming that we would have to pay for on the AppleTV, i.e., Homeland TV series.  I think AppleTV would be a better product if it included AmazonPrime, but I'm happy with it. I just wish we could combine all these products into one box so we'd have fewer remotes to keep track of!

Reviews.Title: Apple TV streams captions!!!
Reviews.Author: Shirley Willard
Reviews.Content: For anyone who relies on closed captioning to enjoy video, this little purchase is a major breakthrough.  Streaming Netflix was previously of no value to me, except on my little iPad screen.  Now the great world of Netflix content is available to me with captions on my television.  I don't care about anything else that Apple TV can do ( mirroring is cool).  For me, it's all about the closed captions.

Reviews.Title: Does what you'd expect
Reviews.Author: Install Heroes
Reviews.Content: If you're tied to your iTunes account or want to use Screen Mirroring from your iPad then this is the best box for you.  However, if you just want a smart media streamer you'd do better with an Android Mini PC.  Available on Amazon for as little as $30.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: KennyM
Reviews.Content: I wish every techie item was this easy to set-up and get working!  Works well with my 60 inch Sony.  I can't believe the picture quality in HD from Netfix over the WiFi!  Wow.

Reviews.Title: My AppleTV
Reviews.Author: Ning Pan
Reviews.Content: I heard Apple TV when it was first appeared with mixed responses from users several years ago. But this time I decided to order it because of its new Airplay function. It arrived safely and on time.  It worked so beautifully that now it becomes the only channel we watch TV. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Simple and functional at a reasonable price
Reviews.Author: C. Kracke
Reviews.Content: This is my second Apple TV and along with the mirroring on Mountain Lion makes it a must have home theater component.  They recently added Hulu+ and I am betting that more will come as broadcasters realize that with mirroring available they might as well join the parade.Easy setup via wifi or ethernet.  Fast interface which provides a lot of extra functionality with users existing Apple centric media libraries.  Streams photos and music like a charm.

Reviews.Title: Essential for Apple product users
Reviews.Author: T. Varela
Reviews.Content: It's tiny. It's energy efficient. It's a  total breeze to integrate into an existing HDMI based home theater system. Netflix picture quality very good on a fast broadband connection. I'm using a 12mb VDSL link. Netflix supports Dolby D.  I'm very pleased.  Oh, did I mention that if you have a recent iPHone you can Airplay videos and pictures to your TV!Excellent product.  If you are an Apple product user,  i.e. iPhone, Macbook,  iPad, iTunes this is an inexpensive and essential addition to your multimedia system.Now if it would just support Amazon Prime video :)

Reviews.Title: Must have companion for any Apple product
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I have bought three AppleTVs in the past year for myself and family. If you have any Apple product that supports AirPlay, this is a must-have companion.We had a party recently, and everyone loved pulling out their iPhones and playing their favorite songs or home videos through our home theater system. It was a great experience.The PhotoStream screensaver makes your TV into a giant digital picture frame. Any picture I've taken with my iPhone, or edited with my MacBook shows up automatically.Airplay Mirroring lets you show your entire iPhone, iPad, or new MacBook screen to your TV screen. You can scroll through photos, watch videos, or anything really, all over wireless, all through your home theater system. This is the future.With Netflix and now HuluPlus, cutting cable TV is much easier. We eliminated our cable box recently and barely miss it.The AppleTV is simply a great device that gets more features every update. The Apple ecosystem is a great place to be.

Reviews.Title: Finally Perfect
Reviews.Author: Samuel Claney
Reviews.Content: I have a Roku, and only chose it over Apple TV because it didn't offer hulu+, or mirroring from a computer. But just last week they added hulu, and they launched Mountain Lion that allowed for mirroring from my Mac, all while my Roku became incredibly slow to take any commands from the remote, and would sometimes just freak out. I got the Apple TV and so far it's been fantastic. It hasn't slowed down like the Roku did, yet, and it's great to be able to watch things like the Olympics on my TV through my computer that's streaming it from the NBC website. Plus, it's just one more thing to harmoniously sync with iCloud, and that always feel good. I'm really happy with the switch.

Reviews.Title: Great for home sharing
Reviews.Author: Sachimo
Reviews.Content: Ok, I bought this product thinking I can share my music and video from my iPhone and iPad using my home entertainment center and TV and it does work great and everyone is happy. Now, another feature of this product is to be able stream and/or download movies to watch. Well, streaming works fairly good depending on the sites you go to such as Netflix BUT if you go to the Apple site and try to download a movie to watch, forget it, you might as well get in your car, drive to the video store, rent a movie, go have dinner with family, stop for gas and come home and then "maybe" the download is complete. Bottom line, good for music sharing and streaming video, not so good for downloading.

Reviews.Title: No more cable.....
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Picked up the AppleTV in an attempt to cut the cord with cable.  We are a few weeks into the experiment and are not looking back!Setup: Pretty much just plug it in and set up your wifiInterface: Simple, intuitive and very smooth.iTunes Content: Tons of iTunes content.  Great selection of movies, but I wish the prices were better.  I see no reason to purchase TV shows, but others might.  Got me back into podcasts, there is an amazing about of content.3rd Party Content: My son lives in Netflix, he never used it on the Wii but now accessing content is much easier.  Vimeo has some great content, much more polished then YouTube.  MLB.TV is great, but I with they didn't follow the blackout rules.Remote: Remote is simple, but the remote app (iPhone/iPad) makes it much easier to use.AirPlay: This is the killer feature, and it will be even better with Mountain Lion this summer.At $99 this is a no brainer.If your have an iPad, this is a great add on.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Way To Make the TV Part of the Apple Ecosystem
Reviews.Author: Virtuoso Fan
Reviews.Content: I don't watch "regular" TV at all and haven't for many years so I decided to ditch the cable service and go with 2nd generation ATV back in 2010. For me and the family it was mainly about watching movies and some educational documentaries a few times per week through iTunes and Netflix. Being that we're also a Mac and iOS family with numerous Macs and iOS devices around the house, the ATV became more useful than just streaming movies and shows to the HDTV set. Now with iCloud it's the wireless router that brings all of the content available through the Mac and iOS ecosystem to the TV screen and the home theater audio system. Gone are the big unsightly black boxes and cables that cluttered the TV cabinet along with the racks of CDs and DVDs. With all the content on iTunes Match and the iOS devices, it's just a matter of using the remote or the iDevices themselves to control what you watch and listen to through the ATV.The value of the ATV is that much greater if you have already invested in the Apple ecosystem - Macs, iPhones, iPads, iPod touch, iTunes content, etc. The ATV on its own, I gather, isn't all that great compared to what's already out there. For TV freaks who put in 4~5 hours of TV time per day, I'd imagine there are more thorough and feature-rich devices out there. But as an extension device of all things Apple to the TV screen, this little unit works charmingly well and provides more than enough content for the casual TV watcher and movie fan. I'd only really recommend this unit to iOS device owners and there are plenty of them out there.Apple still has ways to go to make the TV an integral part of its growing ecosystem. One can tell that Apple is getting more and more serious about this business and that it isn't just a "hobby" anymore. These little ATV boxes seem more like a real-world R&D; testing for Apple's rumored HDTV set that could arrive near the end of this year or sometime in 2013. The key will be content and Apple still has a lot of work to do on that front. For me, live sports would be the only thing I'd consider to be essential to make it perfect but I know most other people have other wants and needs when it comes to what they want to watch. In the meantime, this new ATV would be a great addition to iPhone/iPad owners and a reasonable add-on for others who want to stream movies and archived TV shows every now and then.

Reviews.Title: all excellent
Reviews.Author: cahern4
Reviews.Content: all excellent, as expected, excellent quality, easy to install, easy to user;, I am very happy with the item and my Iphone I can now connect to my TV

Reviews.Title: ❤️❤️❤️
Reviews.Author: Ana12345
Reviews.Content: Cannot tell you how nice it is to see my iPad mirrored on my Apple TV. Many times I have wanted to share something from my iPad or iphone. This was well worth the money spent. Now my family and I can watch church service, movies, etc from the iPad. I also enjoy Netflix too!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Daniel Ibanez
Reviews.Content: its apple, its good.every product i buy from apple i get surprised.its very easy to manage , install and use.

Reviews.Title: really disappointed
Reviews.Author: Busy Mom
Reviews.Content: Received this $100 gift as a Christmas present.  We planned to use it primarily for Netflix.  Loved it when it worked, however, after only 3 months of use it keeps losing the signal.  I've spend HOURS online with tech support to no avail.  The last time I called they told me it would be $20 a phone call from now on.  I threw this piece of garbage in the trash and bought a blue ray player which works well.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Roxie
Reviews.Content: This allows me to stream videos and music from iTunes (on my PC) to my TV.  I can access my playlists for both music and video - if all your media is loaded onto your iTunes you will love this.The only downside I've found so far is the remote.  It's small size means it's much more likely to fall between the couch cushions, and I wish I could control volume with it.  But overall I love my Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Unit
Reviews.Author: Rush McKee
Reviews.Content: Love it, we are Apple users and this is really handy, when the new update comes out you will be able to connect without internet.

Reviews.Title: Like most products from Apple, this is quality that limits you
Reviews.Author: Nate the Great
Reviews.Content: I have a Roku also. Apple has the better quality especially in the super tiny remote, but some channels I want are not available. These things should all be open platform for any dern channel I want.

Reviews.Title: Very useful
Reviews.Author: Pramod
Reviews.Content: Mirror and have fun! Haven't tried it enough but having fun so far! I think what stands out for me is convenience and quality of the product.

Reviews.Title: Simply the best
Reviews.Author: Joe Shmo
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is amazing.  Either you get the concept or you dont.  If you get it, then you know what I mean.  You cant beat this little machine for under $100.  It changes the entire game.  Especially for mirroring my ipad, iphone or macbook to my TV.  I can watch videos of my kids sports on my iphone and broadcast them to my TV.  Thats worth $100 right there and of course there is so so much more.

Reviews.Title: Awesome but.....
Reviews.Author: Nic H.
Reviews.Content: this thing is pretty great, I use it a lot for watching netflix and listening to iTunes radio. The only thing that is lacking is a Safari app and general third party apps. Its kinda lame that you can't download additional apps without jailbreaking it.

Reviews.Title: Love it !
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: Now I can watch what ever TV show or downloaded movies I like anytime I want. Or pictures,music...Is there a way to type words faster?!

Reviews.Title: Great addition
Reviews.Author: Bob Catherwood
Reviews.Content: Watch Netflix and videos from our Ipads regularly.  Kids love it.  Easy to set up and to use.  Highly recommended

Reviews.Title: apple tv
Reviews.Author: Pam Mathison
Reviews.Content: I really haven't had a chance to use it much yet.  But the one time i did, i thought it was pretty good. i didn't see amazon prime or netflix on there though but as i said, i've only used it once..

Reviews.Title: Like it - just what I expected
Reviews.Author: jmerk1
Reviews.Content: …be aware that you can't stream from your computer directly. Everything has to be MP4 coded and 'imported' to iTunes.

Reviews.Title: An Apple soul, but wish I ordered the Amazon model
Reviews.Author: Murray Eisner
Reviews.Content: Works just ok. Sometimes it stops momentarily. I'm an Apple soul, but would prefer the Amazon model if I had to do it over as it is more powerful and gets both Netflix and Amazon.  What I find particularly annoying is that it does not recognize the Apple Super Drive, so I cannot watch a DVD using this with my Macbook Pro. Also no Amazon Prime.

Reviews.Title: Works perfect for our needs
Reviews.Author: Brent Helling "Brent"
Reviews.Content: There are still apps I wish apple TV would add, but this little thing integrates well with our non-apple products.  I recommend to all considering.

Reviews.Title: Apple quality
Reviews.Author: John Balling "Mr. John"
Reviews.Content: Apple is a benchmark for quality and it is not lacking in this product.  The format and design are of the best.  The only drawback is the lack of programs such as Amazon prime and a few other that can be found on Roku.  The Airplay for images from your phone and i-pad work effortlessly.  I only had a problem finding Airplay at first.  I thought it would be an App but it's on the slide up menu from the bottom of the desk top.  Too simple.

Reviews.Title: Such a great fit for iPhone and iPad users
Reviews.Author: Colin Weaver
Reviews.Content: If you have an iMac, MacBook Pro, iPhone or an iPad this is such a great addition to your home media system.  Never mind the huge number of other features this device has, the AirPlay feature makes sharing photos, videos (and anything on your iPhone or iPad screen) easy.  No need for a bunch of people to huddle around your phone to watch videos or look at pictures.  Just use AirPlay and show them on your TV.  It takes two swipes on your phone to connect.  That's it.

Reviews.Title: It's an Apple product
Reviews.Author: Brian F Smith
Reviews.Content: What else is there to say?  These things practically sell themselves.  I now have three in the house and I'm very pleased with every feature.  The quality of the device is outstanding, which one would expect from Apple.

Reviews.Title: Hard to find for Android goods
Reviews.Author: Komerican "Danificent"
Reviews.Content: Since Apple goods never update until 6 months at a time, I suppose their company can invest in long term goods that work well, like this AirTV device.  I hate those cords such as for the S4 or iPod Touch; they either mess up my phone or are too frustratingly short.  The AirTV is a logical, contemporary upscale alternative.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Pamela L. Walker
Reviews.Content: It is a wonderful asset to my classroom instruction.  I don't know how I lived without it all this time.

Reviews.Title: Needs Improvement
Reviews.Author: BG
Reviews.Content: Apple TV seems to be behind the curve to ROKU's channel offerings. They are expanding with more channels (AE and Historty) but mostly with those who already have cable television subscribers. Currently, the service is available to customers who subscribe to DirecTV, Verizon FiOS, and Cablevision Optimum, with support for additional providers coming in the near future. I have Comcast so i am out of luck.There are a couple of issues.Inputting username and password is a bear with the small remote control. Once it is done you should not have to re-enter the information.No Amazon Prime.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Brooke Palmieri
Reviews.Content: An Amazing product and so easy! Perfect for Netflix, music, and images. So glad I bought it and great price!

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Juan
Reviews.Content: Excellent! Very satisfied with the product. Would recommend it to anyone out there who wants to buy it. Happy happy

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Watanabe "Jen Mamo"
Reviews.Content: It works perfectly!  My husband loved it ( I bought it for him for our 10th wedding anniversary)!  Thank you for such a great product!Mahalo!

Reviews.Title: Pretty cool
Reviews.Author: Steve H.
Reviews.Content: Like what this has to offer, didn't really realize many things like movies and all have to be purchased.  Not quite like a smart tv, but close.

Reviews.Title: Good respires for my classes and entaertaiment.
Reviews.Author: Eliberto Martinez
Reviews.Content: This device is a perfect match for my iPad and flat TV to use in my classes and at home. I reallly enjoy using this new technology. Thanks once more.

Reviews.Title: Works as promised
Reviews.Author: Eric Gustafson
Reviews.Content: Loving the apple tv I bought.  The main purpose I purchased it for was to play MLB.TV and it works like a beauty.  Streams full 1080.

Reviews.Title: Mostly love it
Reviews.Author: t66george
Reviews.Content: Since we bought this quite a while ago I feel that I have a good idea as to the pros and cons.  First, we cut the cable cord and really haven't missed it.  Have Netflix and Hulu Plus which, mostly, fill in the gaps.  I miss AMC (The Walking Dead) and the Food Network but can live without them.  More channels have been added to Apple TV which has made it that much better.My one frustration is how well it plays (or doesn't play) with our other apple products.  One of the selling points is that you can mirror a show from your laptop, iPad, phone etc and it will be a seamless transition. I've found it to be not as pleasant a viewing experience as more times than not the video is skippy. It is a broadband hog. If someone is online playing video games then the mirroring is worse and it interferes with the gaming experience as well.It would get 5 stars if it played better with the other apple products and if it had amazon on there so we could use Prime to view TV and movies

Reviews.Title: Love my apple TV
Reviews.Author: LD
Reviews.Content: I have one and bought another as a gift.  Have never had a problem with mine however I can't compare to other similar products as I have never used any but my Apple.

Reviews.Title: What's not to love?!
Reviews.Author: MinnieGene
Reviews.Content: I love my Apple TV.  It streams movies from my iTunes library as well flawlessly.  I love the airplay feature from my iPad and iPhones.

Reviews.Title: Love this; Wish Apple had more features tho
Reviews.Author: M. Young
Reviews.Content: I got this primarily to watch Netflix in my bedroom, but it serves other purposes too like playing music when guests are over, watching PBS shows, etc. I love that I can use my phone as a remote on it.The one major downside is that Apple is stingy with the apps it uses on the Apple TV and I would really love if they put like Amazon Prime on it (I know Amazon and Apple are competitors, but Apple TV has Youtube on it so I don't see why they can't expand out a bit).Otherwise, it's great! It's really small and doesn't take up a ton of space and I'm happy to have gotten it.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Gail Harren
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for a guest room-no need to pay for a cable box for a room only used occasionally

Reviews.Title: MORE APPS
Reviews.Author: Alex William Bennett
Reviews.Content: This is a great product, but the lacks apps. I wish it had Amazon Prime and others, but we do really like it and it works well!

Reviews.Title: Apple TV is a Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Adam Maddox
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is everything that I imagined it would be. I was really trying to decide what to say when writing this review but, this product tells everything it self. Like at this moment, I was trying to decide if I wanted the new xbox one or the PS4. Then, I thought, I have an Apple TV that is just amazing. It runs fast, no delays, very responsive. Remote is very little, not another big remote that usually comes with a tv or cable box. Netflix is in HD, everything is in HD. It had a recent update that made it even better. Has numerous of apps. Netflix, HULU Plus, WWE TV, NBA TV, ABC TV, HBO GO and Crackle. I can go on and on about everything the APPLE TV has but, back to what I was saying. Xbox one, has all the entertainment features and gaming. Why pay an extra $100 for a product, that I had already paid $100 for that does everything that I need entertainment wise. So, I decided I'm going to eventually get the PS4. Now, enough about my xbox one or ps4 decision. The product is great. It's small, almost to the point that it's about as long as a credit card for it's width and height and the depth of it, is easily only about 3 inches. It won't take much room at all. The remote is small and is great. The added feature though, is if you're like myself and own numerous apple products already. The Apple TV let's you airplay anything that you see on your phone to your tv including pictures, videos, music, apps, messages. Anything. The other cool thing abut this product that I love so much is the fact that you can get the remote app for free in the apple store on your iPhone and use your iPhone as a remote for it. Instead of dealing with an extra remote, you can just leave the remote app running and always have your remote and it's free of buttons, so you just roll your fingers anywhere you want your apple tv to go when selected a product. That concludes why I love this product and why I give it a 5 out of 5 star rating. I would for sure recommend it to a friend and, I would just give them all the run downs and how they wouldn't regret making the awesome purchase.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Depardieu
Reviews.Content: I use the Apple TV to play video from my computer, via iTunes (just convert your videos to MP4) as well as for my HULU and Netflix accounts. It used to work with Amazon instant video, but Amazon recently removed that functionality in order to boost sales of their own similar device.

Reviews.Title: Who Doesn't Love This Product?
Reviews.Author: DallasGuy
Reviews.Content: Good product, ease of use and easy to install. Arrived timely and serves its purpose; however, Apple will deliver a newer, better product in Q4 2014 and I recommend delaying this purchase until then.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: So many things available at no extra cost. Variety galore. It was easy to install and is easy to operate. I lowered my cable package and save money all year.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: erwin
Reviews.Content: Good quality, it was as we expected and we can recommend it. I will buy again if we need anothe one.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Gianna LM
Reviews.Content: Great product!... This is the second appletv in our household and we use both of them every day!  We love it!

Reviews.Title: Bought this for my sister
Reviews.Author: Mario S.
Reviews.Content: She loves it. It is convenient and you can stream and mirror your apple product to your TV through it. I have one myself.

Reviews.Title: Just right for Apple users
Reviews.Author: Benny
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is great for use in either home or office. You can not only do nearly everything you can do on iTunes on the Apple TV, but you can AirPlay from any Apple device. Airplay is what I most use Apple TV for. Airplay has the ability to play or view any music, video, photo and even what is on your screen wirelessly through WIFI or Ethernet to the Apple TV from your Apple device. It provides 1080p FHD HDMI output and Dolby Digital sound quality. Rather a slideshow or PowerPoint presentation for work or just music and movies as I do, it's a great product. You can also choose from a variety of apps like PBS, ABC and HBO and many more to stream on demand directly from the Apple TV!

Reviews.Title: Works Awesome
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Mayhall
Reviews.Content: This product I have had for about a year and was hoping for Jailbreak but never happened.Other than that the air play works great and the user interface is awesome the product is very strong and has never crashed on me. The product is great and very easy to rent movies.I don't like that the product is closed. Also a big problem for me was that I have a few movies and few tv shows and I cant search by the name or search by anything.Also no pandora on the product itsself

Reviews.Title: Great Device
Reviews.Author: Kayla
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic device to have on hand. I love using the Apple TV at my parents and finally got one for myself.

Reviews.Title: Great Addition to our TV
Reviews.Author: R. Kahn "Spinyrek"
Reviews.Content: Best part is you can beam anything from an apple product to your TV.  Has had to be reset a few times but works most of the time

Reviews.Title: the complemnet to complete your mac environment
Reviews.Author: David Calvo
Reviews.Content: if you have an apple environment, then the apple tv is what you need.. not only because of the apps, but for the mirroring and airplay functionality.this is simply a must!

Reviews.Title: Really disappointed in this product
Reviews.Author: deedeeg "deedeeg"
Reviews.Content: This would be a great product.  If it worked consistently. and better. I have been using this product since February of this year when i decided to get rid of cable. I had high hope for it but I'm really disappointed. I love how you can use your iPad or your mac to control the device. But a lot of the time, the sound and the movement of the picture are out of sync. It does what I call "kick back" which means it kicks the picture off of the TV and back to the PC or iPad MANY times throughout watching a program. So that I have to "send" the picture or program back to the Apple TV. Sometimes, the sound does not come through at all, at which point I have to either unplug the device or reboot my computer. I had really hoped this was going to perform much better. At time I just hate it. I do also have a Google Chromecast in another room. I notice that the Chromecast works PERFECTLY with my iPad, but not so much with my Mac PC, however, at 1/3 of the price of the Apple TV, at this point, I will be using Chrome to expand to other TVs in my home. No way will I purchase another Apple TV until/unless these issues are resolved.

Reviews.Title: WORKS Great - TINY remote
Reviews.Author: LavandaarGuitar
Reviews.Content: We love it!But the remote is soooooo small. It gets lost all the time.  My toddler loves to grab it and hide it. Had to buy a replacement remote for $25.  But the product works great (and even the replacement remote works great... just take out of box, point, and it works.)

Reviews.Title: My favorite gadget!!!
Reviews.Author: Ultimate Amazon Mom
Reviews.Content: We love our Apple TV!  Super easy to set up, as with most Apple items, pretty much plug and play.  I have an external hard drive I copied all of our movies onto and we use our Apple TV rather than shuffling around DVD's.  With a 3 year old that constantly wants one of her disney movies playing this sure does simplify my world!  My DVD boxes are all put away in the closet, DVD player hardly gets used.  I haven't really tried a lot of the other functions (Netflix etc.), but it does exactly what I bought it for.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: zachary fregoe
Reviews.Content: The AppleTV is a great buy for those families that have a lot of Apple products. We love it and would gladly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: yesenia
Reviews.Content: Works great! I can watch movies from Netflix and more content from youtobe and others. Moreover, you can watch some of your comcast channels.

Reviews.Title: AppleTV is excellent
Reviews.Author: T. Scot "Mama Scot"
Reviews.Content: I have had several AppleTVs and they are a seriously excellent way to get content.  If you have a lot of iTunes content already, they are even better.  Only drawback is no access to Vudu or Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Sweet
Reviews.Author: Foxtrot87
Reviews.Content: Well my girlfriend and I love Apple TV so this is our second purchase. We got one for the living room then got really tired of moving it into the bedroom so... we got a second. If you are tired of paying a ridiculous amount of money for a s*** ton of channels that you never watch this may be for you. Apple TV provides fairly inexpensive access to all the various TV shows and movies that we want. Its about $16 a month for hulu and netflix then whatever we spend on iTunes renting movies. For us it comes out to much less than the easily $100 plus that we were paying xfinity for a bunch of annoying channels we never watched. If you are the type of person who likes to watch every brain melting tv show out there and can't handle having a few moments of quite while you pick out your next show or movie then maybe steer clear... I dunno, just get one anyway

Reviews.Title: APPLE tv
Reviews.Author: Jackie
Reviews.Content: This product was a HUGE disappointment.  I had ordered a Chrome cast and it worked better because I can multi-task on the ipad while streaming and the Apple TV you cant.  Epic FAIL!

Reviews.Title: Nice upgrade to the home
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: If apple were to incorporate this device to include a DVD player, it would be the end all, be all solution for home entertainment.  Unfortunately I have to maintain a blu ray player in additoin to the Apple TV unit to have the best of both worlds.

Reviews.Title: my second one
Reviews.Author: Keun-young Anthony Kim
Reviews.Content: I am a i-Tunes junky.  Instead of having dvds and blu-rays litter the house, I like the digital version of things.  This is my second Apple TV.  It's been a great addition to our tv viewing options.

Reviews.Title: Love my Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Jonny84
Reviews.Content: I have a few apple devices and I bought this to go along with them. The set up was easy and fast. Seamless transition from device to Apple TV . Nice 1080p picture and really cool air play features.

Reviews.Title: As good as expected
Reviews.Author: Fabio Peruzzi "fabio"
Reviews.Content: It arrived in time and it was easy to install.My 12 years old son installed it and programmed it in 15 minutes

Reviews.Title: Does what it says on the tin
Reviews.Author: PenName
Reviews.Content: I got this for my brother, and he and his family love it. They can stream from the Mac to the flatscreen, which is all they wanted to be able to do. But they now also use it for Netflix and other things. I think they're happy with it.

Reviews.Title: It's cool but not 5 star cool
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: The device is slick and the interface is cool. The only drawback for me is navigating using the remote, and limited apps.

Reviews.Title: It's only OK
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: You get limited content from Apple.  You won't find Amazon Prime movies on this device.  I think this device was Apple's biggest failing into the TV market.  I would recommend Roku or anything else...

Reviews.Title: Beautiful and small
Reviews.Author: rosemberg de souza rodrigues
Reviews.Content: It's beautiful and small and fits very well on our living room.It works with our iPhone and iPad and it's very good for watching Netflix, Youtube and other websites.

Reviews.Title: Not Worth the Powder to Blow It Up
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: Pretty disenchanted with what AppleTV provides. I have an iPhone. I have an iPad. I even have an iPod from years ago. Thought I'd get similar quantity and quality of selections.  I was wrong.  Very limited channel choices. If you are unlucky enough to not have high speed internet, forget using this streaming video player.  Streaming video from Netflix works as well as on any other system. Netflix is one of those that still provides a service below 1.5Mbps and its only saving grace.In typical Apple-fashion, requires iTunes account to access video in the cloud (or should I say the iCloud?).  You cannot use AppleTV to access your UltraViolet digital library.

Reviews.Title: Extremely easy to use
Reviews.Author: M. Couchman
Reviews.Content: Could use some refreshed hardware but still a great addition to any home theater system.  Perfect for hbo go and netflix

Reviews.Title: Trouble!

Reviews.Content: I have 3 of these but this one (newer model) takes forever to send a move over my local network and all the others work faster!!! I did every fix and reset imagine able even to Genius Bar 45 minutes away.  No luck.  Suck a duck Apple TV 3.

Reviews.Title: that is so nice
Reviews.Author: Hyunjae You
Reviews.Content: That is so easy controlIf you have ipad that is more easy!!!!!!!Hurry up get this one now than more easy your life

Reviews.Title: THE NEW MUST HAVE!
Reviews.Author: raymondshead
Reviews.Content: This is the ultimate. Since i use Mac laptop, Apple tablet and iphone, aside from all the amazing channels, including my favorites, itunes festival/movies/music/tv, netflix, yahoo screen, vevo, youtube and many more, the "Airplay" features brings all of my itunes and anything i wanna watch on line plays directly on my 40" TV. Simply Incredible.  No extra cable wires necessary. I can't live without it.

Reviews.Title: I love all things Apple!
Reviews.Author: Stacy K. Hasenstab
Reviews.Content: Wanted to dump cable tv but still have viewing options. Apple TV is great!  So much to pick from and compatible with our iPads.  Using antenna free TV and Apple TV has saved us $100/month.

Reviews.Title: Love my Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Robert Evans "eStrategies"
Reviews.Content: This is a good product that just keeps getting better with more content updated all the time.  I am about to cancel my cable bill because I rarely stray away from my Apple box.  If you want the local news or watch regular TV then it is a great enhancement for movies but if you are like me and don't watch the networks this is for you.  I use NetFlix and Hulu Plus and can watch pretty much whatever I want that was worth seeing on regular TV.

Reviews.Title: I love Apple
Reviews.Author: Maggie
Reviews.Content: I have regressed back to PC's for the last several years (because work makes me and I'm not made out of money, yo) but I try to buy Apple products when I can - and boy, do I love the Apple TV. This thing is great - super easy interface and it has HBO Go! Huzzah!

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: easye
Reviews.Content: I like the roku much better, it has a lot more channels, this is ok if you dont have a roku

Reviews.Title: nice product
Reviews.Author: johnnie
Reviews.Content: Yes, everything received was as listed & as all Apple products are easy to setup.Should have got one sooner.

Reviews.Title: Save yourself aggravation and get a Roku
Reviews.Author: Mo
Reviews.Content: I purchased this in October 2013 and was so happy until it no longer recognized my WIFI with the router sitting right next to it.  All of my other Apple products, of which I have many, don't have an issue with the WIFI.  I had to dig out my router instructions and reset it last month.  Now it happened again.  I don't have the time or the inclination to continue doing this.  I see from the Apple site that I am not the only one experiencing this problem.  I am a fan of Apple products but am seriously annoyed.  It was purchased on Amazon and it was passed the 30 day window to return it.  The Roku in the other room, further away from the router, works like a charm and has more channels available.  I regret my purchase and will try to return it at the Apple store.

Reviews.Title: Get One!
Reviews.Author: REB430
Reviews.Content: I love the Apple TV! It just continues to get better as Apple adds more features with each software update.

Reviews.Title: An Apple a day...
Reviews.Author: J. Leebron
Reviews.Content: This little device won't keep your doctor away, but it will certainly make your life better.  At my cabin, I don't have the super duper mega-channel cable that I do at home.  Nevertheless, I watch a lot of movies and TV series through my Apple.  When I go into town, my dog tells me that he doesn't have to watch stupid commercials that way.  I know this because he is always smiling when I come back to the cabin.  I have one at home, too, because I like the way it streams things my smart TV doesn't seem to stream.  Six million channels on the cable and there is nothing worh watching.  Ever feel that way?  An Apple will fix you right up.

Reviews.Title: Reliable seller; good used device
Reviews.Author: Greg Sawatzky
Reviews.Content: I was looking to purchase a 2nd Apple TV for another HDTV in my home.  This used device works just like the original MD199LL/A I already had, and gives me the ability to wirelessly stream TV shows I've recorded via my Mac/EyeTV/Pinnacle HDTV Tuner for the Mac.  This setup, coupled with an Over-the-Air Antenna, has enabled me to ditch the DVR Recorder and cable service from Comcast.  Three months' worth of saved rentals/cable costs and I've paid for my equipment.  I wasn't watching anything besides the local channels anyway.

Reviews.Title: Works Perfectly!
Reviews.Author: Kimberly N. Miracle
Reviews.Content: If you have the internet and other Apple products, then this is a no-brainer kind of purchase.  It syncs with your other devices and provides excellent viewing of shows on all the major networks.  I also have a Netflix account, which makes Apple TV even better.  I can view past seasons of favorite shows in just a few moments.  The remote is tiny and subtle, much what you would expect.  Of course, there is an app in case you lose it.  Great product.

Reviews.Title: not great
Reviews.Author: Zzz
Reviews.Content: easy to start and operate, but it is not always easy to connect mobile devices and stream a video on it, gives a lot of errors, slow, they have to find an other way for the search may be voice command like the Amazon TV. no a great buy, overpriced

Reviews.Title: Good experience
Reviews.Author: Jorge
Reviews.Content: This is a devise to broadcast the screem of your Apple device on your TV... I really like and recomend this.

Reviews.Title: Apple design superiority.
Reviews.Author: mrcrader
Reviews.Content: It's part of the Apple ecosystem that brings everything I love to my television with simplicity and elegance. Enough said!

Reviews.Title: Great for Netflex watchers
Reviews.Author: C. Foster "Road Warrior"
Reviews.Content: I got two of these.  One for my place and one for my girlfriends place.  I have a Netflix account that we use at both places.  WARNING....it will show up at both places what has been watched at both places.  That's not a problem for me because we are together at one or the other places while watching movies.We have had them for two years, and we are very satisfied with them.I recommend this Apple TV

Reviews.Title: Good device
Reviews.Author: fma
Reviews.Content: Received it on time in good shapeEasy to install and useMakes it easy to connect your computer to your tvAccessing variety of stuff such as Netflix ,Hulu plus, YouTube, etcThanks

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: chellig
Reviews.Content: The updated version of the original...more menu options, etc.  The actual device is a LOT smaller too which is nice.

Reviews.Title: different than Roku
Reviews.Author: Andrea Smith
Reviews.Content: I have to admit I got a Roku some months ago and then got the Apple TV a month ago...not my initial plan to get both, but I'm glad I did. I use both of them and like them equally. I use different apps on each, so I and my housemate can keep our places in different apps. Since I might only watch for 10 minutes at a time, I don’t want to spend time opening an app and finding my place in a show.I did set up Plex for Roku, but I way prefer streaming from my iPad or iPhone to Apple TV. Its so much easier to search on the iPhone or iPad, for streaming YouTube, movie trailers, music or videos. Also any friend or housemate in the house with an iPhone can stream to the Apple TV. Besides, there is a fun element of seeing your little devise stream to a big TV.I just checked and I could stream a movie from my iPad Amazon Prime app to Apple TV. It DID go full screen just as YouTube videos do. I couldn't tell on resolution. It looked the same to me when I went back to the Amazon app on the Roku and looked at the same movie clip. I can't swear to it though. If you intend to get the Apple TV and stream Amazon Prime, than I would check reviews on resolution or call Apple. I also don't know what would happen with various iPhones. I believe the resolution went up to at least TV resolution on the recent devises. I would say you DO want HD though if you have a big TV. From Amazon's end of things, I believe Amazon streams to the iPad or iPhone in HD. Last I read some months ago Amazon does not stream movies in HD to computers even if you paid for HD. As long as that is the case, in my mind that might knock Apple TV out of the running for streaming Amazon from a mac to Apple TV. The other issue would be bandwidth.  I am told by Apple tech help that when you stream from a computer or devise to your Apple TV, you are using double the bandwidth.  I have fiber to the home so I haven't noticed any slowing down.As for usability of the devises, I enjoy both Apple TV and Roku. They both handle well, and are quick enough, and both are user friendly.With Apple TV just make sure you pair your remote with the Apple TV.  I didn't know that mine wasn't paired, because the remote was working. But some flaky things were happening in one app which I was blaming on the app. When I called into Apple tech support they showed me how to pair the remote to the TV... phew... that fixed my problems.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: T. J. Bradley
Reviews.Content: Great product.  Works well with iTunes and home sharing. Wish it played more media files than it actually does play.

Reviews.Title: Love love
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: I am thrilled with this purchase and wish I would have got one sooner. It's easy to get started and love everything about it

Reviews.Title: Not a single complaint
Reviews.Author: Sara BHWP
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time. Works perfectly. So easy to use and navigate. So pleased to have all of our networks (Hulu, Netflix, MLB) on one device. You'll hear no complaints from me.

Reviews.Title: Slick
Reviews.Author: Conor D.
Reviews.Content: Has the sleekest interface of the devices similar to this I have tried.  I paired it with AirParrot and the response was a little sluggish for mirroring, but using the on board apps is very nice.  I have given two as gifts I like it so much

Reviews.Title: Apple is Apple
Reviews.Author: José
Reviews.Content: Apple tv is a real good expericence in internet hd tv. I love this product. Very small but very powerful.

Reviews.Title: Pretty much my media center...
Reviews.Author: Patrick D "El Pato"
Reviews.Content: I have a smart tv, a smart blue-ray, even a smart receiver- yet I use the Apple TV to run all my streaming content or for Airplay.Is there an app that it doesn't have? Because I haven't found it.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV setup super easy
Reviews.Author: J. Diehl
Reviews.Content: This was so easy to set up, instructions were clear and easy enough a child could have done it.  Very happy with Apple TVJeanne Diehl Stiffler

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, Great apps, I love to stream from ipad to Apple TV using airplay. This is a must have home entertainment item.

Reviews.Title: Best new Apple gadget
Reviews.Author: Annie "beadgoddess"
Reviews.Content: I love this!  Makes using my tv so much easier.  Looks just like my iPAD.  My son suggested this to me.

Reviews.Title: Love airplay
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: We had to return our first unit which was defective. Amazon promptly sent new unit. We haven't had any issues. We have this and a roku. The roku is better for the kids and apps. Apple TV is great for airplay.

Reviews.Title: well built

Reviews.Content: at times apple stuff is expensive and needlessly so, however the apple tv at under 100 dollars is good value for the amount of entertainment you can control with just the one device. worth it for anyone using hulu, netflix, or even youtube.

Reviews.Title: Wish I had two

Reviews.Content: I can't bring myself to buy the second one, only because I'm trying to be frugal.  I "need" one for my second TV.  I love the features.  Its Apple.  I think you get everything you expect from Apple.

Reviews.Title: You can't find a better interface
Reviews.Author: rs223
Reviews.Content: In my opinion the best looking, easiest to navigate interface out of the other streaming boxes.  I have two AppleTV boxes in my home and purchased one for my mother as well.  They are high quality, fast WiFi and great for syncing your iTunes.  If you tend to avoid apple products try the Roku 3, very similar results.

Reviews.Title: Perfect

Reviews.Title: Its Apple

Reviews.Content: Need I say more?  The usability is great and everything, but they need to expand on the Apps so you can watch more without a cable subscription.

Reviews.Title: Very fast and doesnt drop signal

Reviews.Title: Love Apple TV

Reviews.Content: I love the Apple TV! We use it for work purposes with an iPad and absolutely love it! I have not tried watching movies or anything with it since it is for work but hopefully one day I will get a chance to.

Reviews.Title: Great

Reviews.Title: Problems as first - resolved

Reviews.Content: I had no problems out of the box but after the first software update, it would not stay connected to my Wifi.After calling Apple, it was decided to do a full software restore by plugging it into a computer running iTunes.  This procedure fully resolved the connectivity issue.

Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Content: I have an apple tv 2 that only does 720p. This is a huge difference on picture quality. If you are an Apple person, this is a must have.

Reviews.Title: Like new

Reviews.Title: Simple

Reviews.Title: No surprises

Reviews.Title: Works great

Reviews.Content: Beats Chromecast by 10,000%. Easy to use, works as stated.  If you purchase you will not be disappointed.  As always Apple put out another great product.

Reviews.Title: We love it!
Reviews.Author: Karen C. Jordan
Reviews.Content: So far we are using it for Netflix and viewing our own photos and movies as well as others that are sent to us or are on-line.  We have our high speed DSL cable connected directly to it and have not tried our WIFI as we did not need to and wanted to avoid any potential problems.  All of our computers are Apples as well as our iPhones so we know and like the platform.There has not been one blip or problem of any kind in the month we have been using it.  The quality of the image is outstanding.  Our only fear is that of losing the beautiful, but very tiny remote that came with it.  I have been using my iPhone as the remote with the ap for that and it works perfect.

Reviews.Title: Gift

Reviews.Content: I was skeptical if my mom would like this because she is not tech savvy at all. But the apple tv is so easy for her to use and navigate so she can watch her shows and movies on netflix she loves it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
