Reviews.Content: Just got mine yesterday, can't get myself away from it. This is a great product if you are an Apple aficionado. The easy setup and ease of the interface is suburb. Airplay is an awesome feature specially when you have too many apple products laying around.I would recommend in a heartbeat minute to anyone interested in this kind of gadgets. Way to go Apple.

Reviews.Title: Great Product

Reviews.Title: Great!

Reviews.Title: Great device!

Reviews.Content: You can't go wrong buying this apple product ! I am saving so much on my cable bill and the device is so very easy to use. Thanks Amazon for providing this at such a great price!

Reviews.Content: I'm sure there are more technical reviews above or below this one. Apple TV allows you to mirror your iPhone / iPad, watch Netflix, YouTube, etc on your TV. I also use it to listen to music that is on my home computer, since you can sync the two together. Cancel cable, and you've paid for this baby in one month. If you don't like it, hook up cable again, and you have a "free" Apple TV to go along with your million cable shows!

Reviews.Title: Buggy
Reviews.Author: Abraham Mizrahi
Reviews.Content: After a couple of weeks of use, all connection with the Internet was lost. Only 'My computer' and Settings remained.Only after a SW update the connection returned.This should not happen to a product!

Reviews.Title: Works well, but could have better options
Reviews.Author: Gabriella
Reviews.Content: I use my Apply TV every day and really enjoy it. I have HBO Go, Hulu, and Netflix and use all three of these apps on the Apple TV frequently. Intermittently, a show will not load, but that it mainly due to my wifi connection cutting out. The box is very small and can be mounted to the back of your TV with hardware that I have seen on Amazon.The cons of this product are few, but may be important to you.1. The remote is TINY! I know that you can download the Remote app on your iPhone and use that, but I like having a separate remote to use since I do not always have my phone by my side while watching TV. This remote can get lost easily if it get left on the couch or on the bed.2. No Amazon Prime Instant Video!3. This may not be true for all, but if I am playing a DVD through my MacBook Pro and mirror it to my Apple TV it is unbearable slow. The video skips or completely stops. I was so excited to use the mirroring feature for this purpose since I  do not have a DVD player attached to my TV with the Apple TV, but I never use the feature because of its poor performance.These cons may not be issues for you, but they can be a bit of a nuisance. Overall, I do love my Apple TV and use it frequently.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Deepika Mirchandani
Reviews.Content: I have been using this for nearly over a year and works great. I have been able to stream all my fav shows and watch videos and movies like I wanted to.

Reviews.Title: Another Apple device to have fun with
Reviews.Author: TK
Reviews.Content: My young kids love it....and my wife and I use it for Netflix among other things.  I wish these guys would pick up some key cable channels so I could dump my cable provider.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV Gives Us More Choices To Watch
Reviews.Author: B. G. Fehringer
Reviews.Content: Our in-laws got us hooked on a series on Netflix.  A little investigation showed that the best way (not the cheapest) was to buy an Apple TV.  I like it because, in addition to the wide selection of alternate programs, I can mirror my iPad to the TV.  I have really enjoyed exploring all the unusual show available on some of the channels available on Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Far Too Limited Compared to Roku
Reviews.Author: JJG
Reviews.Content: I bought this in hopes of replacing my Roku 3.  My logic was that there were some channels that had apps for watching video for which there was no channel on Roku and either didn't use or limited their Hulu selections.  First, let me say trying to use Airplay from an iPad for this purpose was pointless.  The Apple TV was plugged directly into my AC router which also happened to be in the same room as our main TV.  With no other network traffic, the picture was terrible and it stuttered, stopped, and restarted for no reason.  So, I wrote off Airplay.Still, I paid for it so I was hoping I can still use it on a different TV rather than buying another Roku.  To put it bluntly, the channel selection is pathetic for a device that costs the same as a Roku.  Not only is there no Amazon Prime, there are not just a lot of other channels either.  I've given up on cable/dish, so having as many channels as possible without having to hookup my laptop to the TV is essential.  Here the Apple TV falls very, very short.The user interface is nice and smooth and I actually prefer it slightly over Roku.  The lack of channels is just too big of a drawback for me to overcome.  So, if you can't decide between Apple TV or the latest Roku offering, I would suggest the Roku.

Reviews.Content: Menu button no longer works...makes the whole thing useless.I think I would try another product next time. Not recommended.

Reviews.Title: Perfect

Reviews.Content: Gift... I already have 3. It's obvious what I think of it. Good choices.  Selections Buy one  You won't regret it

Reviews.Title: Good, but...

Reviews.Author: Stephanie N.

I can walk to a student desk and click it is up on the screen for us all to see.  Students want their work on the screen.  GREAT tool for engagement.

Reviews.Title: LOVe LOve it!

Reviews.Content: I saved so much money with this product, made life easy, I added this and cancelled a lot of channels I did not need, bought one for the spare bedroom too for guests and grandkids.

Reviews.Content: A little unhappy with this unit right now- it's failed during the last three updates and requires a restore each time to be made usable again. I also want this unit to have Amazon Instant Videos added as a service, but I get that Apple doesn't play well with others and doesn't like to share the profits. So they don't work that way but they typically they make super high quality 'user-dumb' and highly usable equipment. Lastly, Air Play is very appreciated.

Reviews.Title: Modem->AirPort Express->Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Giuseppe
Reviews.Content: First world problem: all hell breaks loose when Wi-Fi stops working! So I try to create a reliable set up.Comcast Xfinity Internet Plus 25 Mbps download speed with local HD channels plus HBO Go $79/month.$80 Motorola Surfboard SB6141 (Download Speeds up to 343 Mbps) ($70 SB6121 is slower 172 Mbps)$90 Apple AirPort Express (My only router in a 2 floor 1300 sq ft townhouse) $190 AirPort Extreme (Not needed)$90 Apple TV (Stream Netflix HD and browse Wi-Fi with my iPhone 5 at the same time without any lagging)Speedtest.net I consistently get 18 Ping 28 Mb (I only have the Xfinity 25 Mb package) on my iPhone 5 over Wi-Fi.My parents house have 50 Mb Blast Plus package with the same Motorola SB6141 Modem (Speedtest shows 51 Mb!)

Reviews.Title: Amazon is my trusted shopping site

Reviews.Content: Great item to have at home; it is mobile and compact. No need for anything else, strongly recommend getting one!

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: E. E. Easter "easterbunny"
Reviews.Content: We have a Sony Smart TV but often times we would have issues with our Netflix connectivity.  I assumed it was our DSL, but our computers and phones weren't having issues on the wifi, so I wondered.  I decided to purchase this AppleTV because I also wanted to listen to the music on my phone through the stereo without tethering my phone via a cable.  I am SO glad I purchased this as our main Christmas gift to our family from "Santa."  It took one use to realize all the issues we had been having with Netflix and YouTube were due to our TV, not our DSL.  Now we can watch Netflix and YouTube all night long on our TV with the AppleTV with no issues at all.Using it for playing music from my phone hasn't worked out as well.  When doing so, it often cuts-out, there's popping or it'll just drop the connection.  It's so frustrating, I've just gone back to listening to the music on my phone via a cable. Oh well...it's not everything I wanted, but it's still pretty darn good.  I also wish you could use Amazon Prime on it, but again, oh well.Our set-up:  we connected to our AppleTV to our Sony Receiver via HDMI cable and of course the TV is connected to the receiver via HDMI.  It works great!

Reviews.Title: great !!

Reviews.Content: If you live way out and tired of paying high cable bills this is the item to use.Pay now then decide later what you want to watch.

Reviews.Title: Must have for iPhone Users
Reviews.Author: John Zelek
Reviews.Content: Having used a couple of other streaming products over the years (Roku, internet TVs), and admittedly being a bit of an Apple fanboy, The Apple TV is where it's at. No, it's not your cheapest option, and yes I'd love for them to update the software (perhaps to match with iOS 7), it's really the best option for someone who uses Apple products. The quality is fantastic, it has all the streaming channels you'd want (those that it might not have, you can easily connect from your phone), and it seamlessly integrates with all of my other iDevices (iMac, Airport, iPhone, iPad).There are a couple of things that bother me, but nothing that makes me not want to use it. For example, the YouTube App is kind of frustrating in the Apple TV, but I find it's just as easy to search on my iPhone YouTube App, then just send it to my TV. Similarly, there is no Amazon Instant App, but I do the same: find it on my iPhone and send it to the TV. And yes, I am ready for them to upgrade the software/interface. It's been a while.As for things I LOVE: It's great for parties, in that I can put my iPad out and open, for anyone to access Spotify and have it streaming through my TV and speakers. Before the Apple TV, I would have had to let people use my computer, which is less appealing. Also, if I've got a group of people over and we are sharing YouTube videos, it's easy for the next person to queue up their video and send it to the TV when it's their turn.All in all, it works like it's supposed to, the hallmark of all Apple products, and the Apple TV is no different.

Reviews.Title: Really like it

Reviews.Content: Fast, easy setup.  I also have a Roku LT.  The Netflix app on the Apple TV is much nicer than the Roku.  Interestingly, the 2 devices don't list identical offerings in their respective PBS apps/channels.  I do wish Apple wouldn't assume that their devices are so simple that decent instructions aren't necessary -- although setup was simple, figuring out how to get closed captions to display required a web search.  Easy enough to find online but that type of info should be in the brief guide they provide in print.

Reviews.Title: No more storing all iCloud data on your iDevice or Computer
Reviews.Author: bjj0001
Reviews.Content: This thing can pretty much access all your purchases in the cloud (except apps), and stream them to it (while only storing the data until no longer needed)! The perfect Apple iCloud companion for those who are needy for space on their PC, Mac, or iDevice! It can even do a lot more things than just access your iCloud content. It can share audio with Apple Home Sharing linked devices through the AirPlay service (requires Wi-Fi, and Ethernet devices must have a direct connection through the router), and it can access basic and premium services (like YouTube, Netflix, Hulu Plus, The Weather Channel, and more)! However, the only thing I wish it had was the ability to stream Live TV through your Local Cable or Satellite TV provider (or even a DTV antenna), just one of your choice! Hopefully, the next generation will have these extremely useful features, and more! If they do so, I literally will stop at nothing just to trade it in for credit towards the next generation! But..., only the company that offers the highest Trade-In value will earn the right for the future exchange! So (for example) if Amazon can't beat Apple's offer, they may lose out on the action!For right now, this product simply delivers what I need it for at this time, and I'm not regretting this purchase..., at all!Apple launches new devices faster than any other competitor, so please try to wait for the next generation before you buy!But..., if this is all you want, then I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who wants it exactly for this purpose!

Reviews.Title: I sold my 2nd Gen to get this

Reviews.Content: As usual, I loved it. I never ever have any problem with it for last 1 year. Beautiful stuff. Recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Debbi
Reviews.Content: We love Apple TV.  We did have to upgrade our wireless, but that was an easy fix.  We love it!

Reviews.Title: Appel Tv
Reviews.Author: Thora Hauksdottir
Reviews.Content: I love it it is easy to use I wood recomend appel tv to all my friends, and famaly members.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: James Hanlon
Reviews.Content: The apple tv is a great streaming box and easy to use. I lost the remote, it is probably somewhere in my couch since it is so tiny but thankfully the app for the iphone works well. If you have an iphone or ipad then this fits great into the ecosystem. They are adding new apps to it everyday and rumors are they will add an app store which would make this device almost flawless.

Reviews.Title: Handy gadget for viewing movies, songs, etc., on your computer to a big screen.
Reviews.Author: Forrest M. Butler "skeetshooter8436"
Reviews.Content: Have enjoyed watching home movies on my big screen. Also, great for watching movies, Netflix. Highly recommend it as a must have.

Reviews.Title: Another great Apple product
Reviews.Author: Ozzboy
Reviews.Content: Primarily purchased it because I was having streaming issues with my Blue-Ray disc player accessing Netscape. The Apple TV is working much better (faster) with very few streaming hesitations. Much improved menu system not only with Netscape but also many of the other Apps available from AppleTV. Also like the ability to play my iTunes, display my iPhoto library and mirror my iPad to the TV.

Reviews.Title: Birthday Gift
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my daughter as a birthday gift on the recommendation of my sons. She is thrilled and couldn't wait to hook it up.  I am considering getting it for my own home.

Reviews.Title: Love these
Reviews.Author: Emilou
Reviews.Content: We just love these apple TV's. We currently have two..we have no complaints. It has everything you need ready built in. It's a breeze to use.

Reviews.Title: not to bad
Reviews.Author: P. Dubuque
Reviews.Content: Very easy to hookup and setup.  Can play movies from my iTunes on my macs, iPads and phone.  very easy to share (mirror) my iPad screen - we were looking for something on-line and a bunch of people needed to see the screen very easy to do.  Streams Netflix very well.  Purchasing movies from iTunes is painful, I entered my iTunes id and password which is not a quick thing to do without a keyboard, I kept getting messages to verify this device by connecting to a computer and reentering the password.  I did this 4 times and it still didn't like it.  I ended up just purchasing the movie on iTunes and then this let it stream it.  So far I have not been able to purchasing any content on iTunes from this device.The firmware/software updates for the device seem to come every few weeks and take about 30-45 minutes to get loaded and I have pretty fast internet connection.Overall a good device that has some very user-friendly features and some very unfriendly features.

Reviews.Title: Love it as usual
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This is my third apple TV, I have one attached to every Tv in my home... I do realize that the apps are limited when compared to roku ( I would like to see apps like showtime & max to go added)... but the stream is always smooth and consistent, as long as its connected to 5 GHZ frequency... love the simplicity or the remote but wish it was a little bigger as I am constantly losing it!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Apple product
Reviews.Author: Grandma V
Reviews.Content: This Apple TV module packs a lot of power into a very small package.  I have used a smart Blue Ray player for years and this Apple TV module is faster when downloading from the internet and the navigation is very easy to use.  Another excellent product from Apple!!

Reviews.Title: Great programming
Reviews.Author: Stephanie M Lee
Reviews.Content: Love Apple TV- lots of choices and there are a lot of free programs available.  Some of the movies that are a lot older have ridiculous charges but there are still a fair amount of shows.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: katia
Reviews.Content: Wow its perfect! I can watch my favorite shows, movies, music all in just one! Excellent product! I loved it

Reviews.Title: Trouble with Roku, here's your solution, Apple does it right!
Reviews.Author: Sny D
Reviews.Content: I honestly have Never types an online review but given my trouble with trying to go with a competitor for the Appl e TV i felt compelled to write this. Hands down this device beats the Roku in functionality.  And with Roku only willing to support a 90 day warranty, tells you they aren't proud or willing to back up their technology either. Just do a quick eBay search for Roku 2 and look at how many are for sale due to this. Then look at how many Apple TV's are up for sale, people just keep them because they WORK!

Reviews.Title: Easy Peasy
Reviews.Author: sue chi "sue"
Reviews.Content: What can I say ... I love Apple TV. It's just so easy to pop pictures, movies, whatever to your TV from your iphone, ipad or your Apple computer. This is a must have item if you are an Apple device user.

Reviews.Title: can't go wrong
Reviews.Author: I need to return some video tapes
Reviews.Content: can't go wrong with an apple tv. i own a couple of these and a roku to get into my amazon videos.  but some movies come out earlier on these platforms and that is the reason why i have both.  no late fees anymore with movies.  and i get my netflix

Reviews.Title: My Second Apple Tv
Reviews.Author: Gerald N Rhodes
Reviews.Content: This simple to install and use device has significantly expand our viewing choices. Recommend it to anyone who wants to no longer be tied to network TV.

Reviews.Title: Go Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Bill's Review
Reviews.Content: My second Apple TV.  Great product, great price.  Most every other place I tried to purchase from wanted 20% more for the product.

Reviews.Title: Hmmm...  Not that much of content
Reviews.Author: Efrain
Reviews.Content: I have trouble to display my mac image on the tv, but I think it could be my wifi.  I didn't have any problem installing it.

Reviews.Title: Not as great as roku 3
Reviews.Author: nifa21
Reviews.Content: I have both the Apple TV and the Roku 3. The Roku 3 has much better functionality and seems to have more apps than the Apple TV. The AT is great for someone with other apple products mainly for connectivity, but the roku is faster, includes a private listening headphone jack in the remote, has more apps, includes games and looks better. The AT is very simple and streamlined like most apple products. Even the remote is very slender and easy to misplace. This will definitely meet all of your streaming needs, but I prefer my roku.

Reviews.Title: Rating
Reviews.Author: Carol Mossler
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV is a good product.  There is only one reason I didn't give it the 5-star rating.  On occasion (it doesn't happen very often, but it DOES happen), the Apple TV will stop in mid-stream and go back to the menu without warning.  I will get a message that we are not connected to the Internet, which is wrong.

Reviews.Title: Why is there no Amazon Instant Video preloaded?
Reviews.Author: KoSpazz "KoSpazz"
Reviews.Content: It's silly that I have to pull up Amazon Instant Video App on my iPad and then push it to the Apple TV. This is not necessarily Apple's fault, but maybe Amazon's -- they have not released streaming apps for phones or AppleTV but they have made it readily available for most tablets and Smart TVs.

Reviews.Title: Not able to airplay from iPad
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: Apple claimed that you can use Apple TV to airplay anything from your iPad to your TV. This was the sole reason I purchased this product. When I got this home I immediately tried to airplay my favorite tv apps. Airplay is disabled for the NBC, CBS and USA apps.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Baldwin "freelancer"
Reviews.Content: Works fine. We can't access all the channels because we do not have a cable provider or satellite provider. But, knew that when we ordered it so can't really complain.

Reviews.Title: works great!
Reviews.Author: Brittni
Reviews.Content: I love this thing so far. Sometimes the sound will not play through, but if I unplug it and plug it back in it works fine.

Reviews.Title: Interface is in desperate need of a remake
Reviews.Author: Frank Napoleon
Reviews.Content: Images are too small and trying to type out characters for search strings too tedious often getting the wrong character and needing to drive around for the backspace. Look ahead type guessing while I'm typing in a search would be a welcome enhancement!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Ham2293
Reviews.Content: Anyone who has one will tell you this is a great buy. Easy installation as well right out of the package.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use, lots of options for fun viewing
Reviews.Author: Mister Fixit
Reviews.Content: This was super easy to install and use. The HDMI connection to my TV processes the audio signal through to my Receiver. I wanted to be able to listen to music without my TV being on. The Digital Optical output on this unit was available, but the input on my Receiver had already been used. I bought a C2G / Cables to Go 40019 Optical to Coaxial Digital Audio Converter that allows me to use the Apple TV for music without my TV being on. I also love the ability to use Airplay from my iPhone or iPad to view photos, videos or even Network TV programs on my TV.

Reviews.Title: Should have bought this before my Chromecast...amazing and works with Prime videos
Reviews.Author: AmazoningMyMoolaAway
Reviews.Content: My Chromecast is officially junk; Apple TV is spectacular! There are a lot of app options that I am unable to use due to a lack of owning cable with the corresponding channels (so stupid, this is totally the networks' fault), but my Hulu account is wonderful on this interface. Plus all of my iPad and iPhone apps magically have an AppleTV icon now, as it recognizes the device on the network. Meaning I can play anything I watch on my devices immediately on TV. If I can find a way to work around the cable subscription conundrum, I will never buy cable/satellite again with this. Just my Hulu and Amazon Prime subscription and I'm set. Amazon has so many movies I can stream for free, and so many shows, that between that and Hulu, I think I get everything I could want except for some of the TLC and Bravo shows I like. Pretty great for the price. I wish I'd bought it sooner...

Reviews.Title: Best Addition to My Home Entertainment System!
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: Use this thing daily! I deleted my cable after getting this. I use HBO Go and Netflix along with streaming from my home computer's iTunes library!

Reviews.Title: A great Streaming box
Reviews.Author: Kzoodad
Reviews.Content: I love our apple TV.  It allows us to steam netflix, hulu and more right on the TV so we are not forced to sit around a laptop. Recently Apple has been adding content, and while much of it is still dependent on having cable we still get a lot of use out of it. So true cord cutters might not be happy with it yet.If you are dedicated to the apple ecosystem this is a must buy. It connects to your iTunes account and allows me to stream my music, iCloud pictures (great for when family comes over and wants to see pictures of the kids) and movies. We purchase a lot of disney blu rays with digital copies and they stream directly to the TV no looking for discs. I love this box, we are considering buying a second for other rooms in our house.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Smokinjoe
Reviews.Content: Works really well with my IPad. I love how it connects to your apple product and you can mirror anything on to your TV. Photos and video look awesome on my big screen.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: PorkChop "AnyPorkInAStorm"
Reviews.Content: This was easy to hook up - I already had a Netflix account so it was great to watch movies on my big-screen TV instead of the computer.The only negative would be the remote - it's so tiny and if you lose it, you're screwed.  There are no buttons on the unit to change channels, applications, etc.

Reviews.Title: LOVE my Apple TV!
Reviews.Author: Jenn
Reviews.Content: Amazing product!!  I love it.  It is very user friendly.  I've owned a similar device for years which I've always liked and still do. However, the Apple TV makes everything so easy.  If you own an iPad or iPhone it is so easy to send your favorite shows to the Apple TV to view on the big screen!  We don't have cable and have found this to be a lot easier to see our cable shows rather than hooking up the laptop to the tv all the time!!  We will probably purchase another one soon for another TV.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use technology
Reviews.Author: a13bro
Reviews.Content: I love this easy to assemble technology.  I use it for Netflix currently and it is fabulous!!! Looking forward to learning more of its functions.....

Reviews.Title: What can I say, it's Apple!
Reviews.Author: Stephen
Reviews.Content: This is the second Apple TV I've purchased. My daughter "borrowed" mine so I bought another. might just buy one more for another room!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Gina Ruiz
Reviews.Content: Love Apple TV. So glad I bought it. It lets me watch everything I want to on one easy device. I am also considering buying another one

Reviews.Title: Love my Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Laura Early
Reviews.Content: I absolutely LOVE my Apple TV.  Makes it super simple for Airplay from my Ipad and Iphone.  Love the access to NefFlix and Crackle.  Super easy to set up. No technical skills required.  Worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Juan Cruz "SHIBVMI"
Reviews.Content: Works great for me as I have a large iTunes library.  A must for easy acces to your library! I definitely recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Great Device!
Reviews.Author: Ellie Lombardi
Reviews.Content: Works great! Easy to set up, use and worth the money. Would highly recommend for anyone that has Apple products.

Reviews.Title: a must have
Reviews.Author: S. PELLEGRINO "S. Pellegrino"
Reviews.Content: How did i survive without this for so long???  My nephew talked me into it and it's the best 90.00 I have ever spent!

Reviews.Title: my reviews
Reviews.Author: Debra Longtin
Reviews.Content: Works great to stream movie to TV but only compatible with Apple products. That's ok for me that's all I have.

Reviews.Title: Don't judge the box
Reviews.Author: Jamillah Alexander
Reviews.Content: I was really worried when the item arrived any the box looked as if it had been through fight. But when I opened it it was in good condition, minus the dust.  The only reason I didn't give this item a higher rating is due to the remote battery was dead and I had to purchase a new battery immediately to complete the setup.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Rick Anderson
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th Apple TV unit cause I'm too lazy to just have one.  I don't have to move the unit from room to room.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: DR
Reviews.Content: Best item we ever bought.  Makes me want to give up cable TV forever.  This provides me with programming I want when I want it.  I love it.

Reviews.Title: Works like an Apple!  Simple!
Reviews.Author: Will Fugette
Reviews.Content: Been an Apple user for a few years with a substantial investment in content.  I love using this little box to share my collection, stream from other devices.  Glad I have this!

Reviews.Title: Best evet
Reviews.Author: Rocstar
Reviews.Content: Simply the best ever for movies, shows and integrated with my laptop, iPad, iPhone and best of all can photo stream.

Reviews.Title: Good interface an slightly faster streaming
Reviews.Author: Sally Lawrence "Home Sales Sally"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Apple TV to be the solution for using my iPad to present to an audience. I haven't had the chance to use it for that purpose yet, but in the meantime I'm thoroughly enjoying streaming Netflix and others. I prefer the Netflix Interface on the Apple TV to the one on my Blu-ray player. The same is true for several other services available on both devices.  It also seems that the Apple TV stream slightly faster than the Blu-ray player.I'm quite pleased with my purchase even though I have not used it in the way I intended… yet.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: R. Almeyda "Roberto E"
Reviews.Content: Great...Finally I can show all my Family & friends all those pictures & videos that have been saved for years in my Mac . Now we can all enjoy them on our big screens at TV's.Still figuring out all the other features that only Apple TV offers....thanks for such a prompt delivery of such a wonderful item.

Reviews.Title: Great product, mini remote, wish I would've read up on the apps and requirements.
Reviews.Author: John A. Zapetis "compugeek"
Reviews.Content: Lots of pre-loaded apps.  Purchased as a gift, but most apps were already available on his blu-ray player.  Only uses it to push music and video from his iPod Touch and iTunes from his computer.  There are a few free apps for viewing movies, but we don't have a paid hulu, netlix or other subscription. Maybe down the road.  We were also hoping to hook it up at his mother's house to do a slideshow from his iPod, but the unit requires wi-fi/internet access as well??  She doesn't have that.  It's an okay product for people with Wi-Fi/Ethernet internet access and non-smart TVs.

Reviews.Title: Sleek but disappointing
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: We really were looking forward to Apple TV but once we got it we found you can use it for much more than mirroring stuff to your tv. The biggest disappointment is the limited apps and the ones you can get you have to pay for everything. Hindsight we would just upgrade our tv service for Dvr and sling box.

Reviews.Title: Apple tv
Reviews.Author: eihab
Reviews.Content: I bay thes apple tv becos its naic its hd 1080 iAnd vere good for my home and for my tv lcd

Reviews.Title: this is a great tool
Reviews.Author: Bradley
Reviews.Content: Our church uses this for projection of songs and Bible verses. I imagine we will also use to show movies in the future

Reviews.Title: Great addition if you have a iPad
Reviews.Author: Robert McBride
Reviews.Content: Got two now, one at house one at cottage, working great,, a must have if you have a iPad so you can mirror to your TV.

Reviews.Title: Love my Apple TV!
Reviews.Author: dpidduck
Reviews.Content: I'm an Apple guy (iPhone, iPad, MBP, Mac mini, and Apple TV).  There are a ton of products out there that will make your TV "smart" but Apple just does it better.  I love how all my products work together seamlessly: I purchase a movie on iTunes and it's available on my TV, MBP, iPad, and iPhone. No burning discs, no cables.

Reviews.Title: This is an amazing product but.....
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: I bought this so I could stream my Itunes videos and podcasts to my TV directly from my laptop, the only downfall is that this isn't compatible with Windows Operating Systems.  I spent hours on tech support and forums trying to get it to work but to no avail, I later found that there is a software out there that you can use, it's called Air parrot and  you can purchase it for about $10 and it makes it so you can stream directly from your laptop so you don't have to worry about your data usage.

Reviews.Title: Great media player
Reviews.Author: cset
Reviews.Content: These work great for standard entertainment media streaming, but the big benefit is that they have the built-in Apple "AirPlay" which lets one screencast their iPhone or iPad to the device. We use these in classrooms for presentations and math teachers love them as they can write equations on the iPad screen and students can view through the projector.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Bridgett Howard "Bridgett Howard"
Reviews.Content: I like Apple TV because we have all apple products (iphones, ipads, macbook).  Super easy to set up with my macbook.  My favorite thing to do with this is to play music and watch slideshows of our family pictures from the computer on the TV.  We use it a lot for streaming Netflix.  I noticed streaming with the Apple TV as opposed to our blueray player is that with the Apple TV, the picture is very clear.  This is our second Apple TV.  If this one dies, I will buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Luis Dobon "Lou"
Reviews.Content: What a fantastic addition to any television.I like the YouTube function which allows me to watch anything on the big screen

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY APPLE TV
Reviews.Author: L. Johnson
Reviews.Content: It's great.  Have one in the living room and one in my bedroom.  Very handly when you have grandchildren hanging out at your house.

Reviews.Title: Like this unit
Reviews.Author: Gary Ferrero
Reviews.Content: I am a Mac House and love the features this unit has to offer. Liked the packaging and I am enjoying the Apple!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Matthew McCleese
Reviews.Content: Does everything it says it would and more.  Everything in true HD. Still wondering why I never did it earlier

Reviews.Title: Nice Buy
Reviews.Author: B. D. Lewis "Heartfelt Books"
Reviews.Content: I brought this myself but ended up giving it to my son and he loves it. This is a good value and we have had no problems.

Reviews.Title: I think I may like it!  :-)
Reviews.Author: Gayla
Reviews.Content: I purchased this on recommendation from a family member.Price was better than Best Buy.I have not used it yet.  The moment I got it my brother borrowed it for a ski trip to Colorado, and it worked perfectly for all their downloaded movies while they were at the hotel.  The kids were able to easily navigate the window.  It IS easy to hook up.I love the portableness of this item.Got it in great time!  Price was great!

Reviews.Title: Exceeds expectations!
Reviews.Author: Linda Florence "lflore5"
Reviews.Content: This item came boxed looking brand new and works perfect! My daughter paid almost $100 dollars for hers. As long as it keeps working I am super happy with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: AIRPLAY IS A GOOD FEATURE.
Reviews.Author: Tri T. Technology
Reviews.Content: This Apple TV is useful since had the airplay inlcuded.  You can use to view all your apps on your Iphone or Ipad.  The channels on the device could be improve by streaming content quicker.  That a WIP.

Reviews.Title: Great addition
Reviews.Author: Keys Family
Reviews.Content: My husband got an Apple laptop and with this device, we can connect his computer to our regular TV. This allows us to watch a movie on the TV, view photos, etc.

Reviews.Title: another step toward cutting the cord.
Reviews.Author: Dan Newcomb
Reviews.Content: Easily integrated into my heavily apple-centric household.  I mainly use it for streaming stuff from my Amazon Prime account on my iPad.  I'm even able to stream the audio separately to my old Airport Express, which is nice.The interface is a bit clunky...works best with an ipad or iphone as the remote, IMO.I wish Apple had a comparable service to Prime, but let's be honest, it just isn't there yet.  The built in streaming channels are OK for an occasional diversion, but not much more than that.  I'm hoping the next software revision includes something new, content-wise.

Reviews.Title: Great product if you have other Apple products
Reviews.Author: Paul Dawson
Reviews.Content: We like to use the Apple TV for two things - 1.  To view movies and other shows from our Netflix account and 2. To receive content (streaming) from our iPads into our large LCD TV for viewing as a family.  We are never short of good quality material to watch and learn from.

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: Kapitalist
Reviews.Content: apple tv is nothing special in my opinion.Pros:NetflixCool sleek remoteairplayCons:Boring channelsstreaming issues with wireless sometimesRecommendation: build yourself a cheap htpc and directly connect it to your router and you defeat anything apple tv and/or roku can offer.

Reviews.Title: easy
Reviews.Author: B. Lemons "lemonbrine"
Reviews.Content: I bought this so that I could watch the (VERY FEW) things that I've bought on itunes.  For that, it's great.  You can stream things from the cloud, so you don't even have to download it anywhere.I wish it did Amazon videos, but it doesn't.I also wish that it would play video from my uPnP NAS.  But it doesn't.  Even though it's an itunes server - but only for music.It does have a bunch of apps that I don't really care about - NHL, ESPN, lots of sports things that I'm not interested in.  And it has Watch ABC and HBO Go and some of the streaming broadcast / cable apps that you can use if you have cable (which I don't).  It has PBS, which is cool, you don't need a cable account for that.And it has Netflix.  But so does my TV.  And DVD player.  And Tivo.  But unlike those other devices, it recognizes Netflix's new(ish) profile feature, where for streaming purposes, an account can set up multiple profiles to make queues easier to manage - I have have shows I watch when I go to the gym in one profile, my kids shows in another, my husband's movies in another, and my movies in another.  All separate queues.  This is the only device I have (of many) that recognizes that feature.  All the rest of them just ignore the other profiles as if they don't exist.My only gripes are the amazon thing, my home network media thing, and that while watching content, there doesn't seem to be a way to get an on screen display to show you how much time you have left without pausing it and restarting it.  Maybe there is a way to do that, but I haven't been able to find it.  That and my general lack of understanding on why apple doesn't recognize a difference between "pause" and "stop".  But that's a different conversation.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Jamshaid hassan
Reviews.Content: Needs more content, besides YouTube there is not whole lot worth watching. It does connect all other apple products together. Unless they add more content I think one can live without it.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Larry Loutzenheiser
Reviews.Content: Easy set up. Directions were easy to follow and works beautifully. Price is less or comparable to all that I searched. Came on time. Would buy from them in the future.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Ivan Suro
Reviews.Content: I got an Apple TV instead of  another "streaming" product out there because I work on a mac so it seemed like best option for me.  It works great when watching Netflix, Youtube etc...but when it comes to watching movies it gets a little slow.  I purchased a movie that I liked and it took forever to get it to start playing.  I really like the Airplay function between the ATV and another mac device, I just wish the Apple DVD player on my MacBook Pro would have access to that but alas it does not.  I have also experienced a lot of disconnections between my laptop and the ATV when using Airplay to play music or watch mp4s but then again I am still using Snow Leopard so that might be an issue.  Other than that I am very happy with my Apple TV, hopefully once I upgrade to Mavericks I should be able to mirror my mac and that will be a welcome feature.

Reviews.Title: There is nothing that functions as well as Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Trevor
Reviews.Content: This is the fourth Apple TV I've purchased. Having used the new Roku and Chromecast extensively, I simply cannot see how someone passes on purchasing an Apple TV. The ease of use of this device is second to none. It requires nothing but itself and internet. As a standalone media unit, it has quite a robust offering. Go to Apple's website to see all the content available, but needless to say, it is fully-loaded, and getting content updates regularly. Pair this with a Mac, iPhone or iPad and you have endless possibilities. I use an Apple TV in my office as a wireless monitor. Over AirPlay I can stream content not yet available on the device (such as Amazon Instant). For its average price these days (around $85) there is nothing that works as well. You won't regret buying one.

Reviews.Title: Is working great
Reviews.Author: Monica Roncal
Reviews.Content: I was worry than it didn't work outside the US but it works well and i have no complains. i will recomend this product if you have other devices apple so you enjoy better.

Reviews.Title: I thought this would lag
Reviews.Author: Review Believer! "dzadecta"
Reviews.Content: But it doesn't. Resolution is much higher than streaming services on a laptop. It seems like it's a complete cable system.

Reviews.Title: All I need!
Reviews.Author: D. Smith
Reviews.Content: I have really enjoyed this Apple product and do not wish I had gone with the more expensive.  My husband and I watch you-tube and netflix on it but also enjoy VIMEO and VUDU and several other apps--not to mention showing off our computer pictures on the television while we entertain.

Reviews.Title: You will want another after you get one.
Reviews.Author: Paul Mojica
Reviews.Content: The only bad thing about this product is I want one for every TV in the house. Easy set up, prefect streaming. It does take a while to preform the updates, but not horrible.

Reviews.Title: another score
Reviews.Author: R. Blatt
Reviews.Content: another excellent product from apple.  As time goes on I found this device better and better. Nicely integrated with other apple product like photostream.

Reviews.Title: Just buy it!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey R "Jedi Master"
Reviews.Content: Great product. Air play makes it so easy to send movies from your iPhone, iPad, or iBook. Don't hesitate to buy if your on the fence.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Ric "Ric"
Reviews.Content: Had the original Apple TV and decided to purchase the Apple II TV for the streaming capabilities...from my iPhone or Mac Pro...incredibly easy to set up and operate...The Best! Love it!

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Jitendrakumar Patel
Reviews.Content: Excellent performance with purchase price. I will recommended to buy.Speed and quality of picture is good. I will satisfy with this product.

Reviews.Title: Good price and love the features!
Reviews.Author: Drew T. Riddle
Reviews.Content: One of the cheapest prices I found for a new Apple TV. My only issue is my router, make sure you have a good router that supports all the devices you use or you might find you need to reset your router often. Hopefully Apple will update the device so you can change the apps that are installed and you can add apps you want.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: annemarie
Reviews.Content: I love it I can connect my iPhone or iPad to it and play music or movies or tv or just use it's menu! Definitely worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Great purchase for a great price!
Reviews.Author: Lamont
Reviews.Content: Really glad I purchased this streamer. I had an iPhone already so it just felt right to get! I wanted to cut my cable bill a get into video streaming and it was well worth it. I would have like more channels like the Roku 3, but I am more than satisfied with the features. I especially like the air play feature where anything that is played on your apple device, it can be streamed straight to your tv through the Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: luv it
Reviews.Author: BJ  Park
Reviews.Content: what more can i say about apple product. Apple TV is easy to install, easy to use and compatible with any laptops. I am using it daily either to stream or watch movies.

Reviews.Title: Great buy for those looking to cut cable or supplement.  Apple TV Vs Roku
Reviews.Author: rindy
Reviews.Content: Let me start by saying I am a Roku guy.  I have 2 of them and they are awesome.  So why did I buy an apple tv?1.  The simple answer is the mirror feature.  With apple tv I can stream the CBS app on my iphone and have it play through my TV.  Why do you need this?  Well we dumped our cable and CBS shows are only available online or apps.  This is a super easy way to keep current on all our shows.  You can do this with anything else on your iphone or ipad.  I use the iphone because the stream window is almost full TV size where the ipad is minimized.2.  I was blown away by the HD quality.  It puts roku to shame.  My wife, who can't tell the difference between standard def and HD on  Uverse even noticed the difference between the roku and the apple tv.Why didn't you give this a 5 star rating?  2 reasons:1.  You can't watch your amazon prime, though as I write this I haven't tried mirroring from my phone.  C'mon apple, add the app.2.  You can't add any channels. You get what apple gives you.  This is where Roku shines.  My recommendation get both.

Reviews.Title: No more TV
Reviews.Author: Kristina Cavener
Reviews.Content: My family and I have given up TV and this Apple TV gives us a way to watch some shows and movies without having cable service we love it!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: clearwater
Reviews.Content: Don't know what took me so long. Easy connect. Easy to use. The remote control is so easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: glenn schultz
Reviews.Content: Does everything I expected it to do, the remote control is nice and small with great functions price was right and delivery was great

Reviews.Title: An Essential for Every Home with an HDTV and a companion Apple Product
Reviews.Author: T. Brock
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV is probably Apple's best accessory.Aside from being a standalone streaming device, the Apple TV supports AirPlay, which blows the doors off any any other competition. AirPlay allows for any iOS device running iOS 4 or later to play any video or audio over Wi-Fi. AirPlay mirroring is supported on the iPad 2 and later the iPhone 4S and later, or Mac 2011 and later, which allows for whatever is on your device screen to be mirrored to your HD screen without a VGA cable. This is great for Demos, gaming, and Presentations.Another underrated future, is iTunes Home Sharing, which is supported across every iOS device and Mac computer already. That allows for everything in your iTunes library to be streamed to the TV, including encoded DVDs or Blu-rays. I legally encode the physical media that I own and store it on a hard drive. It's all easily accessible through iTunes and the Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Easy peasy!
Reviews.Author: Geoffrey W Morris
Reviews.Content: Love how easy it is to set up use. Great content, and you can use the Apple rote on your phone or iPad. Delivered fast!

Reviews.Title: Very useful, and much misunderstood, I think
Reviews.Author: Jeff Pinkerton
Reviews.Content: This is our second of the current Apple TV models, one for upstairs and one for downstairs. They are indispensable. We have a large video catalog on iTunes, both movies and TV shows, and the Apple TVs let you play content within seconds, right to the big screen. I think people assume Apple TVs are only used for streaming content from the web, and while it can do this, it also supports your local content very well. So we use them for playing our own content, streaming shows and movies from Netflix and other outlets, and displaying photos. A nice touch is that you can be watching a movie downstairs, and decide to finish it off upstairs. Turn on Apple TV upstairs and your most recent program is right there, and when you play it, it asks if you want to resume from where you left off. Very convenient.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Amanda Johnson
Reviews.Content: I love my new Apple TV.  I wish I had bought it a long time ago.  I would recommend to anyone that has a Mac or Ipod touch.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!!!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: It is bomb.com... Strongly suggest anyone thinking about it gets one. Especially if you have a Mac and or iPhone!

Reviews.Title: apple tv
Reviews.Author: tinkles
Reviews.Content: Works, A must if u own an ipad. cause apple air feature is really awesome! received a working product which makes me a happy customer!

Reviews.Title: Good Choice
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: My son ordered this for my husband and me and we are so thankful! It has made life watching TV so much easier.

Reviews.Title: Comes in handy for our whole family
Reviews.Author: mdcowboys@aol.com
Reviews.Content: My wife purchased this as a Christmas gift and soon became the family gift. No more moving the Wii or Xbox as an extra source of online streaming. It is great to pull out one of our IPads and stream family photos or video to everyone in the home on our TV set. I love the screen saving feature that scrolls thru my IPad photos and passes them along the screen.We are big Netflix fans and use this unit often to view films, videos from YouTube etc.  a great buy for Apple Fans!

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Taylor Lambert
Reviews.Content: Great product! We love the Apple TV. Ots a great addition to the iPad, iphone family. I recommend this product to all apple lovers.

Reviews.Title: Use it every day
Reviews.Author: CCnc
Reviews.Content: Love the Apple TV.  We use it daily as we don't really watch much traditional TV.  Super easy to install and get started.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: B. Day
Reviews.Content: I recently cancelled my cable to try Apple TV. It is amazing. There are more things on there to watch than I can even imagine. I was just browsing through the network app the other day, and couldn't believe the choices! Definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: Not many channels
Reviews.Author: D. Brown "dpbrown777"
Reviews.Content: Not many channels, and more than a few, like ABC, HBO, ESPN, MLB, etc require a cable subscription.  I'm gueesing even ROKU has this problem with sports and other premiium content.

Reviews.Title: way better than cable
Reviews.Author: carebear
Reviews.Content: i would definitely recommend getting an Apple TV especially if you own other apple products because you can stream them thru the TV

Reviews.Title: It is Apple TV!! What more to say?
Reviews.Author: Rwwmson
Reviews.Content: It's an Apple product so it is expected to be top quality and it does not disappoint. You can turn any tv into a wifi tv with one of these, as well as access all info fron your iTunes accounts great addition to any television set up

Reviews.Title: C'mon, its Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Jessie
Reviews.Content: No surprises, its gorgeous, its wonderful, its amazing, its Apple TV. Easy to setup (a child could do it without reading a single instruction manual because it walks you through everything), easy to navigate, beautiful interface. Glad the price has come down in recent years but I'd still probably pay what it used cost. I'm in love.

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy!
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: Forget about buying this version of the Apple TV now that a newer version will be coming up soon.  Hardware is definitely outdated.  My Roku 2 operates smoothly, but ATV hangs every so often.  It's comparable to Roku 1 at best so definitely should not be considered at this time.

Reviews.Title: TV of the Future
Reviews.Author: Reid Sorenson
Reviews.Content: We are officially cord cutters, and now watch everything on the Apple TV. Netflix, Hulu, iTunes, etc. over the past year or so the content channels have multiplied like rabbits. The connection with iCloud for all of our music, purchased movies and photos is liberating, and AirPlay works like some vision of the future out of a science fiction movie.

Reviews.Title: I love my AppleTV
Reviews.Author: Andover Diver "Andover Diver"
Reviews.Content: I have 3 at home, I bought the 1st ten and 2nd version that used to be loud, run very HOT. I ended up hacking those models to run other apps as it is a mini linux box and that was fun for awhile.I use it to stream airplay from my iPad, iPhone and MacBooks both video and also music.I have both 720 and 1080p versions while my TV can do 1080p most videos I watch I don't notice too much difference.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Bobo
Reviews.Content: tried other streaming devices, they were complicated to set up and didn't work all the time.As with all Apple devices this is simple to set up and operate

Reviews.Title: this is my 2nd one, you will not regret buying this device
Reviews.Author: J. FLEITZ
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd apple TV, I find the device so easy, intuitive, and useful.  You won't regret getting one of these.  I share my movies on my TV now as a slide show, it is great to easily show your photo stream to friends and family.  Renting movies with a few clicks is one of my favorite uses for Apple TV, and netflix is good too.  This device is the missing link for TVs.

Reviews.Title: An Apple is better in a pie or dipped but this one you will consume as is.
Reviews.Author: JAMES WILLIAMS
Reviews.Content: Does everything I want except Amazon Prime. Well, maybe I'll find the feature in a future update. It does what it's allowed to very well.

Reviews.Title: If you have an iPhone or iPad  you should get an Apple TV
Reviews.Author: D. Wylie "Big D"
Reviews.Content: So easy to setup and has so many features. We got one for all members of our family as gifts. We stream movies, listen to music and the best part for us is viewing all our iPhone pictures and videos right on the TV. We set up a family photo stream and every member of our family can now share their photos at any time. Now when we turn ours on we go to the photo stream and get to see all the photos the family posted and they get to see our photos. Grandma and grandpa just love it as it's so easy and they get to see new photos of their grand kids as soon as we post them. They love getting new photos almost everyday. The feature I personally like is the ability to mirror the iPhone so when I'm trying to show someone how to do something on their iPhone I can simply turn on the Apple TV, set up mirroring on my phone and then what I do on my iPhone is shown right on the TV screen. For the price you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Love it! Great unit
Reviews.Author: Shane Boyd
Reviews.Content: Works great for us! Can watch netflix and you tube etc. Great unit!  Has Full HDTV video and sound!  Can't believe we did not buy before now highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV by far better than Chromecast
Reviews.Author: Tariq Jamal
Reviews.Content: Apple TV provides a far superior viewing experience than Chromecast. There is no latency between what is projected on the primary device (iPad or Mac) and TV. The pricture quality is excellent and is easy to use. I'd recommend Apple TV over Google's Chromecast

Reviews.Title: I love my Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Mr. C. R. Child "Chris"
Reviews.Content: I love the airplay. My wife and I use that a lot and netflix is the other one we use. Renting movies off there seems like a waste of time. We rented Cloudy With A Chance of Meatballs 2 and it was $4.99 for 24 hours. Kind of pricy compared to services like redbox and it took about 6 hours to be ready to play in HD using my slower internet connection. We rented Thor from redbox for about a dollar and of course it plays straight away being a DVD. Other than that we love our Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Great device for me, bought a second one for the bedroom TV!
Reviews.Author: Mark Wothe "that deaf, dumb and blind kid sur...
Reviews.Content: I love having the Apple TV especially now they've added access to HBO GO; unfortunately you still need an HBO subscription through your cable company.  Only downside is you cannot watch Amazon video unless you use an iphone or ipad app and use the Airplay feature.  It works but is just a minor pain.  Can listen to the tens of thousands of albums I have in itunes, podcasts, watch Netflix, HBO and several others as well as any of the hundreds of movies I have ripped to itunes.  Also can watch TV or movies on PPV but I haven't used so can't comment.  I now only have basic cable instead of all the bundles and save about $75 a month when all said and done.  Really works well!  Highly recommended.  The roku and other devices are good too, but none of them allow integration with itunes on my apple devices that makes the Apple TV so useful for me.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Louis J Ferraro
Reviews.Content: I loveu it, it is apple, it works, it is easy to install, it is samll and it is HD

Reviews.Title: Not What I Hoped For
Reviews.Author: Dicepants
Reviews.Content: Apple tv promises it can do a lot of things, and it upholds some of them. Yes, sadly, only some.Can it stream your itunes library if your macbook is open? Absolutely! This is easily my favorite feature, and a great way to watch digital copies of movies and tv shows.Can you stream HBO Go? Sort of, if you don't mind buffering literally every minute unless you let the program load for several minutes. (I tried this on several internet connections, and still it was dodgy service at best. I blame this problem more on HBO than Apple)Can you stream Netflix? See HBO Go entry.Can you stream YouTube? Surprisingly, yes.Is Apple TV user friendly? It depends on your knowledge of apple and mac products I guess. For me I had to do a lot of googling to figure out how to make the darn thing work.Is it easy to set up? Most definitely. It's two cables and a box.Honestly I would give this a much lower review, but I got the thing for dirt cheap after Christmas, so it wasn't a total loss. However, if you are thinking about paying full price for one of these I would advise against it. Overall, I would NOT recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: This is simply a cool item for a "not so smart tv"
Reviews.Author: Playground Music Center "Playground Music"
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, easy to use, makes an older tv like new and more. Get you one!Has a slender remote control, down side is the range is very poor, should be fine from the couch, but from more than 10ft your out of luck.

Reviews.Title: Item is perfect. No live to watch
Reviews.Author: wander6
Reviews.Content: It's fast and easy to use ,very simple. But content provider don't provide live tv except British Sky News. So it canna Stand for a tv box. I need a tv box additional.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Washti
Reviews.Content: I finally got with the tech era. Got this to get WWE Network. Price is great as its cheaper that retail.

Reviews.Title: It's awesome
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: This thing always works, it's easy to setup, it's easy to operate. I have an inherent delay right when a show/movie starts - but after starting it's never had an issue.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Edwin
Reviews.Content: For a little less than $100, I can view TV shows from overseas via youtube with very good result. That alone is worth the money for me.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Leila D. Offner "Fashion chic"
Reviews.Content: Just how I expected and it came in mint condition! Couldn't even tell it was used!! The only other thing is that it didn't come with the HDMI cable which I didn't know I had to get so it would have been nice if I knew that but maybe I just missed it in the description.. Anyways fast shipping and an awesome product!

Reviews.Title: YOU HAVEN'T LIVED UNTIL YOU'VE OWNED ONE OF THESE!
Reviews.Author: TAPU
Reviews.Content: I used to use my blu ray player for watching Netflix and Hulu and listening to music.  But I always hated how slow it was in loading those apps.  I invested in one of these around Christmas and haven't used my Blu Ray player since.  I've even gotten to buying digital movies because it's so much easier than having to fiddle through your blu ray disc collection. The only downside to this is that it doesn't automatically play the next episode if you're watching a series on hulu or Netflix.  You have to click back, scroll down to the next episode, and hit play.  It's not like the app on the ps3 that does all of that for you.  But I can live that so, I'm good.

Reviews.Title: Forget cable!
Reviews.Author: Dan Stimler
Reviews.Content: If you're like me and don't want to spend $80 a month on a bunch of shows I don't even watch, then this is for you!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Hoosier Fan
Reviews.Content: Having already installed one appleTV in my home, purchasing a second for a family member was a no-brainer. Easy decision.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: David Harper
Reviews.Content: Made a perfect Christmas gift for my son.  He and his wife really like it -- fits with their Apple universe.

Reviews.Title: Good Space Saving Media Player.
Reviews.Author: Alberto Nunez "Alberto Nunez"
Reviews.Content: It works fine, but some of the applications like Crackle get stuck and repeat the comercials. I hope this has nothing to do with the AppleTv. The remote could be improved in the way it works, however it is giving a great service. Thanks, Apple!

Reviews.Title: Couldn't live without it...
Reviews.Author: Timothy Wudarski "timwux"
Reviews.Content: I tried all the rest, and in the end, the AppleTV, especially considering the constant updates and feature additions, is the best of the breed by a mile right now.

Reviews.Title: Don't let the  size fool you!
Reviews.Author: Nor'easter
Reviews.Content: This little Apple TV packs a punch! There is so much contented that is streaming and it's amazing how many channels are free! It does cover the major channels like netflix,hulu,etc and best of all you can order movies cheaper then your current cable provider!. The key thing you must have is a great internet provider and a good wireless server to prevent any lag issues. I love mine and best of all I can unplug the unit if the kids have the tv and watch it on another tv in another room. It's a Apple so you know it's quality is outstanding!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Richard Wanderman "rwanderman"
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is a stellar product. If you have a Netflix account you owe it to yourself to try one out but even if you don't, there enough content available via streaming these days (more being added all the time) so that it's a great value.If you have a nice HD TV adding a product like this or a Roku or both is a relatively inexpensive way to get excellent content on your TV without adding the monthly expense of premium cable channels.Products like AppleTV and Netflix are part of the disruption that will be the end of cable TV as we know it.If you have other Apple products (iPhone, iPad, Mac) using AirPlay to share content on AppleTV is an added bonus.

Reviews.Title: Free German TV
Reviews.Author: Veepka
Reviews.Content: I can now watch all my German TV shows over my I pad on my TV. This is so cool! I love, love, love it! Worth every penny!

Reviews.Title: BUY A FEW OF THESE
Reviews.Author: KATHLEEN TAYLOR
Reviews.Content: What to say - It's an APPLE!!! It is absolutely PERFECT and works like a charm.  Definitely BUY 1,2, or 3

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Katharina Truelove "truelove"
Reviews.Content: We had one in the bedroom and use it so much that we got another one for the family room.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV Rocks
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Babeshkin
Reviews.Content: I love my Apple TV.I mainly use it for Netflix, listening to my music library, youtube and sometimes watching iTunes videos.Apple has the best netflix interface out of all the other such devices.  It is very easy to browse and actually discover other movies that are like the one you are currently looking at.Would highly recommend for people who watch a lot of Netflix, but also as a general media hub for people mainly using the Apple ecosystem.

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: William V. Gale
Reviews.Content: I works as advertised but doesn't seem to really do all that much, let's you spend money on various services etc. It does let you see your I pad screen on your HD TV but after looking at photos on an 3 megapixel 9.7 inch I pad air, they don't look so good on a 2 mega pixel 47 inch HD TV  DONT KNOW IF I WOULD BUY IT AGAIN OR NOT .?????

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Ramesh K. Kapoor
Reviews.Content: It was an additional tv for me for my media room.  Great product- it works seamlessly with other Apple products.

Reviews.Title: Excellent With HBO Go
Reviews.Author: Josh Rastatter
Reviews.Content: When I got this product I was planning on binge watching shows on Netflix, maybe watching a you tube video here and there, but that was about it. Then I found out that HBO Go was available for the Apple TV. That was amazing for me because I love many HBO shows, and all seasons of every HBO show that they have made are available on HBO Go. Unlike the Comcast On Demand service, you can access any episode of any show any time. The interface is easy to use and intuitive. I even used the iTunes app on the home screen to rent a movie. Everything was easy and fun to use. I think in the future, this product will just get better as more apps and services get included with the product.

Reviews.Title: way too expensive, for what you get.
Reviews.Author: Fidofour
Reviews.Content: There are alternatives I have tried including Chromecast and Roku. both offer similar services for more than half the cost of the apple TV.We purchased the Apple TV to sync with my wifes Apple products and that works ok, but I cannot justify the cost for the limited uses.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: C. J. Healey "ZCT"
Reviews.Content: I think the Apple TV is a fabulous product.  I have one on every TV in my house.  So easy for watching HBO Go, or streaming content you've purchased.  But another great feature is the mirror option.  If you have an iPhone, iPad or Apple laptop computer, at the touch of one icon you can stream the content from the device to your Apple TV.  Want to show some pictures to your friends, just press an icon and mirror your phone to your Apple TV and see them on the big screen.There are so many things you can do with your Apple TV, and Apple seem hell bent on adding more and more features.  Just this week they are streaming a concert live from Austin, free for Apple TV owners.  In the fall they get 30 artists to film an exclusive concert, and show these concerts for free.Various TV channels are getting involved too, so you can stream a surprising amount of free content without having to subscribe to a ton of stuff.As with all Apple products, it isn't the cheapest choice, but it is one of the best.

Reviews.Title: Works great and mirrors my iPad so I can use nothing on it
Reviews.Author: Robert S. Mason "Bob Mason"
Reviews.Content: Well worth the cost if you have a subscription to Netflix or Hulu plus.  Also works with Amazon Prime videos

Reviews.Title: I have 2 of these
Reviews.Author: van grant
Reviews.Content: I have been an apple tv user for a while and have gone through several updates. I have the standard version and the HD version. HD is the way to go! I look forward to when more and more channels become available.

Reviews.Title: Works seemlessly, a great investment toward your entertainment!
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: It works fantastically well with apple devices. I love that I could immediately play videos from various internet sources, but also it was great for sharing personal photos and videos with friends! It was a little expensive compared to similar products such as chromecast or roku, but if you have iphones I would recommend getting the Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: nice electronic addition
Reviews.Author: Sherry Monteith "sndmonteith"
Reviews.Content: Love the Apple TV, it sync's with all of my other apple devices and I can use my ipad and mirror it on the tv. My kids love this feature especially when they are playing games on the ipad and can watch it on the big screen tv. We also use it to watch Netflix and show off our pictures when friends are here. We can also listen to itunes over the tv as well.

Reviews.Title: Apple does it best
Reviews.Author: GH
Reviews.Content: This is the second Apple TV that I purchased.  One was a giftl, and the other I use.  There are other products out there, but  this one plays very nicely with my Ipad and macbook.  The other one is being used in a pc based environment as so far it is performing flawlessly.  I highly recommend the product.

Reviews.Title: Luv it!
Reviews.Author: Spike da Peke "Spike"
Reviews.Content: I owned a first-generation Apple TV and liked it. However, when I treated up to this current generation I like it much more. I'm very impressed with the user interface, and like the fact that it handles my Netflix and Hulu Plus subscriptions  as well as a variety of other networks and specialty programming providers. It's a shame that Amazon isn't represented, but, I suppose they are too much the competitors to allow such an arrangement. Likewise, with the up-and-coming Google TV. Fortunately, I have a Samsung intelligent television that works with some of these competing services.  I didn't want another box out in front of my television, so I bought an inexpensive hanger which mounts the very small and light Apple TV unit from one of the upper vent slots on my TV. The Apple remote is more than capable of handling this arrangement. I've also come to use the Apple remote app on my iPad, but as software goes I think it is as much a public beta as a real product.

Reviews.Title: apple tv
Reviews.Author: Steven Solari
Reviews.Content: It works as advertised.  I like it , but volume is inconsistent and picture is not perfect in some cases.

Reviews.Title: Everything and more
Reviews.Author: sonja gould
Reviews.Content: Everything you need in one little box - ability to stream directly from your phone makes it super easy too!

Reviews.Title: iLove
Reviews.Author: Erin Meehan
Reviews.Content: This was exactly what I wanted and happy with my purchase from Amazon! :)  This was a better buy than in stores and did not let me down.

Reviews.Title: Works fine
Reviews.Author: bugsy "bugsy"
Reviews.Content: It does exactly what it is designed to do. It updated to the latest firmware and new menus. It has had zero problems since I purchased it. I use it mainly to show movies that I have on my MacBook laptop and for some presentations at our local Macintosh User Group.

Reviews.Title: iTunes Match Is What Won Me Over!
Reviews.Author: B. Cable "Kebles"
Reviews.Content: I have a huge library of songs residing on iTunes, and once I purchased my Apple TV, I subscribed to iTunes Match and I had instant access to my complete library through my Samsung Smart HDTV with it's optional sound bar. It sounds incredible, and if I'm in the mood, I can actually shake the walls! iTunes Genius works great too, and I use it to create custom playlists. Some of my songs were added a number of years ago, and Match upgrades these to the highest bitrate automatically, which is another great feature. Anytime I purchase music on iTunes, it automatically shows up on my TV. The same goes for my pictures. I take one, and there it is, instantly, on my big HDTV. I wish Apple would provide me with access to Amazon Prime, but since it's available through the Samsung Smart TV, it's not a big deal, but for convenience sake, it would be nice. Apple just added their new Radio feature, which I happen to like too. Overall, I've been very pleased with it for the last year and a half.

Reviews.Title: Everything Promised
Reviews.Author: J. Middleton
Reviews.Content: Like this little guy.. Apple made this product well and it meets every things I need it to do.. super easy to setup, configure, and operate.

Reviews.Title: Loved this product!
Reviews.Author: Akmuradov
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly! Connected to my tv with hdmi, used optical-audio cable to connect it to my stereo, used cat7 ethernet cable for network connection, the result: perfect! If you want to connect your ipad/iphone to mirror the image to your display this is the correct item, it comes with lot's of installed apps (youtube, espn, ...). works perfectly with 1080p. with homeshare, watch everything from your itunes library or computer

Reviews.Title: Typical Apple product with elegant design and great functionality
Reviews.Author: Robert Hollyer
Reviews.Content: Compact, low power, simple to operate, with a convenient remote control. A nice product with a surprisingly low price given that it's designed by Apple.

Reviews.Title: Get this if you have an Apple
Reviews.Author: Pogue Mahone
Reviews.Content: If you have an Apple laptop or iPad or iPod with bluetooth this is the way to go.  Forget the Roku or the Google thing.

Reviews.Title: A must-have accessory for every TV
Reviews.Author: L. Asher "Director, School of Visual Concepts"
Reviews.Content: This is the coolest little black box you will ever own.  It just works.  And all of a sudden you're watching streaming video, Netflix, mirroring your phone, iPad, or computer screen, and more. I'm buying some more.

Reviews.Title: No regrets
Reviews.Author: K. Culleton "Avid Biker - RAGBRAI rules"
Reviews.Content: This is a small unit easily connected to any HDMI capable device. It allows you to mirror your itunes from any device. The one drawback is that you can't stream non-itunes videos from your computer. It has a bunch of applications preloaded (Netflix, Hulu, Vudu etc) and the remote works like a champ. You can also download a remote app for your iphone/ipad which makes controlling the system very simple. I love this little box.

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Jeff Greenberg
Reviews.Content: if you have apple products this is a no brainier. If you use Amazon cloud instead of i tunes get the Roku 3 it has the amazon app. I thought I could get away with using the apple air share function to watch my Amazon movies, you can but there is a downgrade in picture quality. And unless you use apple products the Roku blows apple TV away with the shear amount of channel options. Had I done more research I would have gotten the Roku 3 first. But this is still an ecellent product does everything within it's description.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Troy Pautz

Reviews.Title: Worst remote ever!
Reviews.Author: Androstarr
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV unit itself works well.  The picture quality is great.  Apple keeps adding more channels and making the Apple TV more useful.That said, the Apple remote that comes with it is the worst remote in the history of remotes.  First the remote has only 3 buttons and the utterly useless scroll wheel. Seriously, who makes a remote without a power button? Apple that's who. It takes an eternity to log into your accounts and navigate trough the menus. Second, the remote is super tiny and therefor easily lost, hard to hold onto, and hard to use.  Third all the weight for the remote is in the back and the buttons are in the front making it even more awkward to hold onto and use.I like a lot about the Apple TV, but I rarely use it; mainly because the remote is so horrible.  Every time in try to watch something it takes forever to use the rubbish remote to get to what I want, pause, play, or navigate.  I end up saying "Worst remote ever," at least twice while trying to navigate the convoluted menus and get the show started and at least twice more while trying to put the unit in sleep mode.

Reviews.Title: Does what I expected and more!
Reviews.Author: G&L; Rocks "stratocat99"
Reviews.Content: My main reason for purchasing the Apple TV over ROKU, was so I could access my very large iTunes library in the living room. It does this beautifully, but what I didn't expect was superior performance when streaming from Hulu Plus, Netflix and YouTube. There are a lot of the apps that are also resident on my Vizio TV set, but many that are not, and vice versa, so this also added an expansion of my streaming ability. Set up in a few minutes without a hiccup! Note too, that i am using a PC, not a Mac, and I am not particularly Apple-centric, but I find iTunes to be the best app for compiling and centralizing a music and video library. I can also access my library via my Samsung tablet using Samsung Link and have iTunes open for the Apple TV and other Apple devices without any conflict. Now for those considering getting one of these in order to stream from your personal iTunes library, you can do so without any concern. There are some limitations on video format, but if your primary player is iTunes, and the video plays there, it will play via Apple TV.My audio files in iTunes are loaded as uncompressed .wav files as opposed to using one of Apple's codices. I am an audiophile and many of my files, particularly home recordings from LP, are high resolution at 96kHz 24 bit, as well as the typical 44.1kHz 16 bit CD files. Absolutely no lag or bottleneck to the flow. I am currently piping the audio into a stereo system from the TV set's line out jacks, and the quality is nearly as good as playing the files directly from the computer into the main system it is hardwired into.At first I couldn't locate the proper playlist option, and assumed that the playlists weren't working. Turns out it was a simple matter of selecting the sort option to sort by name and then scroll up and BAM!, there it was. I thought at first too, that it wouldn't automatically play the next video in my iTunes playlist, but again, that was my slip, not the unit.It earns a 5 star rating from me, as it is a simple yet elegant solution to accessing my media library remotely. We may have to get a couple more for other rooms in the near future.

Reviews.Author: Dorian

Even when we paid for a U.S. VPN number, changed the DSN I.P., those items still didn’t work.  Hopefully it will live up to the hype once we return to the states.  I also bought the Roku 3, and it advertise to contain 2x more channels then Apple, but of course being on a European economy, we where only able to receive channels I have never heard of and none of them were Hulu, Netflix and or Disney...the main reason people purchase these devices.  I will write more in the Roku 3 section.
