Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Early Impressions
Reviews.Author: R. F. Mojica
Reviews.Content: I've had this device for about a month now and thought I'd give some impressions which might aid those considering a purchase.First, on the device itself. It's small in size and works well. I recently cancelled my pay-TV package because it was just too expensive for the amount of time I used it. I had 500 channels and watched about 1 of them. My main viewing interest was in watching NHL hockey games, and I watched nothing else, so why pay for what I wasn't using? NHL games were available through Apple TV for $100 dollars a year—about what I was paying each month for pay-TV. A good deal. I find that I actually get a better picture through the Apple TV than I got through my pay-TV provider, so I'm satisfied with how the device works.Now, what I'm not so satisfied with. First, in the NHL TV package, the games come on when the games begin and end immediately when the games are over. What's the big deal about that? Well, I like to get at least a little pre-game and post-game coverage. I'm not expecting complete pre- or post-game shows, but at least a little something. I don't need the game to switch off the second the final buzzer sounds. This isn't Apple's fault. I'm sure it's in the NHL TV contract. I won't reduce my rating because of this, but it's something to consider for sports fans because I'm sure it's the same deal with the NBA and MLB packages.There is not enough content available from Apple TV. Looking at the list available through Roku, they seem to offer a lot more, and a greater variety. For instance, I'm a subscriber to Amazon Prime. It's not directly availably through Apple TV. I've read here in reviews that you can view Amazon prime videos through Apple TV by mirroring your iPad, but I haven't been able to make this work. Oddly, I've been able to get the sound, but not the picture. I hear the program, but get a blank screen. Maybe I'm dumb, but Apple prides itself on making easy to use & intuitive devices so dumb guys like me don't have to bat our brains out getting the devices to work. Besides YouTube and the NHL games, there is really nothing available on Apple TV that I want. So I take a star off for that.I'm a long time and loyal Apple user, going back to the days of the Powerbook 160, and I like Apple products, but it's a love-hate relationship. Some things about Apple products bug the hell out of me, and a prime example of this is the Apple TV remote.Apple seems to have a design protocol that states that all their products will have a sleek, minimalistic, zen-like design with no bumps, protruding surfaces, seams, buttons or breaks to distract the eye. They want their products to have a certain "look" or, as they might call it "sensory experience". This may all look very well in a salesroom display, but we customers have to work and deal with these things, and what looks good doesn't always work good.The new model of the iMac is a perfect example of this. They designed a light, sleek (a real Apple word there) razor thin display unit that almost disappears when you look at it from the side. A wonderful technological accomplishment, but Apple doesn't seem to realize that just because you CAN do something doesn't mean you SHOULD do something. In my work with computers, a DVD-R/optical drive is a necessity. The new iMac, with its sleek chassis, has no room for a DVD-R drive, so if I want to use a DVD-R drive, I have to buy it separately, hook it up to the computer, using up a valuable USB plug, and have it sitting by the computer with cables running all over the desk. Hence we get the sleek, elegant zen design of the iMac with an un-sleek, inelegant dvd-r drive sitting next to it on the desk, with spaghetti like cables running from the drive to the computer. Sort of ruins the sleek, elegant, minimalistic effect, nicht wahr? Dammit, this thing is a DESKTOP computer, not a laptop. It's not something I'm going to carry around in a briefcase. Do I need it to be sleek, razor thin, light, when it's going to be sitting on a desk? The design is eye-catching and you may say, "wow!" the first time you see it. The ten thousand times after that, it's just another thing sitting on the desk. Recently when I needed a new desktop computer and discovered all this, it was the closest I've ever come to switching from Apple. I didn't, but I did go out and buy a used, reconditioned 4 year old iMac, which I'm satisfied with.Sorry for wandering off the subject, but I felt a need for an Apple rant. Back to the Apple TV remote. It's another one of those sleek, almost invisible, disappearing designs Apple so loves. But do the Apple designers ever watch TV? Do they ever use a remote control? Do they realize how easy it is to misplace a remote control? Don't they know the frustration of having a remote slip down in the sofa cushions when the user doesn't know it's slipped? Do these people live in the real world, or in a hermetically sealed container constructed completely of sleek, aluminized, elegant zen surfaces colored only in shades of white, black and gray? The Apple TV remote is ridiculously small, ridiculously thin, and just perfect to get lost with the least bit of inattention. It is a thing designed to win design awards, not to be used. So I reduced the rating another star for this.It's a shame, because the Apple TV device is really a nice item. It works well and, as I said, gives a very good picture. But there is a severe lack of interesting viewing content. If that is improved, I will revise this review and bump it up a star. I don't suspect they will ever change the remote device—it goes against their senseless design ethic. Since the remote is such an essential part of this device (it's useless without a remote), and the remote is such an annoying (if elegant) design, this thing will never be a five star item for me.

Reviews.Title: I like it.
Reviews.Author: EKal "EKal"
Reviews.Content: Important part for me is that the apple TV is super light and can be mounted on the back of a wall mounted LCD with just a little piece of velcro.  If it wasn't for that I probably wouldn't have bought it and instead used a traditional computer with HDMI output for itunes/netflix/amazon.Pros:  Cheap (I paid $80), box itself is small and light, love the look and feel of the remote.  The first standard remote that I don't want to instantly find a way to replace.  Can get to my itunes library on the TV (which I COULD do with a traditional PC but not with chromecast).  Love the way that it turns on and off on its own.  Clean look that even the technologically impaired can navigate.Cons:  More expensive than a Chromecast.  No native amazon app (need to airplay from another device to use amazon prime instant video).Additional Con:  This one is the fault of the American people NOT the fault of Apple or Amazon.  My streaming ability was immediately degraded by my internet provider the second the supreme court overturned the FCC regulation preventing violations of network neutrality.  This product is less useful now than it was in the past because the American people don't care enough about not getting bent over by Comcast/AT&T; etc to elect representatives that will pass laws requiring network neutrality protections.

Reviews.Title: Cord Cutter
Reviews.Author: P. McGrady
Reviews.Content: Apple TV has made my cord cutting experience tolerable.  I grew tired of increasing cable TV prices and having difficulty finding TV programming that I actually wanted to watch. I truly believe TV media is changing as we know it.  Apple TV and other streaming media devices are leading this change.PROS:- Airplay is awesome.- Did I mention that Airplay is awesome?- No really, Airplay is what sets apart Apple TV from all its competitors and really an amazing feature.  I digress...- I personally enjoy the following options on Apple TV:  YouTube, Apple Radio, iTunes via Airplay, Bloomberg News (surprisingly), Yahoo Screen (for SNL and The Onion), PBS, ESPN and NBA (for game highlights and short news clips) , Crackle, The Weather Channel, VEVO, Podcasts (which I never used before), and the Airplay Mirroring feature (mostly for Basic Hulu).- I can usually find something on Apple TV to occupy my time.  After all,  isn't that what TV is for?  It does take some effort to find something sometimes.  It's not like regular TV where you can just turn it on and all your programming is done for you.INTRIGUING OFFERS IF I FELT LIKE SPENDING MORE MONEY OR BEING MORE TECH SAVY:-Netflix, Hulu Plus, HBO GO-iMovie, Photos/Videos, FlickrCONS:- no amazon prime offering (however I think I read you can mirror Amazon Prime with an iOS device)- the remote works well however could be improved with a keyboard feature or headphone jack or sensor technology- no gaming features unless you use an iPad or iPhone with Mirroring- Mirroring did not work well straight out of the box (I had to alter my router settings to get rid of very jerky video playback.  This took me a while to figure out as no Apple representatives were able to help me.  I found the fix on some random messaging board.)- Video playback of HD quality video with mirroring is still slightly jerky.  Let me stress that the playback is only SLIGHTLY jerky.  It's to the point where its hardly noticeable to me.  It does not bother me, but it's not perfect.  My understanding is because it takes a lot of bandwidth to mirror from your device to the Apple TV.  I do not know that there is any way to completely fix this without running a cord.  Video playback used to be flawless using my HD cable. Despite all this, I value being able to mirror with Airplay more than running my HD cable.- not as much channel availability as the ROKU.  I have never used the ROKU, but I've heard that quality ROKU channels are few and far between despite their large channel lineup.WARNING:DON"T FORGET TO MAKE SURE YOU HAVE AN OPERATING SYSTEM ON YOUR APPLE DEVICE THAT IS COMPATIBLE WITH THE APPLE TV AIRPLAY FEATURE!BOTTOM LINE:If you are an Apple user already, I recommend the Apple TV.  If not, I think the ROKU is a fine option.  Apple TV and ROKU are especially valuable if you wish to "cut the cord" to Cable TV.MY TWO CENTS FOR THOSE "CUTTING THE CORD":Don't forget to use a quality TV antenna for those days when you cannot find something on your streaming media player.  TV via the antenna has come along way.

I can use my MacBook Pro, iPad Air, and iPhone to watch Amazon Instant right from my couch! The Apple TV has worked great for my home. I have Comcast and get about 28mbps down and about 6mbps up. I have noticed that on occasion there will be a slight video stutter (never sound though). But nothing major or unbearable. Actually, I noticed my Apple TV software was 6.0 and I had to upgrade it. Now I don't notice a video stutter/lag at all. But I have heard that many people have had problems with this so beware...Other than that it has worked great. If you are thinking about getting an Apple TV, I recommend looking into upgrading your internet speeds if you aren't in the 20mbps range. And maybe to save cost/cancel out cost, look into getting rid of your cable and get AmazonPrime and get their AmazonInstant Videos.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Solid
Reviews.Author: Paul E. Mathematics
Reviews.Content: If you don't want to be another one of the mindless drones who sit through whatever cable has to offer (including insanely long commercials) than this may be the device for you. You can still watch the shows you like via Netflix, HBO Go, ESPN, etc. but without the commercials & without having to wait until a certain time to watch the show. With the Apple TV, you are in control.I like this better than the Roku because the interface is simple & clean. Also, there is a YouTube app which the Roku doesn't have (major mistake on Roku's part). Lastly, the Apple TV syncs well with the iPhone & mac computers so you can show whatever your phone screen is showing on your TV via Apple TV. This is great if you want to watch a game on The Big Ten Network for example & Apple TV doesn't offer it - you can just put it on your phone or computer & beam it to the TV wirelessly. Pretty solid & I don't consider it very laggy, unless you have a slow internet connection.The YouTube interface leaves much to be desired. You can't read comments, etc. but it's still nice for watching videos. You can also download the Apple remote on your iPhone for free. This turns your phone into a remote & saves you time when typing in the search bar of the Apple TV menus. Would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: I Love
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: In all fairness, it's only been maybe 1/2 hour. But everything I've tried so far has been seamless. I haven't tried Netflix or other apps, but i have two other devices that can stream Netflix (TV and Blu-ray), so I'm not worried about that if it doesn't work well. Of course it would be nice if it streamed Amazon, but my two other aforementioned devices do that, too, so this was not a dealbreaker. One hint though, if you have a Mac, the remote will try to operate your computer, too. That was annoying until I figured out how to turn it off (System Preferences > Security & Privacy > General > Advanced > click Disable remote control infrared receiver). I don't use a remote with a Mac, but I can imagine that if you do, it may annoy you to have to turn this off completely rather than pairing with a specific remote. There may be a workaround for this, not sure.One thing I really like is that I have two options, I can access what's on my computer or iCloud directly from AppleTV (and use the apps), or I can mirror my computer if I want to stream something that's not an AppleTV app, such as Spotify, through AirPlay (this works with Amazon video, too, but you may need to turn off the AppleTV screensaver), though that does require a few extra steps. I originally bought a Roku 3 but found its lack of flexibility annoying and ended up selling it after one week on eBay (besides that, the Netflix interface on Roku was awful compared with my Panasonic Blu-ray). The AppleTV is about 95% what I was looking for. Now, if someone could just replace my Hopper, receiver and Blu-ray with something this petite! BTW,  I have a MacBook Pro running Mavericks. I don't know if AirPlay works with a PC.And P.S., if anyone is wondering why you might want to send something like Spotify to your TV, my TV audio plays through my stereo system, not through the TV speakers. I used to have to plug my computer (or iPod or iPhone) into the stereo receiver through a <gasp> cable.

Reviews.Title: For owners of smart TVs too!
Reviews.Author: FLShopper
Reviews.Content: I cannot say enough good things about this unit. I purchased form Target for $99 plus tax. I cut the cable cord some years ago. I was between purchasing a Royku and this Apple TV. I wrote this review because some of the reviewers stated that smart tv owners would not want this. As a smart and basic HDTV owner, I disagree. Also, I cannot speak to the movie sources, etc. because that is not my interest. What I like most is the Airplay feature on the ATV. I have access to content I want on my iPad via the Internet. Being able to Airplay, and not just mirror is worth the purchase. I have used a a digital media adapter on the ipad before but there is no comparison in resolution or presentation for the adapter vs ATV and the adapter will cost about a third of the price for the ATV and still not airplay. So if you are thinking of going the adapter route - probably not. Some complained about the remote. I rather like the little remote, and like that it has some flex in it. I can see that it might get lost in sofa cushions, etc. but I am pleased with it. The ATV was extremely easy to set up. Another point I should make is that I installed mine on a secondary older HDTV that must be about 8 years old or more. As it relates to the discussion of older TVs, this works perfectly. It is an LG and has one HDMI port - ahead of its time when I purchased it. I was concerned about mounting the ATV on the wall mounted tv. I discovered that the ATV does not have to be visible for the remote to sensor to it, so I was able to hide the ATV in the tv casing. So if you want to watch movies, etc. there are apps for that. I like that there is free international news and other free apps. But I mainly use use Airplay to play iPad content - plenty video podcasts - such as time shifted cable news, and other feature programs, as well as free tv internet/cable/tv channels. Of course, photos, notes, and anything else can be air played as well. It did take a while to learn how to move from one tv input to the other without loosing tv functionality- but that is not a problem now. If you are not apple invested, and if you are mainly interested in movies- you may want to also look at a Royku, but this was a best solution for my purposes. And that should probably be the deciding factor, - what do you need a set to do for you that you cannot already do? Hope this helps and was not too rambling.And about You Tube, just Airplay it.

Reviews.Content: Love my apple tv and use it quite a bit.  I love that I can play my music and have a slide show of my favorite photos from my Imac when I am in the mood for music.  It gives me access to my itunes movies etc.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: James Cymbryla
Reviews.Content: Love it ! Easy to use and fast , uncomplicated to install has great features would like more apps- nice

Reviews.Title: Great for Apple users
Reviews.Author: Esteban
Reviews.Content: Love my apple tv. Has made watching things from the internet SO much easier.I only really use it for Netflix, and occasionally YouTube, but there are other apps that you can use.People with MULTIPLE APPLE PRODUCTS should get this over another smart device. You can airplay from your iMac, macbook, iPhone, iPad, iPod touch. So if you want to use it as a second monitor for your computer, do it. If you want to show your friends or family pictures from your latest vacation, do it. If you want to have a bigger screen than your phone when playing a game from the app store, or you want to see what your edited video project will look like on a tv, just airplay. AIRPLAY AIRPLAY AIRPLAY.Only thing I really dislike is that the remote from the apple tv will also work with your mac computers. There is a way to turn it off though.

Reviews.Title: What's not to love about this thing!
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: It's Apple TV, it works, it is easy to setup (especially if you have an IOS7 iPhone).I put this on the TV in our bedroom so now I have NetFlix, WatchABC and access to my iTunes on my PC (yes you have to launch iTunes on your PC to have it show up).Setup was super easy, if you have an iPhone or iPad running IOS7 you can just turn the Apple TV on, turn on the BlueTooth on your iPhone, lay your iPhone down on the Apple TV box and your phone automates the install process! Type in your Apple ID password and confirm that you want to setup the TV and BAM! The Apple TV is setup with your wifi password and iTunes account info.Simple as can be!The only thing missing from the Apple TV options (for me) was Amazon (not surprising since they compete) but it's easy enough to run the Amazon Instant Video app on my iPhone and use Airplay to shoot it over to the Apple TV. The recent addition of WatchABC is awesome and now gives me ABC On Demand in our bedroom (we have a bare minimum cable box in there).I would also suggest installing the Apple TV Remote app on your iPhone/iPad/iPod Touch.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: barbara p.
Reviews.Content: nothing around as good as this. I like it and recomend to anybody. buy it you will love it also is easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: abi
Reviews.Content: So easy to use, a really great product. One thing to note is that if you do not own an HDMI cable you will need one to hook this up to your TV. The one Amazon has is inexpensive and works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: very good purchase and easy to use
Reviews.Author: Tian
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my Apple TV. It works so easily with my iPhone and  iPad. I love it!Only thing is, I didn't realize it wasn't compatible with my macbook pro, because I have an older version.It only works with the mid 2011 model or newer.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying it
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Klepper
Reviews.Content: It works and does what it's suppose to do.  I love throwing my iPad up on the big screen for people to see what I'm doing or watch a show.I do have some issues where the apps just spin and will never go in.Also, the iTunes Home Sharing is a pain.  You have to close and open iTunes for the apple tv to see it constantly.  It can't just find it like it should.  Gets annoying having to go back and forth a few times for it to see it.

Reviews.Title: Great product. Great experience. Great vendor
Reviews.Author: Henry E Hendrix
Reviews.Content: I got a great deal on my Apple TV with no hidden strings.  The product came in a timely manner and works like a charm.

Reviews.Title: We have so much fun now!
Reviews.Author: lilmsperfect
Reviews.Content: It is the neatest little Apple product I have seen yet. Very user friendly. Your other apple products will immediately recognize the Appletv and will offer to Airplay your pics, videos, you can pretty much do everything on your TV that you do on your iphone/Mac/ipad. Also has YouTube and Netflix available so my husband and I no longer have to fight over the PlayStation ;) Honestly I am not an Apple fanatic and I am very leery of the Apple takeover but when its good its good and for the price it is nothing for what it offers. BUY IT

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: overly critical
Reviews.Content: For me, it was between this and the latest greatest Roku. I have gotten two of these for family members who use other apple products, and it's great. The Airplay on Apple TV is a HUGE advantage. But it is sorely missing Amazon. Why can't you play nice, Apple?For myself, I got the Roku. Having Amazon Prime instant video is just too important.Overall, I like the interface better on the Apple TV. But the greater freedom in terms of channels/apps on the Roku was a clear victory in my book. Both are excellent.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Shirley
Reviews.Content: I do  not have satellite or cable tv service.  This is a good answer to more variety in tv programs.  I get good reception with my internet service.The only additional expense I have incurred is a subscription to Netflix.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Wingnut
Reviews.Content: If you have an i-pad you got get one of these.  Air play is cool.  I bought it so I could the NHL Game Center.  That works great too!  A lot of bang for the buck and I am no techie either.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV = Awesome
Reviews.Author: Brayne
Reviews.Content: Just awesome, especially due to the fact that you can mirror your devices to your TV. We play our music from our iphones through our TV speakers and it's seamless. All of our movies that we've purchased are viewed from "the cloud". No storage problems for our laptops.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Device, with an Amazing Flaw.
Reviews.Author: Christian Enright
Reviews.Content: I love apple, I really do. They kind of push it "too far" sometimes, this is in fact one of those times.The build is amazing, and the remote is a uni-body design of aluminum.. pretty cool.The only thing I hate is that the software in apps such as Hulu and Netflix, which I bought it solely for the purpose of streaming, are skinned the way APPLE WANTS IT. It's annoying because everything is like this. It's unlike every other streaming device, like xBoxes, Ps3's, iPads, iPhones, Smart TV's, BluRay Players, etc. So with this, you don't get some features other devices get since it's not the Netflix/Hulu experience that you get on EVERY OTHER DEVICE. For example, the special profile's for each user(Netflix), not there. The "Max" service on Netflix, again, not there.I hope in a near future update they make the 3rd Party apps the way EVERY OTHER device uses it.Besides that huge con, the device is amazing. It also learns any remote so you can use one remote for everything! Pretty awesome device, just one huge flaw in my point of view.(By the way I'm not hating on Apple. I've been using them since 2010. - iPhone 4, iPad Mini, Macbook)

Reviews.Title: Makes me wonder if i need to pay for cable anymore....
Reviews.Author: Kate Maguire
Reviews.Content: With so much available and viewable on apple tv, it can practically replace your cable subscription.  Its so easy to use/set up, even a monkey could do it.Best way to utilize all of its capabilities is to use it in conjunction with your ipad. You can view almost everything on your ipad through mirroring.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect streamer
Reviews.Author: Ali
Reviews.Content: I own a lot of Apple products and like being in the Apple ecosystem (itunes, iTunes Match, iBooks and so on).  I think the Apple TV is a near perfect streamer but I'm giving it 4 stars for only one reason: I cannot play music from it and to an airport express at the same time.  More on this later...-Why I got this?I wanted the Apple TV to be able to play music, and watch TV shows (i'm a cord cutter so I pay for a show or two here and there).  I also have speakers in multiple rooms in the house and wanted the ability to play music to multiple rooms simultaneously.  I had two airport expresses prior to the Apple TV.-How does it work?The user interface is smooth, well-implemented and works well.  Beyond iTunes, you also have access to Netflix, HBOGo, PBS, YouTube and a myriad of other services.  It's also nice to be able to show videos and photos shot on my iPhone on the AppleTV.  The Netflix app is one of the best I've seen.The Apple TV can also work with a bluetooth keyboard making it easy to search for content on Netflix, YouTube etc.It would be nice to be able to plug-in an external drive to play content, but Apple does not allow you to do so.  That's ok though as most people don't spend a ton of time ripping their CDs and DVDs anymore.  If you do have a large music collection and want access to it, just get iTunes match for $25/yr.  You'll have all your music up in the cloud and will have access to it on all your devices.  It would be to be nice to be able to store music on a connected external drive as I have kids and one of their hobbies is dragging DVDs on the floor to create deep grooves.  It would be nice, but it's not a deal breaker.-Areas of Improvement1) It would be nice if the next episode will be automatically queued up when watching netflix.  The family got a bit spoiled with this feature on our Sony Blu Ray player.  Again, not a deal breaker2) While the Apple TV has airplay, you can only use the AppleTV to play audio to one output at a time.  This is maddening.  I have to have a computer open with iTunes running to play music to two rooms in the house.  This is one area where I find the apple tv lacking.  It wants to be my media hub and I want it to be, but my computer still needs to be in the mix for me to use it as such.  While this also is not a deal breaker, it is a problem I hope Apple will remedy.-The Bottom Line:The Apple TV is a great streaming device.  It's everything you expect from an Apple product: It's elegant, reliable and easy to use.  It has some areas of improvement, but none of them are deal breakers.

Reviews.Title: Neat little toy
Reviews.Author: lugnut
Reviews.Content: My kids use this more than I do...... It is fun impressing them by using my iPad to throw pics and videos up on the big tv. My netflix and Hulu accounts interfaced seamlessly as well.

Reviews.Title: As advertised

Reviews.Content: This Apple TV is very easy to set up and use, has a lot of features, and streams in pretty high quality. I like it.

Reviews.Title: Gave as gift

Reviews.Content: If you have a HDMI TV and you have any of the Apple products, such as an iPad, iPhone, or iPad then this is a must have device.  I constantly stream movies from my Mac Mini to my TV.  I also can send music to my stereo through this device.  It does require me to have my computer running when I send stuff from my computer.  I'm still not convince about the Googlechrome cast.  I like taking stuff from my iphone, ipad and computer and send it to the TV.  I just love that capability.  Not to mention all the other applications, such as MLB and Netflix.  I don't care that TV's come with Applications, when I have an Apple TV.  Great value for $100!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product

Reviews.Content: Apple Tv is a nice product to convert your flat tv in a smart tv.If you are user of apple devices, you must buy an apple tv, It's very easy to share your phone/tablet/macbook in your HDTVAlso include the best version of  Netflix

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: I Gooch

Reviews.Title: Don't have one?  Buy it
Reviews.Author: Bradley F. Baker
Reviews.Content: I have all of these gizmos including a roku 3 and chromecast. I don't have a favorite, but this gets plenty of use. If you're an apple fan then you need this today. The music steaming and phone/iPade remote functions rock. I love the apple trailer channel!!!  This is a must have for $100 or less.

Reviews.Title: Really like it
Reviews.Author: momofthree
Reviews.Content: I love the Apple TV. I originally bought it to watch iTunes Movies on our TV but now we watch a lot more than iTunes Movies on it. We used it a lot when our cable line was getting moved to watch ESPN, because it supports WatchESPN. We also use it a lot for Netflix, now that it supports the new profile feature. And I really like AirPlay, because I can stream anything from my iPod or iPad to the TV, and there is virtually no lag at all. Overall, I really like the Apple TV and think it is definitely worth it, especially if you live in the Apple ecosystem.--David

Reviews.Title: It works great, but....
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: I will be happy when they expand the content available.  I especially find the mirroring useful.  I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Carobunga
Reviews.Content: So far so good and am able to stream from my 4 year old macbook with a couple extra steps

Reviews.Title: Thanks

Reviews.Content: For a better reviewCheck out this video on YouTube:http://youtu.be/kkJFPV2X6BsFor a better reviewCheck out this video on YouTube:http://youtu.be/kkJFPV2X6Bs

Reviews.Content: For those without a smart TV you must get Apple TV..  It was so easy to install and you can watch so many TV programs, movies etc via Netflix or Hulu, etc.  I am not tech savvy at all but had no problems hooking it up or using it.

Reviews.Title: We love it!

Reviews.Content: We actually purchased the Apple TV after we had purchased the Google Chromecast before it. We absolutely hated the Chromecast and decided to spend the extra money on the Apple TV. This is the best streaming device we've ever owned.

Reviews.Author: Scherrie J. Lawrence
Reviews.Content: My son loooooves the Apple TV! He watches everything on there now. I love that we can get Netflix on there too. It shows really clear and works so great with my internet speed.

Reviews.Title: Very happy!

Reviews.Content: My AppleTV came quickly and was just as promised...very happy with this purchase! It has worked great so far with no issues.

Reviews.Title: A quality product that fulfills expectations, and then some!
Reviews.Author: Cathy
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a gift this Christmas.  The recipient cannot stop thanking me ... she is SO excited about it!  It was very easy to "install", and it performs exactly  as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Our grandson is so happy!
Reviews.Author: Carole Nordyke
Reviews.Content: Our grandson wanted this for Christmas so we ordered it for him.  He is 16 and into technology gadgets.  With this he can hook up to his I phone and his Apple laptop and watch videos and movies on his TV.  I asked him if it was working okay and he said "it's great".  I gave it 5 stars because he is happy and the order was received in a timely manner and I was happy to find something he really wanted.

Reviews.Title: Great device, especially if you've standardized on iTunes / Apple AirPlay products (iPhone, iPad, etc.)
Reviews.Author: Joe Kiszka
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV is a very impressive solution that couples well with other Apple products.  If you can use AirPlay on any device (Apple or not), it should pair nicely with this.  It provides a very "clean" interface, and it's easy to rip videos (using Handbrake or similar) that will work on your iPhone / iPad which will also work on your AppleTVs.As for the negative aspects of the product, it's similar to any other Apple product.  The biggest disadvantages to the product is a tradeoff for the impressive UI and hardware design--you won't be able to plug in a USB jump drive with an XviD encoded AVI on it and expect it to play.If you use an Apple TV on a home network (or a series of AppleTVs), I'd plan on dedicating a computer to a stable iTunes server that holds your music and movies/TV Shows that you want networked so that you can take full advantage of the convenient interface.

Reviews.Title: Another awesome apple product!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I ended up getting this product and I must say I love it. The only con is that the actually remote is rather annoying. The way that it's set up makes it difficult to use otherwise works as instructed is awesome if you have an iphone or ipad to use it with so you can use the mirroring capabilities. By the way you'll will need an hdmi cable to use this with your tv. I pop the one out of my cable now and use it interchangeably between the two.

Reviews.Title: Who needs cable TV

Reviews.Content: I cut ties with the cable company sometime ago and Apple TV has made sure I'll never go back. Love the effortless way I can display my iPad, and Phone on the big screen. And there's no lag.

Reviews.Title: Awesome apple product
Reviews.Author: Rufino C. Singson
Reviews.Content: I love this apple product as it seamlessly integrates all of my apple devices. Streaming is flawless and quick. Set up was a no-brainer. The simplicity of the remote is elegant and intuitive. Great buy!

Reviews.Title: Love my Apple TV
Reviews.Author: mary lou alfaro
Reviews.Content: I was told after I made the purchase that there is an upgrade to the one I bought. giggle  I didn't know anybetter. Either way, doesn't really matter, this item is awesome. Takes up very little space and allows me to use Netflix, and many other applications like ESPN - through the use of my AT&T; Uverse internet. Awesome buy! Love it. Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Gregg Loyd

Reviews.Title: Amazing Accessibility
Reviews.Author: Jean L Chambers
Reviews.Content: This product has exceeded all expectations. We purchased the Apple TV unit for two major reasons: first- access to apps such as netflix, pandora, hulu, as well as being able to see videos, photos etc from our other apple devices, and second- VoiceOver accessibility. Both of these features offer multiple options for programming and accessibility, but the best, totally cool feature is AIRPLAY! Using this simple to access mirroring feature we have been able to share the wide world of apps from our iPhones and iMac and send the display straight to the tv screen. Imaging sharing a YouTube video with the whole family with just one step! Super! And Apple's VoiceOver means that everything is accessible for our family member who is visually impaired! One happy family!

Reviews.Title: Apple TV stands up to reputation
Reviews.Author: Becky
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a friend for Christmas and she loves itShe said it was her favorite present . She watches Netflix and loves that she can see her iphone photos on her TV. She hasn't begun to see all the features. I scored big time on this present.

Reviews.Title: Second Apple TV to have.

This is the case with both my Apple TV devices in two different location and ISP provider.No issues with AirPlay. performance, Works super well.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Dan Lew
Reviews.Content: It's everything I expected to do and more. I definitely highly recommend this to everyone who owns a hd tv.

Reviews.Title: Works good but MacBook Pro is too old
Reviews.Author: Bruce L. Coyle
Reviews.Content: Doesn't do what I wanted but we do get some use out of it. Wish they couold upgrade software to fix this.

Reviews.Title: Works great! Thanks!
Reviews.Author: Heather Kearns
Reviews.Content: Love it! So easy to stream movies on the TV. Great when there is nothing to watch on regular TV.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!!
Reviews.Author: Kami Lee
Reviews.Content: I had to write a review on this because i have seen people comparing Apple tv and the google chromecast player and some saying they are not much different. NOT TRUE. I purchased both for my apartment to have one in the living room and in the bedroom The apple tv is $100 but well worth it, especially if u have apple devices at home such as ipad or iphone. But u dont have to have it to work this.  Apple tv has so many more options then chromcast. If u have a television provider there are disney channel apps, nfl, HBO and more u can use. If u have an ipad or iphone u can turn on air play and use the mirroring option so everything u are doing on your device is on the big screen. Also it come with a remote but u can also download the apple remote app on ur device and control it from there that way u have a keyboard and makes searching for movies alot faster.  Now chromecast is good but only $35 because it doesnt have alot to offer. It doesn't come with a remote so if u dont have a smart phone u cant opperate this device and also only offers netflix and youtube thats it. Easy to set up but nothing fun to play with.

Reviews.Title: Best gift ever!!!

Reviews.Content: My husband bought Chromecast after seeing a commercial for it, but we already have access to Netflix through the Wii U, and Amazon instant video since we have Prime.  Chromecast didn't do anything new that we didn't already gave.  We got Apple TV and LOVE IT!!! We can play Netflix, and ABC, HBO, Disney, PBS (for Downton Abbey) plus all of our other iTunes movies!!! So pleased with our purchase!!!

Reviews.Title: it was a gift and my Son has been raving about it
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Kirbach
Reviews.Content: It does everything he hoped it would. It was easy to set up. everything is accessible from 'your' cloud. It was a great gift.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV Delivers For Business
Reviews.Author: Harness TechED
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my office. Not only does it allow me to stream or watch content, but it allows me to seamlessly share my MacBook Pro screen onto my tv. Initialize this with clients and training with employees. Another added feature is having a 4 digit pin setup, so only specific people can connect to it.I wish there was more streaming content and that it had Amazon Prime video.Highly recommend for Apple users and new users.

Reviews.Title: Amazing little gadget
Reviews.Author: Mark Wolfgang
Reviews.Content: This is what I tell my friends and family about the Apple TV.  If you have an iphone/ipad, or any other Apple products, it's a "must have".  I take it with me when I travel and buy them as gifts.  They're that cool!

Reviews.Title: You haven't watched TV until you've used an Apple TV
Reviews.Author: PopCultureWhore "PopCultureWhoreDotCom"
Reviews.Content: I got in on the Apple TV with the 2nd generation TV.  The current generation, the third one, is the best. 1080p content streamed to your television from your Apple cloud (any music, music video, tv show, movie, etc) or from your iTunes on your computer. You can also watch live and on zed,and content from many of the major network players like HBO, Disney etc. there's also sports fare like MLB, NHL etc for the sports fanatic. In addition, you have Netflix, YouTube and more.These days, I'm watching more content on my Apple TV from my BluRay digital copies, things I've rented or purchased from iTunes and Netflix content then watching regular TV. It's literally amazing.As always, the interface is easy and intuitive like any Apple product.It's extremely small, about the size of a hockey puck and unobtrusive. There's nothing dangling from the side of your tv like with Chromecast.If you're in the iTunes ecosystem it's an absolute no brainer. If you're on the fence, take the plunge. You won't know how you went without it before.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV MD199LL/A
Reviews.Author: Betsy Haley
Reviews.Content: Apple TV works great & has amazing pic quality!  My wife loved her Christmas gift.  It's also great that our daughter can watch Disney Jr as well.

Reviews.Title: LOVE
Reviews.Author: M. H. Self "2atonce"
Reviews.Content: we now own 4 and i am on the only one in the house without one... what gives?  I need one... easy, mainstream... fun

Reviews.Title: Very easy and fun Apple device to use
Reviews.Author: Hambone
Reviews.Content: I am not one for lengthy reviews so I will keep it short and to the point. The Apple TV works very easy right out of the box and looks great. The controller is very user friendly even for children. We use this almost every day to stream Netflix and Hulu. It also does a great job at mirroring your computer and playing youtube videos and songs from any apple wifi device.Overall a great product and beats out roku any day of the week for me. I would recommend this over any like device.

Reviews.Title: My 3rd
Reviews.Author: AKVHutch
Reviews.Content: I have purchased 3 of these to have one on each TV.  I really like the way it interacts with all of my devices and provides both air play and access to my iTunes library for music, photos and movies.  I really haven't found anything to complain about other than you do have to check for software & firmware updates, there is no notification.

Reviews.Title: They love it
Reviews.Author: Carina Christion
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for my boyfriend.  He is an Apple person, so he loved that he can link all of his different devices with the Apple TV.  He is very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: David H. Lee
Reviews.Content: Love it!  Now have 2 in the house and will soon add a 3rd.  If you have other apple devices then you need an apple tv

Reviews.Title: Best tv yet
Reviews.Author: homer
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this Apple TV, it's awesome, you will love this to. I can get any movie I want, steaming from my ipad is flawless as is any movie purchased or rented, get this you'll love it to. It's very easy to set up, ten or fifteen minutes is all it takes.

Reviews.Title: Thanks!
Reviews.Author: Ryan T Gleason
Reviews.Content: Shipping was fast, everything works fine and the price was very reasonable. Thanks for the easy transaction. There are cheaper alternatives but it is nice to have the easy to use apple interface

Reviews.Title: Fun Gadget
Reviews.Author: Paula K Laurence
Reviews.Content: I purchased as a Christmas gift and my son-in-law seems to really like it.  Easy set up and easy interface.

Reviews.Title: Great gift for somewhat tech savvy parents
Reviews.Author: Elise Alford
Reviews.Content: Since cutting the cable TV cord at our house in October, we have really enjoyed the opportunity to stream and mirror video, photos, movies, and skype calls through Apple TV. It's a friendly interface and we love that it speaks to all of our apple devices. We had a feeling that my somewhat tech-savvy parents would also love exploring this device and we were right. Shipped beautifully, and both parents love Apple TV. They have been texting about their latest adventures since the holiday and talking about how much fun it has been. Great gift for the boomer parents who are hard to shop for and who are open to new technology.

Reviews.Title: It works just as advertised.
Reviews.Author: J. Soifer "Sadhaka"
Reviews.Content: It's simple, it is reliable and it has many options.It seems that they're constantly adding new media content, not only through the Apple Store but also through different partners as You Tube, Vevo and Vimeo.The Korean Network is in, I would love to see the Japanese also !

Reviews.Title: Apple and Amazon- Great!
Reviews.Author: Ash Rock
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV is great- we have bought 2 off of Amazon.  Amazon is the most affordable way to but the Apple TV- free shipping and no sales tax (in our state) plus it was marked down $6 from the original price. Apple TV is great for Netflix and other services like HBO Go.  The Apple TV is very small and easy to fit and hide near your tv.

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: C. Smith
Reviews.Content: Just based on the video quality alone, I would give this product 5 stars, but if you also add how it integrates so well with other iDevices, this is an exceptional piece of technology. It will not replace your cable box/subscription because a lot of the channels require some sort of account to log in. However, if you already have a Netflix or Hulu account, it will nicely fit in to your entertainment ecosystem. We used to use our PS3 to view Netflix but now Apple TV is our device of choice.

Reviews.Title: Picked this over Roku for a family member invested in Apple
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: I am a big fan of the Roku and Chromecast. I have several of each in my house. For Christmas, I was thinking about getting one of those for my sister, but decided to give Apple TV a shot since she is pretty invested in the Apple ecosystem.The design and build of the Apple TV is great. Though it's not something you'll be handling much, it is very solidly built and looks great as a little set top box.Setup was simple, the little remote is also solid and well built and the system is responsive. Got it connected to WiFi and started showing my sister how to use it. The app selection is smaller than Roku, but I figured that could be made up for with AirPlay.AirPlay worked just like I imagined it would. Easy. I love features that don't take much training since it makes showing family members what to do very simple.Overall I am happy that I chose this for my sister. I still think that other devices may be more versatile for people who do not purchase media through iTunes, but there are many people that do just that; for them, I think this is the device to go with.I docked a star only for the app selection compared to other competitors.

Reviews.Title: Needed Accessory for your iPhone/iPad/iPod!!!
Reviews.Author: Andrew A. "sayforee"
Reviews.Content: Verdict: MUST buy if you own Apple devices!Apple TV is awesome! If you have Apple devices (iPhone/iPad/iPod), this is perfect because it lets you watch videos that you normally would watch on your small mobile device screen, and puts it on your TV via AirPlay. Think of it as hooking up your computer to your TV via a HDMI cord but only it's wireless!I use it all the time because I like controlling my Netflix, Hulu Plus, etc on my iPad because it is so much easier to search and select on your iPad (compared to TV or gaming console apps), but it's much nicer to watch on a big screen TV. That alone is worth the price of the device.On top of AirPlay, it allows you to sync and get content from your iTunes library. Not to mention the every growing apps that come standard on Apple TV (although keep in mind most apps require you to pay for the service). My favorite free app is VEVO. When you have guests over, I generally just pick a genre and it's nice to have background music playing with the music video to match. Let's be real - we all miss watching music videos! Much better than playing music and have a muted TV show on in the background.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Salem Nano
Reviews.Content: Worth every dime, you could save by using this product....no need to go to the theater anymore! love the easy of use and the image quality!

Reviews.Title: I own two and love them
Reviews.Author: Laurie
Reviews.Content: I've had my first Apple for about 18 months now.  It works great and I haven't had any problems with it at all.  I bought a second Apple 2 months ago and got rid of cable TV all together.  I now have free antenna TV along with Apple to stream Netflix.  I no longer get ripped off paying $72.00 a  month for lousy cable TV.  Now I watch what I want, when I want, for a $4.00 monthly fee to Netflix. This is a pretty good way to save money in this bad economy.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: The apple remote showed up on time. The only downfall is when purchasing you do not know you need the HDMI cable to hook it up to the tv. I had to go buy one at the store. The device works great. Just let people know about the cable!

Reviews.Title: Apple rules
Reviews.Author: C. Oldenberg "Motorpsycho"
Reviews.Content: Bought an Apple TV for myself about 5 years ago and love it. Picture quality is better than a standard DVD. Bought this one for Christmas for my parents.

Reviews.Title: very easy to project Ipad and Iphone on TV screen
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: it works fine. it is very easy to project whatever you are viewing on your Ipad 2 or IPhone 4s.

Reviews.Content: I chose apple TV because I was having problems with ROKU.  I am disappointed with Apple because there is no way to fast forward or to back up.

Reviews.Title: Well worth it's money
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: It is worth the money, it has many options.  Just the access you to get movies make it well worth it's money.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Joseph Fields
Reviews.Content: This product is amazing. Even with low internet quality and bandwidth, there is minimum buffering. I highly recommend buying this product.

Reviews.Title: Another great Apple product
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Great for my Apple collection, Connects to my mac for use with itunes. Mirrors photos from my ipod to the TV.

Reviews.Title: gift
Reviews.Author: hd103, CA
Reviews.Content: Bought it as a gift.  They love it.  You can't go wrong with it.  Will purchase more in the future.

Reviews.Title: Believe it or not
Reviews.Author: Ali Moosvi
Reviews.Content: I have this device for almost a year now.  At first I thought this little gadget was over priced but now believe it is worth every penny I paid for. The video and sound quality from YouTube streaming on this Apple TV device  is unbelievable and better than what you get from the Hi-Def channels on dish network.  Netflix video/audio streaming quality is excellent.  Now you know why Apple products are priced higher than competitor's and why their stock price is > $550/share.You can also remotely connect your iPad thru Air Play to Apple TV and view your iPad screen/pictures, etc on the TV screen with no loss of sound or picture quality. Way to go Apple.  Steve Jobs was a genius who clearly differentiated Apple products from the rest of the competetion.The smart TV interface for Youtube and other internet browsing is garbage and hard to navigate.The remote is sleek and very user friendly and has a robust builtin WiFi. No cons except a bit expensive but definitely worth the price.  I will recommend this to anyone who wants to watch quality YouTube, Netflix  streaming and iPad mirroring on the TV.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV MD199LL/A
Reviews.Author: John Rosser
Reviews.Content: Out of the box, the remote did NOT work. After phone calls to Apple tech support and a visit to Apple store, Apple replaced the remote. So far, Apple TV is working well. Probably would buy from Apple instead of this supplier to avoid the hoops involved to get Apple to resolve an issue with their products.

Reviews.Title: Instant Internet on my TV
Reviews.Author: SoggyInSeattle
Reviews.Content: We skip Cable and watch all our content from the internet.  The AppleTV is our portal to a growing list of channels and content providers.  We've team it up with its native support for Netfix as our primary way of watching stuff.  We have one for each TV.

Reviews.Title: Only have a couple of problems
Reviews.Author: Just Jon
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a wedding gift for my girl, because she'd been hinting about wanting one. She's into tech stuff and gadgets and anything with an Apple logo on it, so she loves it. I like it too, but I have issues with it.There's only a couple of things I don't like about this, causing it to get a 3-star rating instead of 5 stars.For one thing, it has an app for Netflix and Hulu, but it has no app for Amazon's Instant Video. Granted, you can stream Amazon content from an iPhone, but it's annoying to have to do that. If my wife didn't automatically assume everything by Apple is the best, I'd have just bought a Roku device because that'll also play Amazon video.The other complaint is the tiny remote. I'm sure Apple-lovers are all swooning over how sleek and stylish it looks, but the remote is just entirely too tiny for my tastes. It gets lost every other day, because it's just so tiny. It's about as thick as a graham cracker, and it's very short and narrow. So it's always being buried and hidden under clutter, or it's always falling into cracks in the couches/recliners. I know it's unheard of for people to ask for bigger electronic devices, but it would actually be appreciated to have a conventionally-sized remote that won't get lost all the time. Frankly, having a bigger remote would allow for programmable shortcut buttons or a small qwerty keyboard which would make the Apple TV even easier to use.

Reviews.Title: Hit 4 husband

Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband's Christmas present...Excellent gift, for an Apple fan not to mention the price was right!

Reviews.Title: A great addition to your existing TV!

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied

Reviews.Title: Easy to hook up

Reviews.Content: Typical of Apple products, it's easy to set up(even for us baby boomers) and a high quality product. Love Apple !

Reviews.Title: I'm watching it almost every night.

Reviews.Content: I cancelled my local cable contracts in Singapore and subscribed to Netflix and Hulu via my Apple TV.  I'm addicted and need to get out more now.

Reviews.Title: always something good on apple
Reviews.Author: michelle bradshaw
Reviews.Content: When you own a Apple tv you have the control to watch any show/movie you want anytime you want. Old tv series, old movies, YouTube videos all @ the touch of your Apple remote. Gave one to my mother and sister and they have enjoyed it as much as we do.

Reviews.Title: Excellent

Reviews.Content: In a time when Cable TV costs more money than it should, it's time to bypass it.  A netflix account is all I need as well as files from my computer and the apple tv is now being used every day on my HDTVs.  Well worth the money for me.

Reviews.Title: Music videos

Reviews.Content: This is my second Apple TV.  I have one downstairs and bought it solely to watch Yoou Tube concert footage and videos on the big screen.  Apple is expanding their programming.  Unfortunately there is little else they have that interests me that isn't on cable.Like all Apple products Apple TV is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Perfect addition to my home entertainment...

Reviews.Content: I like the apple tv.  I use it to watch hulu and stream movies from my home computer.We have two apple tvs and I love them.  We plan to get a third when we buy another tv. Reviews.Title: Perfect!

Reviews.Content: I love my apple TV! I have an iphone and they work so nicely together. This is the main reason I choose AppleTV in the first place. I think it helps if you have other apple products to use in conjunction with it. LOVE apple! I would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Davide Colletta
Reviews.Content: Excellent easy to use product. The entire family enjoys it. The new updated version has new and excellent features. I love the way it integrates with all other apple products we havevv

Reviews.Title: Should of bought it long time ago.
Reviews.Author: Kevin Shukla
Reviews.Content: Great product. Now I can watch all my streaming movies on tv witelessly. Now wating for jb to come out.

Reviews.Title: Really like.....
Reviews.Author: Charles Chesnutt
Reviews.Content: Bought one for myself to experiment with and found it so useful that I bought several more for Christmas presents.

Reviews.Title: Easier to use than expected
Reviews.Author: Jonathan S. Blank "LoveGhostStories"
Reviews.Content: Got this for my husband who is into gadgets for Xmas. Was amazed at how easy it was to use, even the kids can do it. Works flawlessly with our iPads

Reviews.Title: ROKU Vs. Apple TV are the same with the added bonus of it working with your other apple products and iTunes
Reviews.Author: Keith
Reviews.Content: Pros- It is as good as the ROKU just a different format layout of displays etc..I have both the Apple TV and the ROKU and don't regret the Apple TV- It give you options to watch TV. For example I use Apple TV to watch Youtube/ ROKU to my knowledge does not have the icon for Youtube.Cons- Remote is too small and easy to hit the center point when you want to hit the sides. Also my version of iPhoto is not current and will not work with the Apple TV.  The Apple TV recognizes this and instructs you to buy the latest iPhoto app at the iTunes store.For $89 and free prime shipping: I would recommend it and I would buy it again because it gives me options away from my basic cable source.Update Dec-30th 2013: I asked my teen daughter which see likes better the Apple TV or ROKU and she said Apple TV because it was much faster than ROKU to access programs.  I'd never considered this point so keep that in mind when considering one or the other.

Reviews.Content: The Apple TV made life easier for me.  I have twin great nieces living with me while they attend college and purchased Apple TV to minimize arguments related to viewing choices. This has worked out great with the new multi-monitor support with Apple's new Maverick OS. I have used it successfully with my macbook pro with retina display.

Reviews.Title: Expect Nothing Less of Apple Products
Reviews.Author: PDot4
Reviews.Content: This is my third Apple TVs for our home.  It is as good as the first one we got when Apple TV first came out.  Most new "smart" TVs can't "AirPlay" with iPad and iPhones.  Therefore, having an Apple TV is essential if you want to display pictures or play video from iPads/iPhones on your big screen TVs.

Reviews.Title: Good, but not great.
Reviews.Author: Matthew Harvey
Reviews.Content: I really like the Apple TV. It's pretty cool to be able to watch iTunes movies or Netflix on my TV. Here, basically, are the downsides:- the remote uses IR instead of Bluetooth, so it's not 100% reliable. The Remote app on iOS does a good job, however.- Home Sharing (watching a movie or listening to music from a shared iTunes library elsewhere in the house) is unreliable and slow as heck. It's a really disappointing experience- renting/downloading a movie from the iTunes store can sometimes take 24 hours to download, which is ridiculous, given my internet connection.- Overall it feels slow and unresponsiveSo, it's not perfect, and I can see lots of areas for improvement, but it's a nice product. I'm glad I have it.

Reviews.Title: Love the Apple Tv

Reviews.Content: Perfect condition love the Apple tv, no problems.  Great product I use it to stream videos and music. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: I love my Apple TV
