Reviews.Title: Love my Apple TV
Reviews.Author: BiologyProfessor
Reviews.Content: Our family has bought into the Apple ecosystem, particularly with many iTunes movies and such, so the Apple TV is a no-brainer for us.  We actually have four of them across the various generations.  The Apple TV is one of many largely comparable products.  If you have any recent Apple products (iPhones, iPad, iTunes movies, etc.) and are looking for a fan free (i.e., absolutely silent), energy efficient box to plug into your TV to see a diversity of media, then this might be the purchase you are looking for.  If you are not invested much or at all into the Apple ecosystem, The Roku 3 is better.  In some ways, the Roku 3 is better (e.g., it has more channels, particularly Amazon Instant Videos), but the two are largely comparable.  To some degree, the real question is whether you want access to iTunes and airplay on the AppleTv or Amazon videos and more channels on the Roku 3.  Trust your gut on which you should buy, but buy own of them.  You won't regret it...

Reviews.Title: Excellent addition to entertainment system!
Reviews.Author: Ryan R.
Reviews.Content: Bought this to be able to link my itunes and ipad on to my TV. Excellent little device, with the combination of airplay, itunes and apps such as netflix and crackle, I only watch cable for the live events; NFL, MLB, WWE, etc. With WWE hitting hulu and the mlb app on this device, I see the chord cutting in the near future!*Sadly, you cannot jailbreak this device, this is why the cost of the AppleTV 2 is 150% more than this.The ability to use airplay on this device is what sold me to this instead of the roku, the lack of amazon prime is no big deal with having airplay to link the prime app on the ipad to the TV.

Reviews.Title: Check to see if it plays what you want it to play.
Reviews.Author: Hisashi T. Fujinaka
Reviews.Content: There's only one thing that I heard of to decide whether to get this or the Roku. If you want Amazon streaming, get the Roku. If you want iTunes, get this.A recent software update made Netflix look awful on the Apple TV, but they seem to have fixed that. I have a Chromecast as backup and comparing the two you could see the difference. Fortunately, it works much better now and it's so much easier to have a remote control than using my iPhone with the Chromecast.

Reviews.Title: If you have IOS devices, you need one or more of these!!
Reviews.Author: Illinois Joe "Joe"
Reviews.Content: While the AppleTV is great for streaming your itunes content, netflix, etc. I believe the real power is AirPlay.  I love being able to mirror my IOS device (iphone, ipad) screen up on to the TV to share pictures, videos, web pages, etc.  It's especially great for doing face time between my kids and their grandparents.  It's like a business video conference with the display and audio coming through a  55" or 42" TV.  The iphone or ipad essentially become the video camera.  Last, after living through several generations of media (VHS, LD, DVD, Blu Ray) for movies, I've given up and moved to download them.  The Apple TV works great for streaming them.  Apple continues to add new functionality and sources for media.  There are even third party apps where you can stream your PC's screen to an Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: prefect product but price can be tter
Reviews.Author: D. Xu "-dxu"
Reviews.Content: the product works extremely well, I can play movies and music directly from my ipod, ipad, iphone and mac computers, and connect the audio through fiber optic to my home theater system. However, comparing with Google's equivalent ChromeCast, which costs only $35, Apple TV is way too expensive, as ChromeCast works nearly exactly the same except it does not has an fiber optic audio output, and it does not have an extra remote control (which is not exactly necessary as your mobile device takes the job).Setting up Apple TV is a little tedious, not as easy as ChromeCast.$50 is a much more reasonable price for Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Used Apple TV works AMAZINGLY!
Reviews.Author: Megan Langa
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical when I ordered a used apple TV, I wasn't sure if It was going to work well. When I received the apple TV immediately I was amazed! The apple TV works as if it was new. If you can save money where you can you might as well! I'm glad I ordered the Apple TV used and not new, I ended up saving money and It works as if it's new!

Reviews.Title: Love Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Robbie G.
Reviews.Content: I have Apple TV for all four TVs that I have. Great for watching Netflix, renting and watching movies from iTunes etc. The remote app on the iPhone is easy to use and is a must.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: ALAA ALSYED "Alaa Awlia"
Reviews.Content: It's the best thing i ever use.... Perfect at home to watch movies and I really recommend it for whoever wants to enjoy watching online

Reviews.Title: Constantly amazes
Reviews.Author: Doppler Man
Reviews.Content: This thing is great; installation was a breeze (literally plug and play!) and now the 5000 plus family photos that reside on the computer are available for viewing on our tv, either as a slide show with music from our iTunes, or as a screen saver while the Apple TV is idle. Works beautifully with amazon prime, Netflix, etc. with plenty of free content from Crackle, PBS, etc. It also allows me to stream content from our iPads and iPod touch, which is a great way to share photos and videos with a group of people.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Arivoli "Arivoli"
Reviews.Content: Simply great, it works great in india.The quality of the movie or image are great.But some time airplay is getting crashed

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: J. Miller
Reviews.Content: We are an Apple family and this is just icing on the cake.  Apple TV is easy to install, set=up and navigate.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Airplay
Reviews.Author: Patrick Ryan
Reviews.Content: My only issue is Airplay.  I understand the different screen dimensions but find it frustrating Apple can't maximize the display on a High Definition TV when your iPad is horizontal.  No one likes black bars

Reviews.Title: More then I expected
Reviews.Author: nino brown
Reviews.Content: Great product to use for any one with an apple device or iTunes. You can watch crackle and a number of other stations as well. All in all a great buy.

Reviews.Title: this is awesome and worth the money
Reviews.Author: Anita H
Reviews.Content: I hate giving money to Comcast or Verizon for cable as cable sucks.  Apple TV makes no cable possible.  I pay for what I want to watch.  I just wish I could get German or Canadian content.  Some channels need you to have cable as well.  Things like the ABC and one other.  I refuse to support cable ever again!!!!!!  I would rather buy from apple TV than give any money to cable.  My advice, Boycott cable!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Apple has it right
Reviews.Author: Matthew L Kowalski
Reviews.Content: Love this item went out and got a second one for the other tv. Even cancelled cable with having netflix and hulu.. Not to mention the 10 other apps

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Apple TV as a gift.  It's an awesome system, especially if you want to use air play from other devices and play them on your tv.  Can't recommend more highly.  Buy IT.

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: Birger M. Lerdal
Reviews.Content: I have two of these because I liked the first one I got another one for my wives TV. I like it more now since I can play Amzon videos.

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up amazing graphics
Reviews.Author: A. Minasyan "Blackjack"
Reviews.Content: Very Easy to set up and connected to wireless effortlessly.Graphics are impressive and the Airplay feature through other apple devices works very well.

Reviews.Title: Makes a dumb TV into a seamless Apple Device
Reviews.Author: Andrew A. Hughes "Masqueman"
Reviews.Content: Something as small as an Apple TV can transform a regular television into a gateway for all your Apple media, You Tube, NetFlix and more. I use it so that I did not have to order another expensive DVR from the cable company... The interface it the highlight of this device though using the tiny remote can be a pain for large handed people.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Gaby
Reviews.Content: this product is really good, it works perfect and I have no problem, however is short-range but what I need is well

Reviews.Title: Apple TV rocks!
Reviews.Author: Dirk G. Payne
Reviews.Content: I bought the unit for the TV in our family room. Since we are heavily invested in Apple products (iPhones, iPads, and MacBooks), it is a perfect fit, and does an amazing job streaming from a remote iPad, iPhone or Mac. I highly recommend this, especially if you own other Apple products!

Reviews.Title: Great device, but still not perfect
Reviews.Author: AG
Reviews.Content: Very easy set-up.  Great functionality.  Very fast switching between different programs.Once downside is with the software.  No way to randomly use photo slideshow without repeating pictures over and over.  Seems like an easy fix, but unfortunately Apple can't/won't fix it.  Otherwise, very nice.

Reviews.Title: my daughter is so happy to receive this item.
Reviews.Author: t.stephenson
Reviews.Content: Now she can hook up her IPOD to the TV.Yes we would recommend this product to other people.  Cuz its awesome.

Reviews.Title: Love Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Mayfair Delights
Reviews.Content: I love apple TV.  I have an Iphone and an Ipad so I really love the compatibility and mirroring features.  Its great to watch netflix, youtibe,etc.  I would have given it 5 except my remote broke and it was pricey to replace.  Although you can make your phone/ipad the remote...

Reviews.Title: Just as described
Reviews.Author: Danielle S.
Reviews.Content: Works great, could tell this was brand new, bought this right before black friday when it went on sale for another $10.00 off, contacted amazon and they refunded me right away. All in all, got this $15.00 cheaper than apple.com

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Judith velez
Reviews.Content: You can save a lot of money in cable. Plus good movies & shows. Recommend to anyone . Go ahead

Reviews.Title: Great invention by Apple
Reviews.Author: A. Rangel "Al R"
Reviews.Content: This device costs 99 bucks, but it's worth it. I love the fact that I can take my apple products anywhere and connect them to the tv. I have used it with FaceTime and it's awesome, my friends are on the tv and therefore I don't have to look at the small iPhone screen. Also, I have used it with Netflix and Amazon instant video, works great with those too. Finally, I made a karaoke system and I use this to view the lyrics, and my iPad to send the songs to the system, it works great with that. For 99 bucks, I think this is a great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: Maria M
Reviews.Content: Thanks for making a great priced product for Christmas!! I gave the gift of apple TV + Netflix to my parents. We love our apple TV!

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Rev Will
Reviews.Content: This little TV unit for Apple is great.  My wife and I love being able to watch our iTunes selections on the big screen TV and this is a perfect addition to our collection of gadgets for TV enjoyment.

Reviews.Title: I've been wanting one of these for years
Reviews.Author: J. T. Pater
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Apple TV as a gift and was amazed at how easy it was to hook up and get it working. This is a very useful product for so many reasons. It's the ultimate big screen for your iPad.

Reviews.Title: Can't get enough of these!
Reviews.Author: Tiffany A.
Reviews.Content: Well.. I own 3.  I have them in bedrooms, living rooms, every-and-any-where!  I plan on getting more too.  I have it connected to my network and surround sound.  I can play movies, music, Netflix, you name it!  Best part, you ask?  I can control it all from my iPhone, iPad, or MacBook Pro (with the Maverick update, that is).  It's just wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding!
Reviews.Author: aroglesby85
Reviews.Content: Love it all the way!  This is great for those of us that have large digital collections of movies, music and tv programs!  Works fantastic.

Reviews.Title: It just works
Reviews.Author: B. Petree "B>N>P>"
Reviews.Content: It's like most every other Apple product.  It works and does everything it is designed to do.  It has a tiny footprint, but growing options for additional entertainment and streaming.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Coldwatergardens
Reviews.Content: My family loves Apple TV. It gives us everything we already had on the phone and ipad right on the tv. This includes all of the movies and shows my kids watch and it's easy enough for them to function it on their own

Reviews.Title: Apple does it again
Reviews.Author: David Burke
Reviews.Content: If you own an iPhone or iPad this little device will really enhance your pleasure with Apple Products. For example I like to watch HBO GO on my TV but my TV carrier (Comcast, also known as the worse cable company in the entire univerese) will not support the Roku Player, but thank god does support Apple TV. Almost anything you watch on your iPad or iPhone you can stream it using AirPlay with Apple TV. It is a must have device.

Reviews.Title: Worth every pennt
Reviews.Author: Jello
Reviews.Content: We use iPhone, iPad, and Macbook, and so it make a lot of sense to get this Apple TV. This device is very easy to set up and convenient to use. We are really happy with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Good device, easy setup, wish it would include desktop rendering on the tv
Reviews.Author: theOCjeremy
Reviews.Content: Setup was easy, it doesn't take up much room and I love being able to play movies from my iTunes account on my TV.  I wish Apple would make an "all in one" device that would both play movies/content as well as render the laptop display on the screen that would be ideal but, sadly, the AppleTV unit only plays iTunes content (an "Airplay" unit is required to show the computer desktop on the TV).

Reviews.Title: I had to have this
Reviews.Author: Tommy "I want to feel good when I complete a ...
Reviews.Content: My wife and I like to click around on our iPads.  We often are doing the same thing and would like to view it together.  We also like the ability to use movie apps.  This is a very cool thing.

Reviews.Title: Marvelous concept, but has a ways to go yet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I just got a new MacBook Pro, and was excited to give Apple TV a try.The good - images (still images and slideshows) are wonderful, and it has that Apple one-click and it works kind of setup. YouTube plays well as long as you use Safari, but for some reason sound won't play using Chrome browser.The bad - I first tried it while staying at a friend's house, and found the video choppy -- downloaded videos play smooth as silk on the laptop, but suffers from stutter on the TV. I thought it must be their network or something, and went ahead and ordered one for myself. But I have the same problem here at home, and I have a state of the art setup with high speed everything.And the real reason for such a low rating - Apple support has been a mixed bag -- the first woman I spoke with was snarky and rude and suggested I reset everything in my house and I found her completely unhelpful; the next person I spoke with was more helpful, and suggested I download the latest updates, which I did. They may have improved things slightly, but there is still this hesitation that gets in the way of a wonderful experience.  At least he gave me a case number, so I can call back and see if they have more suggestions. But I think this is a bug on their end, and one they should acknowledge.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Initially I thought to buy Roku but due to the easy interface of what apple had I preferred this ...I'm just loving itYou will enjoy if you have MacBook/Ipad

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: Maria Buechler
Reviews.Content: This was just as described and my daughter loved it. Packaged well too. This saved me from having to hook another TV up to my satellite.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Felecia Aegerter
Reviews.Content: Perfect for everything all in one place. I love having the ability to play anything from my iTunes, rent movies, watch netflix and enjoy all the many other apps that are on AppleTV and always being added!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic for Streaming HD content
Reviews.Author: Dave Porras
Reviews.Content: I love Apple products!The Apple TV is perfect for enjoy HD content (Music, Photos and Videos) in any No-SmartTV that supports HDMI cable.The Airplay feature is very comfortable because lets enjoy  my iTunes Library from my iPod, iPhone, PC or Mac.Fantastic!

Reviews.Title: hard to read guidebook.
Reviews.Author: arora
Reviews.Content: I wish they supply magnifing glass to read the guide. however was able to set it up without reading. One extra page in guide with larger font will be great help.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Meiling Chiao
Reviews.Content: You'll never say, " there's nothing on T.V." I love this product!!I've got two and cut my cable bill by 1/2.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV  YES!
Reviews.Author: mary huey
Reviews.Content: I wanted to flush cable TV.  Apple TV has given me far, far better viewing choices and has saved me over $100 a month in cable fees.  I love Apple TV!  It is also easy to set up and use so I would recommend it to any one, even those who feel intimidated by technology.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Joe Roddey
Reviews.Content: I bought two of them.  Allows me to have one system operate in two rooms.  Better than running wires through condo.

Reviews.Title: christmas gift
Reviews.Author: drice
Reviews.Content: one of the people on my list has been asking for this but I did not know it did not come with the cord to hook it up..but delivery was fast and no problem in ordering..thanks for the offer...Merry Christmas

Reviews.Title: Apple T.v.
Reviews.Author: tom reynolds
Reviews.Content: It has to be one of the best products I've bought in a while. I use it almost every day.

Reviews.Title: works great, but doesn't have Pandora
Reviews.Author: Unavailable
Reviews.Content: Pretty lame that it doesn't have Pandora, but otherwise, everything works. The apple version of Pandora (Apple Radio or something) sucks because it forces you to WATCH commercials and no matter what you do, the sound will keep playing even if you try to go to the home screen. Very annoying.

Reviews.Title: Useful device.
Reviews.Author: Brevemike
Reviews.Content: Would be more useful if you weren't locked into only Apple's formats and marketplace.But it does a good job as Apple's portal into your pocketbook.

Reviews.Title: be love
Reviews.Author: Khalid Alsaigh
Reviews.Content: i am in love with apple productit is my dream and when i used  i love it so muchsmall box with wonderful servicehelp me to show my mac in tvthanks for apple lool

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Wade and Karen Jenkins
Reviews.Content: I ordered the product from this seller because of the very competitive price.I was able to track the package and was informed of the shipping progress.When it arrived it was with-in the expected time frame promised.The unit was complete and powered up just fine.There were no problems. I would order again from this seller.

Reviews.Title: Makes everything easy
Reviews.Author: Angie Gibson-Pittman
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my Apple TV. I've had it about 4 months and my kids 5 & 3 can use this much easier than the Roku. Since we already have other Apple products, this seemed very intuitive to all of us. Love that I can listen to my music and see my pics on my TV at the same time.

Reviews.Title: Just what he wanted
Reviews.Author: Kim Kroll
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my son. He is very pleased with it. It does what he needs and is compact.

Reviews.Title: One for Every TV
Reviews.Author: Ron "RR"
Reviews.Content: Every single TV in the house should have an Apple TV connected to it. It is the most useful and user friendly device of all. Stream from iTunes, Netflix, etc without glitch. Most of mine are wireless, one wired. Running wired clearly helps but the experience is not poor on wireless. Radio pairs great with Airport Extreme/Extreme.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: M. Pang
Reviews.Content: I use this all the time and it's turned my TV into something that I use way more now. If you have a Macbook that is capable of Airplay, the possibilities are endless.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice!
Reviews.Author: Steve Steckert
Reviews.Content: user friendly and fun! I canceled my regular cable tv because of this. Works good with Apple phone app. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Lightening Delivery
Reviews.Author: Rae Tarrant
Reviews.Content: Incredible service. I received this item the day after I ordered it on-line. This is a gift for my son. Hope it's what he wants.

Reviews.Title: Good Product.
Reviews.Author: rodrigo
Reviews.Content: Netflix, Hulu, 1080p, AirDisplayenough said...I would love to see a dedicated player so you can insert an external HD an reproduce or even stream it with an HD on your Airport Extreme.

Reviews.Title: As the title hints
Reviews.Author: wang
Reviews.Content: As the title hints, our household is already well furnished with Apple products. And as it has been said in other reviews in this thread, it will be a much more positive user experience for people who have Mac computers, or iPad / iPhone / iTouch, for these last three can be used as remote controls with an excellent free app ("Remote") from Apple.

Reviews.Title: Own 2 and love them
Reviews.Author: BBWI
Reviews.Content: I have the fastest inet I can get which is about 50Mb down. Compared to a Samsung Smart TV with apps the AppleTV dominates. Compared to DirecTV with OnDemand the AppleTV dominates. Compared to the Netflix app on AppleTV iTunes movie streaming dominates. Compared to a Playstation 3 interface the AppleTV dominates. Samsung Smart TV lags terribly in the interface. Netflix app on AppleTV takes forever to buffer, stutters, and has limited content. AppleTV movies play within seconds, never stutter, and have all the new releases you'd expect. AppleTV even has content that hasn't hit theaters yet. If you buy an AppleTV it would benefit you to buy into the Apple ecosystem i.e. iTunes Match, Photo Streams, a Mac computer, and even an Apple WiFi Access Point. When you put all those things together everything just works. It may be a little more expensive upfront but it's worth it when it just works. The most I've had to do is reboot the AppleTV or open and close iTunes but after the last couple of software updates everything has been working brilliantly

Reviews.Title: I like it but...
Reviews.Author: Yedidya
Reviews.Content: I am an apple fan boy. I have mainly macs at home so I thought this is the obvious choice of media player to go with.Problem #1, for some reason it starts playing music at will consuming bandwidth.Problem #2, I had to type in my apple ID in 5 different places, I would like to just manage it from a mac on the network like I can do with my Roku.Problem #3 airplay doesn't work seamlessly with older macs.Problem #4 the sound some times plays on the mac and sometimes on the TV, I have yet to understand whyFor all fairness, I have also a chromecast and a 2 Rokus. From those three, I have to say that now that the Roku supports youtube, I think it is probably the best value for this cost.So what is good about it:1) The quality of streaming is probably the best of the three2) Airplay when it works is great for showing pictures, playing music and viewing content of your other apple devices.3) Ethernet and optical connections are very important for stream high quality to make best use of HD TVs

Reviews.Title: LOVE THE EASE AND CONVENIENCE OF THIS ITEM.
Reviews.Author: Betty A. Iams "Betsyanne"
Reviews.Content: This is a great product for combining my iPad and big screen TV. My high school senior grandson introduced me to Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV is fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Joshua Vengley
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. Great product for any room in the house.  Multiple apps to stream video. AirPlay is fantastic to watch my iTunes U videos for class.

Reviews.Title: Simple and intuitive.
Reviews.Author: Mark Taylor
Reviews.Content: Simple and intuitive. I'm no genius when it comes to hooking up technical devices. But I was able to get this up and running in no time.

Reviews.Title: A must own for any ipad owner
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: Seamlessly air plays ipad right onto the tvMany other apps really converts any tv into a smart tv, but  with Apple standards

Reviews.Title: Bought two more!
Reviews.Author: Cultech
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these this time. I liked the one I previously ordered so much that I got one for my two kids for Christmas. So, I bought three in total. Great product, especially because it give me more TV options than I already have. I live in the country and only have DSL and Dish so my TV options are spotty at best.

Reviews.Title: Miraculous concept
Reviews.Author: DebRDel
Reviews.Content: I love love my Apple TV I don't have a computer only IPad & IPhone I was happy watching Netflix or Hulu because my cable is very limited but after a while tablets can get hard to watch for a certain length of time.My first experience with Apple TV was at my cousins he has all new technology.So a few months later had to have went on Amazon it was a little les expensive than Apple so I happily purchased they also had the cables.I called my cousin told him I purchased & not sure how to install which was easy my cousin bought me for Christmas returned bought me another nice gift TMI Any how love love Apple TV and all Apple.

Reviews.Title: Great device & can play Amazon Prime videos too!
Reviews.Author: T. Tom
Reviews.Content: I can't believe I didn't get one of these earlier! It's a great device that I'm getting a lot of usage out of.Not only can I use this to play or display anything from my computer, but I can also stream Netflix and even use the Airplay feature to stream Amazon Prime videos from my iPad, iPhone, iPod or Mac to my TV! It works quite well.It's built quite well and the little remote that it comes with is metal, you can tell some actual thought went into the design of this product.Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Alec Sokso
Reviews.Content: I love my apple TV! I bought this because I had started watching netflix on my Xbox 360 and that was all fine and dandy until I went to college and stopped playing so many video games. Saves me money on Xbox live subscriptions!

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Jared Abert
Reviews.Content: Product is exactly as advertised. Great for Netflix or streaming anything from your laptop. Just wish it had NFL streaming and I wouldn't need my cable anymore.

Reviews.Title: A Must Have for Apple Users
Reviews.Author: Snowbird
Reviews.Content: Such a powerful little gadget.  And there are more and more services offered.  Indispensable especially if you have other Apple products

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Jonathan S Mayer
Reviews.Content: Has worked well from day 1 - no problems.  I ended up hard-wiring mine with ethernet to improve signal and reduce buffering.  Probably all about your LAN as far as your preference.  Like most Apple products, works well, no real problems.

Reviews.Title: Good device.  We play music, movies from Netflix and other, MLB network, surf the net and a number of other things
Reviews.Author: knowja "knowja"
Reviews.Content: Much better than viewing from a PC screen.  Works great with and all my TVs (60", 48", 32", etc)  Only downer is it control, especially initial set ups and initial logins to services, is best completed using a PC/Mac/iPad device.  The remote control works but keying in characters is difficult.  I liken it to texting using Morris code.

Reviews.Title: Almost enough to replace cable
Reviews.Author: MJO
Reviews.Content: Great at streaming content, a lot of great apps, Apple keeps updating for more content.  Showtime needs to get on the ball and put an app on there.  Amazon can be airplayed but you need another IOS device to do it.

Reviews.Title: Beats Older Version(s)
Reviews.Author: manypages
Reviews.Content: This unit replaces an older and more expensive version. I had to work out some problems and had Apple suggest a reset. So far so good. Also, it appears that an infrared button (attached for better remote connection) was at fault. A gummy substance from the fastener had gummed up the devices eye. Having removed the eye and doing a thorough cleaning of the face, along with the reset has helped dispose of the problem. Netflix off of this device is a great have for me. Be advised that Amazon's version of streaming is not available. Beating iTunes pricing on movies makes this understandable. A new blue ray box will get me around this eventually. Sooner than later, since I feel Apple, as rich as it is, gets far too much for its movies.

Reviews.Title: great little machine - but a few minor issues
Reviews.Author: Roka2 "mmx"
Reviews.Content: Absolutely great little machine. A bit idiosyncratic and frustrating at times, but we do love it. The search entry with the remote is the most frustrating thing. Also how the only navigation is via the "Menu" button which takes you up one menu level at a time (You can hold it down a couple of seconds and it will take you to the top directly.)Works better with the "Remote" app on iPhone or iPad. This lets you enter search with a keyboard.  Still, it would be nice if there was a real GUI with the REmote app - like allowing you to select your application directly. Also - now so many apps that navigating is a pain. They should give option to put apps in a "not used" folder. 98% of what we do is Netflix.Still - overall - we love it.One great thing - go to Apple Maps on the iPad (or iPhone) - go to flyover - and send it to your big screen. VERY COOL!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic product
Reviews.Author: SLB
Reviews.Content: We are huge fans of this devise, especially with the upgraded software which now puts iTunes Radio on your Tv and home theater.  We have bought 4 of these so far and giving them as gifts.

Reviews.Title: It is really coming into its own.
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I have had it over a year. The last 6 months have had some awesome upgrades done in it. They only add stuff to it that is relavent. HBO Go, Hulu, Netflix, and if you have an iOS device it is awesome.

Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: sdubb
Reviews.Content: It is a nice product, but my friend has the roku and that is good too.  I think that this product is nice but it does have trouble recognizing my pc at times.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: James Stevens "Avid reader"
Reviews.Content: Installed on a 24 inch ViewSonic monitor.  It works precisely as advertised.  But had to purchase an additional cord/adapter item to get the sound as the monitor does not have a tuner.This was bought so grandkids would be able to watch programming off an Ipad II and from internet.  Good product.The only downside is the remote is very small and darn easy to lose.  Fortunately, the local Apple store has plenty of remotes for about 20 bucks.Very pleased with this solution for tv for grandkids.

Reviews.Title: satisfied apple user

Reviews.Title: Thinking about cutting the cord?
Reviews.Author: Tony L.
Reviews.Content: I love my AppleTV. It provides an amazing service that makes it much easier to part ways with your monthly cable TV bill. For just under a hundred bucks, you get access to Apple's entire media ecosystem, including the hottest TV shows and movie rentals in HD. You also get access to apps like Netflix, Hulu, and YouTube to round out your entertainment choices. And since all of this content is on demand, you don't even need a DVR.Setup and operation couldn't be easier. Just enter your Apple ID, your WiFi credentials, and you're good to go. Once you're online, it's easy to find what you're looking for. The menus are easy to navigate, and while typing in search terms with the included remote can be a chore, you can search for content.The two main drawbacks are 1) you won't find a lot of live content on AppleTV and 2) you can't sit back and channel surf (though in some ways, that's arguably a good thing). A simple HD antenna can do the trick for the major networks, but for events like basketball, you might be out of luck. And while you can purchase NBA, MLB, and NHL packages for use with AppleTV, licensing agreements black out a lot of the games you'll want to see anyway.That said, the amount you save by using and AppleTV over your cable TV service can't be overstated. Even if you purchase four or five seasons of your favorite TV shows and rent a couple of movies, depending on what cable TV package you have, you could easily save anywhere from $500-$900 a year. That's a lot of money. And even if you do decide to stick with your cable TV subscription, movie rentals and access to Netflix and Hulu on your TV still make AppleTV a compelling purchase.

Reviews.Author: B. Moore
Reviews.Content: It's easy to install, plug-and-play abilities make this a great device to start enjoying out of the box. It's very easy to set up and works perfectly. The only issue with the installation is it's HDMI capable only, so if you don't have an extra one, be sure to get one to go with it.It lacks a few apps, most notable being Amazon Instant, although there is a workaround for the iPad and iPhone but if you use other Apple products it works seamlessly with all of those other devices, sharing your iTunes music, iCloud photos (essentially turns your TV into a large digital picture frame), and iCloud video directly to your television. The Airplay Mirroring feature, which broadcasts your computer screen, or video on your computer, directly to the TV is a good feature, although we experience some lag from time to time when we use it. I can't tell if it's an issue with the Mirroring or an issue with our WiFi network. We don't use this feature often but it's worked best for showing a large audience a YouTube video or something of the sort.Overall, we're very satisfied and would purchase again or as a gift.

Reviews.Title: apple tv, baby
Reviews.Author: Jon E.
Reviews.Content: I have two apple TVs now - one in my bedroom, one in the family room.What I like about the apple tv is that it's easy to use, like apple products in general. The user interface is easy - anyone can use it. Actually my 75+ year old father in law recently got one, and it's a breeze for him to use. Along with the remote control included with it, navigation of menus is really easy and apple-like. There's also an iphone/ipad app that you can use to control the apple TV, helpful if you lose the apple tv remote (the remote is rather small). The remote has 3 buttons - play/pause, menu, and a button for right/left/up/down/select. It's well made.I use it for netflix. We have netflix built into our TVs. But the user interface for netflix on the apple tv is slicker and easier to use than that on our TVs.The Apple TV has limited channels - not like the hundreds of channels offered on the Roku. I've never tried the Roku, but channel selection would be a good selling point for the roku. But the apple TV integrates very nicely with other apple products. You can use the apple TV to use airplay with your iphone, ipad, mac computer, apple airport express base station. You could use it to listen to music coming from one apple TV but piped into a tv hooked up with another apple TV. I use it to wireless transmit streaming movies and TV from my ipad to my screen via the apple tv. The only problem is that when doing this, the screen size doesn't take up the entire size of the screen.

Reviews.Content: I flew down south to visit relatives and my gadget GOD brother has everything! He showed me this and I instantly had to get one when I got home, now I don't want to watch regular TV!!!

Reviews.Title: Apple TV MD199LL/A
Reviews.Author: J. M. Carter
Reviews.Content: I love this for watching NHL and MLB. I did not want to pay the higher price for the hockey package with the cable provider, and satellite companies that I have been over the last 10+ years so I figured I would give the streaming a try. I was a little hesitant due to issues you sometimes see on your computer with delays, I am happily surprised. This works great, I have only had minimal delays on streaming to load up the show, but after it is going I have had no issues to this point. If this works this well over the next year I think I will look into cutting the cord on cable and test the waters streaming all my shows. The issues I see are: not a ton of options at this point with apple TV, but I just ordered a ROKU that seems to have a ton of watching options so I dropped my star rating to a 4 due to no availability to expand my viewing options on this unit.

Reviews.Title: very fine
Reviews.Author: K. Proffitt
Reviews.Content: This has improved our download experience over our early version Roku. So that's great. I love the streaming of videos from my phone. Haven't yet figured out how to use it to "mirror" my computer, which is one of the reasons we got this. But we just got this not long ago and haven't played around with it enough yet I presume.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: David T Bishop
Reviews.Content: The apple tv is very simple to hook up and use.  It is also very nice that you can use your iphone or ipad as the remote control.

Reviews.Title: Wedding Gift
Reviews.Author: A. Beatty
Reviews.Content: We love our Apple TV so much that we have given this as a gift twice.  I think its the perfect wedding gift for any couple with IPhones.

Reviews.Title: happy to have ditched cable!
Reviews.Author: RLOinAZ
Reviews.Content: the only thing i am not happy about with apple TV is that amazon instant video doesnt stream on it.  oh well, we still have hulu plus and netflix  so if something is exclusively on amazon, we watch it on the ipad.  totally worth the price paid, quick shipping, and really glad to not have cable!!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Neil
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV is an easy way to get videos, music, photos, and podcasts on to your TV. I edit home movies on my Mac and put them in iTunes where they stream to the Apple TV. When I start a show mid-season, I catch up on old episodes by getting them from the iTunes store.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: jp
Reviews.Content: Great quality, works perfectly and as advertised. simple  - just plug it in and use the simple intuitive remote. Brilliant.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Maggie V
Reviews.Content: Love the apple tv. Works great with my iphone! I am a huge apple lover and love how simple it is.

Reviews.Title: works great!
Reviews.Author: Becky
Reviews.Content: At first I was worried about buying Apple TV because its online descriptions and its paperwork did not indicate that it could do what I wanted it to do: mirror what was on a iPad screen. However, I talked with other people who have Apple TV and received assurances that it would mirror. I have been really happy with it. The only trouble is that, when mirroring, it sometimes stalls or gets out of sync with the images on the iPad -- not often, though.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have to say, sadly, the Apple TV changed my life. Definitely opened up worlds of new viewing possibilities (Netflix, Smithsonian, etc).

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Guinea Pig
Reviews.Content: When I received it the battery in the remote was dead. It had not been cleaned out of who ever signed into it before. Took forever to get here.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: I use it for netflix and for airplay.  it is almost a year and it is working fine.  if I didn't use it for airplay, I would buy a cheaper brand.

Reviews.Title: Simple to use works well AirPlay great feature with iPAD
Reviews.Author: Keith B. Silverman
Reviews.Content: Simple and easy to use, the AirPlay integration with iPad/iPhone works very well.  Selection of "channels" somewhat limited, you would get a lot more on the Roku.  But it was the AirPlay feature that had me get the AppleTV.

Reviews.Title: We set it up on the TV and very simple to make work 10 minutes.
Reviews.Author: joseph h mayer
Reviews.Content: We wanted to use our older tv as a smart  tv this works just great! Now my I pad can play on our tv and I phone.We love our pictures viewed on the tv from our iPad.

Reviews.Title: Apple TVs are an exceptional experience
Reviews.Author: EJB
Reviews.Content: Having had a Samsung Bluray player with apps, a Sharp Smart TV, and a Roku, I bought an apple tv for the office and realized how much more of an exceptional experience it is.  We moved to Apple TVs for our house after that and we love it.

Reviews.Title: okay
Reviews.Author: Stephen A Murphy
Reviews.Content: the video streaming is great but the sites to download from are limited.  If you want many different ways to stream content, look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: I love this thing. Instantly syncs with iTunes media puchases on same wifi
Reviews.Author: Brett M.
Reviews.Content: Typical Apple product, works with an all things apple to mirror media to your tv. Can see why you'd buy a roku or another media player since it has more applications available to it (Amazon Prime for example), but for people that have an iPad and/or am iPhone this just seems like the right choice.

Reviews.Title: Sleek. User friendly
Reviews.Author: Briella
Reviews.Content: Love this product. Much better than blu ray. Easy to use. I love it for netflix and renting movies:) great product overall

Reviews.Title: East to set up and works as described
Reviews.Author: CLINT GROSSNICKLE
Reviews.Content: Only used a handful of times so far, but the set up was user friendly and integrates well with iPad. Very pleased with the purchase and the price.

Reviews.Title: I'm so happy.
Reviews.Author: Amanda B.
Reviews.Content: I'm happy with my Apple TV . One thing , I think I got to learn how to used . I rent a movie and it took a long time to download .by the time the movie has expired , only see half  Of the movie.

Reviews.Title: This is a must have for those of us who use iTunes as your media source.
Reviews.Author: Oskar Contreras "tg8arc"
Reviews.Content: This device may have just been a small side project for Apple, but it is great if you use iTunes.  I have a combination of Mac and Windows machines running iTunes, and you can access all them and their libraries.  Also can access and purchase from the iTunes store and use iTunes in the cloud.

Reviews.Title: Great item to have
Reviews.Author: Lesli Haveman
Reviews.Content: I am sure this would be wonderful for so many more things but right now we are just using it to get Netflix movies. Love it! Easy set up and I am NOT techno friendly.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: SAR Indiana
Reviews.Content: Sleek easy to setup and use, first time user, like the way you can connect with other i stuff iPad phone, haven't figured out how to connect to PC yet

Reviews.Title: Love this. bought two!
Reviews.Author: Vincent Gabriel
Reviews.Content: I love the apple TV, i actually bought two of those one for the living room one for the bedroom. they work great and i mostly watch tv shows and movies on it. i'll sometimes stream from my mac as well. overall great product.

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm
Reviews.Author: Michael H Pan
Reviews.Content: It's a great buy, I'm very happy about it. I'm thinking buying another one for my other TV. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Still one of the coolest devices ever
Reviews.Author: M. Goyette
Reviews.Content: This was my third AppleTV, and it keeps getting better, all for 99 bucks. My home is an Apple world, and the AppleTV ties it all together seamlessly into my living room, and now in any other room since I have two others. I love being able to play my music, movies, Pandora, the new iTunes Radio, Netflix, YouTube, etc. all right on my home theater system and control it all from my iPhone or iPad. The ability to browse something on my iPhone or iPad and quickly throw it up to my home theater via AirPlay is just awesome.  My only beef is the lack of analog audio outputs that I had on my First Generation AppleTV. Almost all Zone 2 outputs on home theater receivers require analog instead of digital, so I find myself unable to play iTunes or Pandora through the AppleTV to my outdoor speakers. Other than that, I love this device. It sets up quickly and just plain works great.

Reviews.Title: Is it Worth the Hassles?
Reviews.Author: Tom Diaz
Reviews.Content: Like so many of Apple's products, this seems to come with many maddening singularities.  It required weeks of tinkering to get sound from Netflix, for example.  I still haven't figure out if or how I can watch videos on my computer without first loading them into iTunes, and, of course, my Kindle videos seem to be out of bounds as well.  I am not a "tekkie," so maybe these betray my own incompetence, but...you know what...I don't like buying hassles, which on balance this is.  I see some but not much net gain.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Steven Klusman
Reviews.Content: I have a smart TV but I like the apps with Apple TV much better. I especially like to mirror the IPAD on the TV to share things with others in the room or to show pictures, etc.

Reviews.Title: Awesome! Easy to use and set up.
Reviews.Author: Sarah Jean
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome and easy to use product. We have Netflix and hardly ever watch regular cable any more. I especially love the 'just for kids' section on Netflix. We now have a huge library of kids movies to choose from. There is tons of other features but that's all we have really used and it has been a great source of entertainment. I ended up buying an extra set of the cables so we can easily move it from the living room to the bed room.

Reviews.Title: A must have
Reviews.Author: nolenurse730
Reviews.Content: This is a must have for football season. We haven't even scratched the surface of what AppleTV is capable of. If you are having doubts, just buy it. You won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: Worth it!
Reviews.Author: B. Hettervik
Reviews.Content: Our son got us interested in purchasing the apple tv.  It is user friendly and we have used it many times.  The cable networks aren't putting out many good movies to choose from so this is an answer to being able to select good movies.  I would recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: I like it, but I don't quite love it yet
Reviews.Author: Crzykindluvr
Reviews.Content: I received my AppleTV two days ago and I really enjoy using the airplay mirroring feature, but when it comes to home sharing I noticed that when my MacBook Pro was put into sleep mode the Home sharing feature stopped working and I could not continue to watch my movie. It is super nice for showing people pictures and running some ideas across though. I will definitely be keeping it for that feature alone.

Reviews.Title: Great media add on
Reviews.Author: Dirk "Fuente"
Reviews.Content: I LOVE my apple TV.  It has made my television watching more productive.  I know that sounds strange, but it's true!  I now watch Ted talks and podcasts on my television.  The Netflix doesn't hurt either.Anyway I'm a big fan the only problem I have with it is it doesn't always work in hotel rooms.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: ami
Reviews.Content: We love Apple TV. It was very easy to set up and now we can access all kinds of programming that we did not have before. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised.
Reviews.Author: Lance Templar "LT"
Reviews.Content: Great product. Works as advertised. Compact, elegantly designed. Wish it could do more like play any video etc... but I knew what I was buying. No regrets.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Chibicat23
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift for myself.  Its awesome to have a small unit like this that works seamlessly with my iphone and ipad.  I think I will purchase a second one for my bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great Apps and Ipad interface
Reviews.Author: Andy Craig
Reviews.Content: Now that it has HBOGo, it has MOST of what I use (Netflix, Hulu, HBOGo, and WatchESPN).  It also is an easy interface to our iPhones and iPad.  Typical Apple mentality - I didn't take any thought to start streaming music and videos from our other Apple products.  I'd like them to sign on to the Amazon App next so i can stream Prime content.  Also, I wouldn't order movies off of it as they are several dollars more than through Amazon (which we stream through a PS3).  The remote is typical Apple - small, simple, and just works.  I got this before Google ChromeCast came out.  I would say there are regrets, but CC doesn't yet have the Apps, and the AppleTV interface (assuming you have apple products) works seamlessly.

Reviews.Title: This is a great addition to my big screen TV
Reviews.Author: John Allington
Reviews.Content: This is a great addition to my big screen TV.  Have a smart samsung TV with similar functionality... but nothing compared to the speed and interface of the Apple TV device.  Great for airplay from my Apple computer and my Apple Iphone/Ipad.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: seirra gal
Reviews.Content: What can you say, it is an Apple product and allows me to effectively integrate all my Apple devices.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Love this product!
Reviews.Author: Preston D. Robinson III "Preston D. Robinson III"
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is one of the simplest steaming boxes to use! I will say that it does not have all of the channels. I use Amazon Prime and you already know that app is not on there LOL. But everything else works great. When coupled with a Mac computer, you can steam your screen onto your TV through the ATV, which is a cool feature. And when streaming music from an iTunes library, you get large cover art that makes your tv look like a jukebox. That's one of my favorite uses, besides watching tv shows.

Reviews.Title: Works great with all thigs apple
Reviews.Author: Beiler Campbell
Reviews.Content: If you have a iphone or ipad this is great. Struggling to find an Android app that works as seamlessly.  The AirParrot app for your laptop is great works well, wished it was available for other smartphones and tablets that are not apple.It would be perfect if Apple included safari browser as well.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Big Guy "Rich"
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure if I like this more than my Google TV or not, but this one works very well.

Reviews.Title: Recommended for any TV Set up
Reviews.Author: Paul E Beard
Reviews.Content: As always apple creates great products that are simple and easy to use. I would be willing to recommend the apple TV to any one

Reviews.Title: Great little thing ...
Reviews.Author: Lacramioara Elena Tewari
Reviews.Content: I love to use it to stream from my ipad. Have not tried to see if it works from other devices, but ipad is enough for me...

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: dbkr
Reviews.Content: If you still don't have an Apple TV yet, and you have wireless internet, you should get this.  Netflix and HuluPlus are about $8 each.  Anyone can sync their Apple device to your tv to show movies, video and pictures.

Reviews.Title: Gift time
Reviews.Author: Stacie Marshall
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift for my boyfriend and he was stoked.  Needs and HDMI cable to go with it, however you can access Netflix, HBO to go, HULU, and youtube.  I wish I could play my amazon movies from it yet, but maybe they will get the rights later.  Good for playing slideshows of pictures from other apple devices, don't need a DVD player, you can just play the DVD in your computer and play it through the apple TV.  Can easily rent movies from iTunes and play all my music and videos from my computer.  Great for the price, good gift for men who like gadgets and Apple :o)

Reviews.Title: Still figuring everything out, but like it so far.
Reviews.Author: Dawn M Wilkinson
Reviews.Content: The Apple T.V. Is easy to install and comes with a remote if you order it new, but you will need to buy the cord to hook it up to your T.V.  I'd buy the one they suggest, otherwise you'll be ordering that separately. I love my netflix streaming through this and you can actually watch music videos if you download the VEVO app for free. Sometimes, you get lucky and find some movies for free and sometimes they cost an arm and a leg if you order them through iTunes. I like the Crunchy Roll programming. They're Korean T.V. shows that all seem to use the same actors, but very entertaining. Maybe on wrong on that review because I don't totally understand how the Crunchy Roll programming is set up. I still like it.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV works great.
Reviews.Author: VIPbeachBum
Reviews.Content: Just does not carry amazon prime video. Use it for YouTube and Netflix. Good all around device that will do the job it says.

Reviews.Title: It Truly is as Easy as 123 to Connect!!
Reviews.Author: Marcy
Reviews.Content: My brother insisted that I purchase Apple TV and I'm so glad that I did. It's beautiful!! I also have a Netflix account that can be watched through Apple TV it's awesome and Perfection will be attained when AMAZON adds there movies. ( Hint-Hint)

Reviews.Title: Like a lot of Apple products ...
Reviews.Author: Tech Custodian
Reviews.Content: Apple TV mostly works as advertised.  It's a little quirky in our environment but what it can do it does consistently.  My students are able to quickly demonstrate their work to others as am I.

Reviews.Title: Nothing Is Better Than Apple
Reviews.Author: Readicicco
Reviews.Content: This is the second Apple TV that I have purchased. Easy to hook-up and use and always reliable. BUY APPLE!

Reviews.Title: Miracle machine!
Reviews.Author: Fulton Lewis "FL in Florida"
Reviews.Content: It's like using my big screen tv as a remote monitor for my iMac. I am able to use my iPhone as the controller (although a very handy one comes with the Apple TV) and it lets me access a wide range of movies (including Netflix, etc.), plus my iTunes and iPhoto libraries and a lot more. A "must-have" for Mac owners.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: onsceneinc
Reviews.Content: Apple Products never let down. I have completely converted my home to Apple products and they simply perform better than any other similar products out there. Apple TV is great for the whole family and integrates with all our apple products.

Reviews.Title: love it..
Reviews.Author: Rad
Reviews.Content: enjoying the apple tv.....the main advantage of this is, it allows for airplay.......which doesn't require any cables.....and also has build in some apps.......loving it..

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Russell Appleby
Reviews.Content: It was a gift and the recipient loved it.  Since I have never seen it, it would be very hard to say more.

Reviews.Title: Love My Apple TV!
Reviews.Author: Potomac Hokie
Reviews.Content: If you are an iPad or iPhone owner and do not have one of these, get it now!  This is a great device and so easy to use.  I was also able to program it into my Logitec RF remote and put it in the other room with the other devices.  We love it and now it has Amazon streaming and HBO on demand!

Reviews.Title: My Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Laura Arenas
Reviews.Content: The best feature that I like about it is being able to view movies from Netflix.  Logging offf was a little complicated at first but I am getting use to it.  I thought that this Apple TV had Pandora on it and am disappointed.  I have enjoyed it so far.

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: john w. gould
Reviews.Content: I should have bought one of these magic black boxes when they first came out. Wow, what a cool toy.  If you have any Apple IOS devices, this is a must have.  Don't waste your money on buying a "Smart TV", spend the $99 and buy an Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: C. Morton
Reviews.Content: This is my second Apple TV.  I had one of the original ones and this is a definite improvement over what was a great product to start with.  My only complaint is that you can't stream StarzPlay or Showtime through it yet, just HBO.

Reviews.Title: Get it!
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: This device allowed me to tell my cable provider to gargle my sack.  My household has been free from an ever increasing cable bill for several months now, and we couldn't be happier.  I chose the Apple TV because I have a lot of Apple devices and the integration of features is great, especially being able to stream content from my iMac to my TV.  If I wasn't  already immersed in the Apple "eco system", I probably would have chosen the Roku unit, which has some nice conveniences not available on the Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Fantastical
Reviews.Author: nickel
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and use. Using an optic cord for sound through my receiver. I just had to ensues my tv speakers were turned off for sound to work on optic. So worth getting.

Reviews.Title: Love!
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: I love Apple TV! I dropped my cable TV for open air antenna and Apple TV.  Works great, I like that Apple updated the software occasionally.

Reviews.Title: Very nice and easy to use product
Reviews.Author: Winston Rojas
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is very good.  I use it a lot.  Apple makes your life easier on everything they develope.  Streaming on Netflix HD, HULU plus, HBO Go, are just fantastic apps.I hope all tv channel were added to the apple tv.Just Great.Winston

Reviews.Title: Best device I Bought recently
Reviews.Author: Luis Rojas Mendez
Reviews.Content: The AppleTv is a great product which we enjoy a lot in our family. Kids are able to stream from netflix and we can rent very recently movies in HD at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Love my apple tv
Reviews.Author: Nat
Reviews.Content: We keep moving it from room to room because we love it so much.  Obviously we need to get another one!

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: Prasad Abraham
Reviews.Content: Love the device.Easy to set up and get going with programsNo glitches noted in over 3 months of use

Reviews.Title: wow... so good!
Reviews.Author: Kal
Reviews.Content: i got the Apple TV and got ride of cable because this is so useful. Saving $80+ a monthonly negative is lack of sports but there are ways around that.

Reviews.Title: Meets my needs
Reviews.Author: P. Hackett "TechMan"
Reviews.Content: I replaced my FiOS set top boxes with this and an Apple TV, they both have their pros and cons but this one seems more flexible overall. The Roku offers lots of free channels and has a convenient 3.5mm (headphone) port where you can use something like a nice little 2.1 speaker setup to improve the overall viewing experience.

Reviews.Title: apple tv > life
Reviews.Author: Moose
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome product. Apple tv syncs with all my apple products (iphone/ipad) You can sit there and watch everything and anything and also mirror your iproducts from your phone straight to the tv... coolest thing ever. If your an Apple fan, this is something that is definitely worth the money. HIT THAT UP!!!

Reviews.Title: This is my second one.
Reviews.Author: G Edward B "Entropy: it's all downhill from here"
Reviews.Content: Although there are times when it chokes on streaming from the Apple server during high use periods,  if you pause the episode and get a drink, it usually has loaded by the time you get back. Great and easy to set up. I can even use my Flickr photos as a screensaver!

Reviews.Title: Works best with a subscribed service
Reviews.Author: chicagoblackhawks
Reviews.Content: Apple TV integrates very well with other Apple devices allowing you to easily stream videos or music to your TV.  Airplay Mirroring also works well for some things but not others.  For example, I originally bought this with the intent to stream Amazon Instant movies through my Prime membership to my TV.  That didn't work out well--I found out later that Amazon Instant seems to have some issues (even when just streaming directly to my Mac) that made for a bad viewing experience.Watching movies on the Apple TV through iTunes is awesome, but not very cost effective.  I ended up signing up for Netflix and that has worked out great.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Nastassja Lee
Reviews.Content: I love Apple TV, easy to install and start enjoying! Such a great product, with no hassle at all, thanks!

Reviews.Title: Great Product! Worth every penny!
Reviews.Author: Derek Bowers
Reviews.Content: This is a great media streaming device! The shipping was super quick and it arrived early! This is a great buy and I would definitely recommend to anyone! The best $100 I've ever spent!

Reviews.Title: greta item
Reviews.Author: Huie Douglas
Reviews.Content: It works and does what it is supposed to do.  How did I ever live without it.  This is a good product

Reviews.Title: So easy to set up and works great
Reviews.Author: Amanda Agard
Reviews.Content: I was not worried about the quality of the product but the setup was so quick and easy and networking was done in less than 10 min.  Great product.

Reviews.Title: Friend loves it, I like it too
Reviews.Author: Rwong "Rwong"
Reviews.Content: Well, I bought this for my friend not knowing too much about it.  It's a great entertainment tool.  I like how you can stream Hulu and play games on it too.  I'm not too familiar with the product but the smile it brought to my friend was priceless.  I think this is a great buy for anyone who is a fan of Apple.  Me personally, I don't have time to play with these new toys.  I will assume another update for Apple TV will come out which is why I usually hold out on a purchase like this.  Anyway, if you are looking for a great companion toy for your TV watching, this is great.

Reviews.Title: very good product
Reviews.Author: Marilee
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter and she was very happy with it. It was just what she wanted. Good product.

Reviews.Title: Great Addition
Reviews.Author: Gary In Texas
Reviews.Content: We have the first and second generation Apple TV devices.  These have proven to be very useful and very user friendly.  Great to be able to pull up movies or tv shows you've purchased and watch it on your big screen.  Also great for listening to your iTunes library through your sound system.  Will probably upgrade to latest version when released.

Reviews.Title: Very fast delivery
Reviews.Author: Doi Nguyen
Reviews.Content: My wife love it without connect cable from her iphone, she really enjoy it and will tell her friends too

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Sandip
Reviews.Content: It works great for me.As expected I could use it perfectly for  photo sharing, connecting with other home devices and online streaming.Sandip

Reviews.Title: Love the Apple TV
Reviews.Author: CaLeB2017
Reviews.Content: I got this as a birthday present, and I love it! It works with an iPhone but it works a whole lot better with a iPad! We have not had any problems out of it so far. It shipped within just a few days and was easy and simple to hook up!

Reviews.Title: A must-have
Reviews.Author: Leah G Fallon
Reviews.Content: We have full cable with on-demand and TiVO - and this was a critical addition. Apple TV lets us access HBOGO and a host of other programs that are phased out, on-demand.  The range of programs is excellent, and fills out the variety of shows we can watch.  It's compact size makes it an easy addition to the "media center" corner of the room.

Reviews.Title: The best ever...
Reviews.Author: Genuwine "JH"
Reviews.Content: So little money to receive such pleasure. The interface is excellent.  I enjoy using YOUTUBE for music and other video watching.  Love Netflix and many other programs.  For $100.00 dollars you just can't beat it for another viewing option.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Pol
Reviews.Content: it is very useful, it works perfect, it has good materials and I can enjoy all the different services that it has

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: LGergel
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend is able to watch his shows on Netflix in the loving room, and I can watch my netflix shows in the bedroom with Apple TV!

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: gjw
Reviews.Content: I'm so excited to have this.  It saves me $60 per month in cable fees.  You can even mirror your iphone to it and access the internet.  Great!

Reviews.Title: Easy and Great
Reviews.Author: Rjflower
Reviews.Content: Easy to set-up. Even easier to use. Love this product. I continue to find new ways to use it. Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Loves it
Reviews.Author: Anil Patro P
Reviews.Content: As per my expectation, happy with price and enjoyed it well so far. Packing was good too! It was good!

Reviews.Title: Excellent companion to other apple devices!
Reviews.Author: R. Darst
Reviews.Content: I have two of these now. One for the kids TV and one for my TV. I have another Blu-Ray player that utilizes WiFi for streaming Netflix or HULU Plus that is just plain inferior to the AppleTV. Not just the navigation, but the actual speed of streaming and drop-outs are awful on the DVD player. If you use any Apple devices, like an iPhone, Mac or iPad, the AppleTV is the way to go! Airplay works seamlessly and you can control it with the Remote App for iPhone/iPad and iPodTouch.

Reviews.Title: Met all expectations
Reviews.Author: Joyce Powell
Reviews.Content: We especially enjoy the TV shows minus the advertising and the podcasts and music stations on radio. Very pleased with our choice to purchase the Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Product recommended, very useful
Reviews.Author: ingequinpi
Reviews.Content: Convert your tv in a media center easily. The instalation and configuration is easy, This is a product very useful for the entertainment.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV Really Works
Reviews.Author: Barbara M. Molinari "Barb"
Reviews.Content: This little box is very easy to install  and easy to use.  We have two of them.  We use it primarily for streaming Netflix, but it is easy to purchase current movies and TV shows, too.  Also, the Smithsonian Channel is free and has many documentaries.

Reviews.Title: Airplay is awesome
Reviews.Author: Scott

Reviews.Content: The Apple TV works great! I love that I can hook my ipad up to it and stream videos along with my music!!

Reviews.Title: Its great!
Reviews.Author: Wilson Bao
Reviews.Content: There are other cheaper options, but this is the only thing that lets you have easy iphone/ipad tv output. It has some built in video apps, and if you have an iphone for the tv output, there's alot of possibilities.

Reviews.Title: Brand New, packaging perfect & delivered as promised!
Reviews.Author: Noel1212
Reviews.Content: Quality of this product met my expectations. It arrived on time, new, and in the original packaging. The product is easy to setup and easy to use. Perfect for anyone wanting to access internet on their tv. It's perfect and anyone can handle this technology!If mine were to ever break, get stolen, or lost in a move.. I'd definitely purchase it again!

Reviews.Title: THE BEST APPLE PRODUCT EVER!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Cindy L VanderMeulen
Reviews.Content: i am in love with this thing. iOS 7 is about to come out so im hoping the back ground will be able to change like on the leaked pictures.
