Reviews.Author: Maximo Jerez Gomez
Reviews.Content: Exellent performance, no complain. I've used it for two weeks. It has fulfill my expectations. I'd recommend it to my friends

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Judy Smith
Reviews.Content: Love watching netflix when nothing good is on tv and my husband watches baseball through MLB.  We also can watch videos from the tv on it too...but I don't know how to do that yet, my sons and husband do though!

Reviews.Title: HBO GO FTW
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Camacho "Macho Camacho"
Reviews.Content: I bought it for HBO GO and it looks excellent. The quality makes you forget that you are streaming the video.

Reviews.Title: Many uses, hate "typing"
Reviews.Author: Brooke Vertin
Reviews.Content: We use this for so many things, watching Hulu, youtube, itunes, etc.  It is small and usable, but we hate typing into it.  I keep wondering if there is an app for the iPhone/ipad so you don't have to type using the small Apple tv remote.

Reviews.Title: The best
Reviews.Author: deployed ariman
Reviews.Content: This apple tv is the best for streaming or purchasing items on ITunes. Netflix works very well also. small, affordible and exellent quality just like everything else from apple

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Steve Berger
Reviews.Content: Like all Apple Products...the best.  The only con I have is I wish it had more content for video shows.  Very easy to set up and use with great sound.

Reviews.Title: Very Good  Very Good  excelent idea from apple
Reviews.Author: Antonio lopez
Reviews.Content: Very Good  Very Good  excelent idea from apple, i love it with ipad and iphone is very beatiful product to use

Reviews.Title: Great price and works great!
Reviews.Author: Jerad Horning
Reviews.Content: As long as your videos play in iTunes, they will play on the Apple TV. I had seen so much online about jailbreaking the Apple TV2 or using Plex with Apple TV3, but you don't have to do any of that stuff if you are okay with the built in GUI and don't mind converting your files to mp4. I wish I could airplay more than audio from my iPad 1, but besides that, I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: GREAT product
Reviews.Author: AmazonReviewer
Reviews.Content: We have an Apple TV, and think it's wonderful! Everyone in our extended family has them too, and it's great!

Reviews.Title: Great gadget!
Reviews.Author: michael murphy
Reviews.Content: House full with family over Labor Day weekend. Great way for everyone to share their photos on the 60' TV. So easy to use. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Device.  Need Subscription Service.
Reviews.Author: SSS
Reviews.Content: Netflix has rather limited online content.  Apple has all the latest releases on iTunes.  When or when can we have an iTunes subscription service?

Reviews.Title: Nothing to say
Reviews.Author: Ethem Kaan Okcuoglu
Reviews.Content: If you are addicted to Apple products as I am, this thingy needs to be in your Apple ecosystem. AirPlay and AirMirroring are amazing features.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IS WHAT I SEE
Reviews.Author: nickcal
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV is great. I have one in three rooms of my house. I even keep one in my laptop bag for when I go on trips. Is it worth buying yes, very much so.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: leonardo montoya
Reviews.Content: excellent , I recommend this product. came at the right time . Its very practical, and this is good idea

Reviews.Title: Really love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Nhut Nguyen
Reviews.Content: This is one of my most favorite product that I ever ordered from amazon. My family and I watched all days. I have cancelled my TV service since I got this Apple TV because I got everything I want to see.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Edgar E. Allen
Reviews.Content: Meets all expectations , easy to set up and easy to use. The price was right and was delivered quickly. Couldn't be happier with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Movietvfan
Reviews.Content: Apple TV lets us watch movies tv use Netflix, watch videos from phone and show pictures! Easy and convenient!!  The kids use it all the time.

Reviews.Title: Better than Roku
Reviews.Author: Eric Brady
Reviews.Content: We have the Roku and now the Apple TV. The Apple has a better looking user interface and movies are easily made able to go fast forward or reverse, something the Roku has trouble doing. If you have streaming Amazon Prime then you need a Roku if not the Apple TV is a better choice. This unit can stream YouTube videos something the Roku doesn't and I choose to start my online "in the cloud" movie collection on iTunes rather than Amazon. For a hundred dollars, hard to beat the entertainment value.

Reviews.Title: Very Cool
Reviews.Author: Dalton Hurst
Reviews.Content: Very awesome i absoulty love it it is the best thing i ever bought i use it every day love it

Reviews.Title: Much better Netflix streaming interface than TiVo
Reviews.Author: Mark J. Stanley
Reviews.Content: We were dissatisfied with the interface between our TiVo premiere box and Netflix - wait times for our instant queue to load, fast forward function, etc.  I got Apple TV set up in minutes and we are extremely happy with the way that it streams movies from Netflix. It also has a great interface with my MacBook air using Airplay - a cinch to have it display whatever is on my laptop screen. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Mark T
Reviews.Content: Like the idea of being able to show people pictures  and video from my phone on my tv when we have a party !!!!

Reviews.Title: Best thing ever!
Reviews.Author: Deb Grosner
Reviews.Content: We are now able to watch the games on MLB, movies, TV shows we've missed, and with the update, iTunes Radio and Disney are now available.  Love this!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Home-TV Accesory
Reviews.Author: Rob Art "bob"
Reviews.Content: This AppleTV is a great step up from the original one (which I used to have until now). I've used this for about three months now, and it's just excellent. It hooks up to the TV via HDMI, and if you can get a mounting kit for it (about 15 bucks here on Amazon) it's not even visible as you can hide it behind the TV and the remote still works.1080p HD makes the image look great, and it hooks up to your wireless device to stream from either your computer or any online streaming service available (I use it primarily for Netflix regarding online streaming).Another use it has is streaming images and videos from your iPhone or iPad. You can set up slide shows using your images, show videos, or listen to audio from it. Everything is wireless- no cables required. You can also stream your Mac to the TV using airplay, also no cables!Even though the control is kind of clunky, it's small and gets the job done. If you have an iPhone or iPad, you can also control it using an app on these devices, which is actually extremely useful.I can't recommend this enough. Every house should have one on their main TV! And if you're a Mac user, it should be mandatory that you have one!

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Tammy Ladner
Reviews.Content: Love this.  My toddler loves being able to watch movies that I have on my phone on the big tv...in addition, my husband and I love sharing videos/clips/sports with each other without having to pass the phone around.

Reviews.Title: Nice little device
Reviews.Author: Darren
Reviews.Content: I bought this for the fact that it can mirror whatever is playing on my iPod or Mac laptop.  I have my old stereo hooked up to my tv so I can mirror Spotify music through the Apple TV onto the stereo.  It's a great option if your not interested in spending a ton of money on a new sound system.  I also mostly use the Apple TV for the YouTube and Netflix apps.  I've found that most of the other apps on it are useless to me.  Most of them require a subscription to use them.  I do enjoy the trailers app however as I don't have any TV reception where I live so it's nice to be able to see what movies are out.  It also will give you info on theater locations and show times which is nice.  As far as connecting it to your tv it's no problem.  Just plug the HDMI cable in to your tv port plus the power cable into an outlet and that's it.  You do have to also connect to your wifi network which shouldn't be a problem. It's a great little device especially if your already invested in other apple products.  If not then I've heard the Roku is better as far as content goes.

Reviews.Title: Love AirPlay
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: If you love AirPlay you love this one. Finally,  I can watch my EPIX channels right off the iPad to the big screen without even turning on of off the device.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Regina Harwell
Reviews.Content: I use it a lot for work and pleasure.  I am a minister and it is a great tool for visuals.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV best investment
Reviews.Author: Zoila
Reviews.Content: Best investment I could have made. I will never watch network TV again. Got rid of cable bill and also bought one for my parents. Picture always sharp and even works when wifi signal is compromised. So happy with this purchase, worth every cent - especially all of the ones being saved not having cable!

Reviews.Title: Family Fun
Reviews.Author: StaciSmiles
Reviews.Content: Technology is Ah...Mazing. This device is our Family go to on the weekends, or when there is nothing on T.V. A must have. Just be careful where you put the remote down at. Since it is so small & thin it can easily slide down in between cushions, or the wall.

Reviews.Title: Better TV
Reviews.Author: Will
Reviews.Content: This makes a hub for everything I need,and works very easy. It's great that all of my apple products can use it. I'm buying another one for my daughter.

Reviews.Title: easy setup
Reviews.Author: Gdadgd
Reviews.Content: Many of the reviews did not mention many of the things that I was concerned about.  I was interested in a faster method of viewing Netflix.  I did my research and decided on the Apple tv.  The setup was very easy, even for someone like me with only a limited technical background.  I used a hard wire connection with cat 6 cables and a HDMI auto switch so I could hook up both the ATV and a blu ray to one one HDMI port on my TV  The increase in speed from turning on the equipment to watching a movie on Netflix was simply unbelievable.  No waiting for 20-30 seconds or more for the blu ray to load.  It was almost instantaneous and the improved navigation was wonderful.  Coupled with the simple design and Apples reputation for quality make me very glad that I chose the Apple tv.  I wanted a system that would last and not give out in a year or two.  The final reason I chose ATV was for its ability to view my pictures off of my other apple products.

Reviews.Title: Same great user interface
Reviews.Author: E. Travis "etravis78"
Reviews.Content: Very simple device with a great user interface.  I use the mirror function with my MBP all the time to show friends and family home videos and photo's.  There is some latency with video, but I expected that.  Awesome for YouTube and Netflix streaming.  No complaints as of yet.

Reviews.Title: Get rid of cable
Reviews.Author: D.L.
Reviews.Content: Save a lot of money by getting rid of cable. Instead, get one of this streaming gadgets (Apple TV, Roku, etc.) to watch your favorite shows and movies on Hulu, Netflix, Redbox, etc.

Reviews.Title: AirPlay and home sharing really make this useful
Reviews.Author: Michael Wray "Casual Shopper"
Reviews.Content: I have found that I use this more with AirPlay to view steaming videos and listen to podcast from my iPad and iPhone, rather than trying to navigate the screens with the very basic remote.  The home sharing with your iTunes music and pictures is probably the 2nd best feature, as I can use playlist and let photo albums run on the TV.  This finally solved the anxiety of all the pictures that I wished were framed our in photo albums.

Reviews.Title: I'm in love
Reviews.Author: Dustin
Reviews.Content: I love it!!!!  The only thing I would recommend is them adding more airplay games on the App Store . Everything else I have no complaints about , it is the most amazing technology I've ever used

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Alphonso Dunston
Reviews.Content: I've been watching so much Beyoncé on my Apple TV it just doesn't make sense this product is so great thank you so very much for the fast shipment

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Salty
Reviews.Content: Great product, allowed me to get rid of cable and save money. Very similar to turning TV into a smart TV.

Reviews.Title: A great way to cut the cable cord!
Reviews.Author: Carmen Camacho
Reviews.Content: I love my Apple TV! It's super easy to set up and use. Just make sure you have a Netflix or Hulu Plus account, otherwise you'll be getting things with your iTunes account.This also works great with your iPod or iPhone (and in my case my iMac) great for playing music from my iPhone through the home theatre system - if I get a call, it pauses the music and then starts playing again when the call is ended.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic product
Reviews.Author: Dreamer
Reviews.Content: We got a box for streaming Netflix with our new flatscreen a few years ago, but it never worked properly. The cable guy told me I needed Apple TV. For the price, it is SO WORTH what this does for you. Never since hooking it up (relatively easy with my husband's help) have I had a problem streaming Netflix. It works great. The mirroring is nice too, when I want to send something from my MacBook Pro up to the big TV screen. Works like a charm.

Reviews.Title: great device
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: I love this thing if you use itunes netflix or hulu this device is great also it allows u to use apples internet radio with 50 million choices lol

Reviews.Title: a wonderful invention
Reviews.Author: happy amazoner
Reviews.Content: Except for not having a dedicated app for Amazon (they gave theirs to Roku) it is a super addition to your tv.  The device is sleek and the remote is simple.  It is a job apple does well - and roku does not.  The apple tv does not ask for any personal information and works perfectly every time all the time.  Upgrades can be made on the TV to the original apple tv.No complaints at all

Reviews.Title: Smooth
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Jans
Reviews.Content: Easy to hook up and use.  If you desire something to display your Ipad or iPod fun, then this is it.  It also allows us to play iTunes movies stored on computer...wicked...

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Roxy
Reviews.Content: Excellent and easy to hook up. I would recommend it to everybody. The control is user friendly. Love the screen saver

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Plevniak
Reviews.Content: So much to do with the Apple TV!  You Tube, Netflix, Airplay... Just wish Pandora was available. Great Product for the price.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Kenneth J. Keim
Reviews.Content: I bought this specifically for watching movies on tv that I bought on iTunes, but it turned into so much more. My wife started playing with it and was able to access shows in German for my daughter to watch. Great all around. Love it, I use it almost every day.

Reviews.Title: Get this AND a Roku
Reviews.Author: N. Hyland
Reviews.Content: Solid device. AirPlay audio is great and is not compressed like Bluetooth.Apple TV does not have all the channels of Roku but most of those extra Roku channels are junk! I also have two Roku boxes and the main plus is access to Amazon Prime videos. But that (small) addition is about it.Regardless, I'd recommend owning both devices as both are useful. For now. But Internet TV is undergoing some big changes in Fall of 2013 and, as expected, Apple seems set to lead the changes.

Reviews.Title: Does what I needed it to do, and then some!
Reviews.Author: Joseph M. Barone
Reviews.Content: There are other options out there for streaming media to your TV, but I found the Apple TV easy to set up, a breeze to control (especially with an iPhone), and able to stream even the largest of my movie files without skipping or stuttering at all. It offers a ton of subscription services right in the box, and anything it doesn't offer, I can stream from my other devices using AirPlay. Though not a perfect product, the pro's outweigh the cons in my opinion. (note: We own mostly Apple devices in our home, so our experience may be different than someone with out any. Haven't used it to stream from one of our PC notebooks yet)Pros:Easy set upiPhone as a Remote (great for entering in name/passwords for your subscription services)Tiny footprintFast streaming of networked media hosted on external HDGreat quality from subscription services (NHL is AWESOME!)Nice Screen Savers based on photos from your iphoto or photstream, or from Flickr searchesCons:iTunes does not support .avi movies without a work-aroundslight delay when changing song/movie using airplayNo Spotify/Pandora built-in - must stream this from another deviceNetflix layout is not as intuitive/pretty as other devices like the PS3 or some Blu-Ray playersWould be nice if it had a USB input for an External HD

Reviews.Title: I love Apple TV!
Reviews.Author: Oliver Chuo
Reviews.Content: This is a really great product! Integrates all your apple stuff with your TV easily.Despite of that, you can access:- Netflix- Vevo- Flickr- Youtube- Rent movies in iTunes- Access your iTunes library- and so much moreGet Apple TV and enjoy it!

Reviews.Title: Excellent device
Reviews.Author: Belt
Reviews.Content: Excellent device. Connection ease makes it a very versatile device. my daughter just 3.5 years, connect your ipad 4 and relayed their videos and cartoons. It is very easy to use and install

Reviews.Title: A very cool device.
Reviews.Author: Francis M.
Reviews.Content: I am not a big tech person, but this little Apple TV really impressed me, it's very easy to use and to connect, all you need is a HDMI cable, which does not come with the device, and connect it to any Hi-def. TV or component, and pair it up to your WiFi, and your ready to go, it also connects directly into your computer modem if you don't have WiFi, or wireless, the Apple TV only works on Hi-def. Tv's.

Reviews.Title: The Best Netflix Player, but limited Apps (only Apple)
Reviews.Author: A Customer
Reviews.Content: The best Netflix Player that I see! I have a Roku too, but this is faster and the quality is very impressive! The bad point is that you have the access only to Apple iTunes, and on Roku you have more options of apps.

Reviews.Title: Watch TV from iPhone, iPad or MacBook
Reviews.Author: DBL07.CO Web Design Columbia SC "DBL07.co"
Reviews.Content: Watch TV from iPhone, iPad or MacBook if you get past the proprietary Monopoly apple has on all their products it helps to be able to watch on a bigger screen. It works for keynote presentations or web design, or just playing Angry Birds Star Wars

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Max T. Nigh "Max Nigh"
Reviews.Content: Works fine , and offers a lot of entertainment value for little cost.  I am just learning how to use it the best way

Reviews.Title: Works well with wifi
Reviews.Author: Stephen
Reviews.Content: I bought this because of the appeal of sharing my sizable library with the big screen in our living room. The setup was a pain because of trying to use the remote for the pass-phrase, but the device has never overheated or ceased to work.

Reviews.Title: So Cool!!
Reviews.Author: Daisy
Reviews.Content: I love that the Apple Tv connects with all my other apple products (airport, iPhone, macbook, etc) and I really like the airplay function for games and music. I've had other smart players with the same apps, but the Apple TV works so much smoother and loads faster than Roku or my smart Blu-Ray, which is great! I'm also really glad I can stream all the movies and tv shows that I've bought in the past, that I don't keep on my hard drive, which saves a lot of precious space on my laptop (which I almost never use for watching TV). Most of all, the definition of the streaming quality is very good. I have it hooked into my bedroom TV right now, which is old so I can't say it's super HD yet, I still need to put it to the 1080p test...but I'm confident that it'll pass. This is a great addition to a high quality Tv's, because the new smart tv's are often a bit slow, and can't connect to other devices the way Apple Tv can. All in all, it makes life a bit easier and my TV watching experience a bit better!CON: The remote is pretty small and sleek, but I often find myself needing to type something in, and it's a total b**ch! I downloaded the remote app to type stuff in, but I don't really like it, sometimes my phone is unreachable! Mostly, I'm usually too lazy to find my phone and open the app. You can connect a bluetooth keyboard, but  I don't want a whole keyboard to sit around, I just wish they had a small remote with a qwerty keyboard on the back to make things easier.

Reviews.Title: Convenient!
Reviews.Author: Tiffany M. Ramos
Reviews.Content: I love having the apple computer for my television.  It is easy to use and very convenient compared to connecting my laptop to the television through the HDMI cable.  I have had some problems with the connection and apple being unable to upload or connect to the server.  Customer service recommends keeping the apple computer on your t.v. stand or shelf away from the modem and sound bar.  There seems to be interference with the connection and apple computer will not connect.  Frustrating.  I didn't think I would have to worry about where to put the little box, but apparently apple is sensitive!! I would recommend this product, but just be careful where you place it to prevent any connection issues.

Reviews.Title: This thing is really, really cool - and useful
Reviews.Author: Williams
Reviews.Content: I finally decided to buy an Apple TV even though I have a blu-ray player that supports the usual apps.  Our family has a lot of Apple products (Macbook Pro, iPad, iPhones, ect), so this thing really added to the collection.  To me, the biggest advantage was the AirPlay option.  If you have an iOS device, being able to mirror what you have to your TV is truly amazing.  It's fast, intuitive, and very appealing.  The Apple TV is small, energy-efficient, and has been a great addition to the Apple family.  As other people have said... if you have multiple Apple products in your home, this is a no-brainer to purchase.  If you don't have them, I'd probably recommend going with a Roku or some other streaming tv device.  I think I'll be able to get rid of cable after using this thing with Hulu and Netflix.

Reviews.Title: Great Addition
Reviews.Author: Karen P. Young "odyssey reader"
Reviews.Content: I don't have any complaints, easy installation (it's an Apple) product! Once plugged in and did my settings it was ready to go.

Reviews.Title: Awesome...
Reviews.Author: Srini
Reviews.Content: The best small device...Most important thing is airplay...works perfectly and very useful if we have all the apple devices. waiting for split screen features coming this fall...

Reviews.Title: IT's one of a kind
Reviews.Author: Randolph Williams
Reviews.Content: This little box do a lost for me in the army... It's easy to hook up and work good in Germany...

Reviews.Title: I DID NOT KNOW SUCH A SMALL BOX COULD ADD THIS MUCH ENJOYMENT.
Reviews.Author: Eugene C. Riley, Jr
Reviews.Content: IT WAS EASY TO INSTALL. AND TO GET UP RUNNING.  ONCE A PERSON SEES IT I FEEL THEY WILL WANT TO BUY ONE

Reviews.Title: Product features and capabilities
Reviews.Author: Humphrey Muturi
Reviews.Content: No Netflix access in Africa, disappointing. Otherwise, it works well for the other capabilities provided herein, AirPlay feature works wonders. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!!!
Reviews.Author: Mabel Wang
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this Apple TV. very convenience for using Airplay with my iPad or notebook. user friendly, great cool product!!!

Reviews.Title: LOVE Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Cessna89811
Reviews.Content: This apple TV supplements my apple ecosystem. Great user interface.  Able to stream movies from Netflix and use Apple Airplay to watch stuff (pictures, videos) on all our iPods, iPads and iPhones.  Plus it also supplements our free over the air (OTA) tv since we dumped basic cable TV.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Paramedicc
Reviews.Content: I use it pretty much every day ranging from using it for music to netflix or watching a long youtube video. if you have a mag you can send music, video to the apple tv instead of watching it on the computer, you can also control it from any ipod,iphone,ipad as long as they are on the same network  my dad liked it so much i got him one for fathers day and he really enjoys it as well..must get

Reviews.Title: Works Great.
Reviews.Author: David B. Camarillo "notredave"
Reviews.Content: At first, it had a hard time connecting with my iPhone.  But by the next day or so, it worked great!  Been happy with Apple TV ever since.

Reviews.Title: We use ours all of the time
Reviews.Author: The Hughdns
Reviews.Content: We love using our AppleTV and have completely moved from having cable to watching movies and TV through Hulu and Netflix, thank to this bad boy. The only downside (and not sure it's an Apple problem) is that we'd love if Closed Captioning was available.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: B. Kara "BK"
Reviews.Content: I love it. Got rid of cable, got Netflix and using Family HBO & ESPN access. this is all we needed. Recommend to everyone...

Reviews.Title: I love apple
Reviews.Author: Gerardo E. Pombo Vazquez "Mexicanpurchaser"
Reviews.Content: I recommend this Apple TV.  Good price, good quality and as Apple Brand...Excellent.  Just the remote is a difficult to handle.

Reviews.Title: Mirroring alone is worth it
Reviews.Author: Michael R. Dawson
Reviews.Content: Mirroring is so easy with Apple tv.  One touch of a button and I am sharing my photos/videos/presentations.  The only downside is that the audio does not transfer as well, just the video.

Reviews.Title: Great interface
Reviews.Author: CM "Better things to do but this is more fun."
Reviews.Content: We use Apple TV to augment our normal service (AT&T;'s U-verse) and watch both iTunes and Netflix content. Works great!

Reviews.Title: The only things missing are Amazon Prime and NFL Network apps.
Reviews.Author: Christopher M Rash
Reviews.Content: I bought a $10 app for my computer (now a free feature in OS 10.8) so I can stream anything from my desktop.It's compact and does everything I want it to.  The remote app for my iPhone and iPad makes losing the tiny remote irrelevent.All I know is that I'm completely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great concept, but only if you have Netflix, Hulu, etc
Reviews.Author: pb
Reviews.Content: I've streamed a few movies from my iPAD to here, but I see the bigger value in this if you actually subscribe to Netflix streaming, Hulu, or other streaming media.  We don't---since we have HBO and Netflix DVD.  To make best use of it, better to have streaming subscriptions.

Reviews.Title: Easy way to watch TV
Reviews.Author: Erin
Reviews.Content: We use this for watching Netflix and iTunes purchased content on the TV.  The only way it could be better is if it had Amazon Instant Video content.

Reviews.Title: I can get just what I wanted and not paying too much
Reviews.Author: chanyou chow
Reviews.Content: With this, I canceled my cable service. It cost me less than the monthly cable program fee and still have all the programs I wanted.

Reviews.Title: excellent product but needs a cable
Reviews.Author: Michael B.
Reviews.Content: The product is excellent.  Mirroring works perfect from iphone & ipad.  Even though I have an older mac (thus can't mirror from the computer), I can still link the computer to the apple tv to view movies or listen to music that is on the computer.  The netflix interface is very nice. The problem I had with the product is that when I first installed it, it crashed during the update. To resolve the crash you need to connect the apple tv to your computer.  The cable to connect it to the computer, however, is not supplied.  None of the apple cables I have would work. Luckily my brother had a cable which he uses to connect his android phone to his computer that worked.

Reviews.Title: Very useful! Best client for Netflix and Hulu+
Reviews.Author: Walter
Reviews.Content: This is the second AppleTV I bought! As nice and small from the outside, it comes now with more apps: HBO GO, Netlfix, Hulu+, music videos and sports.I would love it Apple would include Spotify or Pandora, but I know that would be like shooting themselves I the foot. :P.If you have a large iTunes library, this is the way to go. Using iTunes Match you can play your songs anywhere. What I really love about videos is streaming those from the cloud (everything you had purchased in iTunes Store).Regarding apps like Netflix, is awesome, I can from any title look for actors and director and then look for more from the selected one. I haven't seen that on Roku.I really recommend it. Just take in consideration it might be more expensive than most of the streaming boxes in the market (considering the lower amount of channels). However, the streaming quality is awesome and practically you can take your movies and tv shows with you anywhere!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use, OK value
Reviews.Author: J. Kahn "NumberOneSon"
Reviews.Content: PROs:* Easy integration with a house-full of Apple products* Simple, pleasing menus* I like the ability to watch movie previews, in which hope springs (albeit fleetingly) that a given flick won't suckCONs:* I would have liked to have had greater connectivity with the internet at large, like Google Chromecast

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Just the way it is!
Reviews.Content: This is a very easy and simple Apple device to use. It makes your home entertainment centre complete. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Upgrade from older model.
Reviews.Author: TMentuis
Reviews.Content: I have long had and used the old white model, with built in hard drive. It worked well, but i had issues. Mostly sync speed and app support. This model seems to have handled those issues. Speed is fantastic and the array of Netflix and similar apps available on it makes it an all line one media device. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good. Could use some extras.
Reviews.Author: A. Customer
Reviews.Content: Solid performer. Easy to install and integrate with existing A/V setup, home networking was a breeze.Biggest problem: Lack of 3rd party apps. Unlike the Roku, there aren't very many "channels" or apps that you can add to customize the experience. The built-in apps are good but not great (Internet Radio app is terrible).

Reviews.Title: Great Device
Reviews.Author: Tally Fisher
Reviews.Content: Works awesome with my Iphone.  I can put what ever I want on my TV for everyone to view.  ..

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Mad Max
Reviews.Content: Have a lot of enjoyment from this purchase. Easy to set up and use with my Ipad. Prefer watching Netflix from this box rather than the app on my TV. Like looking at picture and movies from my Ipad.

Reviews.Title: adds tons of features to any tv
Reviews.Author: ALK "AK"
Reviews.Content: apple tv is a great ad-on to any tv. Although apple still claims it's a "hobby" product this box is way advanced. Since now the google chromecast is out you can really see how advanced apple tv really is. There are not too many devices in such small form factor that pack all these features.I highly recommend Apple tv for anyone.We use it at home to stream various services as well as in the office to run our digital signage, it's great.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV little box
Reviews.Author: sigma 7
Reviews.Content: It works fine, but must restore if power is interrupted.  We just found that out last night, after being gone on vacation for three weeks.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Sal
Reviews.Content: Awesome product, I love apple tv, I use it all the time. I can watch youtube, hbogo and lot of other stuff as well as I can play my videos and music from my computer hard drive

Reviews.Title: Great product...
Reviews.Author: Freestyle_7@hotmail.com
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Apple TV because my tv was not a smart tv and I needed access to Netflix and did not want to purchase a gaming console.  I have been very satisfied ever since.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV is amazing
Reviews.Author: Jason Hicks
Reviews.Content: $100 for a device that does so much (and continues to get more features via software updates on a regular basis). iTunes movies/tv shows in HD (both own and renting with your Apple ID), HBOgo, Netflix, Hulu, you name it.I am obsessed!

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm, love it
Reviews.Author: Kayak David
Reviews.Content: As I live in an ipad, iPhone, iMac world this little device brings them all to my large screen TV. People crying about Amazon video not working have not heard about airparrot for the Mac.  That program allows me to watch my Amazon movies and other videos on my TV.  Also my new Vizio smart TV has Amazon built in so I'm covered.  Airplay also works great with a service called Aereo that we use for local stations.  I just ordered a second device for my wife to mirror her ipad onto the flat screen she has upstairs.  Anyway I'm very happy with this purchase that I bought along with the new one i just ordered on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Replaced a boxee, never turning back.
Reviews.Author: chrisazonian
Reviews.Content: The interface could use some better options here -- I would love to have a tile interface for browsing on-network media, like the Boxee's. But a very simplistic interface isn't really a problem here, I'm just comfortable working with something a little more complicated.I liked my boxee a lot -- like I said, I much preferred the interface on that --- but the boxee is a labor of love. It often just stopped working -- either would inexplicably fail to play some media files, or wouldn't be able to load a remote network directory...But this is an Apple product. You plug it in, and it just works. No hassle, no frustration, no cursing. Oh, and it's cheaper, too.

Reviews.Title: Plays shows
Reviews.Author: BG "Bob G"
Reviews.Content: But has it's limitations. Your computer must be on with ITunes running which is a negative & you can't add aftermarket software which is a major negative. On the other hand it plays well & your movies of reasonable quality will look just fine on even a large TV (I use a 65 inch model) because of the ability it has to step pictures up to hi def.

Reviews.Title: Lovely!
Reviews.Author: Shez
Reviews.Content: I love this product. Great sound, great picture, great quality overall. Seamless integration with my computer's itunes library, my ipad and the internet. It works perfectly in Nigeria. Downside, is not enough content on it. Apple should open it up to more content providers and allow users download whichever provider they want just like apps on the app store. Also would be nice to have a browser, so you can stream video from any website you want. That's why i give it a 4.

Reviews.Title: Great for what it is made for
Reviews.Author: Lars
Reviews.Content: The only reason it does not get a full score, is the lack of streaming from external servers / NAS devices.

Reviews.Title: Best ever!!
Reviews.Author: maiseymae "reading teacher"
Reviews.Content: Highly recommend this! Haven't got cable this is all we use!! Love photo streamingon large screen!! Might want to add another to my second TV

Reviews.Title: Streaming on Apple
Reviews.Author: Howard S Fredman
Reviews.Content: The device was easy to install and more-or-less intuitive to use.  At first we had problems with streaming -- but that turned out to be a problem with our cable company and not the device.

Reviews.Title: quick delivery
Reviews.Author: nat P
Reviews.Content: the actual product was a gift for a friend. so I can't tell you how well this one works.But I love mine!

Reviews.Title: As Advertised
Reviews.Author: L. Brozek "Luke"
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup.  Works like it supposed to. Netflix works much better on apple tv than on the PS3.  Looks great.

Reviews.Title: Works amazing
Reviews.Author: Saul Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: It's awesome. Recommend that everyone gets it. It's an awesome device. Plus with the new upgrade software, they have added more channels. Now I can enjoy all my movies and tv show on the big screen.

Reviews.Title: 2nd one.
Reviews.Author: W. M. Greene
Reviews.Content: Love these things. Able to stream movies from my iMac and Macbook pro. The family can enjoy movies with me.

Reviews.Title: If you want to stream iTUNES ON YOUR TV
Reviews.Author: Philip Holden
Reviews.Content: I have a Roku and a Logitech device so I guess I'm not surprised that when I got a Mac, I also needed Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product
Reviews.Author: Peter Mucci "PeteMucci"
Reviews.Content: What can I say but this product met 100% of my requirements... the main requirement was to access Netflix.. and the quality is just awesome...

Reviews.Title: Just Awsome
Reviews.Author: Flubber
Reviews.Content: What can I say if you own an Apple product then you must get one of these. Best thing out there for seeing your pictures on TV.

Reviews.Title: Awesome, I love it!!
Reviews.Author: Richard E. Crance "Rich in Phx"
Reviews.Content: This is are second Apple TV for another room.  It is great, love the new HBO to GO.  It would be nice if Apple added the NFL Sunday Ticket

Reviews.Title: A fantastic upgrade to the motorhome
Reviews.Author: John Simonson
Reviews.Content: I put the Apple TV in the motorhome to connect all of my devices to the TV making road trips just like home.

Reviews.Title: What a great way to watch TV and Movies
Reviews.Author: Andrew J. Haglund "Andrew"
Reviews.Content: This is such a simple solution. Instead of plugging a laptop into the wall, and then plugging the laptop into the TV –– you can just stream everything in a very energy efficient and space efficient package with a great interface. Yes, you need to pay for everything (Netflix subscription, HBO subscription, pay for iTunes movies and TV) but it works very well. In addition, with iPads, iPhones, and newer Mac, you can put whatever is on your display onto your TV, wirelessly. It's a great device!

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Robin Haggerty
Reviews.Content: No problems at this time...  Is doing the job that they said it would do...  Would recommend to a friend or business...

Reviews.Title: Apple love.
Reviews.Author: Gino Alberti Flores "seri"
Reviews.Content: Well not really, but this my second Apple TV. This product is easy to use and it matches my decor.

Reviews.Title: Simply Excellent
Reviews.Author: John Delacy
Reviews.Content: Plug in this simple little device and it will not only transform your television into a streaming video device, but may change the way you watch TV!Apple has changed the way we acquire and listen to music, and with the help of Netflix, iTunes, and Youtube, your viewing possibilities are endless!ProsStupid simple setup.Small form factor.Ethernet/Wifi connectivity.HDMI/Optical audio out.Low power consumption.A remote your parents will appreciate.Built-in Movie rental/store.Easily associate your iTunes Match account and listen to your music library.New features and functionality through firmware updates.Price.ConsLimited to iTunes and Netflix (for now).ReviewWith competing Roku, Sony, WD, and others breathing down their neck, Apple's Apple TV stands tall against the competition. With a rock solid interface, intuitive interface, and access to your purchased iTunes movies and music; if you are okay investing in the Apple ecosystem, this is a winner!Setup of the Apple TV is a snap. Plug in the unit, and simply enter your iTunes credentials to unlock all of your purchases and transforms your television into a modern streaming device.The remote has four (4) buttons! The simplicity of your interaction with the Apple TV compliments the simplicity of the interface. The interface may lack the bells and wistles that other systems may include, but ultimately promotes searching for and enjoying content.With rentals hovering in the $3 - $7 range, and HD or Standard movies starting around $10, some may be able to ditch their expensive cable service. Very happy with my Apple TVs! Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: THIS WAS A GIFT AND HE LOVES IT
Reviews.Author: shopinful
Reviews.Content: My son wanted this Apple TV for his birthday.  He tells me it works as advertised and really likes it.  Easy to install as well.  So, I just might get one!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Matheus Machado
Reviews.Content: is great, im recommend for everyone...the best i had ever...and coming fast, i really happy...is awesome thing ..i love it..

Reviews.Title: Loved it!
Reviews.Author: Phyllis Gibson
Reviews.Content: Worked great!  Client support was excellent! Would highly recommend this for netflix streaming - best birthday present ever - Thank you

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Bluedog
Reviews.Content: Great for watching streaming NETFLIX.  Well built and a quality product.  I would definitely recommend this for anyone to try!!

Reviews.Title: Great little product.
Reviews.Author: Daisy J Moreau
Reviews.Content: This is my second Apple TV.  So convenient to watch movies.  Now I have one in the den and one in the bedroom.  So easy to use ipad and watch on big screen just by using Apple TV. Free shipping is always a plus with Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Less than 1 year
Reviews.Author: Vellokat
Reviews.Content: Less that 1 year after purchasing this product we are regularly having issues with intermittent connections when using Airplay, Hulu, Netflix, etc

Reviews.Title: Can't live without it!
Reviews.Author: Leon
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is one of the best creation that a man/woman could ever have. It's so HD and so easy to use better than all those product that was mimic on this device.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!
Reviews.Author: Ivan Baptista Lopez
Reviews.Content: Is an excellent family entertainment device!Netflix works very fast and is very friendly interface!!If you buy it, then you'll want one for every room of the house!!

Reviews.Title: What a great product!
Reviews.Author: Connor Brady
Reviews.Content: I want to keep this brief and to the point, because there have been hundreds if not thousands of reviewers before me.I personally have used this product hundreds of times since I purchased! I use this to watch YouTube videos streamed from my iPhone, and I also love watching Netflix TV Series like lost from my Apple TV. The product is fantastic and I have no complaints!I would purchase this again with no doubt.

Reviews.Title: Apple Rules!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Wegis
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with the Apple TV and would recommend it over any of the other comparable products out there. Perfect it is not, but darn good for what it does.

Reviews.Title: One step closer to ditching my cable bill
Reviews.Author: V. Wright "buzz buzz"
Reviews.Content: My son-in-law recommended this so I had him install it but that seemed pretty simple if you have the hdmi cord to connect it to the television set.  The unit itself is small and inconspicuous, with a small remote which controls it.

Reviews.Title: great i love it
Reviews.Author: kkamel
Reviews.Content: this is by far the best thing that i have bought months ago all you need is in this little device. although i have a bad internet connectionnetflix, hulu plus, youtube, radio are working perfectly. its totally recommended

Reviews.Title: Perfect for streaming from computer to TV
Reviews.Author: Mista B
Reviews.Content: I bought the Apple TV so I could stream movies from my computer to the TV and it works great.  It does come with some apps but I really don't use them.  Too bad you cannot add apps to the Apple TV.I purchased my second Apple TV for use with a soon to be purchased big screen TV.Apple TV in combination with a Roku antennae works good.  Now I have to hunt down an inexpensive wifi connection.  That might eb the most difficult thing

Reviews.Title: If you're not a Mac house, get the Roku.
Reviews.Author: B. Smith
Reviews.Content: This thing was awesome out of the box.  Now, after several "updates" I want to throw it out of a moving car.  During playback audio will completely drop out.  To get it back you have to rewind and play again.  In the middle of a show a black screen with dialogue saying "error can not play content" will just suddenly appear.  You have to restart the show again.  I've had the error screen appear twice during one 20 minute show.  And of course if you try to reset the box to factory settings and original OS version, it won't let you unless you have a wireless connection because it automatically re-installs the latest updates.  Keep in mind all these playback issues occur using Netflix.Because everything I own is Mac I give this thing one star for Airplay and a second star for the iTunes radio/podcast playback.  I do love those two features.

Reviews.Title: Great product, easy setup
Reviews.Author: R. Rudoff "Buckeye in FL"
Reviews.Content: Love this product. Got it mainly for Hulu Plus, Netflix and MLB. Have MLB and Netflix already on my LG blu-ray but the picture can't compare to this. Setup was simple and haven't really tried too much of the Air Play but it is quite easy too.

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality, simple to use
Reviews.Author: Kevin Campbell
Reviews.Content: I considered going with a Roku or similar device, but chose Apple TV as there's no material price difference and for anyone with a number of Apple devices there are real advantages to this over the others.Setup was very simple, and I have no signal problem from my WiFi access point at the other end of the house. Straight out of the box both Youtube and Netflix apps are very straightforward to use, and picture quality from both has been very good. The ability to use your iPad or iPhone as a remote keyboard makes navigation easier.If you're invested in the Apple eco-system there are of course many more advantages; access to your iTune library, airplay screen sharing from your Mac or iPad - all the usual goodies you expect when you stay in the Apple fold.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Monica Carrera
Reviews.Content: This is the best product for a great TV experience. I can see YouTube videos, shows, movies and just discovered a super variety if music. We barely even use our cable anymore.

Reviews.Title: Loving this Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Bwwilson
Reviews.Content: Went ahead and got this and my wife and I are loving not having to pay for cable. We watch Sky news all the time and get international news and weather-a nice feature. Also hooked up to Netflix streaming and downloading from iTunes.Also we had an issue with the icons and we had to call Apple. They gave us great customer service and they fixed our issue and we were able to get back to watching very soon. Apple is a great company all the way around.

Reviews.Title: We use this more than I anticipated...
Reviews.Author: ZeroBoy
Reviews.Content: I bought this mainly to get access to Netflix and Youtube.  Now we use it all the time to stream iTUNES content/playlists coupled with slide show of pictures from my computed via WiFi...sounds great running through our BOSE home theatre system.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV rocks!
Reviews.Author: Enrique
Reviews.Content: As an apple fan, I bought one or two apple tv's every time I can for selling to my family and friends..I love this product!

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: Mar Saav
Reviews.Content: It's really what I expected, it is very useful and greatly increases the options in TV besides it is very nice.

Reviews.Title: Ditch cable
Reviews.Author: CHRISTINE
Reviews.Content: Easy setup.  Only had it a couple of months and already has new programming available.  If you have an iphone, looking at your pics and videos on the TV is super easy.  Works great with netflix and hulu+.  I don't miss cable at all.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV is awesome
Reviews.Author: Kenneth A.
Reviews.Content: I love Apple TV.  Watching rented iTunes videos, while more expensive than Redbox, the streaming quality is great.  Also, the Apple TV streams Netflix so much better than my Sony Blu-Ray....the Sony gets alot of pixelation and the Apple TV doesn't.

Reviews.Title: It works great.
Reviews.Author: David Egan
Reviews.Content: We also have a samsung blue ray that we use to view Netflix. That thing is so slow. The apple tv is farther from the router but it works flawlessly. I haven't tried to download pandora on it. I'm nit sure that's available. That may be the only drawback for me.

Reviews.Title: You need to add AppleTV to your Apple eco System.
Reviews.Author: Leticia Sanchez Garzon
Reviews.Content: I purchased this at the Apple Store specifically to connect to different client HD TVs to display my Keynote presentation. Setup is very easy. Once your laptop and the AppleTV are on the same network, in typical Apple fashion, everything just "sees" each other. After a very easy set-up, it's just one click and your laptop display is mirrored on the television set.Most people purchase Apple TV as part of their entertainment system and it definitely did not disappoint in that area. The Netflix and YouTube apps operate flawlessly. Very clean, sleek design for both. Unfortunately (and the reason I cannot gove it five stars), AppleTV does not include a browser like Safari and there are limited apps available, and no means of downloading others.But, if you have an iPhone, iPod or iPad you can display videos using their browsers onto the television you have AppleTV connected. So, no need to catch up on old Episodes of your favorite show on your tiny laptop screen or hunched over your desktop. Display it onto your television screen through AppleTV. I love this feature because I can watch online foreign news channels without increasing my cable bill.Definitely worth the $100!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: kp
Reviews.Content: No problem hooking the Apple TV up...streams my iTunes to my TV with no problems...I would recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV Takeover!
Reviews.Author: Mike Perlatti
Reviews.Content: Since getting this device my eyes have opened up to all it can do.Gameplay with up to 3 others so far.Just need iphone to stream video and music.It has taken over my living room.Easy to hook up.Kids look at me lovingly.Sure that won't last long but my new found toy is here for good!

Reviews.Title: Fabulous!
Reviews.Author: N. P. Beekman
Reviews.Content: I use it mainly for streaming Netflix but love it! No access charges to use it! Am looking forward to streaming the digital movies I have on my computer!

Reviews.Title: Apple TV  - Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Bill in Michigan
Reviews.Content: I find the Apple TV to be a fantastic product. The Netflix app is the best I've seen, very slick and user friendly.  I agree with several user reviews who find the included apps limited, however if you use Netflix, iTunes, Youtube, etc. then this little box can't be beat.As far as networking and download speed, I use AT&T; DSL Elite which is capped at 6 mbps and I rarely have buffering issues.  Anyone who uses a cable modem should be aware that you are sharing your cable node with many users so during periods of heavy use your performance will suffer.A recent update added HBO Go!!!

Reviews.Title: Apple t v
Reviews.Author: Fredrick Todd
Reviews.Content: Apple t v is small work great,this is more than I through it would be.i recommend this for anyone this is a 10star

Reviews.Title: Exactly as Advertised
Reviews.Author: Marc Versley "mvers"
Reviews.Content: This was easy to install.  Great picture and sound quality.  Movies look and sound fantastic.  I would recommend this to anyone with an iTunes account

Reviews.Title: I don't see a purpose for this product
Reviews.Author: Statman
Reviews.Content: The setup was easy and the Apple TV works well with Netflix. However, I already had no less than ten devices (four computers, one tablet, two smart phones, one game console, and two DVD players which worked well with Netflix. I primarily bought this for "home sharing" and to see what else it was capable of. Well, it has few other capabilities that are of more than passing curiosities to me, and the home sharing works horribly. I just spent about a half-hour getting the Apple TV to play a movie through home sharing. Five minutes into the movie, it stopped and displayed the message "To access your iTunes library on Apple TV, turn on Home Sharing in iTunes on your computer." Obviously, "home sharing" is already turned on. Another ten minutes of tinkering and (hopefully) I'll be able to watch my movie. This problem didn't seem to occur when I first bought the Apple TV two months ago, but it seems to occur every time now. Extremely frustrating. If you want to access a streaming service like Netflix, the best solution is to connect a computer directly to your TV. You should also be able to access multimedia files directly from your home network, without the added hassle of iTunes. The simplest solution fr streaming is a DVD player, which would be far more functional than Apple TV at only two-thirds the price.

Reviews.Title: Loved the 2nd gen, ordered 3rd gen as a present for family member
Reviews.Author: Keith S. Napolitano
Reviews.Content: I personally own the second generation of Apple TV, and I absolutely love it.  The way it so easily integrates with other apple devices makes it that much better.  In addition to the vast apple store for tv shows, movies, rentals etc... if you own any apple products, Apple TV makes a great addition!  Couldn't recommend more highly!  My family member is already in love with it and has only had it for a few days!

Reviews.Title: Make sure you have good internet
Reviews.Author: joshua turner
Reviews.Content: Bottom line is that APPLE TV is nice but it is only as good as your internet service.  If you don't have HIGH speed, don't bother with this.

Reviews.Title: Love Apple, but it could be better
Reviews.Author: Kayla
Reviews.Content: Full disclosure: I'm an Apple junkie & rarely dislike an Apple product. My only frustration with this is that only Apple ID can be used to control the Apple TV. This is annoying for a mixed family with music, apps, etc. on different devices. Yes, it is easy to log in to the remote app with the one Apple ID, but I really would prefer that weren't necessary.

Reviews.Title: Nice Purchase
Reviews.Author: Lynn Kennedy
Reviews.Content: I first bought a ROKU for accessing Amazon Prime but wanted another device for the other TV. I decided to go with the Apple TV. By using a remote desktop app like splashtop or logmein you still can share your movie playing on your computer through your ipad to the Apple TV..quality is not to bad. I still need to try a full movie, but feel it will work fine

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Robert Tynes
Reviews.Content: Easy hook up and interface! I would recommend it, especially to anyone who is familiar with ease of use of Apple products! You can display slide shows directly from your iPhone or iPad! So easy!

Reviews.Title: Great little unit
Reviews.Author: epps83
Reviews.Content: More polished interface than the roku.  The integrated power supply makes it heavy enough to keep it in place.  The roku is so light that the cables move the whole unit.

Reviews.Title: Perfect media center
Reviews.Author: Dunham
Reviews.Content: Love the Apple TV. Now that HBO Go is compatible, it easily beats out the Roku. I actually use this in the office to throw video up to the main screen, it's fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV 8 months later
Reviews.Author: R. Allen
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Apple TV after the HD version came out, V3 I suppose.  What I like is Netflix.  I won't watch Hulu, because you get less for the version you pay for than the free one, plus all the same commercials over and over drive me up the wall.  So, basically it's a Netflix box with a little bit of AirPlay or Air Parrot.  I rarely use this because I am too lazy to start it on my computer and move to the living room.  It's easier to watch Amazon Prime on my computer or my iPad.  I don't watch baseball (gasp!), NBA, or NHL, so those are worthless to me.  Also the just added ESPN and HBO are also totally worthless, as I have DirecTV.  What's with that?  So, I am being generous with the 3 stars only because for what it does for me, it does well.  I only wish Apple would quit treating ATV like a hobby and get serious about offering content.  There are reports of a deal with Time-Warner coming, but once again, worthless to me as I can't get TW. Apple, talk to DirecTV!! Please!!Bottom line, if all you are going to do is Netflix and AirPlay on your home network, it does this VERY WELL!  If you want more, maybe the new Roku 3 is the way to go.  I am thinking about adding one just for Amazon Prime Video and the slick headphone remote!

Reviews.Title: love me some apple tv
Reviews.Author: Courtney Livak "ceejay"
Reviews.Content: I really like being able to pull up a yoga video on youtube throw it to the tv and have my own yoga classes in my living room. Also we watch HBO GO and netflix almost every night.

Reviews.Title: Love these things
Reviews.Author: ~ Kyle
Reviews.Content: Already own other Apple TV's and love them, needed this one for mobile presentations from my ipad - using the wireless screen share option makes it a breeze to do without being tethered to the tv.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: if you watch movies and is a mac user you must have one - bought two one for the office and one for the house.

Reviews.Title: The 1!
Reviews.Author: Magix
Reviews.Content: I wrote a few reviews about the other streamers and I always said just buy apple tv instead!The best design, Check!The best software, Check!The best ease of use, Check!The best option to watch anything you like, almost Check! (no amazon prime at the moment, 7/7/13)The best resolution, Check!The best screen saver, Check!The best of the best, Check!!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!!
Reviews.Author: PDaws
Reviews.Content: Makes me wonder why I wasted so much money on satellite TV!  I highly recommend this as either a replacement or a supplement!

Reviews.Title: How are you living without it?
Reviews.Author: Zachary Burns "Computer Guru"
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd one I've order - one for each room.  Easy and connects easily to all my favorite media outlets and itunes libraries

Reviews.Title: worked as expected
Reviews.Author: payrez
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my fathers house to use on a tv to play hbogo,etc on.  worked. very happy with the results

Reviews.Title: I like this product very much.
Reviews.Author: Richard W Ulmer
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV is a very nice small low power product which allows me to connect from my MacBook Pro to my tv screen and audio from anywhere in the house, over the wi-fi. I can show hi definition video or just my computer screen, in 1080p. It also will play audio files from my iTunes account, although the iTunes program must be open on whatever computer you want to play from. The TV/Movie connections are almost all subscription, which I'm not going to use. TV shows from the iTunes store are priced at $3.99, which is too high unless there are special circumstances.

Reviews.Title: Best B-day present for a my bff
Reviews.Author: Bml
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my friend on their birthday and they loved it. Works perfect loves to use it for music, movies, videos. Great device.

Reviews.Title: This is my second one!
Reviews.Author: K. Ryan
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my living room, already had one for my bedroom. It's a must for anyone looking to fully take advantage of Apples offerings!

Reviews.Title: Definitely worth buying!!!!
Reviews.Author: HappyinBuckeye
Reviews.Content: It's just wonderful!  The shows I can watch are unlimited. I've stopped relying on my DVR so much (which often couldn't handle all that I wanted to record).  Easy to install. Comes with little remote and it's so easy to operate.  Definitely, definitely worth it.  I then ordered a second one!

Reviews.Title: I love my apple tv
Reviews.Author: SK
Reviews.Content: We use the apple tv to stream content from our phones andhome network. This thing is too super cool.

Reviews.Title: Another Winner
Reviews.Author: Michael L. Shanks "MikeLee777"
Reviews.Content: I have put off buying this forever, finally took the plunge last week, wish I had spent the $99 years ago.  If you have an IPad, of Mac in the house, then this is a wonderful device to have.As with all Apple devices, it works seamlessly with all of them, easiest set up I have ever had, connect HDMI cable, power cable, and login to your accounts.The minimalistic remote is a joy, three button, wow, only potential problem is it's so small.Works on 802.11 g/n, guessing they will add 802.11ac soon, amazing performance on such a small unit.HIGHLY recommend

Reviews.Title: Apple TV MD199LL/A
Reviews.Author: Mitchell Henry
Reviews.Content: I'm a huge apple products guy anyway but surprisingly it has taken me a while to purchase the apple TV.  I finally bought this product less than a month ago but I'd have to say so far, so good.  I'm pretty satisfied.  It has lived up to the billing to this point.

Reviews.Title: Worth it if you use Airplay, better alternatives otherwise..
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: I purchased the 3rd Generation Apple TV at Best Buy as a means to Airplay music around the apartment with my home stereo. I also wanted to use it for services like Netflix, Hulu and Amazon to replace my Playstation 3 for media (I had every intention to sell my Playstation). I'm glad the eBay sale fell through because my intention of using Apple TV as my primary media device fell short.Problems:1. The Apple TV insists I rent HD movies, purchase HD TV shows because that's what I indicated during the setup. The problem with this is that I don't *always* want to watch something in HD. I don't *always* feel like paying the extra $1. Big budget films, season finales are where I splurge for the HD quality stuff. The lack of easy toggling between HD and SD without having to trudge through the settings or purchasing the SD version from iTunes on Mac/iPad first is a real pain and not convenient compared to Sony's Playstation Store which allows options.2. Where is Amazon? Amazon cuts deals with Sony, TV makers, Roku and other devices but can't manage their way into the Apple TV? I don't care who's fault it is, Amazon Prime Instant Video needs to be part of the Apple TV ecosystem. I already pay for prime and don't want to spend money for Netflix which would be completely redundant just so I could watch older seasons of TV. You can work your way around this using airplay mirroring on a Mac, but not an iPad which will block the image with airplay.3. Where is the media server capabilities? Sony has Playstation Media Server, which will push out content from your PC to the Playstation in HD without an issue. Apple TV will remedy this by Airplay Mirroring but it's completely picky about the formats. MKV is a no go, you'll have to spend a few minutes converting the file to an MP4 using MP4Tools (shareware program, works fine) for stuff to function. When it finally airplay mirrors to the apple TV i'll occasionally see stutters in the stream, though it's tolerable.4. Where is the ambition / extensibility? Where is the application store, the iOS game store? There is potential here for Apple TV to be the next big ecosystem for Apple. Like the iPad they could have opened it up for Apple TV specific apps to be built by developers to push their videos and content. But instead they've taken away the jailbreak method, and have very slowly opened up services over time. Apple TV right now just feels like a little box to bide the time while they work on the real successor to their TV ambitions.-----Those are all criticisms, but I'm not fully down on the little box. It's definitely attractively designed. The processor chip inside the Apple TV is smooth and opens services quickly compared to the aging Playstation 3. The interfaces for Hulu, Netflix and the iTunes services are attractively designed and easy to use. The Airplay functionality is mostly very impressive and music sounds great with the fiber optic sound output to the speaker system. The video might be struggling with the wireless N technology, but when things are at their best, the HD Airplay from the Mac looks great. It's pretty inexpensive and that's something you don't hear a lot about an Apple product. Roku is cheaper with more services, but iPhone, iPad or Mac owners should find serious value in Apple TV with Airplay and ecosystem benefits.-----I can't recommend an Apple TV to the non-Apple crowd. There are much better media options. As a streamer, Roku has more services and a cheaper price. For a premium experience the Playstation 3 has a nice Blu-Ray player, Amazon Prime Streaming, Netflix, Vudu, Media Server and video games which really makes it the most well rounded machine for every day use.Where the Apple TV becomes a worthwhile purchase is when you've attached yourself to the iTunes ecosystem for TV/Movies or you want a nice way to mirror videos/pictures/movies from your Mac/iOS devices. There's nothing quite as rad as watching a video game trailer on your iPhone and hitting the Apple TV icon to immediately see it in HD on your TV with your sound system. It's just too bad Apple never went for a home run with this little box.

Reviews.Title: First Impressions - Needs more Content but Great for Up to Date Apple Users
Reviews.Author: Taylor Walker
Reviews.Content: About me, I'm a tech guy with 30 years experience. Over the past 2 years I have heavily invested in the Apple Eco System. I have IPods, an iPad 2, a 2012 Mac Mini, and now Apple TV (newest version). It's been well stated that there is not a lot available for content outside of the Apple Eco System as compared to Roku, for example.I've hardwired the ethernet connection to my router from the Apple TV, as suggested, to avoid overloading my wireless capability at home.I'm running the latest version of the OS on the Apple TV, Mirroring my Mountain Lion and Ipad screens is very handy.I've updated my review and added a 4th star because the 'wired ethernet causing content load failure' issue has been addressed. The device needs to have more content available and have it available from the Itunes store. That's the only drawback at this point that I see, and it costs 1 star...I have seen one 'bug' in the current version of the software. Loading select Vimeo content caused an error message stating that the content wouldn't load because my TV didn't support the 'HDMC' protocol (an encryption protocol used by newer HDMI devices). Recommended fix was replugging my Apple TV into the TV. That didn't work. Cold booting the Apple TV did fix the issue.As others have stated, this is a no brainer if you already have Apple products, especially newer ones. If you don't have Apple products, then unfortunately at this time, I could not recommend this product to you, it simply wouldn't have the value per the cost to you... That's the bottom line.

Reviews.Title: Needs more content and has issues with sound
Reviews.Author: jason
Reviews.Content: I bought this apple tv awhile back and I was planning to take it back but the 15 days return policy passed. So I got stuck with it. The good things are that it streams really well and is pretty simple to use. The bad side is that it has way to little of choices for streaming compared to Roku. No appstore, no adding stations, way too controled and limited. The airplay seemed like a good idea but in reality Ive got other things to do with my computer besides streaming movies. My kids like to watch programs from some other sites that apple tv does not support. I like to use my computer for other things. I thought airplay mirroring would be really great but it is not very smooth many times. There are so many glitches while air playing through my macbook. Sound problems and video quality have been issues. I cant really recommend apple tv right now. Apple offers limited channels its super limited. Roku offers i believe around 750 channels.  When you turn on your apple tv youll see movies, tv shows, music, dedicated to guess who, yep Apple to buy or rent movies or tv shows of which you can find many on netflix or Hulu with your membership. The hulu plus on the apple tv does not give you all the content you get on your computer. I don't know why, thats even more limited. Amazon prime is not supported along with others. I wish I would have thought sooner. I suggest going with Roku or another streamer at least until apple gets a better selection. Apple makes great products but this particular one is lacking pretty big in available content and as I said earlier the mirroring features with airplay have not worked very well. Consider very well before you invest in apple tv.

Reviews.Title: Great addition to any home entertainment system
Reviews.Author: rhody86 "Sally Chaffin"
Reviews.Content: I bought the Apple TV a little over a year to round out my home entertainment system.  I had previously purchased a Roku and was frustrated beyond belief. Unless my technological savvy partner was available, I was dead in the water with Roku.The Apple TV is clean design, intuitive and has added a new dimension to my viewing. I watch many movies - free if possible, and the Apple TV opens lots of options.

Reviews.Title: Love this
Reviews.Author: DEWDENVER "DEW"
Reviews.Content: Using this all the time now.  Getting rid of our cable DVRs and just using this.  Both kids took to college for easy access to Hulu etc.  Doesn't have Pandora naturally but everything else we use.

Reviews.Title: I'm an Apple guy
Reviews.Author: Todd Mittness
Reviews.Content: Works great with all my Apple products.  Apple has continued to update he software, which Apple excels at.  I also own a Roku, and I now prefer the AppleTV.

Reviews.Title: Apple Tv
Reviews.Author: Jorge Maciel A. Dias "Jorge"
Reviews.Content: Great Product!Fulfilled with your propose and surprised about your connectivity with apple devices.No more words to say about that.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Streaming Experience
Reviews.Author: Satis Superque "SSQ"
Reviews.Content: The AppleTV offers a beautiful, easy-to-operate streaming experience that's likely to be far better then your Smart TV's built-in options. The unit is as reliable, fast and trouble-free as you might expect from Apple. The AirPlay streaming feature with other apple devices is especially fun and useful.My only complaints are related to the lack flexibility; it is not possible to add streaming services that Apple has not yet partnered with and not possible to remove the streaming apps that you may not use. Pandora Internet radio is notably absent.

Reviews.Title: Love Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Harold S
Reviews.Content: This is the greatest addition to my entertainment center.  We use it more than cable by a long shot, between HuluPlus and Netflix.

Reviews.Title: Great, but where's the analog audio jack?
Reviews.Author: B. Garland
Reviews.Content: It's an Apple TV -- like most Apple stuff, it works great. Very fast menus, loads content fast, easy to use, etc. BUT -- there is no analog audio. Only optical digital. I don't know why they didn't put a combo jack on this like on the Airport Express. So stupid. Not everyone has surround sound digital audio systems these days. I had to buy an external DAC -- costing another $35 when Apple could have just added an analog jack to the Apple TV for $2. There's no good reason to leave this out, it's just annoying.

Reviews.Title: No more paying cable for regular TV
Reviews.Author: first timer
Reviews.Content: This Apple TV was so easy to assemble that a child can do it. Provides many ways to watch TV, listen to music and much more.

Reviews.Title: best purchase ever
Reviews.Author: CJ Brashear
Reviews.Content: there are so many things you can do with this device added to your TV. Best of all with Airplay your TV can become a mirrored computer screen and with the new Maverick coming out we will be able to add a 2nd computer screen to out TVS with airplay and drag and drop applications to clear the main computer screen ( mainly a app developer or game developer feature ).

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Vel Ham
Reviews.Content: I love my Apple TV!  I like how the Netflix and other apps are just on the Apple TV and you don't even have to use an iPhone or iPad for them.  Netflix also loads a lot faster on this than our Samsung Bluray players - it's very fast actually. And the recent update put HBO Go app on it, so now we don't have to use an iPhone or iPad for that either and it also loads very fast.  I love how small it is and the fact that it has a network port in case wifi isn't readily available (such as having to pay for it in a hotel room).  I bring it with me when I travel and hook it up to the hotel TV - great for catching up on my shows or entertaining the kids.  I only wish it had more onboard apps, but that may come with future updates.My 82-year-old grandma also has an iPad and Apple TV and uses both regularly and loves them.  The interface is very simple.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Theresa Hawkins
Reviews.Content: Apple TV gives you options like a plethora of Internet radio stations to listen to, FLICKR, and sports subscription channels.The downside to Apple TV is the price, but despite that, I'm glad I spent nearly double what I paid for my Roku on this device. It's sleek interface runs smoothly (update it when you hook it up so you have the latest firmware) and quickly, and Netflix, HuluPlus and YouTube look great when played on the Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE AIR PLAY!
Reviews.Author: Chris S. Bizzelle
Reviews.Content: These are a nice cheap solution to whole house audio! Every room we have a TV in we have an Apple TV. Its great to have our entire tv show and movie library in every room. When I clean the house listening to music, going from room to room I just hit a new airplay location! If I airplay from my Mac book pro I can airplay to more than one apple tv so then it really is whole house audio!!

Reviews.Title: Super useful, especially with iPad
Reviews.Author: BrownyBrownie
Reviews.Content: So, it isn't quite the Swiss army knife that a Roku media player is.  It's really locked into the iTunes eco-system.  But if you're already invested in it, especially if you're using an all-Mac, all-iOS setup, this is probably the most value-driven thing that Apple has ever put out there to make your devices even more cool.  I love that I can be commuting home, watching a video on my iPhone, then as soon as I walk in the door, throw the video over AirPlay to the Apple TV and keep watching on my television.  Seamless.  And I love being able to mirror my iPad on my TV.  And tied to my Mac's iTunes library, I can listen to whatever music I want over my TV's speakers, instead of using a separate speaker system for my laptop.  I also love that I never need to go to another clunky appliance to watch Netflix -- the Apple TV's interface for it may be the most elegant out there.  Yes, I wish it did a bit more -- like play files from non iTunes folders -- but it's still pretty great.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic !!
Reviews.Author: Po the panda
Reviews.Content: Looks like finally I have what I needed. I am using airplay to stream from my macbook, using vlc player to stream dvd. Works like a charm. Great product at this price.

Reviews.Title: I love my apple TV!
Reviews.Author: Kristy H. Thompson
Reviews.Content: I was trying to stream movies via my ipad but wanted to see them on my TV and heard about apple tv.  I had no idea what to expect but absolutely love it now!  it was so simple to set up and I love how i can access my itunes and videos from it too.  If you are a iphone or ipad person I highly recommend apple tv!

Reviews.Title: Dream Machine
Reviews.Author: Matt Whitaker
Reviews.Content: I bought he Apple TV after much consideration between it and Roku, I found it best suited what I was seeking. My family and I have a Roku in the game room where the kids can easily access Netflix and watch their shows, while in the media room we have the Apple TV. We are a complete "iFamily," so the Apple TV is perfect. It shares with our computer, iPhones and iPad flawlessly. With the recent addition of ESPN Go and HBO Go to the channels the Apple TV is by far the best choice. And no, you don't have to watch everything or anything on iTunes to get the most out of the Appe TV. If you don't have any other Apple products, the Apple TV stands on its own like a champ. Like all Apple products it hooks up easy and the interface is beyond user friendly. Highly recommend for persons who have other Apple products, as well as for those who want to enjoy a wide array of programs, as Apple continues to add new channels.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: M. Espriella "Mac Fan"
Reviews.Content: I bought this because my vacation home has no TV service (by choice). I hooked this up and its working great with my DSL internet connection. I bring up sling box on my laptop and watch anything I want on my cheap 32 inch TV through Air Play display mirroring. Best of both worlds. Netflix and ESPN  work great directly from Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: I'm an Apple guy.
Reviews.Author: Douglas Miller
Reviews.Content: I've been very pleased.  Since we own Apple products the ease of setup and use is just like any other Apple product.

Reviews.Title: A great addition to my home enertainment system!

Reviews.Content: I bought this based on a friends recommendation.  I am more than pleased.  I ordered it on Saturday, Amazon shipped it promptly and I had it set up and working by Wednesday afternoon.  I particularly enjoy watching Lost via Netflix!

Reviews.Title: Apple TV 3

Reviews.Content: Awesome hardware if you are an Apple fanatic , I currently have several apple products and they work seamlessly together including the AT3.I would recommend this product to a friend

Reviews.Title: Thoroughly enjoy Apple TV

Reviews.Title: Brilliant product -must have.

Reviews.Content: Brilliant product with great functionality. I think it's quite adequate to convert a normal LED to a smart TV at an unbelievable price with this product.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
