Reviews.Content: This was a gift that my son wanted to give my daughter-in-law for Mother's Day.  She loved it.  Met all her expectations and was a great price.

Reviews.Title: it is loyal
Reviews.Author: L. F. Block "LuisB"
Reviews.Content: The product is very easy to set up and to use. As always Apple products as as intuitive as life.

Reviews.Title: Best apple product
Reviews.Author: joe
Reviews.Content: The Appel tv is Great for apple users but not android users I have a lot of apple products and this is one of my Favorites it will only work with hd tvs with hdmi plugins. This devices is worth getting. It lasts a long time to.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Joni Hutchins
Reviews.Content: This is a great product! We use it all the time to watch movies with the family, and with its 1080p it has amazing video quality.

Reviews.Title: Most loved product
Reviews.Author: Van P.
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is just so perfect for family with all Apple's products. So convenience. Easy to set up and use also.

Reviews.Title: APPLE TV is the Core
Reviews.Author: ChicagoFox
Reviews.Content: It has become the core of late night entertainment as it flawlessly handles Netflix and its vast library of TV and movies.  The remote control is the paradigm of simplicity and function in one.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Michael D
Reviews.Content: We like this more than we expected we would. Can't wait for Apple to add more services. We also have a blueray player that has network services, and the Apple TV is a completely different (faster, easier to use, more elegant) experience.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV works works great
Reviews.Author: swest
Reviews.Content: It does work as expected... however i cannot seem to get the air play to work (stream wirelessly from my iphone/pad to the TV)Other than that it's great to have shows available at anytime!

Reviews.Title: apple tv and airplay
Reviews.Author: Brooks M Steedman
Reviews.Content: I purchased the product primarily because we have an Imac with the music library that I wanted to play through the Definitive speakers . the results are great. more detailed instructions on how to use the apple tv's other options would have produced a higher rating.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful device!
Reviews.Author: Ed Meyer
Reviews.Content: Love it, love it, love it! Could not be any happier. It works great, even with an older, 2005 Plasma TV!

Reviews.Title: awesome

Reviews.Content: Awesome little box that allows me to watch Netflix et al. on my HDTV. Order right from the screen. Did I say awesome? Yes, I am an Apple fan.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
