Reviews.Content: Very easy to install and use. Amazing speed in accessing my Apple account on my computer. I recommend this product emensly.

Reviews.Title: Love the Apple TV!
Reviews.Author: Todd W. Richey
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV is definately worth the price!  At $100 you can't beat it!  I love using the Apple TV to watch Netflix, Hulu Plus, and many other apps you use through it!

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: James R Clingerman
Reviews.Content: This is a great add in for the entertainment center.  Easy to use and works great for displaying ipad iphone browser on the tv.  I may buy another one for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV is great
Reviews.Author: Michael D. Finley
Reviews.Content: Like most Apple products, this is well made with a great interface. I took a star away for 2 reasons: 1st, no Pandora.  Apple needs to include that.  2nd, I had to call tech support to make YouTube work.  While this may be YouTube's fault, it was still annoying.  Tech support finally got it working by having me manually change an IP address (not my local WiFi IP, but an external IP).

Reviews.Title: Good stuff
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: Everything was delivered on time no issues. Device works great still figuring out new ways to use it. It came in real handy to show off vacation pictures and videos wirelessly.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Hubbub
Reviews.Content: Per usual, top quality product by Apple. Works exactly as expected.One note since the solution is not in the manual: if you have a router that has dual-band frequency ability (both 5Ghz and 2.4Ghz) and you connect your Apple TV to the Internet via Wifi, sometimes you may get a blank screen when attempting AirPlay. I was able to get around this by plugging AppleTV in to my router directly via Ethernet cable. Hopefully this is an option for you if you run into this issue.

Reviews.Title: Amazing device
Reviews.Author: Luis Gustavo Tsuru
Reviews.Content: As all Apple equipment, this is another great device.Easy to setupJust pay attention, cause you need newer Mac/Macbook Pro/IPad to stream videos

Reviews.Title: Love my Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Everglades Photograpgy
Reviews.Content: I love my unit.. I recently started using Netflix and didn't want to use it on my computer while in my office. I have an extra monitor that I don't always use, so I got this unit to plug into it and am very happy now. It was very easy to install and connect to my account. Love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Worth buying just for AirPlay
Reviews.Author: MDaytona
Reviews.Content: I just use this for AirPlay and Internet radio most of the time, and worth it just for that. I have it hooked up via optical to my sound system and it sounds great. Video quality is top notch also.  Now has HBO Go app too so just started using that.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Alejandro Herraez
Reviews.Content: I Like because It is that I expected.I recommend this product to duplicate what you see in the ipad or iphone.

Reviews.Title: Another good innovation by apple
Reviews.Author: C. Parreno
Reviews.Content: I have been looking to get apple TV since a long time ago and I finally did it! What I like the most is the mirror option, I can share what it's going on in my Iphone and Ipad in my 55" HD TV and works quite well!

Reviews.Title: having fun with it
Reviews.Author: ARBadger
Reviews.Content: Streaming quality is better than our Samsung blueray and on par with our xbox 360. I'm mostly happy with the content but I wish they would add Amazon Prime streaming content soon. That would bump it to 4 stars, easy.

Reviews.Title: Love it! Family Friendly!!
Reviews.Author: Vosornio
Reviews.Content: This was the perfect gift for the gadget guy who has it all ( my Husband).Great gift!The only down side I see is that if you have multiply televisions in the house you'll have to purchase one for each television. We have ours in the family room, perfect central place in the house.

Reviews.Title: Liked it
Reviews.Author: Vita Walen
Reviews.Content: We use it to stream Netflix.  It is easy to use and understand.  We are happy with it.  We wpuld recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great little box!  Almost essential if you have an iPad or iPhone!
Reviews.Author: Music Fan
Reviews.Content: Great little box!  One word:  AirPlay!  If you have an iPhone or iPad, it is worth it solely for this feature.  You can 'mirror' what is on your display, and also stream audio/video via AirPlay.I have two of these at home, one is connected to my 50 inch plasma for video/streaming.  Mostly Hulu/Netflix/YouTube.Another is in a different room connected via HDMI to my AV Receiver for audio only.  I listen to music and podcasts on this one.  Apps that support AirPlay that I have used and work (there are probably lots more than this):  Downcast, Pandora, Spotify, built in Music app, NPR News, NPR Music, TuneIn Radio, and Amazon Cloud Player.PROS:--AirPlay, AirPlay, AirPlay!--Great Netflix/Hulu interfaces--YouTube (go to "most watched" today or this week to see the latest viral videos)--1080p video looks fantastic--More content available with the latest software update (v5.3), including HBOGO, WatchESPN, and Sky News.--Draws less than 1 watt of power for the 3rd gen, rev2 model -- A1469.  This is according to an analysis done by AnandTech in March 2013--Small:  about the size of a hockey puck!  Speaking of hockey pucks, there's a great built in app for watching NHL highlights (free)!CONS:--Apple has not opened up the Apple TV platform for app development, but this is not as important with the AirPlay feature.TIPS AND TRICKS:--With the latest software update (v5.3), there are now many apps on the home screen.  You can clean this up a bit and hide the ones you are not using by going to Settings-->General-->Parental Controls.  Scroll to the bottom, and you can toggle show/hide for each app.--To move apps around on the home screen, hold down the 'select' button and then you will be able to move it to wherever you like.--To go back to the home screen at any time, hold down the 'menu' button for a second or so.--Remote control:  You can pair the Apple TV with a universal remote (go to settings to set this up).  You can also control via the 'Remote' app in Apple's App Store, or even pair it with a Bluetooth keyboard (I have not tried the latter).--The Apple TV drives both the HDMI output and optical audio output at the same time.All in all, if you have an iPad/iPhone, I would say get this and enjoy!If you don't have an iPad/iPhone, it is still one of the best streaming boxes out there -- the Netflix and Hulu interfaces are the best I have seen.

Reviews.Title: Easy to navigate flawless fast GUI
Reviews.Author: Steve Burton
Reviews.Content: Great box.  Recent Apple update provides ESPN and a live news broadcast from England covering world news.  Great choice to cut your ties from cable and satellite plus you save money which I know everyone likes.

Reviews.Title: Works for what I wanted it to do.
Reviews.Author: Anita Smith
Reviews.Content: So far so good.  The problems I had with it was that I live in a town house so I had to hard wire the system, now it works fine.  At the time I was also having issues with my MAC so I took them both to a MAC diagnostic shop....glad it was not only me, the battery in the remote for the MAC TV was dead....there goes the money I saved on S&H; and taxes.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied.
Reviews.Author: Steve J. Wuertz "TonyW"
Reviews.Content: Great product.  Has been everything I had anticipated it would be.  Very satisfied and hope to use it for many years.

Reviews.Title: Excellent little device...
Reviews.Author: M. Wire
Reviews.Content: I would love to give this device 5 stars, but it's lack of Amazon Streaming Video is, to me, it's only downfall. The box connects quickly and easily to your network - setup is painless. I was plesantly surprised to see I could connect a bluetooth keyboard to the unit, which made setup even faster. So far, this device has worked flawlessly. I have several devices around my home which have access to Netflix, this is by far, the cleanest, most user friendly interface.

Reviews.Title: It's great
Reviews.Author: Dennis Key
Reviews.Content: It is better than cable or any of the other available options.  We really are glad that we purchased this tool.

Reviews.Title: Love this Item!
Reviews.Author: Yari
Reviews.Content: User friendly, easy to set up, makes my dresser look fancy! I wish it would allow me to browse the web though...

Reviews.Title: Apple quality
Reviews.Author: John E Hinkle
Reviews.Content: Works well providing music to the pool and back yard.Need more than 2 to fill the backyard with sound.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Howard Crow
Reviews.Content: Best thing since TV!!HD movies, download entire TV series. I will never go to another movie theater again. This is perfect for a big HD screen in a home theater.

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: J. C.
Reviews.Content: Why didn't I buy this sooner.  Easy to hook up - love the music, photo and movie aspects.  Plus being able to watch Netflixs on the large screen TV on the sofa instead of the laptop.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Addition to My TV
Reviews.Author: Ben Beltzer
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV has actually replaced a cable subscription for me.  I only watch a few shows, and I can grab these easily either through the iTunes store, Netflix, or Hulu.  This saves a ton of money versus a complete cable subscription, plus all of the content is available on demand, so there's no need to remember to DVR-record anything.  You can also generally avoid commercials, or at least limit them (in the case of Hulu).I also use the Apple TV to stream music through iTunes which is great day to day but also for parties.  The album artwork shows up on the screen which is a nice addition.This is a product that I use every day and would recommend highly to any of my friends.

Reviews.Title: Best TV Home Entertainment Center
Reviews.Author: Andrey Bolaños Sandoval
Reviews.Content: Apple just hit the nail with this device. Its so easy to setup, use, play and enjoy all the content right on your TV

Reviews.Title: It just works
Reviews.Author: H. High
Reviews.Content: I am a huge fan of Apple.  And the Apple TV is just like their other products.  They just work.  I mostly use it for my Netflex account and to watch Youtube.  I would love to be able to get a bluetooth connection with my keyboard so I wouldn't have to peck through all the letters to find things when I'm searching but think on the future upgrade that will happen.  Overall a very neat simple product that just works.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: David Snook
Reviews.Content: Ok, I bought into the Apple infrastructure.  I and my wife have iPhones, iPads and Macbooks.  This is the ideal supplement to these products.  It installs easily and operates seamlessly.

Reviews.Title: Best TV ever!
Reviews.Author: AZhikergirl
Reviews.Content: We all love it!  My husband and I and our 17-year-old son!  The selection of movies is a weekly event and we love the TV series available on Netflix! We gave up cable and THIS is our TV now!!!

Reviews.Title: Use it for everything!
Reviews.Author: Samantha Maddock
Reviews.Content: I use my Apple TV for everything. You can watch Hulu and Netflix on it, which I love because that is so convenient.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Rothenberg
Reviews.Content: Does everything expected - second one I bought for a second TV.  Love looking at all of my photos on the big screen..

Reviews.Title: Apple TV 3
Reviews.Author: drcall81
Reviews.Content: What can I say that everyone else hasn't?  As far as a thoughtful review, forget about it.  Subjectively, I love it!  My kids are able to use it all the time for Airplay and we can stream content to it, via wireless N.  Super easy to configure.

Reviews.Title: if you love streaming, you will love this.
Reviews.Author: Saket Goyal
Reviews.Content: I compared apple tv & roku and just by airplay capability, decide to use this product. simple to setup and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic investment
Reviews.Author: Eric Salzman
Reviews.Content: My entertainment organization has jumped light years thanks to purchasing the Apple TV. My kids love it too since it has so many options for videos, movies, music.

Reviews.Title: Apple rocks
Reviews.Author: Font420
Reviews.Content: I watch Netflix, MLB and rent movies.  A must have for iPhone and iPad users for the AirPlay option (watch anything on your phone/tablet on you TV through wifi)

Reviews.Title: Good Concept
Reviews.Author: Hasen
Reviews.Content: I really do like my Apple TV, however, I had so many connection issues with my HDTV and computer that it was hardly worth it in the end.  It turns out, you have to buy a specific type of HDMI cord to connect it.  I bought cheap ones so some connection couldn't be made.  Just make sure that you buy the right cords, and if you aren't sure, buy them somewhere where you can return just in case.  It seems like this was a pretty common problem all around the internet while searching for solutions.

Reviews.Title: Wish it had the Amazon Prime App.
Reviews.Author: storm
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from an older generation Apple TV and must say that this is much more responsive, as it should be.  Wish it had the Amazon prime app for free videos ... then I would not need the Roku.

Reviews.Title: Easy
Reviews.Author: Auburn Cinefile Society "Cinfile"
Reviews.Content: This tight and easily set up device is just what I would expect from Apple.  Though to really enjoy the unit a membership to Netflix or Hulu is needed, it is an able substitute to cable television for the infrequent viewer.

Reviews.Title: Nice media player
Reviews.Author: Nate A. Thornhill
Reviews.Content: Ez to install works great.  Now Hulu iTunes and Netflix YouTube all in one place no more switching between devices to use them all in 1080p.

Reviews.Title: Nice product, typical Apple design
Reviews.Author: Michael Huspek
Reviews.Content: Works well, typical of Apple which stresses design and functionality.  One wish - that Apple someday decides to add a slingplayer to Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Another winner by Apple
Reviews.Author: T. Pendergrass "History Dawg"
Reviews.Content: Wow! The installation is very simple. The operation is intuitive. The video pass through is very high quality. The ability to play from an iPad or iPhone is amazing. AND it is inexpensive (at least until you start subscribing to downloads).

Reviews.Title: This is the good stuff
Reviews.Author: Cathrine L Hutcherson
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is a perfect inexpensive addition to your TV. I use Airplay frequently, watch YouTube and Nerflix on it, rent movies, and occasionally stream music to it. It is simple and makes it easy to do what it's supposed to do.. Also, it has the most elegant remote I've ever seen.

Reviews.Title: What's there to say
Reviews.Author: Michael Fieramosca
Reviews.Content: It's Apple TV a $99 investment into almost limitless entertainment. This is the fourth Apple TV I bought, if you have a TV you need Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: D. Keeney
Reviews.Content: Can say it does as advertised. Good remote catches wi fi easily. Have to reboot (unplug) once in a great while.

Reviews.Title: We love it...
Reviews.Author: Patrick D. Quinlan
Reviews.Content: Our Apple TVs extends our TVs to include experiencing more of our content - pics and vids - and adds to our options for viewing downloaded / streamed content. And it is controllable from from iOS devices.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: giluv2ski
Reviews.Content: One word describes this device.  AWESOME!  I love all Apple products and would not change.  I would definitely recommend this product to everyone

Reviews.Title: Wonderful picture and I love the iPad mirroring
Reviews.Author: Grandon "Grandon"
Reviews.Content: Amazing!!! With the 1080 HD thhe video quality is superb -- as good as any blu ray DVD I have played. . Netflix streaming is excellent. I am on the 30 day free trial and I definiteely will subscribe  While newer movies and a lot of old movies are not included there is still ample material. Also there are a. world of TV series that are available from the first episode on. .The deciding factor in my selecting Apple TV over the latest Roku is the mirroring of the iPad (2 or later) screen onto the large screen TV. There were things that I could only watch on my computer that is a lot more enjoyable on the big screen TV.The remote is small but very good. I have had an older Roku for some time. The newer one also has 1080 hd capability and seems to sell for the same price. It might boil down to the mirroring.  No matter which one is right for you -- jump on it. I don't think it could get much better.I will add that the mirroring is a constant source of enjoyment.  It alone is worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Love love love
Reviews.Author: BUNDY
Reviews.Content: Best thing ever!  No more wii for Netflix, no wires showing, great to connect to my iPhone.  Good variety of standard features

Reviews.Title: Quite a discussion piece
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: Every time we have people over and I have my itunes playing through it people freak out when they see me changing songs and volume and such from my phone through the surround sound system.

Reviews.Title: What More Could You Want?
Reviews.Author: Cracker Jack
Reviews.Content: It works! I'm a frequent user of Netflix and I really like being able to connect to it from my man cave rather than share the "main" TV. If I was married to the lady who lives inside the Apple box, I'd go stark raving mad. I've learned to speed through the selections so as to minimize her blather. I would like to have a few more pages of Owner's Manual as I'm not sure I understand everything.

Reviews.Title: User friendly, sleek and fun
Reviews.Author: Ali Solo "SoloFamily"
Reviews.Content: We love this!  It automatically detects wireless connection, just add iTunes account and voila! all of your purchases from the Apple iTunes store.  We watch Hulu Plus, movies, tv shows and pause/play back at our choosing. Much cheaper than DVR (monthly) and my 3 year old loves it.  It is small enough no one even notices it by my TV, QUICK on/off with no boot time.  Awesome product.

Reviews.Title: Love my Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Peters
Reviews.Content: I love this device.  Now I can watch All My Children and One Life to Live on Hulu Plus on the bigger TV screen rather than on my IPad or computer.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: pepandjez
Reviews.Content: My main purpose for buying this was so I could stream video from my iPad to our TV.  This has given us that and much more!!!  My husband and son immediately were hooked on Netflix.  For us, this is so worth the price!!!

Reviews.Title: Best choice for Latin America -But you also need a PC
Reviews.Author: Miguel Lescano Cornejo
Reviews.Content: Vudu, Amazon Instant Video and other services are not yet available in my country, and even when I do access them via Unblock-Us, movies don't have subtitles in Spanish... Or even worse, no subtitles at all. So iTunes is, so far, the best option for digitally renting movies down here in Ecuador, since they started offering us this service about a year ago.My only gripe is that, despite having a 11Mbps Internet connection, iTunes movies load slowly, so when I rent a movie I have to do it from my PC, wait around 5 hours for it to download, and then watch it from the Apple TV. By comparison, I can watch 720p Netflix with no delays at all.Another plus of the Apple TV is that the UI and remote are so easy to use, this is the first time my 76-year-old dad is using Netflix all by himself. I also have a PS3, but he always asked me to turn it on and play the TV show he wanted. He would not dare use Netflix on the PS3 by himself. I once also caught my mother watching a video from her iPad on the TV via Aiplay... I have only needed to teach them a few times, and they already feel confident with their Apple toys.

Reviews.Title: great!  Am enjoying it in both my business and personal!
Reviews.Author: Anne D.
Reviews.Content: This is easy to use and works great!  We use it to watch movies and I use it to project my slides from my I-pad to a large tv when doing business presentatons. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Love it! Once we had one, we ended up buying a second one for upstairs!
Reviews.Author: Denise W. Pursifull
Reviews.Content: Love, love, love it! We tried the first one out and then bought 2 more for the 2 bedrooms upstairs! Couldn't live without it now!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Ket "Gadget Freak"
Reviews.Content: What can I say about this product. No surprises, the product is as good as expected. I have an iMac, iPod touch, iPhone 5 running on Apple Extreme, so installation was not a hassle at all. But see that your devices are running on the same wifi network.

Reviews.Title: Use it every day!
Reviews.Author: primefan1
Reviews.Content: For 99 bucks this this is a steal. It totally integrates all of my Apple products (Mac, iPhone, iPad) wirelessly and seemlessly using Airplay to stereo and TV. Great for renting movies from the iTunes store and streaming Netflix movies and series

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT!
Reviews.Author: Lcarter13
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this to everyone! Great product. My kids love watching Netflix through this device. Great for the entire family!

Reviews.Title: Love Apple products!
Reviews.Author: Casey J Maxon
Reviews.Content: You cant go wrong with Apple, especially this Apple TV.  It has made my classroom so much better, for teacher and students!  Instead of standing by your computer, clicking away, why not walk around your classroom with Ipad in hand...I love it and highly recommended for classroom!

Reviews.Title: Better than I had expected
Reviews.Author: Chay David
Reviews.Content: I bought an Apple TV to replace my Roku device on my family's main TV. I've had a Roku HD for the past year and a half which I've since moved to another TV. The Apple TV has Netflix and Hulu Plus on it which is what my family uses 99% of the time. Roku has more channels, but I rarely watched them. I do like having Spotify on the Roku, but with AirPlay I can easily run Spotify on my iPad and mirror it to my TV/sound system. I think this device is excellent for what it does. My only complaint with the Roku was that it was flaky and I had to reset it frequently. Whether that was the device itself or the software running the channel I don't know. Hopefully it's better with the newer Roku devices. I will still use my Roku on another TV. I also have most of my media in iTunes. If you have a Mac and/or several iOS devices then an Apple TV is worth consideration over Roku. I couldn't be happier with it. My kids enjoy AirPlay because one can play on the iPad while the others watch it on the TV. That solved the problem with my oldest son getting irritated by his younger brothers crowding around him to watch him play on the iPad.In summary, I think both Apple TV and Roku are capable devices. Having other Apple devices in the home was the deciding factor in purchasing an Apple TV for my family. If you don't have other Apple devices then Roku is likely a better choice.

Reviews.Title: Perfect if you are an apple family and don't have cable
Reviews.Author: SiggyFay
Reviews.Content: We use 2 of the apple TV's in our home.  We no longer subscribe to cable or satellite and have been enjoying the extra money in our bank account every month and the ease of using the Apple TV.  We do have a subscription to NetFlix and Hulu Plus so we will use those to watch programming.  In addition we find ourselves listening to alot more music through MOG and Pandora through the apps available on the apple devices.  Also has the ability to watch NHL, MLB and NBA games through those apps if you have a membership to any of those.  But even if you don't you can watch the highlights from all the games offered in these apps.

Reviews.Title: Great little device at a reasonable price!
Reviews.Author: Jeff M "jeffm"
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is amazing! The Netflix interface is awesome and I love being able to stream content from my iPad or iPhone to the TV via AirPlay! I would highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Apple TV rocks!
Reviews.Author: Mick Maestro
Reviews.Content: I use it for access to iTunes music and movie purchases, streaming radio and podcast and most of all to airplay and stream my blu-rays and dvds from my Mac to the Apple TV and occasionally i would stream some Korean Dramas from the Mac to the Apple TV as well. Great value, and a must have for Mac and iOS users if you want to airplay mirror streaming.

Reviews.Title: Allows me to see the iPad screen on my TV
Reviews.Author: D. Bratman
Reviews.Content: I'm sure there are going to be a lot more detailed reviews of this product on Amazon. I wanted the ability to mirror what was on my iPad on my big-screen TV, and the Apple TV does just that. Great for watching YouTube, streaming videos or whatever (wink--wink) is on your iPad on your television screen. I'm not sure about the quality of streaming video, but the sharpness of some video may be affected by watching on a large screen. Does exactly what I bought it for.

Reviews.Title: Very useful
Reviews.Author: BeepCruz
Reviews.Content: Got one for my husband for Christmas and one for my dad for his birthday cuz he liked my husband's so much. Really nice to control from our phones when we want to watch Hulu or Netflix or use our iPads on the tv. My husband suggested we get one for our other tv, too.

Reviews.Title: Does what I need it to do
Reviews.Author: Michelle D.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to watch Netflix on my HDTV as well as to mirror streaming websites and other things from my MacBook to my TV. Works well. Easy to set up. I like that it is so portable so that I can switch tvs with it. It does require an HDMI cable sold separately. I bought an extra cable so that when I use it on my other tv I don't have to reach behind my wall mounted tv to unplug the HDMI cable.

Reviews.Title: Compact but not perfect
Reviews.Author: aston m
Reviews.Content: Use it but it is not as user friendly as my d-link media server. Like most Apple products totally focussed on the Apple platform. Great to mirror the computer but if used for downloaded movies those have to be actually started on the computer ( unless they are in the i tunes library of course ).

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: chad
Reviews.Content: i can play all my itunes movies and i use it alot for netflix. also use it for pics and airplay

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: R. Gunn
Reviews.Content: After getting this and using it for a few months it became very apparent to me that I could finally cut the satellite. One thing I would recommend is either having an iphone or an ipad.  With either of those devices you can Airplay them on to your TV and watch pretty much any network TV show you want.  The other feature I love that I didn't expect was that all the music and movies you have in iTunes is available to play on the device.  I love this thing!

Reviews.Title: Not as good as a Roku or PS3 for streaming... too limited and no autoplay
Reviews.Author: Michael DEredita "Mike"
Reviews.Content: My biggest gripes with the AppleTV is the lack of video apps and its inability to autoplay.  If you buy a series on iTunes, you need to click to start each episode.  If you are watching Hulu Plus, same thing.  The Roku will at least offer Autoplay in many apps, including Hulu Plus, where you can marathon a series without being interrupted to needing to find the remote after each episode and then click around to get to the next episode.My other gripe is Airplay with a mid-2012 Macbook Pro (upgraded with 16B ram and 512GB SSD) along with 80 MBps (yes, eighty MBps) wired internet.  There is a lag of about 1-2 seconds when you use the Airplay feature to play what you have on the laptop on the TV.  Voices do not line up with the audio, which is very annoying.I just find the AppleTV very limited at best.  Yes, I can watch video from my iPhone 4S, iPad 3, or 2012 MBP on my TV, but that's really about the extent of this device.I own a Roku 2 HD, PS3, Wii and Wii U, iPhone 4S, iPad 3, mid-2012 MBP.  I use the PS3 the most for streaming, followed by the Roku 2 HD.  I lent my AppleTV to a family member, who I think after one or two days gave up on it, and it is siting in their drawer.If Apple opened the AppleTV up to app makers for more streaming video choices, as well as the ability to Autoplay, then I would highly recommend it.  Problem is the are far too few choices for streaming, and there is no autoplay feature.  It's just too limited when you compare this device to competitors.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV MD199LL/A
Reviews.Author: Atlanta Kid "Atlanta Kid"
Reviews.Content: I bought this apple tv since my iTune kept getting upgraded and the Sony Playstation did not work correctly with my itune library. I was using PS3 Server.The only thing I dont like about the Apple TV, while watching Netflix the Sony can do 5.1 but the Apple does not !! they are connected to the same Sony Receiver.Also the Netflix client software on Apple TV does not show the movie detail as intuitively as Sony Playstation does, but since I have all my music and movies cataloged on iTune, I using apple Tv primarily.

Reviews.Title: You gotta have one if you have a iPad or iPhone
Reviews.Author: Brent Stanphill
Reviews.Content: These things rock! I can push any of my content from my iPhone / iPad to the screen to share with the family or watch a movie, stream music from my iTunes collections, it washes the dishes, folds my clothes, pays my mortgage, and takes care of the kids all at the same time!

Reviews.Title: Goodbye Cable!
Reviews.Author: pedalpushinmama
Reviews.Content: I love that I was able to call my cable company and cancel my tv subscription saving me hundreds of dollars a month.  This product is easy to install, easy to use, and since I installed it on my tv, I have purchased and installed it in my son's home, my daughters home, and my mom's home, saving everyone money!

Reviews.Title: Wow!  How convenient.
Reviews.Author: Happyheartstrings
Reviews.Content: My sister told me about this item.  I was use to bringing in Netflix via my WII, but I hate that shaky remote on WII.  This is so convenient to just set up and turn on.  I have purchased two more of these to give as gifts.  Love it.

Reviews.Title: Why did I wait to buy this
Reviews.Author: Patti Myers Pringle "Soundtrack Lover"
Reviews.Content: We had a MacMini hooked up to our tv to watch Netflix and movies.  I don't know why we waited 3 years to just buy the Apple TV.  I love it.  Watching Netflix or HuluPlus is so easy.  Access to your music & movies is simple and we love that you we can link to pictures on another computer to use in the screensaver.  For the price, it's well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Love the Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Robb Riddell
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love the Apple TV. I have been able to watch mlb.tv on it with high def. You can't go wrong with an Apple product

Reviews.Title: Apple TV rocks!
Reviews.Author: Jorge Philly "Jorge"
Reviews.Content: I recently bought an Ipad and Iphone and now I'm addicted to everything "Apple". Apple TV is amazing in the fact that you can spend hours and hours watching youtube videos and can see your own stored movies and videos from iPad, iPhone, or regular computer. It still lacks Pandora or the potential to add new channels like Roku does (I only bought this one to watch youtube videos, otherwise Roku is way better than this).

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Tanya
Reviews.Content: great product so much fun. easy to set up and great price keep up the good work 5stars A++++ and fast shipping

Reviews.Title: The Best Entertainment Box Out There
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is a fantastic product allowing users to view new content through multiple services. Netflix, Hulu, iTunes and more are all available through Apple TV. The remote is thin and streamlined for easy use and the unit has Wi-Fi and the option to be wired. It is small and unobtrusive. For the features, the unit is also priced well. I have three of these units throughout my home and all of them work well and function with my iPad, iPhone and Mac. Reduce the cable package, save some money, and buy an Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Not what I had expected
Reviews.Author: Moshe Shadmon
Reviews.Content: Until recently I used Logitech Revue, and was very satisfied with it. Recently it began glitching, and crashing which caused me to switch to the new Apple TV.I have a Macbook (and 'of course' an iPhone), so I thought to also give the tv a try since I greatly enjoy my other Apple products. Sadly, my finding were not what I expected...Though the Revue was one of the first Android TVs it contained a large number of apps, an app store, and a browser. While with Apple there is only a limited number of apps available, and no app store*. I assume it is because they would like users to purchase the shows via iTunes instead of 'renting' them. However, they have Hulu and Netflix installed which makes me wonder why apps like HBO-GO, or SHOWTIME ON DEMAND, are not available. As for the browser, when I had Revue I found it great, because it allowed me to watch shows (like HBO GO), or read check a social network site when the application was not available. Revue, honestly made it feel like there is a computer connected to my TV, while apple feels like I have a bunch of apps (which are standard on all blu-rays) extending the capabilities of my TV.The one good thing about Apple TV, which Revue lacked, was that it is very organized. The small number of apps makes it very clear where you are and what is available to you.*No app store means: limited number of apps online, and no games on your box (something I think apple would have profited from)

Reviews.Title: Can not live without my Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Alicia
Reviews.Content: We use it for Netflix, streaming on our iPads, sharing family photos and music. I need to get a second one for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great with Apple family!
Reviews.Author: RayC
Reviews.Content: Set up is easy.  Makes my Net Flix render very nice and fast with great audio compared to my smart tv.  Was disappointed with available apps.  If I were not an Apple person would definitely go for Roku 3 instead.  May anyway if Apple TV requires jailbreaking to add content.  Love how it mirrors in my laptop or iphone or ipad so easily.  Starting to get a little weary with Apple's revenue ideas by limiting content to PAY only.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: B. Cochell
Reviews.Content: Fantastic product. Some small issues with wireless connection to iTunes at times but overall great. I recommend this item to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Moe
Reviews.Content: Great product.  Will use in our locker room for the girls since we don't have cable and will just use the internet.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Thunder
Reviews.Content: My second Apple TV. Perfect for me to have access to my music and be able to AirPlay my Macbook Air and iPhone to the TV's.

Reviews.Title: Great addition to my home theater.
Reviews.Author: Wendall M. Barclay
Reviews.Content: I have a Roku and I think this Apple TV has a better user interface for Netflix. It's 52 inches of "eye candy" on my Big HD TV. But what I really like is now I can rip my BluRays with Hand Brake to the Apple TV 3 format, drop them into itunes and now I can watch all my movies through this "hocky puck" sized device. My home theater pc uses around 120 watts of power, while this only sips 1.9 wats. Whats not to like.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV Review
Reviews.Author: Steve Silvasy
Reviews.Content: Tremendous device.  We absolutely love it.  Does everything we need.Hopefully the OS expands to more functionality.  I'd love to see Twitter involved, etc.

Reviews.Title: Ehhh...
Reviews.Author: Meydad
Reviews.Content: the reason i am giving only 3 stars out of 5 is not for the quality or any technical problem i have with the device.the reason this device is getting 3 stars from me is because of Apple...Apple decided to put a certain apps on the Apple TV and even though the platform is ready to have more and different apps, they had decided to keep it closed! so.. you can NOT stream content from Amazon (or anyone else that is not iTunes, Netflix or Hulu)ALL the sport channels and radio channels on it are locked and are very expensive to open.Apple should consider opening the device and give him a pot-light in the App Store.

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: DAn
Reviews.Content: Inexpensive, and delivers so many options to the TV. apple has scored big with this item. Highly recommend to anyone wanting additional TV experiences

Reviews.Title: Great for streaming audio and video.
Reviews.Author: Benjamin W. Sessums
Reviews.Content: Wish I could get to my HBO account to watch from the Apple TV but there are many options for video including Netflix and Hulu. Streaming audio wirelessly from my iMac is one of my favorite features of this device.

Reviews.Title: Usable for conference room
Reviews.Author: half dome
Reviews.Content: I used it to provide ipad wireless presentation in a conference room.  Works.A few things to note though:1. "upgrade" notice is troublesome for non-home applications.2. all the show icons make it un-professional in conference room.3. of course, appleTV is not designed for enterprise.  But, given that many ipad, isn't it time for one?

Reviews.Title: Apple TV - a great device!!
Reviews.Author: Dave Zak
Reviews.Content: We had a WD box for watching Netflix but wre very disappointed in it. It was slow loading videos and froze often. We purchased the Apple TV unit because we have iPads, iPhones and Mac computers and were very happy with them. This device works so well and integrates with our other Apple products that we regretted not getting it first!! Amazon also saved us around $10 over purchasing it at an Apple store. We had it the next business day with free shipping too. We recommend the Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Gerard L. Comtois
Reviews.Content: Am loving it because I can now watch Netflix and listen to radio and many other items.This is an amazing product that has revolutionized the TV industry.  GREAT product.Ger,Southington, CT

Reviews.Title: Fantastic....
Reviews.Author: Thiago Schefer
Reviews.Content: It is very easy to use, you can see a lot of films Netflix and you can see films Itunes.Can play game and see in TV, very fantastic....Perfect...

Reviews.Title: A must have
Reviews.Author: Paul D. Aronoff
Reviews.Content: Great product, works flawlessly with iPad2 or newer and iPod.Not as inclusive as Roku but still a great product.

Reviews.Title: It's Apple...which means it's easy, works as you would expect and then some!
Reviews.Author: Doug A. Cole
Reviews.Content: It's Apple...which means it's easy, works as you would expect and then some!  So good, I got two!  One for living area and another for my bedroom.  Love how easy it is to connect and to mirror computer screen to TV.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: MN "mnagle8"
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is good but not as good as I thought it would be. Great to be able to project from iPad but some apps make this difficult or impossible. Video quality is not great when doing this. So we end up using it occasionally instead of frequently.

Reviews.Title: Great Apple product
Reviews.Author: Envision2009
Reviews.Content: Simple and easy to set-up and use. I mainly bought it to watch my Netflix on a larger screen than my laptop. Thank you Apple as usual.

Reviews.Title: Great for Pandora!
Reviews.Author: RaDadIndy "indiana_dad"
Reviews.Content: I use this daily, sending a Pandora stream from my iPad to my TV and home theater speakers. It also lets me stream artwork apps from the iPad, or Flickr, which make for a very pretty TV screen through the day. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Always solid like all Apple Products.
Reviews.Author: Douglas "Doug"
Reviews.Content: I am anxious for Apple to grow it's content offering.  They should add Amazon Prime access and HBO Go capability.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: ell107
Reviews.Content: My favorite aspect of this apple TV is the ability to watch youTube videos on my 42" plasma.  While I could have accomplished this in other ways, the streamlined operation of the Apple TV makes it seamless.  Additionally, I appreciate my ability to link my iPad to my apple TV and listen to Pandora (through the backwards way of using TuneIn radio to connect the iPad to the apple TV, then going to the Pandora app and that overriding the TuneIn Radio music) during parties and social gatherings.Another great apple product.

Reviews.Title: Its great
Reviews.Author: Valentin K
Reviews.Content: Considering for me it is not for an old monitor watching movies. Otherwise works great and so far I have no problems with it.

Reviews.Title: If you own any Apple products Buy This!
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: I own a Roku and a PS3 so I have had all the different internet TV available, but I always wanted to watch You Tube on my 55" screen. This Apple TV blows away the Roku as far a picture quality. The Apple TV is far superior to the Roku! also being able to take my iPhone and my Imac and connect through Airplay my iTunes and Video and pictures from either to my TV is great. This may not have all the channels the Roku has but I am using the Apple TV far more then the Roku.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Cate Cullen
Reviews.Content: You simply cannot go wrong with the Apple TV.  Works flawlessly every time.  Very easy to set up.  Also, provides closed captioning for everything.  Thank you, Apple!

Reviews.Title: Nice concept
Reviews.Author: erk
Reviews.Content: Purchased the Apple TV with the hopes of ditching high priced cable.  Unfortunately that has not come to fruition yet but still trying.SImple to hook up, just need the HDMI Cable purchased in addition to the Apple TV.Enjoy the 'Sync" features that can be used along with an iphone or android phone.Overall price is very reasonable.

Reviews.Title: Love this product!
Reviews.Author: Ronnie329
Reviews.Content: Easy to install (just a cable attachment).  We use it all the time! Enhanced the use of both Netflix and iPad for us, and we're not very tech savvy!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Kelly Gesell
Reviews.Content: Meets all my expectations. I really like the Apple TV. I use it all the time and it works great. It was very easy to set up and get started. I would recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Easy set up and always works
Reviews.Author: Steve B "Mac User"
Reviews.Content: It's nice when a powerful product just works right all the time. It took about 90 seconds to set it up and it has been working flawlessly ever since. In comparison, my ROKU took half an hour to get up and running and needed to be reset about once a month to reset a lock up. The only disadvantage to it is the limited number of programs available compared to ROKU, including the Amazon Instant that I use occasionally (using my Samsung TV Smart Hub). But I'd give up Amazon Instant before giving up the Apple TV..

Reviews.Title: Works just as advertised, Great picture
Reviews.Author: Richard H. McCann
Reviews.Content: This is great for watching re-plays of shows through the History Channel and A&E; Channel app that I have installed on my iPad.  Picture quality and sound are superb.

Reviews.Title: i love it .
Reviews.Author: nasser
Reviews.Content: apple tv is a very nice product ,i can use it with all my apple products via internet connection and wireless .

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: James Gettens
Reviews.Content: This is a great way to be able to rent videos and watch them on your TV instead of the small screen on the computer. Easy to set up and a great addition to your iTunes collection.  You must have iTunes if you purchase the Apple TV, but I had it already and, with my iPod I have completed my Apple tree.  Enjoy.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Gary C. Henley "G C Henley"
Reviews.Content: I use this as well as a Roku. If you have a iphone or iPad the Apple TV really works well with them

Reviews.Title: It's Apple, how can you go wrong!
Reviews.Author: D. Faust
Reviews.Content: Works as described.  This is my second one, and would recommend to anyone and everyone.  Definate must have.Great job APPLE!

Reviews.Title: Best little device for Mac users
Reviews.Author: Robin A. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Works with ipad, mac, ipod, and iphone. Also plays netflix on the big screen. Would recommend it to anyone interested in using their ipad apps to display on the screen. Amazon prime app will not play through this device though.

Reviews.Title: Amazing...
Reviews.Author: Saraht
Reviews.Content: This is what Sony was trying to do in the 80's and 90's...just turns out Apple did it better.  If you have Ipad(s)/Ipod(s)/Mac(s) or any combination this is a great device.  Also, I have DirectTv which has a brutal on-demand service...so AppleTV fills that gap too.  Great product...easy to install...easy to use.  Awesome.

Reviews.Title: A Great Product
Reviews.Author: G. Prouty
Reviews.Content: I have been an "Apple Man" since 1986 and I have nothing but. This is a very nice addition to my collection!

Reviews.Title: works good, does what it is supposed to do
Reviews.Author: Constantin Schmekel "constantine"
Reviews.Content: works good, does what it is supposed to do. Does for sure not what the description doesn't say like playing various files as a media player could. I got it for the air play function in order to play videos on the big tv which are streamed to iPhone/ iPad. Can recommend it for this and the advertised purposes.

Reviews.Title: Yep it's great
Reviews.Author: Cornelia McAndrew
Reviews.Content: So yeah I bought this on the recommendation from a co-worker and I love it! I've been thinking about getting rid of my over priced cable and I wanted to see how this would work and it's great! Super easy to set up and super easy to use!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Boris Chu
Reviews.Content: I am glad that I got this.  It was able to keep the office nice and with the minimal amount of cables.

Reviews.Title: Another great Apple product that works!
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Apple TV so that I could use the mirroring function on my ipad to my tv. It works very well, I am very pleased with it.Setup was quick and simple, I had to provide my own HDMI cable to hook it up.With the combination of my new Apple TV and Netflix I no longer have a cable tv bill!!!One feature that I use a lot, is showing YouTube clips on my tv from my iPhone.Overall this is another great product from Apple that just works!!!

Reviews.Title: Makes my life easier
Reviews.Author: ncparkins
Reviews.Content: I love my Apple tv...in fact I am buying two more so that each tv has one attached to is so we don't have to be stuck in front of the tv in the tv room.

Reviews.Title: Lazy man's best friend.
Reviews.Author: Galant
Reviews.Content: This thing is great. It has a few glitches every now and then, but being able to stream music and video wirelessly is great. And being able to watch netflix without a laptop is icing on the cake.

Reviews.Title: An apple for all
Reviews.Author: pooky maliboo "pooky maliboo"
Reviews.Content: Great product. Cool to watch YouTube on TV transfer from my ipad. Also great to bring it with you as long as you have wifi and hdmi cable.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Rachael
Reviews.Content: Great addition to my husband's TV room.  You can play all you tube videos, stream from you Ipad or iphone and great quality

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Luciana Soares
Reviews.Content: I'm an apple freek.This gadget is perfect. I can watch almost anything from home.My boy and I love it!!!!

Reviews.Title: Presentation must for anything "i"
Reviews.Author: Robert Nordstrom "Hitec1"
Reviews.Content: I use this for wireless demos and presentations regularly and it's the only way to go. Several at our company have adopted the Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: rayonavich
Reviews.Content: I am an Apple guy so I am probably a little biased on this but this works great. high def and awesome sound, just cant be beat. I'm using a Bose surround sound system so I can play all of my iTunes and watch movies with great sound and great picture along with all of the internet extras with Apple TV. who needs a movie theatre anymore

Reviews.Title: Got rid of cable TV
Reviews.Author: Raymond E. Pinard
Reviews.Content: This is the second box I have purchased, this one for my office. More TV shows, movies, music, podcast, etc than you can ever use. Once live sports and live news break the monopoly of cable companies, this will be how we watch TV in the future.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Fr. Joseph
Reviews.Content: The box & cable arrived in an excellent condition and on time. Packaging was neat and clean. Thank you. Product & delivery was so good, my neighbor asked me to buy one for them.

Reviews.Title: Great for Parties
Reviews.Author: Emille31 "Emille31"
Reviews.Content: We host a lot at our house, so this is great for sharing fun YouTube videos or even to project music. It's great for Netflix and very simple. I am not very tech savvy, so I love this. It's simple but has a lot of great features.

Reviews.Title: Simple To Use And Connects Every Apple Product We Own
Reviews.Author: We Like Mondays "We Like Mondays"
Reviews.Content: So simple. We plugged it in, set up the account info, and it has worked perfectly from day one. Love that I can even set the pictures in the screen saver to my favorites from my photo library.

Reviews.Title: Awesome.
Reviews.Author: Robert Dunlap
Reviews.Content: We use this as our family room sole entertainment box. It has all the apps that we need and services that we use so we can watching whatever we want from any source on this little box.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Joey G
Reviews.Content: Pretty awesome device, couple things I with I could do differently but Im still learning. Can't really go wrong buying an Apple product .

Reviews.Title: Easy to setup. Works beautifully.
Reviews.Author: JS
Reviews.Content: This is a very high quality apple product that blows away the competition. The audio is high fidelity, the look is sleek and ultra-compact. The user menu is easy for a child to navigate and the hook-in to itunes is nothing short of brilliant. Highly recommend using this product. Make sure you have an HDMI cable and an open slot on your TV for using this.I love this setup so much that I'm buying a second one for my neighbor. When I told my neighbor, he was really excited.

Reviews.Title: Tiny Wonder - Apple quality!
Reviews.Author: C. Sinklier
Reviews.Content: HD resolution - great interface (much better than the web browser -readable) - take it out of the box follow the very short manual and it works instantly or take it out of the box don't read the manual and it still works instantly - the remote is an elegant dream to use - streams beautifully! ~:0)

Reviews.Title: Use it every day
Reviews.Author: Kmon
Reviews.Content: It's the best 100$ I've ever spent if ur pretty much an all apple user this is the best purchase ull ever make

Reviews.Title: Outstanding TV accesory
Reviews.Author: RickW
Reviews.Content: Apple TV provides instant access to my entire iTunes library of movies, TV shows, and music with a fantastically simple remote.  It's hard to imagine a better, more intuitive way to get at audio and video files.  My TV/Blu-Ray combo is by LG and includes smart TV, but Apple TV is easier to use and much faster streaming or downloading content.  Actually, I suppose there is one thing I could ask for - closed captioning of the same quality as a good disk.  But to the best of my knowledge, nobody does that, so we wait.

Reviews.Title: best $100 i spent
Reviews.Author: johnny appleseed
Reviews.Content: what can i say......we use this everyday. i love playing games on the iphone or the ipad, then throwing the signal on the TV via apple tv. great product.......we have everything apple in the house now.

Reviews.Title: Love my Apple TV
Reviews.Author: David C. Ryals "ccwpbear"
Reviews.Content: Needed one for my office and since I have already 2, one for my big tv and another one for my wife's tv in her sewing room, I got another one. It works great.

Reviews.Title: Netflicks and more!
Reviews.Author: BillTheDad
Reviews.Content: This product was shipped quickly and works just as described.  Plugged it in and within a minute was connected to the internet and away.

Reviews.Title: expected more
Reviews.Author: Solaris "SUN"
Reviews.Content: As the device itself look sleek and good, it don't have much app as others said.  If you have itunes account with lot of movies, then it may be useful.  I know this when i buy, the main reason i bought this iplay (mirror) and its not as good as i expected.  It should least have amazon instant etc.  Little disappointed as i have couple of iphones and an ipad.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: I think it is a good produce to have when you want to watch more on your computer and TV.

Reviews.Title: It's absolutely great!
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: It's the best thing we've bought since our first TV! I will never go back to cable!  Never! It's great!

Reviews.Title: Great little product!
Reviews.Author: Captain Llama
Reviews.Content: I purchase the Apple TV, on a whim and have really fallen in love with it.  I have given up cable television completely and now purchase my TV per episode or season on this device.It was incredibly easy to set up and I've found that the picture quality is great, even on standard definition.  The HD is also quite good for something that is streaming.  The sound is also quite good.  I have the sound set up via optical audio into a surround sound system, and the sound is VERY clear.I use it for purchasing TV from iTunes as well as streaming Netflix.  What is really nice about purchasing TV shows and movies via iTunes, is that it preloads what you are watching as it streams, so if your internet connection slows you're quality stays the same.  (I should note however that this does not apply to Netflix, as the quality adjusts per your connection as with most other streaming devices).I highly recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Apple TV Rocks!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Makarewicz
Reviews.Content: I recommend this to anyone who is a fan of Apple and the ecosystem. The Apple TV speaks for it self great bang for your buck at $100

Reviews.Title: Another typical Apple product
Reviews.Author: crs83
Reviews.Content: Working as expected.  Not much suprise as I bought after thorough review over this product.  My internet speed might be a little slow, as every time when I try to use the NBA recap fuction, it will need several tries to have it work smoothly.  Other than that, everything is good.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Omen Jain
Reviews.Content: I can watch videos on my iphone on TV, can browse you tube videos too. The HD movies on itunes store is awesome! great product.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: CaT
Reviews.Content: I like Apple TV, which can watch youtube our ets in My TV and I can show my Ipad Iphone or Mac in My TV

Reviews.Title: Get it!!
Reviews.Author: Mom2kpbaa
Reviews.Content: I love it! Especially for youtube videos! Simple, easy connect, user friendly...I love everything about it! Fast and professional S/H.

Reviews.Title: Slow video upload.
Reviews.Author: Fred Calmerman
Reviews.Content: Surprised that it takes 3-4 times the lengt of the video to upload apple's own video format "mov" on iPhone and iPad.

Reviews.Title: Apple does it again!
Reviews.Author: Xnickitynickx
Reviews.Content: This is my second Apple TV. I still use the first one almost daily, so it was only natural that I'd get another when I wanted to expand. The airplay feature is beyond useful!

Reviews.Title: free for trying apps getting amazon money
Reviews.Author: Alejandro Cruz
Reviews.Content: i got this free from downloading apps and getting amazon points! lol so yea i love my apple tv.! kit is a new apple tv sealed from apple. its an amzing ox. wish a jailbreak would be out for it. but hey i dont care still amazing 1080p.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: C. B. Wilder
Reviews.Content: I purchased this not really sure if I was going to keep it. Becausethere are several options now with Mac products (iPad or Mac Pro)to stream videos on HDTV using a cable.  But once I set it up and sawthe ease of using it, the quality of the display, and the options Apple TV canoffer beside video streaming from iTunes or Netflex is amazing. I highly recommendthis product.

Reviews.Title: Apple's hobby that works for me
Reviews.Author: Darrell Smith
Reviews.Content: I have one of these on each TV and utilize my iTunes library continually and throughout the house.  I also utilize them for NBA league pass and other online streaming.  For a hobby, Apple has really developed a good device.

Reviews.Title: Works well and easy to use
Reviews.Author: T. Waldrop
Reviews.Content: The only issues I ever have are due to my network (I'm a computer nerd so my house has a complicated network).  Usually, I can easily find the answers on the support forums.  The device itself works amazingly well and interfaces well with the multiple iTunes libraries on my network.

Reviews.Title: Just what I expected.
Reviews.Author: Terry
Reviews.Content: I ordered this from amazon on a Sunday and it arrived on Tuesday.  Perfect price ($5 cheaper than apple).  I was torn between a Roku 3 and an Apple TV.  Since I used iTunes for years and purchase music, movies and TV shows, this is exactly what I needed.  It connected to my account and I can play anything wirelessly through my TV.  In addition I can play/stream anything from my iPhone, iPad and iMac directly to my TV.Don't worry about music/video files you can't play through iTunes.  Simply convert to mp4 or mp3, add them to your iTunes and you're set.  I definitely would recommend this to apple users.  It works for me.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: SANG KWON LEE
Reviews.Content: I like it very much.I enjoy this with air mirrorring function very much.I can enjoy youtube with big screen using this.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: atomicdp
Reviews.Content: I am now able to watch max go and hbo go on my TV! Easy to set up and easy to use, plus great quality!

Reviews.Title: our 2nd
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: we had one already and this was our second for our 2nd living room so We love it. Price was better then instore. I recommend to anyone who doesn't have cable and has netflix or Hulu.

Reviews.Title: What can you say, it is an Apple product.
Reviews.Author: coffee farmer
Reviews.Content: What I like best is ease of use. Theability to watch the programs I missed first time around is really nice.

Reviews.Title: Pretty darn awesome!
Reviews.Author: Jon Rollins
Reviews.Content: Okay, so my daughter wanted something to stream NetFlix on so she could watch Finding Bigfoot (don't get me started!).  I was torn between AppleTV and the Roku 3, but since everything she has is Apple I opted for the AppleTV.Installation was very simple.Operation is smooth and simple.The only ding I would give it would be that it doesn't do Amazon Instant.Overall, my daughter loves it so I'm happy.  Now she has moved from Finding Bigfoot to Duck Dynasty.  Have I failed as a parent???

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Law Student "ABS"
Reviews.Content: Easy to set-up and use for any current Apple customer.  Makes it simple to watch all of your iTunes movies and listen to your music through your TV.

Reviews.Title: Phenomenal
Reviews.Author: Trevor Rappa
Reviews.Content: Took a little while to get it to stream from my iPad, but now it works all the time and the picture is fantastic. HBOgo and watchespn are the main apps I use as some are still blocked like the xfinity player, but hopefully that will change soon. I don't have cable tv so $100 to watch ESPN and HBO is definitely worth it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: The best thing about Apple products is they come with zero fuss...and the same goes with Apple TV. You take it out of the package, plug it in and you are on! Works perfectly with iphone, ipad, Macbook (with Airplay). Remote is also as simple as it can ever be.As always Amazon did a perfect job in delivering it on time with perfect packaging!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product!
Reviews.Author: MomOfTwo
Reviews.Content: Very convienent to use and the set up is so easy. I Highly recommend this product for you iphone, ipod or ipads. The mirroring feature is so cool! We enjoy watching shows and movies, playing games or reading the news on our 55" TV and the picture quality is very good!

Reviews.Title: Best ever
Reviews.Author: angie
Reviews.Content: I took this with me to Dominican Republic and was able to use it with my ipad and get all USA , like Netflix and other things I use to steam, not like my song player, would not pick up USA only the country's program. It's very easy to use and steam onto to your TV .

Reviews.Title: What's not to like?  Apple and smooth as butter!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Got one for each TV in the home.  To access my Netflix, iTunes library (photos, movies, tv shows)  and Aperture library (photos, home movies) stored on my iMac.  Never had any problem with device itself and they just work.  The only issue I had was with Airplay from my 27" iMac to an AppleTV having stuttering video on a 1080p movie (both devices were ethernet connected) but Airplay works fine from iPhone and iPads (perhaps because of the lower resolution and therefore lower bandwidth requirements?).

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Jakintosh
Reviews.Content: I had an older version of this and it stuttered a lot during Netflix views. This one has been great!

Reviews.Title: Wifi problems!
Reviews.Author: Andrew2834
Reviews.Content: I would love to say its 5 stars especially because it apple but I can't. It has a beautiful UI that is easy but it does have WIFI PROBLEMS!! Sometimes it says theirs a errror when i try to watch netflex. So i have to unplug it and plug it back in. But it if very nice and small, but until apple fixes the wifi problem I can't really recommend it, even if you can mirror anything from your ipad or iPhone on to it.

Reviews.Title: really like
Reviews.Author: athena smith
Reviews.Content: I really like this product, but Apple needs to be able to add more apps, the lack of available free tv on this product make it hard to LOVE it :) content that is free on the internet, cost on Apple TV, that's not hot!!!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: If you own an iPhone or an iPad, this is a must buy. We use it all the time. Apple makes everything so simple to use. I have taken ours with us on vacation to play movies for the kids and pix of the day.

Reviews.Title: Cable, replaces.
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV box is great. I primarily use it for Netflix and streaming pictures and projecting images from my Iphone and Macbook. Careful though, because episodes from itunes are super expensive, some of them are nearly $5.

Reviews.Title: The best!
Reviews.Author: Hong Carrillo
Reviews.Content: Works extremely well with my iPad and iPhones. Love the Airplay features. Set up took me under 5 minutes. We use the Netflix features daily. It would be even better if Apple and Amazon get together and approve use of Amazon prime videos with the Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: JS
Reviews.Content: This device is really worth getting if you have an iPhone or iPad. The remote that comes with it is okay but the device really shines when paired with an iOS device using the remote app. The YouTube app on this is great and so is the music application (which I have paired with iTunes match).If you don't use iOS devices you might want to consider a Roku.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Ha Vinh Loc
Reviews.Content: The packaging was totally apple-style, very elegant. Functioning well, intend to get an airparrot to mirror my PC. Overall satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: They collect me the shipment and tax, and it supossed they didn.'t I just hope this product can be hackeed soon so I can see more TV series and movies

Reviews.Title: Review of Apple TV MD199LLA (NEWEST VERSION)
Reviews.Author: ronnie jones
Reviews.Content: Very good performance. However, I hate the remote. Takes so long to  call up what I'm looking for.A small keyboard like my Visio tv has is much easier to use..

Reviews.Title: I like it but it has a few quirks...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Apple TV works great but it does have a few quirks.  First of all, right out of the box is that annoying voice which I had to immediately learn how to turn off.  Airplay is quirky.  Sometimes it works and sometimes it doesn't(we've been using it with my wife's iPad).  I've also noticed that sometimes after enabling airplay on this device, that it will turn off after the unit is put in sleep mode.  Other than these few annoyances, the unit works well, picture is crystal clear, and the menus and organization is great.  I would recommend this.

Reviews.Title: I think this device is great!!!
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: I ordered this device because I'm visually impaired and can't always read text on the TV screen.  When I got this, I turned on Voiceover and it works great.  I talks enough to give me some basic information about a show or item on the menu but doesn't talk over what I'm watching.Setup was easy and I was up and running in no time.

Reviews.Title: Best streamer product you can get
Reviews.Author: Alberto Quijada
Reviews.Content: Apple Tv is a great streamer and if you have iOS devices you will get the most of it by usuing it together while enjoying all the digital content you can find on iTunes and other social networks.

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: power7
Reviews.Content: With a house full of apple technology, this item is a must. It is a bit of a chore to set up and we have to keep reconnecting it but once you get it connected to your device it works great.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: We love our Apple tv. My nine-year-old actually set it up and started using it before I even got home.

Reviews.Title: Good choice
Reviews.Author: Seriously
Reviews.Content: I went from spending $170. /month to 65./month by getting rid of my cable and just having Internet with Hulu + and Netflix. I get all the same shows and more features than I had with cable only. It took a little adjustment to get used to operating. But if you're good with an apple product such as an iPhone or iPad you'll adjust quickly.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Papa fish
Reviews.Content: Got it for my grandkids.  They love it so it rates high in my book fgor quality, prive, and kid friendlessness

Reviews.Title: nice product
Reviews.Author: waterdog
Reviews.Content: I use this for online movie streaming and playing music from an iPhone, and it works great for both.  The user interface is simple and syncing with an iPhone for music streaming could not have been easier.My one gripe is that I have not been able to get my Logitech One remote to work very well with the Apple TV. The Logitech turns it on and off fine, but I have not figured out the navigation using the Logitech.  It may be just that I have just not put in enough effort to get the Logitech One programmed property, or it could also be another case of Apple not playing nicely with products outside the Apple family.  The Apple remote is intuitive and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Device
Reviews.Author: James C Lloyd
Reviews.Content: helps get my whole home airplay setup going.  When your library is on iTunes, this set up just makes sense

Reviews.Title: LOVE ALL APPLES!
Reviews.Author: Pamela Sullivan
Reviews.Content: I live in an old house with few telephone outlets. Apple TV is the best way for me to see a movie without having to move from in front of the TV set.  Very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Mary Ellen Sturgis
Reviews.Content: Visually impaired and the Apple TV is essential in viewing and using my Apple iPad.  User-friendly.  Wish instructions were easier to understand.

Reviews.Title: Great with iPad
Reviews.Author: ZCCH - Sonoma, CA
Reviews.Content: I had resisted getting this for over a year. I finally gave in when I had movies on my iPad that I wanted to watch on my HDTV. It connected easily and works great on my wireless network. I like the small size. People don't even notice it on my TV stand.Turning it off when not in use too a little research, but now that I understand how it works, it is fine.

Reviews.Title: Way better than the Logitech Revue we used to have
Reviews.Author: mcd
Reviews.Content: Like all the apple products we've tried, it's simple to use and does what we want it to do.  I do wish the remote maybe had a keypad, as it is a bit laborious to pick out letters to type in a youtube search onscreen, and is very easy to misplace for months at a time due to its small size!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Carl Saiyed "Carl"
Reviews.Content: Love being able to push media from any of the apple devices in my home. Renting movies on iTunes is very convenient. It's easy to set up just plain works - you can even access your iTunes library on your Mac from this device and stream whatever is there.

Reviews.Title: This will replace Cable soon
Reviews.Author: Richard Regitano Jr
Reviews.Content: I have one at home and at work.  We use at home for movies, tv, music, and pictures.  At work we airplay our pictures, emails and anything else we have on our ipads and iphones.  works flawlessly and will eventually replace your cable subscription.

Reviews.Title: Addicive
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: I truly love Apple TV. My son can watch his hockey highlights, my husband gets his German programs and I myself my British. There is something for everyone and it is so simple to use.

Reviews.Title: Every TV should have one
Reviews.Author: Stevie
Reviews.Content: If you use IOS then every tv you have should have one.  Airplay is great, easy and allows you to show whatever you have on your mobile device onto the tv screen.  Take a video or pictures and show the entire group.  Play a game and mirror it onto the tv so all can watch you.  Looking forward to the addition of games some day...come on Apple open this puppy up and give us the app store.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Stephen
Reviews.Content: This apple TV changed how I see apple. ALong with my macbook pro the apple TV changed how i run my home, manage my entertainment and school. I cant wait for the iTV...true story.

Reviews.Title: Does what it's supposed to do.
Reviews.Author: Tim Brown
Reviews.Content: Not much you can really say about an Apple product I guess. It does what they say it's supposed to do, does it well, didn't cost an arm and a leg, hasn't broken or crashed, so I'm good with it.

Reviews.Title: Everything it was expected to do
Reviews.Author: EDDIE
Reviews.Content: It was simple to install. It worked as advertised. We're getting all the programs we want. We eliminated all our premium movie channels.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: John Miller
Reviews.Content: Received overnight, sets up easily, great performance,slick remote control, can hoop up iPhone and stream right from it. Typical apple product. Gotta love it

Reviews.Title: its great
Reviews.Author: Nathan
Reviews.Content: its everything they said it would be. they are who we thought they were. i guess you can say....im as happy as a little girl.

Reviews.Title: They got it right with v.3
Reviews.Author: TicketMediaGuy
Reviews.Content: I'm reviewing v.3... which is the same as v.2... but now with 1080p.If you see my review for v.2 you should disregard it as they've made significant improvements to the user interface.In short... I love my AppleTVs.  One in the living room and one in my bedroom.  You can "mirror" your Apple's Mac to ALL your connected AppelTVs, so if you're running a movie for a bunch of friends through your mac (like I have a few times) you can have some of them in the living room and some of them in the bedroom watching the same thing.Enough about my life... the product itself is very intuitive to use, the interface is simple and sleek, and allows for iCloud information to be passed to your ATV (bought music on iTunes but don't have iMatch? No problem. All your music that you bought through iTunes now shows up on your ATV and you can play your music to your hearts content). Bought a movie or TV show from iTunes? It plays it via streaming.  They used to only stream rented movies, but NOW you can play any movies or tv shows that you've fully purchased via iTunes.What it DOESN'T do is allow you to play any iTunes extras (the added features that some iTunes movies comes with).  You'll need to run them through your Mac and send the "broadcast" over to your AppleTV.I also love the fact that it pairs up nicely with my Logitech Harmony remote. As simple as the included remote for ATV is, I like everything to be controlled through ONE remote... ONE remote to rule them all... and Apple TV plays nicely in that respect.Why ATV vs. Roku? Quite simply.... simplicity.  My roommate has my old Roku box.  And what I didn't like about it is that there were a plethora of "channels" to choose from, however, most of them had the same content that I could find on the Apple TV box and those apps (Netflix movies and shows, HuluPlus movies and shows, rental items from iTunes, sports apps, etc). You have to wade through all their "channels" to see what they were about and how useful they are to you. I found a majority of the channels NOT useful to me... even less useful when I found out that you had to pay a subscription services for a majority of those channels. And so this is why my roommate ended up with my Roku box.  He don't care. He's happy to have something for free.

Reviews.Title: Mitsubishi WD-73c9 bulb
Reviews.Author: jayjordan21
Reviews.Content: Fast Shipping and Easy Install. TV back in business after replacing blown out bulb. Takes a a minute for the screen to brighten but other than I am a satified customer. I am going on one week. Will update review from time to time with any changes.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Ronnie G. Miller
Reviews.Content: What can I say about this product, it's an Apple!!! A great addition to any TV. Enables you to watch great, current movies for $5.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Heather Fannin
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this product.  It shipped quickly, easy to set up and works great.  Glad I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Sarah Marie Sibley "Siblesandbits"
Reviews.Content: Our Apple TV has been just as good as we anticipated it would be. We use it for everything from watching movies to tv shows to listening to music. I didn't realize the new version is so much smaller than the old one so that was a pleasant surprise. All around a great product. Amazon delivers again!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Amjed Shacker
Reviews.Content: We love you Apple. Keep producing these wonderful gadgets. Life is much more interesting with technology and Apple is the company for it.

Reviews.Title: Works like a champ
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: Now I have all in one access to my netflix, hulu plus, iphone music library etc etc. It doesnt stream video from devices very well for some reason but for everything else its great. Plus I can use my iphone as a remote! Sweet!

Reviews.Title: Loved it
Reviews.Author: Rashid "Rashid"
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly fine, easy installation, you can play any file (music, video and pictures) in your TV, moreover, you can access youtube and other things like (flicker, Vimeo, Trailers, etc...).Syncing the files to be displayed on TV can be done via the wireless network or wired, I have tested playing HD movies via wireless network without a problem.It is recommended to download the FREE (remote) application available from Apple for your Iphone or Ipad to easily control the device and type faster for YOUTUBE search instead of using the provided remote control.Browsing pictures is super fast, there is no lag what so ever, I was surprised to see that even though my pictures are larger than normal Ipad or Iphone pictures, also there is a cool slide show and screen saver.Notes:- You need to buy an HDMI cable it is not included with this product, many available in AMAZON and can be available for less than $10- The item I have received is supporting (100-240V & 50-60Hz), I think some customers outside US might be interested in that, I have also uploaded a photo with such details.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Dustin Mayeux
Reviews.Content: If you do not have a smart TV or want to save hundreds when buying a new TV by this.  A non smart version of a TV is ussually a few hundred cheaper.  Then you buy this and viola!

Reviews.Content: easy to install.  easy to set up!  easy to use!  what more could i ask for.  it took a good five minutes to open it up and find the parts, figure out the instructions, hook it it up and set it on the back of the set!  the hardest part was throwing out the box.  setting it up was with my computer was soooooo, easy.  it was connecting to my my mac mini and as the they say...,. easy as pie.  the hardest part of pie is washing the plate and the fork!

Reviews.Content: the integration with my itunes library and my other apple devices make the device amazing, the only thing to be perfect is the lack of jailbreak and install xbmc,plex or something like that.

Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my dad after he fell in love with mine. He uses it to view the pictures he has on his iPhone. He also uses it for music (so many genres to choose from). Reviews.Content: I currently have three of these and a HD antenna. We only have internet and over the air television which has been amazing. The Apple TV has worked well for me since I have iPads and iPhones which can have stuff streamed to them via Airplay. I tried a Roku but the lack of Airplay and I own many movies that are in iTunes which Roku wouldn't play.

Reviews.Content: I had a Roku play for about 3 years that suddenly died.  Deciding this was a sign, I ordered the Apple TV and love it!!  The design is great and it is easy to use.

Reviews.Content: Fantastic! Only problem is that you get addicted and you want one for every TV & you then have to buy the additional accesories like the optics cable for sound & the HDMI cable for video.
