Reviews.Author: tengleha
Reviews.Content: Read a lot about the AppleTV and wasn't sure if it was worth purchasing.  Decided to buy one for home and one for the office.  If you have any wifi products (tv, bluray, PS3) then there is no need for AppleTV.  The Air Play feature is nice but it only works for a few things.  I have DirecTV but that cannot be shown via Air Play.  So if you have any wifi products or are thinking this will be great for the air play feature, I would do some investigating before purchasing.  At $40 it would be ok.

Reviews.Title: Great

Reviews.Content: We love our Apple TV.  We got all caught up on old tv shows using our Netflix account.  There's alot of other things we could get into, but he haven't explored it yet.  I've been wanting to watch Netflix on my big screen TV for so long, and finally found a way to do that with the Apple TV.  I strongly recommend everyone buy one of these little gizmo's.

Reviews.Title: For $99, a great buy. Streams music/tv. Remote control isn't great.
Reviews.Author: pauldecarlo
Reviews.Content: I don't like the remote.  However, I was able to easily program my main t.v. remote to control this device.It was easy to setup, like most Apple products.  There are no buttons on it, but it has a number of good input/output options on the back.  I'm using HDMI straight to the t.v.Once you're logged into your Apple account, you can see a menu of Netflix, Hulu, and other things.  I like to keep one computer on the home and logged into my iTunes account.  The "home sharing" option has to be on, but then you can stream photos, music, etc... from your computer.There's a lot of features and much more that you can do with this, but I haven't messed around with all the features just yet. So far, I like it.One thing I want to try is traveling with this.  There are some blogs about how to set it up in a hotel, but it seems cumbersome.  I have a hot spot through Verizon and might set it up with that when I'm traveling.  It might work well in a conference to stream things to a projector.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: oliver
Reviews.Content: I have another one of these and being abe to use my computers iTunes as well as my big screen is really cool and worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Love my Apple TV

Reviews.Content: This is the perfect replacement for DVD's, cable, everything. I have both NetFlix and Hulu Plus and with these two monthly subscriptions I was able to replace my cable.

Reviews.Title: Great

Reviews.Author: Thomas Bangash "THBangash"
Reviews.Content: Admittedly, I have not Had the unit for more than a week by this time, but that is aside the point.MAIN Reason for selecting this unit was so that I or MA Hon could hook up and watch the contents of our other Apple Products, (POD, PAD, Air, Pro, Phone) on the TV Screen. and as far as this part is concerned, it serves its purpose, thou I still have to figure out how to interact on it with my Macbooks.Hook up, install and configuration was done in less than 15 mins, including the initial update.The User Interface, ie the Remot, leaves abundance to be desired, and With Iphone/iPad/Mac interaction, One would expect to be able to Input faster With the keyboard, but that is not supported.The connectivity is pretty standard, wifi or Ethernet for input, and HDMI for output.Surely i would had prefered if i could connect my external USB HDD to it too, but that is not supported. Then again, the item is a STREAMING Device. So that is Apparently not what it is suppose to doThe Pre-Set options that comes with this unit is VERY Limited. beside home sharing of the content on the Apple Products or the Purchases from ITunes, it only offers YouTube, Hulu and Netflix for streaming contents right off the internet. the search in youtube is easy and simple, but it lack the option to Sort or Refine the results with any criteria or catagory. at least I have not been able to locate the option to do so as of yet.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV is the best

Reviews.Content: Apple TV is the best, Lots of Movies in the store, Youtube watching and Airplay is great and fast.I recommend it to everyone especially to people who own Apple devices.

Reviews.Title: Perfect if you are committed to the Apple ecosystem
Reviews.Author: Roger J. Buffington
Reviews.Content: If you are committed to the Apple ecosystem, the Apple TV (latest version) is a must have.  It allows you to stream all of your content from your main computer iTunes account to your TV in a superlative manner.  Additionally, you can stream purchased content directly from the iTunes store -- if you have purchased the content from Apple, you can stream it if you have a sufficiently fast internet service.  The newest software version of this device also allows you to access certain other content providers including Netflix.  Unfortunately but not surprisingly, this device does not allow you to access your Amazon Video-on-Demand account, which is truly a shame.  Nonetheless, this device does a lot and does it extremely well.I have been using Apple TVs since the second version, and it has come a long way.  This latest version unfortunately does away with the on-board hard-disk, which allowed one to place content directly on the Apple TV.  This was helpful for use in boats or RVs, where you might not have WiFi, internet, or the ability to stream from an iTunes computer.  On the other hand, the setup and use of this device is almost completely intuitive, and there is essentially no real setup procedure to speak of.  The device goes into sleep mode after being idle for a time, but simply click the remote and it immediately wakes up.  This works perfectly and effectively, and cures the grip that everyone had with the earlier Apple TVs, which was that they always ran warm, causing users to question the service life of the component.Overall, this is an elegantly engineered and well thought-out accessory that is a pleasure to use.  If iTunes is the major source of your content, this device is nearly perfect.  If not, you can still stream Netflix and certain other content providers, but it is somewhat limited in this regards.  RJB.

Reviews.Title: Can't live without this!
Reviews.Author: Gigi
Reviews.Content: Love this!  Use it every day!  We watch a lot of movies and older British TV series on Netflix, and the girls absolutely adore the videos on YouTube that are for children!  This device allows us to watch anything we can see on our iPhones or iPads right on our TV screen, including our photos and videos as screen savers!  If you have an iPhone or an IPad, you should have Apple TV!

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Mybrick
Reviews.Content: We bought an Apple TV because we decided to cancel our cable. We signed up for Netflix and Hulu plus as well. Apple TV makes it so easy to stream these two services. We are saving about $75-100 a month by doing this. We are still able to watch our shows-Castle, Whitney, Go On, NCIS, Hawaii 5-0, etc thru Hulu Plus. We have a 2 and 6 year old that can easily find shows as well.Another thing I like is the radio option. Apple TV has thousands of radio stations to listen to. And while you are listening to them you can set you screen saver to show apple TVs options of flowers, animals, or you photo stream on your iPhone or iPad, thru the iCloud. AirPlay is also easy to do. You just need to be connected to the same wifi as your Apple TV.We love our Apple TV and wish we'd purchased it earlier.

Reviews.Title: Accurate description
Reviews.Author: Wendy A. Arriaga
Reviews.Content: Description and picture are accurate.  Received quickly and it was well packaged.  Not such a technical person so had trouble setting it up at first.  Nothing wrong with the product though.  Read the instructions that came with it and also did some research on- line that had more visual aids which mad it easier for me to connect to my TV and laptop.

Reviews.Title: I should have bought this earlier
Reviews.Author: jebus
Reviews.Content: I hesitated to buy this at first because of Roku 3 but after receiving the Apple TV and playing with it for awhile I am absolutely impressed by it. Everything worked seamlessly right out of the box. If you already have other Apple products at home this is a must have. Once you get one you'll kick yourself for not getting it earlier.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommend this game changer!
Reviews.Author: Jron
Reviews.Content: My family and I use it everyday. Easy Netflix streaming, and Hulu plus for TV..therefore you will strongly consider cutting ties with your cable company. Should you have an iphone, the integration is seamless, and we often watch videos off YouTube,/internet My 4 year old can pick up my phone, go the downloaded (remote) app, select Netflix, and watch her favorite shows. Very easy to use. And did I mention I dropped my cable company??  savings over well over $100 a month (kept the high-speed internet though.)

Reviews.Title: Superb ...its Apple
Reviews.Author: Rajesh Waghade
Reviews.Content: Loved the Interface, loved the remote functionality with iPhone 5, iPad, iPod touch its just amazingly easy to use Remote App.Setup is easy, in 5 minutes I am ready to go...Airplay feature is too good and convenient.Apple TV box is so small that it fits in your hand, pocket and great finish, its really looks smart.Highly recommended product.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for an Apple Girl. :)
Reviews.Author: LissieRae
Reviews.Content: I own a lot of apple products (iPhone 4, Macbook Pro and an iPad 2) so this was the perfect fit for me. It works perfectly with all my stuff and the only thing at all is that the remote for the TV works on my macbook! But I usually just use my phone as the remote anyways! :)

Reviews.Title: Great invention
Reviews.Author: Merle A Higdon
Reviews.Content: So much in a small package. I ordered this so we could watch House of Cards, produced by Net-flicks. Great series and now we watch movies and view things from my iPad on the larger TV screen whenever we want.

Reviews.Title: Love 4 The Apple
Reviews.Author: Juan Mason
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV is easy to work. I have it connected to a number of iTune accounts we have in the house. The Apple TV Remote App works wonderfully on my iPhone. I downloaded the Remote App because  I can see the remote that came with it comming up missing.

Reviews.Title: What can I say - It's an Apple!
Reviews.Author: Donald Bruce Jones
Reviews.Content: Wanted to be able to stream movies and I'm an Apple product person so the choice was easy for me. It easy to use and makes a great addition to my home theater. Apple you have done it again!!

Reviews.Title: Good but not great
Reviews.Author: Johnny Vigneux
Reviews.Content: Apple TV (MD199LL/A) is a pretty good supplement to my entertainment system. You can access many different non-apple accounts from; the NHL network to Vimeo and from youtube to Netflix. Also, you have the same access to the iTunes store that you would from a computer (albeit in a different interface). The real great thing about appleTV is that you can "mirror" your macbook and iphone to your television - this basically means that you can watch your computer screen on your TV. This only works if you have the iPhone 5 (or newer) and a 2011 or newer macbook pro - I'm not sure about other apple products, so please read the fine print before buying! Also, with slightly older apple technology (say iPhone 4) you will still be able to use airplay to play music and videos.However, I feel that apple is still lacking in the total user interface with appleTV. As of April 2013, they do not have access to an app store, so what you see on the main screen is what you get.

Reviews.Title: Works Fine
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: This works great.  I found the setup a bit confusing, mostly in regards to iTunes passwords and such.  With only two buttons on the remote, text entry (i.e., the pasword) is a major challenge to "type" in.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: michael buhler
Reviews.Content: I had looked forward to seeing Hulu, for instance, but one can only get a subscription.  Most everything requires a subscription!  Since I could already stream from my laptop via a cable, the Apple TV is redundant.  There are other devices like this out there, and I would encourage you to research them better than I did.  Hopefully I can find a hack for this box and unlock the streaming features that I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Melanie L. Stanley
Reviews.Content: We have really only used it for Netflix at this point but so far so great! Extremely easy to set up and very straight forward to use. No complaints!

Reviews.Title: Love my Apple TV
Reviews.Author: zacb
Reviews.Content: only thing missing is HBO Go.  other than that love it.  The mirroring from my MBA and Iphone5 is pretty good, gets a little choppy.

Reviews.Title: So easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Coney
Reviews.Content: I love this unit!!! You can stream music right from your iPhone or computer which is the main use for me. I do wish it had an app built in for Pandora but no biggie! I can stream Pandora from my iPhone... Very cool unit that does a lot!

Reviews.Title: The potential is there
Reviews.Author: L. G. Gilley
Reviews.Content: The basic setup for the Apple TV was very easy and many of the features work immediately. However, the instructions for accessing the computer or iPad screens is less than adequate, both in the manual supplied and on the web. The web instructions tell you to click on a symbol that does not appear anywhere, and they don't bother to tell you where it is. This lack of information is very frustrating, and the effort to be "elegant" in having a tiny instruction book really is not helpful. However, the things that work without much instruction work really well.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Stephen O.
Reviews.Content: Streaming iPad / iPhone videos and Netflix app make me realize I don't need cable anymore.  No brainier at the price.

Reviews.Title: Great for Itunes & Netfiix Vids But not Amazon Vids
Reviews.Author: Stanley O. Chang "stan1911"
Reviews.Content: I purchased my Apple TV from Apple.  They didn't have a link for reviews so here I am. I specifically bought Apple TV as I read it can stream from iOS devices.  Ok, just what I wanted.  My 3 year old streaming DVD player has a limited Amazon menu.  No wishlist.  Small con but all my purchased vids are from Amazon.  My ipad retains Amazon wishlist entries. When I want to view one of my Prime vids on my HDTV, I have to note the movie title, then use search to find and select that movie on my DVD player's interface.So, after plugging in my brand new Apple TV squarish hockey puck, registering all the passwords for my wireless network WEP, Apple and Netflix accounts, I noticed Amazon was absent from the channel lineup.  Great access to iTunes purchased or rentals vids but the competition was not there.  No surprise I guess.So, on to Amazon vids.  Vids playing in other apps will only display vids through Apple TV if it's Airplay compatible.  Wish I knew that before sending $100 to Apple.  Vids playing on my ipad in Amazon's video app can send audio to the TV but not video.  However, vids in the Apple "Videos" app will play through Apple TV.  After all, "Videos" is an Apple app. I did notice Apple TV Netflix interface is several times faster than my older DVD streaming player interface.  The remote is what I would expect from Apple, simple and elegant.  30mm wide, 120mm long and 5mm thick tapering down to 2mm at the edges from a single piece of aluminum.  Uses a 2032 button battery. Slender but kinda easy to lose in sofa cushions.I looked into Roku but one reviewer found out that to activate his Roku account, a credit card was mandatory, just in case he made a purchase in the future.  Uh oh.  Another opportunity for a hacked commercial database to spread stolen credit card info, so I will live with Apple TV and continue checking my ipad for my Amazon wishlist movies to search for them in my DVD player Amazon interface.  Such is life, until I buy a newer streaming DVD player.

Reviews.Title: Why Not?
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV gives you so much functionally in regards to iTunes, Hulu, Netflix, Photostream and others. I would say anyone who has an iPhone should have an Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Impressive
Reviews.Author: Willie
Reviews.Content: I am not usually a gadget person, so the ability to transfer so easily the content of the iPad and the computer to the TV screen was quite amazing to me.

Reviews.Title: I love it, love it, love it, really do still love it, really do!
Reviews.Author: Matthew L. "Big Daddy L"
Reviews.Content: This is where my eyes are burned out! I have watched so many movies and the list keeps getting bigger and bigger on Netflix. I do think I will run out of movies in about a year and a half. But that's what happens when you pick off 3 or 4 movies in a day. At the very minimum one movie. Netflix is worth the money and so was the Apple TV. Although now that I know I need a new TV I'm going to buy a smart TV. Then I won't need the money for the Apple TV anymore! But until then they rock!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Ryan Anderson
Reviews.Content: Love it, great product. I can sync it with my iphone, iMac and iPad for games, tv, movies, music and so much more. Nuff said!

Reviews.Title: MUST have for iPhone iPod and or iPad owners (iOS)!
Reviews.Author: Eric F.
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV doesn't look like much but it's an absolutely must have if you're the owner of an iOS device (iPhone, iPod, iPad). The Apple TV doesn't provide the most apps but enough to keep someone content. If you're heavily invested in iTunes this is also a must have. Apple provides constant updates with new features (recently HULU)which is second to none in support. The GUI is also great, actually the best out.For me, the best feature is AirPlay; it is rock solid. AirPlay allows you to wirelessly stream any photos, HD Videos (stunning video quality even wirelessly on my HD TV), mirroring of video games as well as YouTube and basically most things on your iOS device.Apple like many of it's devices make using the Apple TV SIMPLE and a joy. Again, it is absolutely worth the $99 for the AirPlay feature alone.

Reviews.Title: <3 it!
Reviews.Author: cebulka26
Reviews.Content: I got a HDTV as a gift, and given my Apple product collection (computer, ipod, phone), this just made sense compared to the other TV streaming devices. I love being able to airplay from my phone or computer, and share my photography on my TV so easily.

Reviews.Title: Typical apple product
Reviews.Author: dish74
Reviews.Content: Very simple to set up and use. Plug this in to your tv, tell it where the wireless network is, and all your MacBooks, iPads, and iPhones start offering it p to play music and video. It's that simple.

Reviews.Title: great

Reviews.Content: purchased for myself and my mom and we both enjoy it  itunes and netflix  can be used with this and you tube is great  just make sure what cables are needed

Reviews.Title: i bought it as a gift
Reviews.Author: Sayed Nasser
Reviews.Content: it is amazing and works great =) ,, my wife loved it =]i like the idea .. and it is small

Reviews.Title: Works well with my iPhone and iPad

Reviews.Content: I got this mainly for YouTube. Has been working great. I occasionally suffer due to my internet bandwidth but that has nothing to do with the product. Recommended buy especially if you have other Apple products.

Reviews.Title: Another great Apple product
Reviews.Author: edgar ramos
Reviews.Content: It does what it says it will.  Mirroring my iPhone and Macbook is a breeze.  Streaming music is even easier.

Reviews.Title: Download times are the only draw back
Reviews.Author: Susan "deals shopper"
Reviews.Content: I have had the Apple TV a few weeks now.  It was easy to install and has beautiful picture quality.  The problem is I rarely use it because of how long it takes to download a show or movie.  People with faster internet may enjoy more, but with even High Speed DSL internet, I have to plan a few hours in advance for any movie I want to watch.  Just to watch a trailer for a movie takes a few minutes to download.  I haven't tried a Hulu Plus subscription yet, but plan to.  If show can be accessed quicker I will probably enjoy it more.  Perhaps upgrading my internet speed some day will make me enjoy this more.

Reviews.Title: Its great
Reviews.Author: Scott Baker
Reviews.Content: It's great.  The Wi-Fi is really good, the streaming is quick and buffer less.  The mlb.tv spring training games have been great!

Reviews.Title: Apple TV has made television veiwing more enjoyable.
Reviews.Author: judith a bell
Reviews.Content: We live in an area that is not connected to cable and our only internet provider is a phone line--not the most user friendly to watch streamingTV. We dropped the satellyte. We had an early roku device which did not have caption ability. It served us fairly well but one of us really needs captions and with some of the British series, we both need captions. Now all the netflix has captions and I can down load movie rentals and any tv series that I might want and watch them without interruption. My phone line does take a while to down load so I try to do most of that job over night. The Apple product seems to be more efficient and even when watching streaming there is less buffering than before. While we are buying some of the programs from the Apple Store, we are still saving money over subscribing to a satelyte company that forces you to buy so much programing you don't want and never watch .  My husband and I are very happy with this product .

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: Jessica Witham "J Witham"
Reviews.Content: I use it for netflix mostly great for buying or renting movies too. If I wasn't married I'd cancel my satellite tv for this!

Reviews.Title: Apple tv is pretty cool
Reviews.Author: Webblaze
Reviews.Content: Why they didn't allow apps to load on it or safari, I have no idea? This would be in every home in America if that was the case. I like the fact I can mirror my iPads and iPhones to it, but forget about trying to get a web browser on it. If you own a Mac this is a must have. It works good with my windows computers if you leave iTunes up and running. Great picture quality on my projector which doesn't have smart apps, and would be good for anyone who has a good tv but not a smart tv. If you have a smart tv, I'm afraid this cool device wouldn't be good for particuarly special for anything but watching your iTunes content. You can mirror anything from your iPhone or iPad except safari? If somebody knows a work around for this please let me know. Otherwise this is just another cool apple device that can run, iTunes, netflx youtube and Hulu in highdef

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: raef f gorgi
Reviews.Content: It's a great item but the only problem that it didn't come with AV output so I can't let it work with a projector, only on my LCD tv

Reviews.Title: LOVE!!!!!
Reviews.Author: K. Mulready
Reviews.Content: I download a few shows from iTunes that I enjoy watching and keeping the episodes.  I purchased this product so I could watch those shows on my television instead of my computer or phone and it's awesome.  I know it does other things and I'm not using it to it's full capabilities but for what I need it for, it's perfect.

Reviews.Title: We love it!
Reviews.Author: Linda M Wilson
Reviews.Content: We can flip our tv shows, videos, games and everything else up on the tv! Plug in and start watching.  Easy easy.

Reviews.Title: I have 3 of these baby's now!
Reviews.Author: Mark Schuster "m6255"
Reviews.Content: One for my shop, Bought one for my parents and one for my LR Bedroom. Some people want the Apple TV 2 because of Jail breaking. I don't know. This is 1080P the 2 is 720. Only other channel I wanted to watch was HBO GO so I got a ROKU XS. Same thing as Jail-breaking an Apple 2 but its 1080P so is the Apple 3 and a lot less money that a Jail broke Apple TV 2 Plus,if you screw up and get your Apple TV 2 updated, you lose your Jail Break. This is a great product. Oh the updating over wifi would not work. Failed on all three. Found a Mini USB from an old cell phone and plugged it into my computer, Opened iTunes, update screen popped up and in 5 minutes had the latest firmware.I would buy this over the Apple V 2 even if they were the same price. Great picture! Great audio, Air play, Blue Tooth, everything I need!

Reviews.Title: Love my apple TV
Reviews.Author: Jason Sandblom
Reviews.Content: I love this thing. I have one in the living room and one in the bed room. Can't fall asleep without it. No problems whatsoever.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: craig Erickson
Reviews.Content: 5 minutes out of the box and I feel like I've used this product forever. Nice small size. Wonderful product. Have sold 5 more of these to family members who have been over.

Reviews.Title: Why did we wait so long to buy this?
Reviews.Author: colebillcole
Reviews.Content: We are super happy with our Apple TV. We use it in the bedroom to watch the occasional Netflix, etc. We were plugging iPad into TV with a 10 ft HDMI cord before and that was a pain in the butt!Apple TV is super easy to use and took less than 5 min to set up. Love that we can also access the iTunes content from my computer upstairs, including movies that I download as torrents and convert using Vuze. We've even used it to watch videos from YouTube or to listen to the iTunes radio stations.

Reviews.Title: It's cool to have, but it could be better...
Reviews.Author: J. Kennedy
Reviews.Content: I'm glad to have the AppleTV as it's fun and ads a new dimension to our entertainment.I had a problem with network/WiFi conectivity drops but believe I made some changes in the WAP that have taken care of it.The thing I'm surprised about, and disappointed in is the lack of comprehensive music and playback control.  To add music to what's playing is useless.  If you don't build playlists or play by category like genre, artists etc., you really can't build a current play list or "now playing" and have mush control over it.There are probably better appliances out there for a little less money, but over all, I'm pretty happy with this.  I do hope they add more control to it though.

Reviews.Title: APPLE TV IS GREAT
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: APPLE TV is easy to add on to existing TV.  Adds wide variety of additional options to your potential viewing choices.  Also allows you to project photos, keynote presentations, videos from you iPhone or Apple computer with ease.  Versatile with frequent updates to units options/capacity.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: W. Wilson "Jamminmon"
Reviews.Content: Great user interface and price for an apple product. Very easy to set up and to use. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Easy TV
Reviews.Author: R. Knapp
Reviews.Content: Version three works for me.  The installation is Straight-forward; just power and HDMI is all we need.  The remote is not sophisticated, but works well enough.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV device is okay
Reviews.Author: Kim Schopmeyer
Reviews.Content: The display is fairly easy to use. But the directions for using the device are skimpy.  I believe this is the "Apple way" where users are expected to somehow "discover" the various functions and devices, instead of providing instructions.  As with my iPad, there are many, many functions that exist, but one usually only finds them when a friend points them out.  This appears to apply to the Apple TV.In addition, if I want to stop a video and try to start it up again, I get an error message every time.  It requires me to "try again later," which may require me to wait a full 24 hours to get back to the video.  I also find the remote to be, as usual, unclear.  The information on the buttons is not at useful or intuitive and they make no sense at all.  The buttons also don't work consistently and I often have to push one or more buttons many times before something happens on the screen.

Reviews.Title: I found out I can do the same thing the box does, with my Macbook Pro and a cord!
Reviews.Author: Jack Gire
Reviews.Content: Not being a techie, I am unable to understand how to use the box.  The instructions that came with it are anything but helpful. One could put the directons on a 4x5 file card!  When I stream movies from my MacbookPro, the go to my big screen over a wire and I don't have to go through the "enter password" process every time I use it.Save yourself a $100.00 and get a wire from  your computer and enjoy the same experience the box might provide, if you knew how to use it.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: J. Rojas
Reviews.Content: Does exactly what it's supposed to do.PROS:- Works out of the box, minimum effort to setup.- Great integration to my Apple ecosystem (iTunes, iPhone, iPad, Macmini, TimeCapsule).- Small, Easy to conceal behind the TV.CONS:- Needs more channels (Crackle, Amazon Instant Video, HBO GO, etc)

Reviews.Title: Kind of glitchy - but I like it when it works.
Reviews.Author: E. Redifer
Reviews.Content: I like the idea of this device, and if I could get it to do everything they say it will, I would love it.Problem is, I can't get it to work consistently.  I have it hooked up to my home network - wired not wireless -  with a cable modem connection.I've tried to use it for Netflix movies as well as streaming video from other apple computers over the network.As far as Netflix goes, most of the time it works great. However sometimes it just doesn't want to download my netflix movie or it just drops the movie in the middle.Another annoying thing, Apple updates the software and one time when they did it, some of the netflix features were missing, including access to my instant queue.  The next week or so that came back.  I suspect Apple wants you to use it's Itunes store rather than Netflix, so they make it a little inconvenient.I tried to get some movies to stream from my apple desktop machine, but I haven't been able to make that happen either very well. I got it to work once, but haven't gotten it to work again.One interesting feature is being able to show content from an Iphone or an Ipad.  We had several folks at once showing videos one after another one day - that worked great.Customer service: After about six months, the remote control quit working.  This thing is useless without the remote - it's a brick.  You can't turn it on, you can't do anything with it.I had to make an appointment at the Apple store, then wait in line for my appointment, only to find that nobody in the store seemed to know much about Apple TV.  They took the batteries out of the remote on one of their display units, and since the remote seemed to make the lights on the Apple TV blink, they said I needed to buy a new remote battery (they didn't give me one)...  So I took it home, put new battery in the remote and of course it still did nothing.  Back to the Apple store - where after another hour of waiting they finally found a new remote control for me.  It was an excruciating wait for a $99 device to get fixed.  It would have been cheaper just to buy a new one.  It did work fine after the new remote.I hope they get the glitches fixed.  As I said, I like the device, I just wish I could get it work more consistently.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: D. Alva "Kevin"
Reviews.Content: Good product, highly recomended. It would be nice if you have it with a lower price but, works perfect !

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Sower
Reviews.Content: So small and easy to use. This was up and running in 5-10 minutes. I am going to get a second one for downstairs.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: Raafat A. Al-Saqr
Reviews.Content: I LOVE ITSpecially wifi streaming (iPhone and iPad)The new Bluetooth feature is awesome too , now I can pair my B.T keyboard to my ATV

Reviews.Title: Apple TV Rocks!!
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: This product is awesome! Easy to set up and use.  Way to go Apple! I would recommend this product to other buyers.

Reviews.Title: Second Apple TV for box for bedroom TV.
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: Bought a second Apple TV when I moved my old TV into the bedroom. Make a dumb TV a smart TV for less $$s.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product.....
Reviews.Author: Larry G. Ross
Reviews.Content: Other products do steaming but dont give access to AirPlay as does Apple. Super simple to install and use.. Great product..

Reviews.Title: Alternative to cable or satelite
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: Works fine. Does not get local channels or real time TV. However an indoor antena should get your local stations. Check to see if Netflix, Hulu or your antena gets your "have to have" shows before severing ties with your provider, if that is your intention. Nice feature allows you to stop the show your watching and resume it where you left off later. Most of my tv watching is when I go to bed so works out great. Can see on your tv what is on your Ipad. Bit of a lag doing it that way. If your getting it to sever ties, it is a change to get used to. Switching your tv from one source to the other to watch from the antena or apple tv and the change of the menu. No big deal.

Reviews.Title: Love This Device
Reviews.Author: USMC74
Reviews.Content: I have an iPad 4th gen and bought this to stream my HD movies I have downloaded from iTunes.........using the HDMI connection to the TV and the toslink optical cable to my Onkyo receiver I get a fantastic home theater experience....was super easy to hook up and connect to my wireless network.......I can stream from my iPhone4s and my iPod touch 3rd gen as well.......If I use my HP laptop and open iTunes I can stream from my homeshare and play my music too.

Reviews.Title: Definitely like this.
Reviews.Author: newtexian
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is cool. It'll be even cooler when they realize how great this device can really be, and we get a lot more apps for it.Currently a little limited (hence the 4 stars), but what it does do, it does well.I love using AirPlay to listen to my iTunes library on my Denon home theater receiver.

Reviews.Title: Don't even need cable!
Reviews.Author: S. Bennett
Reviews.Content: This is the greatest little invention for the tv. We love that we can connect out iPads and our computers to the tv. I love the iRemote app that lets your phone become a remote control. Love love love Apple TV. Perfect for adults, yet our toddlers even know how to use it!

Reviews.Title: It's Great!!!
Reviews.Author: KK Chan
Reviews.Content: I absolutely LOVE IT!!!! So much to Watch on it and do!!! I'm thinking of canceling cable now!!!! Wouldn't trade it ever!!!!! It's awesome I love apple products!!!! Can't talk enough with this product!!

Reviews.Title: Bought as a gift
Reviews.Author: Lindsy M. Carranza
Reviews.Content: But I have one as well and I love it, we don't have cable or anything and it's an extremely convenient way to rent new releases, watch netflix, hulu plus, youtube, listen to music and much more.

Reviews.Title: Great gift item for apple lovers
Reviews.Author: ShanieceB
Reviews.Content: Hi All, I got this as a bday gift for my boyfriend and he absolutely loves it. Although he initially had problems syncing it to his macbook, he figured it out and now all products-ipad, uphone, etc are synced.

Reviews.Title: Love mine!
Reviews.Author: Sage Wysocki
Reviews.Content: It works flawlessly.  No issues here.  Radio stations on it are my main priority, most of them sound crystal clear (with the exception of few.)  500 channels of whatever genre I want at my fingertips is just awesome!  Add a slideshow of all of the pictures that I've ever taken with my iOS devices is just so cool.  The remote app for it works perfectly, and the remote that comes with it is one of the few high quality remotes that I've ever seen.  It also has some of the best reception, working about 50 feet away.  1080p looks brilliant!  YouTube very rarely need to buffer.  AirPlay is delayed by a few milliseconds, but you really only notice it when gaming, and I got used to it quickly.  I love being able to push a button on my phone or iPad, and instantly see a mirror of my screen on my TV.  The build quality on this good.  It's plastic, but it still feels pretty dang good for something that'll be out of the way most of the time. (not as good as the 1st generation build quality though). Overall, a very solid addition to your setup, perhaps this will be the one device to bind it all together, as its done for me.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Karen M. Loparco
Reviews.Content: but the screen on the tv cuts off part of the end icons for the choices of apps and the shows that are on the end of hulu and netflix.

Reviews.Title: A SHORT review
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: With so many long, detailed reviews about this awesome product, I figured a short, quick review might be helpful.Apple TV is great, I've gotten rid of cable, I'm saving money, and mirroring from an iPhone is pretty amazing.Netflix, Hulu Plus, YouTube and Vimeo are all available and work seamlessly, plus anything you've purchased on iTunes is ready to play, this includes music, TV shows and movies. You can also rent through iTunes, which though I thought I wouldn't use, I've rented just about a movie a week since purchasing Apple TV.Also, MLB, NBA, and NHL packages are available, however, there are blackout restrictions based on the location of your internet provider, so if you're a fan of local teams, these may not be worth it.In closing, buy Apple TV, it's worth it.

Reviews.Title: A nice accessory for those wanting internet tv
Reviews.Author: SenaR
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift and we were very excited to use it. Surprisingly, it's actually very small and the setup was really easy. Once everything was plugged in, we were able to program it within just a few minutes. Once it was all programmed, it was relatively easy to switch through the menu to whatever category of your choice. We primarily used it for Netflix and it works really well.

Reviews.Title: Super
Reviews.Author: D. Mullen "pontoosuc"
Reviews.Content: I have both the apple tv and the roku side by side in our den. The apple tv has the best picture but is limited in it's channel offerings. The roku has less than perfect picture but has more channels.I am planning to purchase another apple tv for the kitchen though.

Reviews.Title: The Best? 'Fraid So!
Reviews.Author: Jon West
Reviews.Content: Apple TV MD199LL/A [NEWEST VERSION]I wanted the Apple TV so I could access recorded shows from my DVR onto another TV.  I wanted it to be able to access my DVR and transfer live TV to my other TV.  After I bought it, I read some discouraging reviews stating that Apple TV can not stream HBO GO or others.  The Apple TV DOES enable me to stream HBO GO in full screen mode using AirPlay and not by mirroring.  I access NPR music and PBS apps on my Ipad, and play the concerts and shows on full screen ( a 42 inch LG and a 55 inch LG led 3D tv.) I do the same with HBO GO too.  All of these work on Ipad 2 and 4 and Ipod Touch 4. The clarity of the picture is incredible, better than the Roku -- which is pretty good and beats most built in smart apps included with newer DVR's and "smart" TV's.I use DishAnywhere on my Ipad and can access all the live TV channels I subscribe to including any and all in either HD or SD.  I can access ShowTime and HBO as well as NBC or Comedy Central.  I access DishOnDemand and watch the shows on my large TV from the Ipad.  I am also able to access my stored shows and movies from the DVR and play them on the Ipad and then via Apple TV view and listen to them on the large screen TV in full HD quality.  I am not using 'mirroring.'Note: My Apple Ipad 2 does not allow me to access Dish Anywhere except only by "mirroring." That is not as good of an option since I cannot get the entire TV screen filled this way.  Also, regardless of which device I use, the Amazon app for the Ipad ( or Ipod Touch) will only broadcast the sound not the picture, so I would have to use mirroring for that app, but I have had a Roku 2XS, and I use that for Amazon Video streaming to access my Prime movies and others.The video quality on the Apple TV is brighter and appears to offer more definition and clarity than the Roku --- which, again provides an excellent picture.  I do not use Netflix but my wife is trying a one month sub only to get Blu Ray DVD's of a certain TV series. The Netflix app on the Apple TV is by far the best HD quality picture one can get.  The You Tube app is excellent since I can also use my paired Blue Tooth keyboard to search the Your Tube site.  The WSJ site is good too.  I am taken aback as to how much I can stream in HD from my Ipod Touch 4. I am using the Ipod over the Ipad to access the apps and DishAnywhere.Of course I can access the my iTunes library but I don't care to listen to the music on my TV.  I have a few movies in my library that I acquired via ultra violet or something like that which I have in my iTunes cloud. Playing them back from ?wherever they are via the Apple TV is a real pleasure. The color and picture quality are the best.  Apple still reigns supreme when it comes to producing a great visual and sound product.

Reviews.Title: Awesome device
Reviews.Author: doclee
Reviews.Content: I added this one as a second Apple TV for my home. I really like how these work and how easy they are to install into my system.

Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Content: Love 1080P output. Airplay from iPad and iPhone work well. Now able to sync with Bluetooth keyboards which helps with entering titles on Hulu and Netflix. The only negative is airplay mirroring from a MacBook can be laggy so it's better to connect a TV directly to the MacBook if you want to mirror your display.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: John B. Reese "Dubai Master"
Reviews.Content: One of the best things I've aver bought besides my Imac.  We use this every day.  One thing I would like is if we could get Amazon on it.

Reviews.Content: Apple TV is well worth the money and good addition to any Apple House Hold.  Works very well and like the interface with outer Apple Devices.  Both Netflix and Hulu work flawless along with Apple Library, only flaw I find it Netflix titles appear kinda small for me and have to squint to read it sometimes.

Reviews.Title: new apple tv
Reviews.Author: CMG72
Reviews.Content: very nice and good price love the airplay mode, i connect my ipad 2 via wifi and i can see my videos directly on my tv without using cables thats amazing

Reviews.Title: Fabulous Product
Reviews.Author: Ala M. "aelmalak"
Reviews.Content: This is a dream to use, I use to download movies and connect to the TV via computer.  No more !!!  This one of the best products I have ever bought.Highly recommended

Reviews.Title: Surpprised at features
Reviews.Author: Dale
Reviews.Content: Went to local store to purchase Apple TV, only to find the last one walking out the door as I walked in.  Looked at Amazon.com and I had it next day with no trouble. Thank You Amazon.com

Reviews.Title: Best option for streaming content to your TV assuming you use the iTunes Ecosystem
Reviews.Author: M. Martinez
Reviews.Content: I have found the Apple TV to be the best means for streaming content from your iTunes library to your TV set by far. No other media box has a easier to use interface and all that I have used seem to lag and generally be sluggish compared to the Apple TV. One thing to consider though with the Apple TV: It is designed to be used with iTunes. To get the most bang for your buck with this device, you need to manage your audio/video media with iTunes. I would like to see apps on this device in the future, but for now it does what I want flawlessly!

Reviews.Title: I love my Apple TV
Reviews.Author: BBJ
Reviews.Content: Don't wait, just buy it.  It is amazing what this little device can do and how simple it is.  The size is great and the quality is incredible.  Between music, video and even mirroring out Macbook Pro's this device handles them all.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV is the best
Reviews.Author: Peter G "NJ Cyclist"
Reviews.Content: Typical of an Apple product, beautiful, yet functional design.  I just wish my TV provider would allow you to stream their channels over Apple TV.  It would make it that much more functional.  We have 2 and use them every day.If you have a Mac, you can easily do screen mirroring and watch streaming videos from your laptop to Apple TV in just one click.

Reviews.Title: Apple does it again
Reviews.Author: jeanne m kirby
Reviews.Content: I had the original version of Apple TV in my living room and enjoyed it for the last 4 years.  I had been considering getting the latest vesion and when I built out a media room in my house I added another.  Love this product, fast easy to setup and once I connected to my Itunes account all my music, movies and pictures were available instantly through the cloud.I use one to run my home media/music through the house including 16 speakers and the older one in my media room and couldnt be happier.  im a Prime member so it was a no brainer to order from Amazon.Functionally this unit is much faster, about 1/4 the size and easier to run than the original box.  I would recommend to anyone wanting a seemless media experience. 5 stars
