Reviews.Content: was working great until now when it doesn't detect my wireless signal (and that too from an apple router!). which means i can't do airplay from my ipad. otherwise it works great on the wired connection. let me try taking it to the apple store...

Reviews.Title: i loved it
Reviews.Author: Jaime Ramallo Torrez
Reviews.Content: The product exceeded my expectations apple tvI have no product to give it 5 starsthe product has a good presentation

Reviews.Title: GREATEST THING SINCE SLICED BREAD
Reviews.Author: Greg Scott
Reviews.Content: LOVE my APPLE TV! Only improvements I would request is the ability to mirror History Channel App and Amazon Live Streaming app from my iPad, and an actual Safari browser built into the box instead of having to mirror from another device.

Reviews.Title: The best techno gadget for my future lifestyle!
Reviews.Author: Chris Grieshaber
Reviews.Content: To be honest, this is being written on a year-old Macbook Pro. I also own an iPhone, a Time Capsule, an OG Apple TV... and between myself, significant other, and the friend crashing on my couch, the number of fruit-based electronic devices in my household currently numbers at... ten? Eleven? Fact is, I might be slightly biased.But! Another fact is this gadget may finally be the thing that convinces me that we're living in The Future. And why is that, you ask?AirPlay.See, the thing is that Apple has pretty much nailed the concept of dead-easy streaming to the big screen mounted on the wall (just like yuppies!). This has kind of changed my life. I consider myself, if not an audiophile, then at least an audio appreciator, and love and cherish my vintage, freshly re-foamed JBL loudspeakers. I have managed to basically make my entire A/V setup disappear from my living room as a result of this little box. I plugged a chip-amp in behind those speakers, and then just started using AirPlay. For everything. Soon, I'll have the ATV mounted behind the TV and poof! That's it! If I want to listen to a CD (yeah, I have a CD collection) then I'll pop it in the laptop and beam it over. Same with a DVD. Or radio from my phone. I select the ATV and those JBLs start pumping.And it gets even more exciting when someone has photos to show us or a spontaneous YouTube-off. All of it just goes straight to the TV, reliably, no fuss - just the occasional compression artifacts faintly audible.And that's the thing. It's not perfect. It's wireless, so I'm not wringing the ultimate in audio quality out of my ones and zeros. It's mostly a dumb box, requiring I have my laptop open if I want to listen off of my iTunes library, or buy things ala carte off the iTunes store more often than I intended to. I also really really wish I could add services to it. And honestly, if you're not as brand-centric as I somehow became, it's probably won't be so magical (what with AirPlay being proprietary and all). But it does 1080p, and has been the the trigger to completely upend my attitudes and behaviors surrounding media consumption and my home. I watch more videos. I listen to more music. I present things to my friends and learn more as a result. And that's not bad for the little black hockey puck once known as Apple's forgotten side project.TL;DR - I own a lot of Apple product, so this fits perfectly with my life in The Future, full of streaming and robots that fold my laundry. Might make less sense if you own disparate electronics. I'd say to throw one in the cart next time you buy a Mac.

Reviews.Title: Works great for Mac and iDevices but Lacks Channels
Reviews.Author: Guitarplayerbp
Reviews.Content: I initially go this to watch videos and try to eliminate cable.  It's not enough.  While I'm a family with three iPhones and two iPads, it's not compelling enough to have just the Apple TV.  Apples holds the reigns too tightly to be the sole device.  They are slow to add channels and functionallity.I also have a Roku and it provides much more functionallity and a lot more channels.  WIth the use of PlayOn software on my PC and the Roku I have all of the TV I want (recorded, not live) along with Netflix and all of the other video services.

Reviews.Title: Poor streaming and caching performance
Reviews.Author: bhipinne
Reviews.Content: Poor streaming and caching performance otherwise ok, however most of my media is purchased on amazon so not used much as pushing from android to other compatible devices.

Reviews.Title: Super duper
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Schuch
Reviews.Content: Great new way to watch TV! It gives me programs that are exactly what I want, when i want it.

Reviews.Title: Product. Works
Reviews.Author: RH "RH"
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, breeze to set up and navigation is idiot  proof. Delivers as it is supposed to when used.

Reviews.Title: Easy and a better value than on-demmand
Reviews.Author: Dave in Ashland
Reviews.Content: First my profile is home with 2 teenagers so the youtube features are  a big hit.  We now look here for "on demand" movies as the kids get itunes gift cards all the time.  I was not sure about real-time streaming but this is flawless and sending music and video from the iphone and other devices are simple.  All you have to do is share your library in itunes ( PC of Mac) and you can display it on your TV in HD.Next I need better audio on the TV to replace the stereo!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product and excellent service...!!!
Reviews.Author: Mark Miller
Reviews.Content: We love the Apple TV (newest version).  It has added more to our entertainment experience.  The setup took me less than 5 minutes (with an existing WiFi network and iTunes account with Share enabled).  We are considering dropping our Cable TV, keeping Cable Internet and using just the features of Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Festus "cooking skydiver"
Reviews.Content: Opened up a new world of entertainment for us. Saw 4 years of "Breaking Bad" in 10 Days. Canceled all our premium channels.Make sure you have an available HDMI outlet on your TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Device!
Reviews.Author: Fun Finder
Reviews.Content: Just as advertised for easy access to Netflix and music. Love it!No down side at all.Apple makes great product!

Reviews.Title: Best thing ever!
Reviews.Author: Shoppaholic Chick
Reviews.Content: When I first purchased this I found a better price here than apple store or Best Buy. But when Amazon started to charge tax for some items, I purchased all my other 4 apple tv's at Best Buy, yes, that is how much I love aplle tv's, I have one for each television in my house. It is a great product, with awesome features, my favorite being Airplay or mirroring. It is very easy to use, even for my 6 year old. Since I have Amazon prime, I can mirror movies or shows from Amazon instant video that are not available on Netflix, directly to my tv.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Victori4ever
Reviews.Content: Wow..what a nice little toy.  I enjoy viewing something on the iPad and then it appears on the HDTV...so cool!!

Reviews.Title: Easy setup and great HD images.
Reviews.Author: Chmoller
Reviews.Content: This is such a great product with a price that is awesome. I have two at home and can't get enough of it. The only thing Apple should consider is embedding more streaming services to the box.

Reviews.Title: As expected from an Apple product
Reviews.Author: Efrain Yepes
Reviews.Content: I love my Apple TV. Got one in every room. Even my grandkids love it. They use it in the guest room with their iPads when they play multy palyer games.

Reviews.Title: Best apple device I've ever purchased
Reviews.Author: Joseph
Reviews.Content: I bought the Apple TV because I wanted to play all my video and music on my tv I wasn't disappointed. I can play my videos on my iPod touch and push play on Apple TV.  I will definitely recommend this to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Marcus Lontra
Reviews.Content: Who still buys at Apple Online Store????For 10 bucks less, you get the same, faster!Must have for Apple Macbook users!

Reviews.Title: AirPlay works great, but content unimpressive for me
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: I really just bought this to link my iPad and our iPhones to my old Bose system to play music.  AirPlay function works excellent for that purpose.  For $100 I think this is worth it for that purpose alone.  Can link to computer to play music from iTunes, and also can upload purchased music into Apple TV to play directly.  You can mirror iPad or iPhone 4S+ to view on TV, decent feature except that iPad doesn't have 16:9 aspect ratio so part of your tv screen doesn't get utilized. Content of Apple TV was unimpressive for me, but I already had most of those features on my Bluray player anyway.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Shawanda
Reviews.Content: Obviously this is a great device to possess...it's Apple. However, on top of being able to conveniently purchase this product, I also got it at a discounted rate....I'm Loving this!

Reviews.Title: I recommend but older routers/modems can be problematic
Reviews.Author: lakesaintclair
Reviews.Content: I'm an Apple share holder but I have to admit I didn't expect what happened when I hooked it up. Homeshare worked wirelessly between my Windows 7 PC with iTunes and the Apple TV. But guess what? The internet shuts down for all the PCs, including the one I have iTunes on. And it's not easy to get it going again. After Googling it, it appears that a lot of other people have the same problem. It has something to do with my router which is a Linksys WRT54G and the IP address. You know what, it should be plug-n-play and it isn't in my case, and I'm not an Apple geek who prefers to spend his life trying to fix what shouldn't need fixing. I suspect if you have a Mac or iPad you won't have this problem, but if you have what I have, you probably will be unhappy. On the plus side, playing your iTunes content through the system or ordering content through Netflix, etc., is very cool. It is the future so I'll keep it and wait until I have a day to fix what shouldn't have to be fixed.UPDATE: Aug 2013. I moved and now have a new comcast router/modem combo and the "shuts down the Internet problem is gone. After many month I really like the Apple TV, especially the iTunes music capability and YouTube. It is well worth the money when hooked up to your TV and stereo. The older modem/router was the problem. Now my PCs and iPhone/iPads work fine.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: alwaysfun
Reviews.Content: I purchased this about a month ago.For some reason the wireless connection would not connect, so I just ran an ethernet cable to it.I hope that when I actually have the time and connect the wireless it will work and I am not stuck with a product that does not function properly..Otherwise Apple TV is the way to go!

Reviews.Title: Easy
Reviews.Author: ernst
Reviews.Content: The setup is extremely easy.  The family has gotten more use out of the Apple TV in the first month, than the Roku we had over a year.

Reviews.Title: This thing is awsome!
Reviews.Author: Ghassan Tranesh
Reviews.Content: I had this item just yesterday, I liked so much, I can't believe that I stayed without it for all this time!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: MM
Reviews.Content: I love everything about the product. Zero complaints. It's not often you can say that! Setup accessing my iHomeServer was brainless.

Reviews.Title: A TV system that talks to your computer?
Reviews.Author: Nate-G
Reviews.Content: one word... Awesome. It's got Hulu and Netflix pre loaded, all you need is an internet connection (faster internet prefered, above 3mbps) for streaming from Hulu or Netflix. I love the fact that you can stream the movies right from your iTunes account to the TV.The CONS: If you want to stream movies from your computer, you must have iTunes running in the background and be able to connect to it, otherwise you cannot watch them. If the program is closed, you lose the connection and the movie turns off.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Stanislaw Zdanewicz
Reviews.Content: As described, well packed and arrived on timeWould recommend to anybody, very satisfied with the service. Will use the service again.

Reviews.Title: what can be said
Reviews.Author: dust
Reviews.Content: Honestly, there is not much I can say about this product that doesnt speak for itself. Living overseas I do not have access to the shows I like to watch back in the United States. This has given me a legal way of watching the shows I like to watch as well as watching movies and listening to music and then it airplays my MBP and my iDevices as well. Great buy overall.

Reviews.Title: WHY DID I WAIT SO LONG TO GET THIS!
Reviews.Author: J. C. Goldenberg "BookWhisperer"
Reviews.Content: I had tried Roku about a year ago but it screwed up my tv and dvr so I was very reluctant to try this but everyone I knew who had it insisted that it was the best.  I bought it, plugged in one plug and it was done!  SO EASY TO SET UP! And it works perfectly with my TV and my DVR (Time Warner Cable).  I LOVE IT!  I only wish that I had got this years ago!

Reviews.Title: Works as stated.
Reviews.Author: Thinker623
Reviews.Content: Worked real goos.  Make a Apple products work on TV.  You can have whatever is on device on tne TV or just the videos.

Reviews.Title: Another Apple success story
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: It does the job with a minimum of fuss - providing access to on-line content and displaying a beautiful picture on the TV.  Recommended

Reviews.Title: Love our apple TVs
Reviews.Author: C. Fox
Reviews.Content: We have two of the older models and one of the new and love them all.  Setup easy, use easy, and wireless-N.

Reviews.Title: awesome product
Reviews.Author: Kevin Pack
Reviews.Content: It's a awesome product. We bought it for my Mom. She had some issues with her router so double check that you have a compatable one before buying. Hers was a Cisco and it didn't work well.

Reviews.Title: appletv review
Reviews.Author: oswaldo
Reviews.Content: Quiero comentar que este producto de apple es totalmente recomendable, la experiencia como.usuario es de las mejores. Instalación sencilla, interface adecuada. 100% utilizable

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Mary Ann Hadman "Limey"
Reviews.Content: It is another great Apple product! It is extremely easy to set up.Only con is it does not come with more instructions!

Reviews.Title: Big Fan
Reviews.Author: PTW
Reviews.Content: I really like my apple tv.  Really a great accessory if you have multiple apple devices and a library of music and movies in itunes.  Netflix works great on this too.  Cool little device!

Reviews.Title: Very happy with Apple TV multiple features
Reviews.Author: V. Camiolo
Reviews.Content: I'm most happy with the ability to show my Flickr pictures on my large screen TV.  We have had many enjoyable family get-togethers where I can so easily now share and enjoy the pictures that I've taken via Flickr and videos on Youtube.I also enjoy being able to show my iPhone display and Netflix on the TV and play Internet radio channels as well.  I was concerned as to whether the performance over WIFI would work.  Even though I do have a hard wired cat5 cable available from my router upstairs I decided to try the WIFI first.  It works so well I never plugged the cable in.  I highly recommend the Apple TV unit.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV MD 199LL/A
Reviews.Author: Amber9207
Reviews.Content: Great item. I bought this as a Christmas gift for my nephew, and he loved it!! I was so happy to find this on Amazon. Very happy with the purchase, and arrived on time.

Reviews.Title: A great product
Reviews.Author: Si
Reviews.Content: Integrates well with iTunes on the main computer which means any kind of streaming (photos/videoa/music) with in the house is greatNice gateway to streaming  from Internet: acess to apple movies/Netflix/YouTube

Reviews.Title: Gooooooodd
Reviews.Author: Zulema Cook
Reviews.Content: Fairly easy to use little box here from Apple. Great interface, highly recommended for those people who likes to spice up their TV sets.

Reviews.Title: Excelent!
Reviews.Author: Milton Ortiz
Reviews.Content: Great product just what i needed to watch all my ios products, ipad, iphone, etc. ive even use it to work on the flat screen

Reviews.Title: Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Cheri Camp
Reviews.Content: Ordered this for a Christmas present, it arrived in a few days, great product, great price & I didn't have to deal with the crowds in the stores!  How can I complain?

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted.
Reviews.Author: xoxmbixox
Reviews.Content: We have the Roku and the Apple TV. At first it took a little figuring out because the products are different but I love the apple tv a lot more. Very easy to use. Haven't had a problem so far. The guy who did a lengthy comparison of the two is spot on and he convinced me to buy this product and I'm not upset that I did. Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV-3
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: Streaming movies/music is smooth with absolutely no interuptions. In the past I used my Samsung B-ray player to stream movies and it was very frustrating as the movie would pause, stream and restart playing again. My Apple TV-3 is sitting next to my Blue Ray player in my entertainment center, and I have no streaming problems at all. Great product, way to go Apple!

Reviews.Title: Excellence
Reviews.Author: C. S. Campbell
Reviews.Content: After reading some reviews, I had made plans to return this device for a Roku 2. I have the return mailing label (provided by Amazon) but before I place everything in the box, I gave it one more go around. And after reading MANY more reviews regarding Apple TV and Roku 2 and since I have EVERYTHING Apple (MacBook Pro, Mac Pro desktop and 2 iPads), I decided that the Apple TV (new version) is a keeper. Like everything else Apple it just works! Below line, if you are thinking differently, just stick with Apple!

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Cena C. Hamby "Cena"
Reviews.Content: As you probably know, Apple products are never on sale.  This was!  No taxes or shipping make it a great value.  Love watching movies and viewing our pictures on our 52 inch TV!

Reviews.Title: Airplay!!
Reviews.Author: Luis H.
Reviews.Content: One word that resumes my reason for buying this: Airplay. I can stream music and videos from my iPhone and iPad.

Reviews.Title: Its the best thing on the world
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: completely change my life now I can listen to music watch netflix connect my cell phone with tv and connect my computer to the tv

Reviews.Title: Bye bye cable box
Reviews.Author: Trey Humbert
Reviews.Content: This is the Greatest device ever, can't believe I waited so long to buy one of these things....bye bye cable box

Reviews.Title: Everything and more
Reviews.Author: T. Plunkett
Reviews.Content: I love this product. I was surprised at all that it does like AirPlay for music and video, Netflix and many other commercial streaming services, and Internet radio.  Plus, photo stream slide show!  I loved that I could take a picture during a party and it would show up on the tv!

Reviews.Title: Love the airplay
Reviews.Author: L. Leon "DueceL3"
Reviews.Content: Gotta have one of these if you are a speaker and use keynote. The airplay feature is the best feature.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Miguel
Reviews.Content: It is so easy to set up.  Just plug it in, connect to your wifi and log in to your accounts and you're all set!  The only reason I gave it a 4/5 stars is because there is no access to Amazon Prime content.  Not that I use it but it would be nice to have that option.  Other than that all other things work great!

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Greg Flannery
Reviews.Content: My son uses all Apple products (iMac, iPad, etc.)  This integrates perfectly and was easy to set up.Received it the day after I order it!

Reviews.Title: Apple TV a hint of what's to come...
Reviews.Author: J. Dodge
Reviews.Content: I like the interface much better than Roku's. Much easier and more enjoyable to use. A little disappointed in that it does not have newer first run movies. I am hoping Apple comes with something more affordable, easier to use and better than FIOS or Comcast.

Reviews.Title: Convenient
Reviews.Author: DM
Reviews.Content: Makes it nice to watch movies and videos from the ipad. A little quirky though and sometimes videos don't work depending on the app. Other than that it works well. I believe it is overpriced for what yo get though. I don't use all the crap that came loaded on it either. It seems to me that all that crap is just another way they try to make money off of you.

Reviews.Title: One of the best purchases I've made this year
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: We use this for Netflix and Hulu Plus.  We signed up for these through the Apple TV and after the free trials are over they will bill to our iTunes account.  We can turn the subscription on and off through iTunes.  Theinterface for Netflix and Hulu Plus is similar.  It looks like services like this work the same with the Apple TV vs. having apps that have completely different interfaces.  Youtube works well and the radio is nice also.  It's excellent.  The interface is really clean.  Setup is dead simple.  It seamlessly integrates other Apple devices.It also integrates with our iPads and iPhones.  Having it work with other Apple devices is surprisingly useful.  We airplay from these devices to the TV all the time.  We use this for Pandora, video clips that we come across from web pages, etc.  It's nice to put those up on the TV to show the family.  You can mirror screens as well.I have to say that it's cool to start watching something on the iPad (e.g. a Netflix documentary) and then resume on the Apple TV later on.  I do this all the time.  I start watching something on the iPad, maybe while the kids are using the TV.  Then when they're done I resume on the TV.  That's more of a Netflix thing than an Apple TV feature but obviously it all works together nicely and I want to mention it for those who are considering this kind of setup.We use the remote app to control the Apple TV and that works really well.  Also, the screen saver for the TV will pull from your photo stream so when we take a picture it immediately shows up on the TV's screen saver and photo stream,  Having access to everything you buy with iTunes is very nice.The remote that Apple provides is not bad.  I've seen reviews that complain about it.  It's small, yes.  But it's very functional and we make sure to put it on the coffee table or an end table when we aren't using it so that it doesn't get lost.  It doesn't allow you to control the sound on the television.  That would be a nice feature to add.Like any Apple device it automatically updates its software periodically when new versions are available.  It's very user friendly.Lastly, we used this setup plus a Winegard FreeVision TV antenna to eliminate cable TV.  We're *very* pleased.  My wife was a skeptic and pleaded to drop the idea.  I kept cable while we tried this and then I let her decide.  Our deal is that she can allocate the savings from cable to something else that we need (for the kids or the house).  She loves the new setup now that she's tried it.  The kids absolutely love it and thanked me for getting them Apple TV.  It's really about the entire system but they like how Apple TV organizes kids shows by character.  They flip through and then find new shows to watch.Buy it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent little toy!
Reviews.Author: SteamedFrog Shopping
Reviews.Content: Okay, my initial plan was to save up and just buy a mac mini and hook up an external hard drive to play all my iTunes library, but that's going to take a while, and in the meantime, I had 4TB of iTunes videos (sad, I know) that had no way to get to my TV...so I picked this up. (Thank you, refund fairy!)It was a nice surprise that it didn't make me authorize it, since I've maxed out the number of devices I can authorize, and I didn't know who was going to get cut from the lineup (again, weep for me and my troubles!) and that made life nice.The downside was that the apple remote was operating my laptop and the apple TV at the same time, so while I got it on the network I think I watch/paused about five movies on my computer.I had to turn the home sharing feature off, then on again on my laptop to get the streaming effect going (not airplay, I think my computer is too old for that to work without airparrots assistance, but I hooked this up yesterday so haven't tried too hard yet) and then later when I went to change videos I had to do the same thing. Minor issue for me, but if you're operating a desktop in another room you might be led into temptation to use bad words after that goes on for a while. Also if the computer you're streaming from goes to sleep, that may or may not affect whether the movie continues (I just muted a really long music playlist)So I love this thing, but I also have months of iTunes exclusive video to play with...if you primarily watch other kinds of videos, I don't know that this will bring you nearly the skeeky joy it brought me. Best of luck though!Also I used a mediabridge HDMI 3D quality cable, and the picture is gorgeous, even the SD stuff I tried.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: kjk
Reviews.Content: Easy to hook up and navigate and great picture. I would recomend this product. I'm adding more words because I have to.

Reviews.Title: Love it (apple fan) Does what I expected
Reviews.Author: DP "DP"
Reviews.Content: looking for something with an easy set-up and can instantly forward videos and music from my iphone.  This does exactly what I wanted.  I have on in the living room as well as bedroom when I want to watch movies that are on the computer.For the living room you can use this one trick.....I hooked the apple TV up to the stereo reciver via the optical audio cord.  Now, I only have to turn on the receiver and forward music from my phone to get the sound.  I can leave the tv off (like when going through hdmi) because the apple TV will  start playing what I do on my phone instantly.  HDMI can also be hooked up to make it a dual output device.

Reviews.Title: Presentation in a box?
Reviews.Author: black sheep hunter
Reviews.Content: I bought this in order to connect my ipad to projectors/TVs for presentations.  For this purpose the product HAS limitations.  I have relegated it to being used mainly for streaming netflix and hulu+.  If you are simply looking for a device to stream your media to your television...this is fabulous and I would give it 5 stars; however, I was expecting more in the marriage of AppleTV and my iPad.PROS:Great HD quality when using the HDMI connection.Can mirror my iPad to display photos at gatheringsExcellent alternative to cable/satellite (when subscribed to netflix and hulu+)The unit is small and mighty (easy to transport)CONS:-I am a public speaker and use the SlideShark app often to present my powerpoints from an iPad.  For this product to work, you have to have an internet connection.  Not all of my venues do.-I have to work around the limitations of projectors (until I purchase my own) that do not yet have HDMI input.  There are converters from HDMI to VGA yet that only carries video signals the only audio output is optical and most portable speaker systems are not set to receive optical audio signals.IF I were able to mirror my iPad WITHOUT internet (via bluetooth) I would give this 4 or 5 stars, but this was a great disappointment that prohibited me from using it for my primary intentions.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: A. Liu
Reviews.Content: So far, works ok.  Sometimes I get disconnects when AirPlay, but not sure why.  Didn't have this problem with my apple tv 2.  Will try it for a bit longer before I deem it defective

Reviews.Title: Best purchase you'll ever make!
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: Being able to have my iTunes library played on our big screen TV is wonderful.  Netflix, HuluPlus and the MLB app are also inlcuded.  We subscribe to MLB package so now we can take it with us when we travel with our AppleTV.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: DeeDee
Reviews.Content: We used to have a Roku but it was an older version and I wanted to upgrade. Since we have mostly Apple computers, however, I decided to try the Apple TV instead. It's great. We use it mostly for Netflix streaming and the picture is extremely good. One of my favorite features, however, is Airplay. If your computer supports Airplay (newer Macs do), you can stream anything from your computer wirelessly to the TV - no cables needed. There is little or no degradation of the picture - you can stream movies, photos, music - if it's on your computer screen, you will see it on the TV. And there's no set-up involved - simply set your TV to Apple TV input and click the Airplay icon at the top of your computer screen. Whatever your computer screen is showing will also be on the TV. Additionally, you can set the sound to come from the TV sound system not your computer's. I was skeptical at first because we don't have the fastest internet connection and I thought the picture when streaming a video would be choppy but wasn't at all. We are very happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: APPLE TV WORKS FOR ME!
Reviews.Author: Sunshine
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my purchase of the newest version of the Apple TV. It syncs with my iPhone perfectly and displays my information onto my television just as it says! It is very easy to figure out - self explanatory.

Reviews.Title: I love this, but I don't know if it is a must have
Reviews.Author: David R. Wakeman "Dave Wakeman"
Reviews.Content: I've had the Apple TV for about a year and a half now and I love it.  It isn't something that you would call a must have item, but it is very good at what it does do.Here is what you get:*  User friendly interface*  Integration with other Apple products*  Access to the iCloud*  iTunes integration*  Apps that include MLB TV, NHL TV, NBA TV, Netflix, and moreAgain, it isn't something you absolutely have to have, but it is fun and adds an element to your media consumption.

Reviews.Title: cool but eh
Reviews.Author: Robert Hunt
Reviews.Content: The idea of apple tv is cool but still in its infancy stages.  There just isn't much that sets it apart from on demand on cable.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: Just like all of the other Apple stuff... simple, useful, and reliable.  It's great to be able to project the iPad screen up on the TV so the family can share a laugh at a YouTube video, to browse photos or watch a movie.

Reviews.Title: Mirroring
Reviews.Author: Sharon Wick
Reviews.Content: A way to get amazon prime and videos is to down load the amazon instant video app and amazon app to your I phone, I pad or I pod. The Apple TV will mirror onto your tv whatever you have playing on you device. You can do that with most apps. Hope this helps

Reviews.Title: Suits us
Reviews.Author: dufrog
Reviews.Content: I don't know how well it stacks up against Roku and other competitors, but as an iDevice family, it suits us very well.

Reviews.Title: a piece of cake made of Apple
Reviews.Author: Matthew
Reviews.Content: So cool to now be able to watch Netflix and Hulu on my big screen TV, wirelessly no less!  Transmission so far has been excellent.  Have fun.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Reginald T. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Received the Apple TV on time and excellent condition, I love the way you can mirror your IPad or ITouch to the Apple TV, reason given 4 stars, will not play Amazon Prime movies thru it, can't understand if you can get and watch Amazon Prime on the IPad and ITouch why it won't play thru a third device (Apple TV) does not make any sense?

Reviews.Title: Not as great as I had hoped
Reviews.Author: Christina L. "Christina"
Reviews.Content: I should have done some more research first, was dissapointed to find out you can only stream 1-2 episodes at a time on the device, it has no hard drive to store items, and I am in an area with slower speed DSL access so it can take 2 hours to get a 30 minute show.  I am now downloading media to my ipad and using the airplay feature, which I really love.  I can be listening to music on my iphone in the kitchen and mid-song change the playback to the living room tv when I switch rooms.  Defintely worth $99.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: BukoBoy
Reviews.Content: Only complaint - wist it came with an HDMI cable so I didn't have to make a separate purchase. Other than that, the wifi is very good. I like the user interface.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product for a Low Price
Reviews.Author: Dan Thompson
Reviews.Content: I use this Apple TV almost daily and I'm not sure how I lived without it. I own a lot of digital content and have ripped my movie collection so I can take it on the go. Streaming this content to my TV is very easy with this device. The content is maintained through iTunes and it's a simple matter of turning on Home Sharing on your computer, and signing in on the Apple TV. Obviously a wired connection is preferable but I've found a wireless connection works fairly well also. I've only had a buffering issue a few times but blame that on my old wireless router.The UI is similar to that of an iPhone or iPad; there are multiple apps available for the user to choose from (most of them existing services you need to sign up for) and it's as easy as signing in to use the apps. We use this for Netflix, Hulu, and MLB TV, all of which work great on the device.The device is small (the remote even smaller) so you won't have to take up a lot of valuable space on your entertainment center to enjoy it. I own two of these now and have loved having them. If you use iTunes a lot to manage your content, give this a try.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Bruce L. Lutz
Reviews.Content: Best aspect of the Apple TV is the display of the slideshow. Enjoy watching and remembering those wonderful memories again and again.

Reviews.Title: getting better all the time
Reviews.Author: Dr. Cyber
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is better than ever, but still not perfect. That's why only four stars.  You might consider a Roku box as an alternative that starts out even cheaper at about half the price.  If you're already bought in to the Apple "environment" however, I'd recommend this.

Reviews.Title: paired with an iphone/ipad, it's fantastic
Reviews.Author: Cmac
Reviews.Content: tempted to buy a mac mini for a home entertainment setup, but used with an ipad, the apple tv does 90% of what i'd like for much less than the price of another machine.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: B. Grant
Reviews.Content: I use the AppleTV with all of the Apple products in my house and it works seamlessly. I have an Apple AirPort Extreme Base Station that has an external HDD plugged into the back and together with the AppleTV I am able to easily access all of the digital media on the HDD without having to get off the couch. I have only had it about 3 weeks but it's one of those things I'd hate to go withou after owning one.My only complaint as of now is the Netflix app needs a lot of improving. I am used to Streaming Netflix through my Xbox 360 and the Netflix app on it is much better. The AppleTV Netflix retires far too many button pushes to get things goin and doesn't have continuous play like the Xbox. I am able to get around this though by just steaming it from my computer to the AppleTV.Overall this gets a 10 out of 10 from me.

Reviews.Title: AppleTV does a lot of cool stuff.
Reviews.Author: JRH "ViperACR"
Reviews.Content: I have bought a couple of AppleTV's now and they are really nice. I especially like the Airplay capability. I just with they would figure out how to jailbreak the AppleTV 3!!!! :)

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Barbara Gleasure
Reviews.Content: Great addition to my IPAD. I  Can play music, games, email and play video on my TV from my IPAD.

Reviews.Title: A Must Have if you use media and have an IOS device
Reviews.Author: D. Nalesnik
Reviews.Content: I initially purchased the 2nd generation Apple TV and my family used it so much that I bought the 3rd generation for our other TV. Both versions look the same, but the 3rd gen. supports 1080p.We have a Netflix streaming subscription, and use the Apple TV for that, but there are many devices that offer access to Netflix, Hulu, You Tube, etc. so that isn't the reason to buy this, in fact the Roku box offers more in the web-based steaming channel category at the moment. The real reason to buy the Apple TV is the ability to stream media from your ITunes account.I've streamed my media to devices in the past, including an Xbox and a PS3, but this was the easiest by far. This is the only device ive ever had that my wife will actually take the time to use for streaming purposes. she always complained that the other setups i used were too tedious and unintuitive. With the Apple TV, iif you are on a network, and have a PC with iTunes running and Home Sharing enabled, you can access everything you have loaded into iTunes.Then there is airplay, which allows you to actually use your iOS device to communicate with the Apple TV. Anything you have in your iPhone or iPad can quickly and easily be shown on the Apple TV. Streaming music, videos and even viewing apps has never been this easy. The box does a lot more than what I've mentioned, but these are the main features my family uses.

Reviews.Title: Impressed with user experience, bored by lack of content
Reviews.Author: Amir Elaguizy "amirpc"
Reviews.Content: The user experience of the Apple TV - meaning the on screen UI and responsiveness is top notch. It is very friendly to use, easy to set up and even a bit exciting to play with. I find myself annoyed at the lack of depth, however. I don't understand why there is no app system on this apple product - it leaves me feeling as if it is a neglected toy as compared to the rest of the Apple product line.I really wish I could watch vudu on this device, as I find it has the best selection of new (in theatre) movies.The Netflix experience is fantastic, definitely the best netflix experience of all of my devices. I love the AirPlay from my iPad and my Macbook, but I've yet to find a practical use for it in my house - it has come in handy on the ones we have at our office though.The very stylish but annoyingly tiny remote control is a frequent pain point. The fact that it is so small means it's always under our butt, between the couch cushions or otherwise hiding. I really just wish it had a normal size remote control as we've evolved our livingroom habits to efficiently manage those without losing them or sitting on them (much).Overall I'd say this product is well designed and fun to use but a bit too closed (platform limitations) and lacks a lot of the functionality I've come to expect from apple products.

The setup and interface between the Apple TV and my router/modem was simplistic Like most Apple products, the quality of the hardware and the ease of use helped make my choice.The only reason I did not rate the Apple TV 5 stars is that the product is lacking applications. Both the Apple TV and Roku both have Netflix, However, the Apple TV does not have Amazon Prime Video which Roku does. I hope Apple will add this application to their menu in the near future.If you are looking for a streaming video box that is easy to use, quick in its response time, and small in its hardware design, then I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great product -- missing only Netflix integration
Reviews.Author: Dev from Seattle
Reviews.Content: The Apple-TV 'hobby project' works very well as a media content streamer.  Using iTunes, all of your stored media can be played easily.  But more useful is the AirPlay integration with just about all other Apple devices -- every Mac, iPhone and iPad can stream media to the Apple TV.  Using 3rd Party apps such as AcePlayer or Air Video, you can browse all of your network's shared media and play almost all of it through the Apple TV.While other media streaming devices can also browse and stream your content, this product succeeds because 'it just works' quite well and without a lot of fuss, and also does so with an attractive and easy-to use interface.Works so well in fact that it allowed me to re-purpose a Mac Mini that was being used as a Media Center PC -- now my kids have an extra Mac to work on.Rated 4-stars due to lack of Netflix integration at this time, though many will not find that much of a limitation -- it's only a minor point in my case.

Reviews.Title: Solid product that starts aging
Reviews.Author: DrOleg
Reviews.Content: I've been using Apple TV for a couple of years. This is my 3-rd device: 2 at home and 1 at work. At work (iOS dev shop) it is a great solution to sharing your iPad, iPhone or OSX screen with a team. We could not run a meeting without it. We loved the ease of switching between different devices: no wires or adaptors to worry about. At home I use it for streaming Hulu and Netflix, showing my photographs and occasionally renting a movie from iTunes.  I like it for what it's built for, however, I feel that Apple TV is aging fast. Competition from smart TVs, game consoles and other streaming devices is catching up quickly. Apple needs to innovate to make me buy another Apple TV in the future. I want 3-rd party apps on Apple TV and better integration with the rest of the home theater.

Reviews.Title: Higher Quality Than Roku
Reviews.Author: ILoveTheUSA
Reviews.Content: The fit and finish on this device is much higher in quality and feel than the Roku.  It has a nice solid, heavy feel to it and all the seams are very tight and smooth.  I used to own the Roku 2 and it was an inferior product both aesthetically and functionally. The obvious advantage that the Roku had over the Apple TV was the channel selection but that was about it. Setup on both devices is easy.  Plug them in, they find your wireless network and after the password is entered, you're good to go.  You have the option for a wired connection but for some reason the wireless works better on my network.  The GUI on the Apple is smoother and looks better than the one on the Roku.  The Roku is clunky and it takes forever to scroll through the channels, whereas the Apple has the channels on a grid pattern.  Picture quality is also superior on the Apple TV and the wireless streaming has been glitch free.  I had trouble setting up the homesharing but once it was up and running that also has been free of problems.  The only reason I removed a star on the rating was because of the performance of Airplay.  The sound quality is poor and it fluctuates during playback, becoming louder and softer continuously.  This could be a problem with my network but other people have also complained of this.  The bottom line is that this out performs the Roku with the disadvantage of a small channel lineup  which didn't matter to me because the main reason for this was the home sharing and the use of Netflix.

Reviews.Title: Awesome if you already own other Apple products
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: It works great with the iPhone, iPad and MacBook for mirroring, and I can use the Remote App to control it from the iPhone which is better for navigating through menus than the remote, which I can use with my MacBook. Really integrated stuff here.Also can stream the movies stored in my PC via iTunes.Netflix loads faster in Apple TV than with the roku xs I already have.

Reviews.Title: Great way to watch TV
Reviews.Author: D. Beckwith
Reviews.Content: Having satellite TV and not wanting to pay for receivers in each room, we were relying on rabbit ears to pull in channels in our bedroom.  With AppleTV we can add the lineup of Netflix and Hulu as well. It is easy to hook up and portable so if we want those streaming channels on our main TV, it only rakes a minute to swap.  We plan on trying it the next time we vacation to see if it will work with the hotel's wifi.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Luella P. Rollins
Reviews.Content: It is great but I was hoping to stream my prime movies from my iPad through the Apple TV.  Thanks

Reviews.Title: Good with some caveats
Reviews.Author: Brady
Reviews.Content: Nice for people who have apple ecosystem (like my girlfriends family) and you get netflix and your libraries on your TV.Wish there were more apps supporting it.Also im not sure if there is a work around, but while airplaying certain apps, picture would not full screen.  I know the screen ratio of my GF's IP4 is different from a widescreen, however it was basically a 4:3 inside a 16:9 inside a 4:3 as their was space all around the picture.  Tried adjusting all the settings, but it wouldn't atleast match up the height or the width.

Reviews.Title: Wifi Issue Fixed with Update
Reviews.Author: Mayor Bloomburger
Reviews.Content: Edit:  The Hulu Plus issue detailed below has been fixed with a system update ... I'm bumping this up to four stars but I'm leaving my original comments online so that people can see that this product has historically not gotten the support it needs from Apple.Original Review: 2 Stars:Considering the Apple name and the price, I expect a premium product - this doesn't cut it.  Hulu Plus only works if the device is set to Wifi, even after a firmware update.  This is a known issue that Apple can't or won't straighten out with Hulu.  I can cope because the wireless streaming is reasonably fast and reliable ... BUT .... tonight I rent a movie on iTunes and it won't load unless I hard-wire the internet.  Tedious.If you're expecting the same quality you find in iPhones and MacBooks, then no, this isn't the same level of quality usually found in Apple products.  I expect to tinker with cheap, also-ran products but not slick, expensive Apple products.  Just under the surface is a 5-star product waiting to bust out here, but this device is the red-headed step-child of the Apple line.  It's basically a beta-test for the TV Apple is going to make anyway, and it feels like it.

Reviews.Title: apple tv
Reviews.Author: Michael V. Estrada "mexman00"
Reviews.Content: i would buy another one of these. I don't have to buy a adapter for my iphone to play movies on the tv. this new age of "streaming" movies is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: works fine
Reviews.Author: perla "Being. Differently."
Reviews.Content: We use our Apple TV as is, no jailbreak, so far, and this has been working fine. Setup with itunes cloud we play our own music collection off of the apple TV a lot, but many times we are having issues with the connection it took days, maybe even weeks before all of our library was available on the AppleTV. I think this is an itunes cloud issue and not a hardware issue. Applications for youtube isn't up to its best performance yet. Sometimes downloading itunes movie rentals or purchases gets stuck if the broadband internet connection isn't performing at top speed. Just for us, we found that Hulu plus isn't that great for providing additional options to Netflix. We use the mirroring for iphone and ipads every now and then but manytimes just using an hdmi cable direct between the iphone, ipad or laptop to the TV screen's hdmi port is many times the better option.the remote control for the AppleTV still has a lot to be desired---is quite small and hard to control even with my smaller female hands, but my husband and teen sons don't like the small size. Even i feel like the remote control is going to fall out of my hands while I use it. The controls are pretty basic, and I must see primitive. A keyboard would be a nice add-on option especially for the simple task of keying in words for searches, rather than toggling from letter to letter with the up-down-left-right RC buttons. Are you listening, Apple? (Wait! as per E.J.'s almost immediate comment, there is a free Remote Control app for the iphone and ipad that you can use with the Apple TV. I just tried it and it is a handy remote control alternative that I am still getting used to, BUT i really like tapping searches in for itunes, movies, netflix and youtube instead of toggling for letters. Highly recommend using it with Apple TV now. Thank you, E.J., for the tip)So lots of 3rd-party factors going on for the AppleTV to perform to its max, but we don't regret cutting our cable TV off and saving 70% off of our ATT Uverse bills!I read up on jailbreaking the AppleTV to get more content on this thing, but I am looking forward to a paradigm shift for smart TV so that more content will be made available through this medium.

Reviews.Title: Love. Seriously.
Reviews.Author: jaimilyn
Reviews.Content: Bought this for Christmas, it's great. Very easy to use, so much fun to use with the iPad home sharing. Only feature "missing" that I'd like to see is the ability to control it remotely using voice commands (have gotten used to this with the Xbox Kinect with the Netflix/Hulu/Amazon Video apps), but that's just a wish, and probably will be included someday.Great buy, especially if you have an iPad or new iPhone that does the home sharing.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: H. Turner
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is great for homes with iPhones and iPads. We got it primarily to stream our pictures as a screensaver on the TV and are enjoying airplay and the built in apps as well. Easy to set up. Amazon as usual has super fast shipping and great prices!

Reviews.Author: steven d
Reviews.Content: its better than waiting for the ps3 to load up for netflix and now can stream my itunes to my son's room

Reviews.Title: Another win
Reviews.Author: Amy O "sista411"
Reviews.Content: Apple TV.  How do I love thee?  Let me count the ways....No more DVD player.NetflixCan I get rid of cable yet?  Pretty soon.My only complaints, can't stream hbogo or PBS. I'm us they'll get there one of these days.  But it hasn't dulled my Apple TV love affair

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: James T. Looney "Sailors on SeaLoon"
Reviews.Content: Easy to hook up and use.  Some difficulty finding the right setting on the TV to get it to come up, but all go after that.

Reviews.Title: simple interface with AirPlay
Reviews.Author: Matt D
Reviews.Content: Apple TV has a user friendly interface that is easy to learngreat for owners of other apple gear because of AirPlay

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Fern Gtz
Reviews.Content: I now have 2 of these in my house. One in the living room and 1 in the bedroom, it makes life a lot easier.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: J. Bigler
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV works great with all our Apple devices as well as watching videos on YouTube, Netflix, or other streaming services. We don't have a DVD/Blu-ray player hooked up to our TV, so this is awesome for watching videos.

Reviews.Title: A great product
Reviews.Author: volterra
Reviews.Content: Apple TV allows you connect your apple product with TV. It works smoothly and fast. Just one thing you have to know that Apple TV locks up in its own system. You cannot change any apps. (Maybe there are limited number of apps you can choose. )

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: Sunil B Bhojwani
Reviews.Content: Is a good product & performs Iike it is supposed to! Money well spent! We will enjoy our purchase for a long time to come.

Reviews.Title: Much better than Roku
Reviews.Author: M. L. Laney
Reviews.Content: I would give this product five stars, except it doesn't include Amazon streaming video as one of its channels.  But in every other way, it is far superior to the roku player I had before - easy, intuitive interface and displays closed captions for Netflix (roku didn't).  Also, Apple service is much nicer and more knowledgeable to deal with than the service I received from roku.  I have to watch Amazon streaming on my tv, though, or I can mirror tv screen thru the Apple TV, but resolution is not as good.  Hope Amazon/Apple get together soon, so I can give this device five stars.

Reviews.Title: Like the new Apple TV but dislike some of Apple's decisions...
Reviews.Author: Phil Keesee
Reviews.Content: I bought the latest generation of Apple TV because my older second gen took a dump after many years of use (HD crashed). I've become used to using Apple TV for movie rentals, listening to my music collection through my home stereo, etc.  I like the new size and don't mind the lack of local storage and dependence on wireless connection to my home computer for music, photos, videos etc.  Makes for a smaller, cleaner unit.  The wireless-n works fast and flawlessly.  No problems streaming everything.  The ONE thing I am bummed about is Apple's decision NOT to support 1080i output.  This unit supports 720i, 720p and 1080p, but not 1080i. My Sony display is 1080i, so I have to view using 720p instead.  Not a lousy picture, but I'd rather use 1080i like I did with my 2nd Gen Apple TV!!  Common Apple.

Reviews.Title: Just ok.
Reviews.Author: Billy Allmon
Reviews.Content: If you live out of the country, you will not be able to access Hulu! Also, this device does NOT get any local NEWS networks!

Reviews.Title: Great device and at a lower price than I expected
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV is useful in ways you don't realize until you have it, as it allows full integration of all of your Apple products. I guess I'm officially an Apple person now. Great buy!

Reviews.Title: Best of the Best
Reviews.Author: draves67
Reviews.Content: I have owned three media player and have over two hundred videos on my system, so this is not my first time to the party.  If you are wanting a media system that is reliable, responsive, easy to use and offers solid pack of features the apple TV 3 is the unit to buy.  I have two in my home.  I will give you the pros and an outline of how you have to set up a system with this unit.1. The wireless feature is high quality I have never had an issue with data transfer or streaming video. (my router is in the basement and my apple tvs are upstairs)2. The family share feature allows you to access all your music, photo's and video files on your home network.3. The screensaver options are extensive and easy to personalize. I have 300 photos that cascade across the screen with music playing from my library. Great feature for parties.4. The slideshow feature has a large selection of shows that all play music , play in fixed order or shuffle and are great for parties also.5. The video and photo libraries work the same as the itunes music library so cover art and genres are easy to set-up. (FYI  the video and photos are run through the itunes program)Out line system configuration:If you are wanting all your videos in a network storage system and your DVDs in a box this is the best way to do it from what I have expereinced.You will need all of the items below:1. Dual band Wireless router with 802.11 N speed equiped with video streaming  ( I use a  Belkin N750 Dual Band Wireless N Gigabyte Router2. Network storage device  (media server, DNLP, NOS  I use a WD MY Book Live  6TB)3.  Dedicated work station  ( I use an old window xp tower this computer will sit in the corner and run 24/7  mine is in the basement)4. Apple TV 35. iTunes installed on the workstationThe set up is easy, just follow the instructions for the network storage the My Book Live is super simple.  Install the itunes on the workstation (basic computer for nontechies) connect the workstation to the router and load your media on the storage system then copy links to itunes (drag and drop to itunes).  Install apple TV 3 on tv and follow on screen set up. Activate home sharing on itunes and apple TV now you have access to all your personal media.  (side note: if you don't know how to copy your DVDs to your network you will need ripping software.  Their are several free programs on the net I recommend a software package called DVDFAB it cost $200 for the suite but, is the best I have used no more legal notices, movie previews and can convert standard dvd  and bluerays to appleTv langauage (Mpeg4)

Reviews.Title: Great item!  Just can't Jailbreak it.
Reviews.Author: Motorcycle Owner
Reviews.Content: Great product, but it needs an App Store of its own for adding content!  I really wish it had HBO Go, but until then I really do like the fluid switching between my Apple devices and my living room TV.  Highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Fun
Reviews.Author: Jeffery
Reviews.Content: This is so much fun and easy to use small lightweight and portable apple you did it again will buy again if I need a gift

Reviews.Title: Best way to have fun
Reviews.Author: Cuitlahuac Guerra / Inbond
Reviews.Content: Playing music and view videos through the AppleTv wireless. Great to having a good time sharing your music, video, podcast, etc.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Coren E. Mino "suburban customer"
Reviews.Content: I love being able to watch TV, movies, etc. on all my devices! This has been a real enhancement to our entertainment!

Reviews.Title: So much better then TiVo for:
Reviews.Author: Bick
Reviews.Content: Picture & sound quality Awesome! Available programs? Awesome! Like it for NetFlix & a few others better then TiVo! Thank  you!@

Reviews.Title: I love my Apple TV
Reviews.Author: melanie torres
Reviews.Content: I received the product and im happy with it! I got it on time and just the product is perfect!

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: Barry Berman
Reviews.Content: I must say I bought this with a little apprehension, but I am surprised at how great the product really is and the ease of use. I love the air streaming feature, where from any other apple device like iPhone etc I can simply stream pics or videos I have taken on iPhone to my tv. I can stream music as well which means I don't need to buy another accessory to do this. Great product for great price.

Reviews.Title: Extremely solid, reasonably priced home theater tool
Reviews.Author: Rich Grace
Reviews.Content: To start with, let me note that I am primarily a Netflix and iTunes user. I started out with a very nice Roku 2XS which worked just fine out of the box, detected and connected to my network, and functioned exactly as it was supposed to. Then... I realized my iTunes library was completely inaccessible and realized I'd made a mistake. So I ordered the Apple TV from Amazon. Here are my observations:1) The fit, finish and packaging for this most inexpensive of Apple's products is as good as anything else Apple makes. It does not appear like a stepchild in Apple's product line. It is an extremely tactile, compact, weighty little device with clean lines and is a perfect physical match for my new flat screen.2) The user interface is far and away superior to that for the Roku or any other similar device I've tried. Some thought has gone into their software for this device and it's the most usable in its class.3) The "channel" selection through AppleTV continues to grow, and so far as I can tell, this item offers more options that the Roku.4) The Airplay connectivity with my wireless PC works as expected. It's a very pleasant experience to find your complete iTunes media library accessible directly on your set without being forced to connect yet more cabling. I have a 2Wire router from AT&T; and the performance is easily good enough for high-def movies and TV shows. This is the main reason I went with this device. I am quite satisfied. I can now see new episodes of "Justified" and "Mad Men" when they come out on iTunes the day after the episodes air. You can't get everything in the most timely manner through iTunes (Game of Thrones? Hello? HBO?) but this is a large chunk of a good solution for people like me who refuse to subscribe to cable.I would eventually like to see Apple manufacture another version of this product with a 2-3 TB hard disk. I would absolutely consider buying such a device given that they can be trusted to put thought and design into the software to really make it work.

Reviews.Title: Can I live without it?
Reviews.Author: TechGeek
Reviews.Content: Probably but this thing is pretty nice.  I kind of hate giving Apple all my money, but they make a darn good product.

Reviews.Title: Second apple TV
Reviews.Author: James P. Barrett "Joleen"
Reviews.Content: Bought one when they first cam out with apple tv and loved it.  Now we bought this one and still love it.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: Landon J. Harris
Reviews.Content: I have one for every room in the house - everything we watch comes over the internet to my TV via the Apple TV. My life wouldn't be the same without it!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Gorgeous
Reviews.Author: Haider Sahib
Reviews.Content: This small piece of technology enabled me to share whatever photo, video or webpage in my iphone 4s, ipad 2, or MacBook Air with my family. It's amazing how it works on its own with all the devices connected to my home network without any installation whatsoever. I have 4 Apple TV 3rd Generation installed at home in 4 different rooms, and whenever I click on AirPlay icon I instantly get the list of four rooms to choose from. It's just like magic!

Reviews.Title: Very very cool
Reviews.Author: Voice of  Reason
Reviews.Content: The only real question is if it actually does all the things it claims to do. It does!  Easy to set up. Nice on screen interface. Mirrored my iPhone and my iPad beautifully to my TV. Found my PC computer on my network and I played my iTunes library through my TVs attached sound system. Great little toy. Pod casts and movies are my next venture.

Reviews.Title: Score!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My kids loved this product!  Said it was the best gift they received.  They were able to plug it in and use it immediately.Of course, it helped that they had a hdmi cord available for immediate use.

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: Drew
Reviews.Content: Netflix, Hulu+, and iTunes is all really need to have all the content you want at your figure tips with this awesome device!

Reviews.Title: Works good
Reviews.Author: Naggy
Reviews.Content: Does what it's supposed to. So far we are very happy with it but we have only used it with movies from the computer

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: James Svoboda
Reviews.Content: This is a cool item to have for TV shows and movies. You need to have a good internet connection (fast) though. The Itunes rentals are too expensive also, but it's a good product.

Reviews.Title: Its GREAT!!!
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Papa
Reviews.Content: I love this product! The selection of apps that come with the iOS is great, there is something for everybody. The set up is sooooo easy and connecting to my wifi is even easier. Very intuitive and easy to use

Reviews.Title: Easy Easy!!
Reviews.Author: TDavis
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to compliment my IPad!!  It is SUPER easy to set up and use.  I do suggest downloading the "remote" app from ITunes.  It is completely free!! This device allows you to see everything from your moble device on the TV.  Pictures, Videos, Music, Movies, or Games!!

Reviews.Title: Love my Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Donald R. Anderson
Reviews.Content: Gave to my son for Christmas.  He loves it for streaming a slide show from his iPhone.  Says its a lot easier than using  his X-Box

Reviews.Title: Love It for Cutting the Cord
Reviews.Author: Chris Feldhaus
Reviews.Content: We cancelled Directv and use the Apple TV plus an antenna for our tv watching needs.  We have plenty to watch, especially since I can stream any app that plays video from my iPad.  If you are tired of spending ridiculous amounts of money for the 99% of cable channels you don't watch, consider an Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Neat!
Reviews.Author: HiE4me
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my stepson for Christmas.  It is a very neat product as are most Apple products.  He really enjoys it and the neat thing is he can put his computer on the tv so we can all view things together on large screen.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: A. Smith "Agent Smith"
Reviews.Content: The only only reason why I didn't give it 5 stars is because I had to go back to the store and buy hdmi cables in order for it to connect to my tv. I thought a device like that would have come with its own cable. My lost. However after going out and buying a hdmi cables my Apple TV works beautiful. Love it

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Robert Manning Jr
Reviews.Content: This is something I wanted will help me save on my cable bill. I can view several different movie apps (you have to pay for Hulu).

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: bwgilbr
Reviews.Content: I am a huge fan of all Apple Products.  This one is great for streaming netflix, hulu, as well as any of your itunes.

Reviews.Title: Love Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Tara
Reviews.Content: I got Apple TV for my husband for a Christmas present.  We have thoroughly enjoyed streaming movies and pictures through Apple TV. Only hiccup we had was that our TV only had 2 hdmi slots and those were already taken by blu ray player and satellite box.  So, we had to buy a splitter to be able to hook up the Apple TV. Wasn't very expensive $10-$12 (I think) at Radio Shack. Overall we are most pleased with yet another Apple product in our household.

Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: Python
Reviews.Content: Usual Apple - everything just works well !!! Easy set up and and easy to use. No problems at all.

Reviews.Title: apple tv
Reviews.Author: Silvia Bellia
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for family members and they loved it. They were absolutely blown away thank you so much.

Reviews.Title: Just works and connects everything Apple
Reviews.Author: Foster
Reviews.Content: The best part and reason for buying it is AirPlay, otherwise save your money and get a Roku!Two drawbacks:1.) limited subscriptions when compared to Roku and Apple is very slow to add new ones.2.) While AirPlay allows Macs running Mt. Lion and other iOS 6 devices to connect wirelessly and show content, there is a serious lagging problem through the Apple TV. Video that streams cleanly on laptop or other device is often just a little behind the computer or LOTS behind the computer with complete stalls.  No good fix in any forum so far.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: B. Gilligan
Reviews.Content: This product has worked out wonderfully to display videos from my iPad to my tv. Great for presentations as well.

Reviews.Title: Great media box with extras...
Reviews.Author: ken p
Reviews.Content: Great media box. The best features for me are media streaming, Airplay, MLB.TV and internet radio. Very easy to hook up.

Reviews.Title: Good!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jinho On
Reviews.Content: Good product, easy to install and use for all ages. Vey limited in the online channels you can see !.

Reviews.Title: WoOooOOooW
Reviews.Author: Khaled Altawily
Reviews.Content: As usual, Apple products superior to itself.Ease of use and absorbing.I received the shipment in a short period of timeRecommend this product is a unique experience

Reviews.Title: Best
Reviews.Author: Jason Coleman
Reviews.Content: Great quality, useful, best.  Buy it.  I'm a normal dude that doesn't go crazy with reviews. I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Works fine but limited in use.
Reviews.Author: James Twiggs
Reviews.Content: It works fine but is far more limited than I had hoped--too much tied to iTunes. I should have researched it more carefully before I bought it. But again, for what it is, it works very well.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Amazing
Reviews.Author: JoDean
Reviews.Content: I have no idea how I lived without it. It's far superior to Roku, XBox, and all those other vehicles to run apps like Netflix and Hulu to the TV.  I have used both the XD Roku and XBox Live and Apple TV is far faster, runs smoother, and is easier to use; that alone would be enough to get it. On top of that though, you can play music or videos on the TV wirelessly from you Mac, IPhone, or IPad... But if you don't have any Apple products, it's still superior to the other devices.

Reviews.Title: Love It - 'Nuff Said!
Reviews.Author: HelenU
Reviews.Content: Easy interface and complete integration with iTunes, Netflix, Pandor and your computer.  It's also fun to 'project' from your iPad or iPhone. Not sure I can tell the difference between the 720 dpi and the 1080 dpi versions (I have both) but my largest TV is only 42".I have two Apple TVs (one upstairs and one down) and am a huge fan. I just wish they would add Amazon VOD, but won't likely happen since they compete, so I have to switch to my Blu-Ray or Xbox to watch Amazon VOD.  Still searching for one device to rule them all...

Reviews.Title: Good product but not enough
Reviews.Author: Luis Elizondo
Reviews.Content: Good product, easy to install and use for all ages. Vey limited in the online channels you can see !.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: J. N. Leute
Reviews.Content: I just got an Apple TV and for the most part I love it. I would give it 5 stars if it had more apps like Pandora and Last fm. Setup was simple and I love being able to connect my Mac.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV is GREAT!!!
Reviews.Author: Scott - Canton, MI
Reviews.Content: From order to delivery, Amazon was great!  My Apple TV arrived on time and was simple to set up (5 min).  With a high-def HDMI cable, Apple TV is streaming Hi-Def movies and TV shows from my iPad, iPhone, Mac and iCloud beautifully (even between floors)I now have two Apple TV "pucks" and I'm sold on the simplicity, quality and performance for the price.

Reviews.Title: Well implemented, limited content
Reviews.Author: CA
Reviews.Content: Nice interface, very easy to setup and connect with other apple devices and services.  Only con is limited content -- no hbo go, no amazon prime, etc

Reviews.Title: Bought as Gift
Reviews.Author: Jim Bourisaw
Reviews.Content: I bought as a gift for Christmas to a friend.  They told me they love it so far and use it everyday.  I wish I could tell you more but I gave it away...

Reviews.Title: A great add-on to the plethora of Apple products you own
Reviews.Author: A. Freeman
Reviews.Content: Setup: The setup on the box was very easy. Apple TV saw my wireless internet right away and after some tweaking I was watching movies in no time. Just remember that you do need a HDMI cable.Pros: The usability was truly was better than what I expected. It allowed me to watch movies and listen to music from iTunes. I could also use my TV as an extension of my I-Pad which was an added bonus. This device will continue my use of Apple products for the time being.Cons: I think the only con for me is I live in an area where the internet is not that speedy. So by the time I am using wireless the Apple TV system can be slow. AKA: slow buffering and everything taking longer than it should. This is no fault of Apple TV just something to consider if you don’t have fast internet.

Reviews.Title: Fits perfectly with Apple devices
Reviews.Author: Blake T.
Reviews.Content: Most often I use my Apple TV to AirPlay and mirror stuff from my iPhone and iPad. I wish there were more choices to load apps onto the Apple TV. No Amazon Prime streaming yet.

Reviews.Title: Now appleTV is better than ever!
Reviews.Author: Terry "Dresden Phile"
Reviews.Content: I seem to have always had an apple TV, starting with the first 40GB version, then to the 160GB, and now the streaming version. The streaming version is the best by far, in my opinion, because not only is it connected to the iTunes store, I now have availability to use Hulu Plus and Netflix, as well as stream from my iPhone or my macbook air where I watch videos on Funimation Channel's official website (I am an elite video subscriber, I love my anime!) to my TV.  Since I have added this device I have totally dropped cable TV.  Now I watch everything when I want to, which is kind of the point, anyway, without having to DVR it or watch it live.  appleTV has made my life simpler.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: The apple tv does everything it boasts about. When mirroring to my phone everything shows up on the tv. Its outstanding. Movies from iTunes are awesome.

Reviews.Title: Works great on everything, almost.
Reviews.Author: Sam Canterbury
Reviews.Content: For streaming of Netflix and watching movies on our library the Apple TV works great and you can use a iPhone or iPad for a controller and even send you iPad screen to your TV, unless you want to watch a DVD from a mac computer and TV simultaneously. We use the Apple TV on a TV that does not have a DVD player on it and my assumption was that I could play the DVD on our mac and watch it on the TV, however Apple blocks this service. All and all its a great small device that links all your apple device to your TV but competitor devices like the Roku may give more freedom.

Reviews.Title: Owning a second one now.
Reviews.Author: MightyIndian
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful product. I could award 5 stars if Apple can figure out how to connect home network using Windows 7.

Reviews.Title: Great Use Of My IPad
Reviews.Author: Michael Freund
Reviews.Content: Love to watch movies and listen to music on my tv with Apple TV. So easy to setup and use.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Marv27
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased the Apple TV device and love it.  It was easy to install (almost did it by itself).  It worked the first time and whereas my previous wireless connection was "spotty" the Apple TV is solid.The caveat however was in order for me to be able to use my headphones (in the middle of the night when my spouse is sleeping) I had to purchase an Digital => Analog converter ($80.00) plus an optical cable and an analog cable ($30 each) in order to hook the Apple TV to my receiver.The Apple TV only puts out a Digital signal.  Oh I also had to purchase an HDMI cable (Apple TV to Yamaha Receiver - $100.00) to connect the digital signal to my receiver.

Reviews.Title: AppleTV it really works
Reviews.Author: Thomas Altman "telpaman"
Reviews.Content: The coolest gadget I have ever purchased easy setup easy use small active remote its awesome to use for anyone. Comes complete with a detail manual it's easy to setup like I said and simple to use

Reviews.Title: This is awesome!
Reviews.Author: The Germ
Reviews.Content: I love that i can mirror my ipad to my television. I also have to give kudos for the screen saver. Even if you don't have an an iOS device, Apple TV is an awesome upgrade to any TV that doesn't have wifi.

Reviews.Title: works with your own HDTV
Reviews.Author: Parker Knight "Photo Geek"
Reviews.Content: This is based on cloud. Cloud is where you have record of purchase with Apple iTunes store. If you purchased a movie on your computer, the APPLE TV allows you to watch it streaming into your TV. Requires internet in broadband capacity to really enjoy this product. Lets you watch Netflix and Hulu as well as Youtube and show flickr dot com slide shows. It has other features yet to tapped in and we are excited to say our household purchased two of these downstairs and upstairs. Apple TV is great to connect your iPad and iPhone to show on TV from different room to share with others and could be used in business situation to show your product video pulled from any youtube account and get the URL from iPhone or iPad while on wifi environment to display directly onto APPLE TV. It requires pairing prior to sending data on to the APPLE TV.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Need more books!
Reviews.Content: I am locked into the Apple Ecosystem and like it. Therefore this is an indispensable accessory. LOVE IT. Air Play Technology is awesome. I only wish that the Amazon Instant Video App  was not BLOCKED FORM USING AIRPLAY TO THE APPLE TV!! But Vimeo, Youtube, Netflix, iTunes movies all look great.

Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: AmazonBuyer33
Reviews.Content: When I bought this Apple TV, I wasn't plan to watch that much streaming video/movies.  Since I had this unit, I have been watching movies on the TV instead on the iPad.  It is easy to set up and reliable.  It is also being used to share video amongst family.  I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great but there are limitations
Reviews.Author: Trevor T
Reviews.Content: Great device, especially if you utilize some of the Apps through the the Apple TV.  We are big Hulu and Netflix users and the integration is great.  Best feature is the mirroring.  We hooked one of the up to a small tv the the Kid's loft and we can be anywhere in the house and be able to stop or start their movie all while still being able to use my IOS device.

Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: Im an apple junkie so why wouldn't I have this!!! I signed up for nextflix and canceled my cable saving me over $100 per month. Best purchase Ive ever made.

Reviews.Title: LLOOVVEE IIITTTT
Reviews.Author: Miguel A. Brizuela "MICHAEL B."
Reviews.Content: ONE OF THE BEST APPLE DEVICES OUT THERE. Cant stop using it. LOVE APPLE FOR LIFE. YOU CANT GO WRONG WITH IT

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift for Bro
Reviews.Author: coco
Reviews.Content: He enjoys watching his podcasts and the ability to watch current movies at home for very little money."perfect in every way"

Reviews.Title: Great product, very easy to use.
Reviews.Author: ralph gottlieb
Reviews.Content: I don't often write reviews, but I am so pleased with the Apple TV that I am writing this one. First, it was really easy to set up, which is important to me. You do need an HDMI cable, so make sure you have one--and don't buy an expensive cable. Sure, I wish the Apple TV did more, but if you have Netflix, Hulu Plus and iTunes--this is a great way to watch them on your TV. I mostly use it to stream video from my iPad. It works with many other video podcasts and other videos sources (such as Leo LaPorte's shows) on the iPad, but not all. I'm very happy.

Reviews.Title: Good for Itunes but not Amazon Prime Video.
Reviews.Author: Bulleydawg
Reviews.Content: This is great for watching movies off of iTunes or Netflix, and to be able to mirror what you are doing on your iphone or ipad to your TV through this device is really cool. I just hate that Amazon Instant Video is not available. Even if you watch on iPad or Iphone and mirror that to TV through Apple TV, it is blocked. Roku Box would be better for internet TV as it has many more channels and options.

Reviews.Title: Netflix
Reviews.Author: CHARLES J MILLMAN
Reviews.Content: The main reason to own one is to watch Netflix. Netflix is just okay, not great. Netflix has mostly older movies and the collection is kind of patchy.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: codered1126
Reviews.Content: I got this for my girlfriend for Christmas because she has asked for one for years. Once we were able to get the thing hooked up, it was really nifty and worked with all of our Apple gadgets. However, I did not pay close enough attention to the specs when I purchased the box and did not realize it ONLY hooks up to the TV via HDMI cable. At the time, we did not have a TV that had an HDMI input. Soooo, we had to make another $100 investment to get a small HDTV that could work with the Apple TV.
