I would definitely recommend the product but make certain you have an HDTV if you purchase.

Reviews.Title: Access Netflix Too
Reviews.Author: D. Mahan
Reviews.Content: For the $100 price tag, it seems an easy choice between this and a Roku.The Netflix interface via Apple Tv is also very good (have never used a Roku). You get access to iTunes, Netflix, Hulu MLB, NHL and NBA with the Apple Tv (assuming you subscribed to these).You can also kick anything from an iDevice or Mac to your TV (assuming the hardware meets the version requirements).Your iPhone can also be the remote.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV 3
Reviews.Author: wakkedup
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Apple TV because the JB was due out in December 2012.  It never came.  Still waiting for the JB to arrive so I can install XBMC onto it.  As a streaming device, it does a decent job running my netflix, but I dislike the multiple screens I have to go to in order to play the next episode of a TV show.  Watch one show, then once it's over, give me the option to watch the next show!  I know this is a limitation of Netflix and not the Apple TV, but comparing it to my xbox360 which also streams netflix, it has some things to improve.I'd also like to note, I don't have an iphone, an ipod touch, nor do I have a lot of shows I've purchased in my itunes, so really until the JB and XBMC are installed, my ATV3 is just a netflix streaming device.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: We got Apple TV for Christmas and LOVE it! We cancelled our cable and now just watch shows from the iPad and stream them on the TV. It's saving us a ton of money!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Daniel Chait
Reviews.Content: its awesome. it does everything you want and more. apple always has the best products and this is no exception!

Reviews.Title: Best Thing Ever!
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I have had my apple TV for just a few days now and I have loved it every minute!  I have been able to watch all the movies that I have on my iTunes account with just a click through airplay.  Im gonna order another one for the bedroom TV!  The remote that comes with the apple tv is kinda lame, but the iphone/ipad has a "remote" app that is perfect and makes finding the movies i want to watch a breeze!

Reviews.Title: Works good with Apple products
Reviews.Author: Ramesh
Reviews.Content: Pros:If you have an Apple products like iPad, iPhone you can play or mirror content from your ipad and iphone on your LCD/LED TV .It also plays content from your iTunes on your PC/Mac.It also has optical output that you can connect to your old receiver to have 5.1 audio from Netflix.Cons:When compared to Roku 2 it has very less content. Roku 2 has way more channels to offer that Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: ROBERT W ARMSTRONG
Reviews.Content: great idea, easy to setup and use. love the internet radio, and the movies and tv rentals from i tunes

Reviews.Title: Great just wish it took more sources and outside of iTunes
Reviews.Author: cityToCountry "wang"
Reviews.Content: Have 3 of these throughout the house, feeding media off an Mac Mini and 2 iTunes libraries.Very handy, sometimes requires a restart if lost connection to libraries.Just wish they were more friendly/compatible to sources outside of iTunes and some interent media like Amazon prime/Netflix etc.Easy to use though and setup.

Reviews.Title: They loved it!
Reviews.Author: Yvette D. Pannell
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my brother and his family who all utilize Apple products and the really like like it a lot and one for my son who loves it.  He can purchase all his favorite shows by episode or season.  The only thing that would make it better would be if it had more free programming.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Scott Bruno
Reviews.Content: Absolutly love Apple TV, so much that I decided to get one for another TV in the house.  Lowered my Cable bill and now use itunes, and netflix to stream TV and Movies.  You can also "mirror" the iphone on your TV screen which makes searching the internet fun.

Reviews.Title: I have two
Reviews.Author: J. Hamer
Reviews.Content: I was looking at purchase a nice dock like the B&W; Zeppelin Air, but then I realized I could buy another Apple TV for 1/6 the price and use it with any speakers I want.  This solution works very well for me as I can take my small powered speakers and the apple TV anywhere in my wifi network and I have air play speakers.

Reviews.Title: So Easy!
Reviews.Author: A. Allen
Reviews.Content: I really want to know why everyone does not have this device in their house! There are probably a lot of reasons with the #1 being that they don't know how to use their Apple devices. So sad because Apple TV just makes everything better - we can show videos, pictures, and literally everything to everyone on the TV using our Apple devices or play music through the in-home speakers from my computer or phone or iPad with Apple TV.  Amazing... Nuff said!Way to go Apple. Thanks for continuing to make products that fit into my life and my interests.

Reviews.Title: Good product, but if you don't have a mac or iPhone consider Roku
Reviews.Author: pat
Reviews.Content: This is a great product, however you can get a Roku for a lot cheaper.  The reason that you would get this over a Roku is if you have another apple product such as an iPad, iPhone or Mac computer.  If you have one of these items then the Apple TV is a bit bitter because you can share things through airplay.  This is really convenient and works really well.  Basically, whatever you are seeing on any of those devices you can share with the TV which is a nice feature.  The accessibility to Netflix as well as Wall Street Journal is really nice too.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Galen A Grimes
Reviews.Content: Love it! Surprised by the amount of content available. The only downside is that some of you have to pay for, but $8/month for Hulu+ is a tremendous bargain especially considering that ALL of the 5 Star Trek series are there.

Reviews.Title: Great unit, but could be better if Amazon prime was on it
Reviews.Author: TravellingNormad
Reviews.Content: I bought this primarily for my theater room which has a projector and surround sound.  The rest of the streaming devices I have are all 780p, so streaming Neflix at 1080p and projecting it on to a wall makes it look like you almost blu-ray quality.  I  also 'airplay' music from my PC where I have 100s of songs stored to this device and then to my Pioneer receiver.Now the complaints...con #1: In terms of content, it is rather limited. I have an account with Amazon Prime and would love to watch the free streaming movies available online, but unfortunately it is something I cannot do with ATV3.con #2:  I have on the unit is that it's remote is flimsy and Apple really needs to review the design of it. Quite often, in a dark room, it is hard to locate the buttons on the Popsicle stick like remote. I wish the buttons were not so sensitive or the remote had some low led light although I agree this would consume battery life out.con #3: This is a common complaint, apple needs to figure out the keyboard.  Searching for a movie using the ATV3 can be quite frustrating at times using the onscreen keyboard. I have a 10 year old no name digital recorder and it has the same keyboard, so it is not something i was expecting from one of world's leader in innovation.

Reviews.Title: Very good product.
Reviews.Author: Linda K. Morefield
Reviews.Content: I like Apple TV and being able to stream Netflix movies and YouTube videos to my living room television.  I haven't quite figured out the iPad sharing version yet but I will.  I don't really use the iTunes movies because of the cost on each movie but I do enjoy my Apple TV!

Reviews.Title: Apple GUI a winner as usual.
Reviews.Author: BUFULO
Reviews.Content: Apple consumer products just plain work.  Couldn't be any easier to set up & use.  Lots of worthwhile free content but add Netflix & DTV (via antenna) for a complete & less expensive alternative to cable.

Reviews.Title: Best gadget I've bought in years
Reviews.Author: David Mcconaughy
Reviews.Content: Combined with iTunes Match all my music I've ever owned is now available on this little box wired into the stereo and tv.  I bought a second one and it shows up on iOS devices as Apple TV 2 automatically.  Love it.  Thinking about ditching cable.  May never buy another movie except on iTunes either as you can purchase and watch instantly whatever isn't already free on the built in Netflix.  Way cool.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Product
Reviews.Author: Charles Brooke
Reviews.Content: This product has significantly enhanced the use and value of our television set. It synced easily with our cloud providing access to all our Apple related content from our iPhones to iPads to Macs. If you have a TV and you are an Apple user this is a very inexpensive  must have product!

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a present for my dad who is Apple everything.  I have a Roku but no apple devices.  He loves Apple TV and uses airplay from his macpro to the tv.  Pretty coolProduct arrived on time, packages well.  No issues.

Reviews.Title: Works like it should - Mirroring glitches
Reviews.Author: K Lowder
Reviews.Content: I like my Apple TV.  Works quite well.  The only issues i have had are some mirroring lag with my macbook.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV.. Great Product
Reviews.Author: Ornate D. Smith
Reviews.Content: One of the best bang for the buck ... I wished all of Apple products were more in the general price range as this product.

Reviews.Title: Hard to choose between ATV and Roku
Reviews.Author: stradavarius
Reviews.Content: I went with the ATV over Roku simply for Airplay and the way it fit into my current media setup.  I wish it had more channels like the Roku, but Airplay makes up for that for everything I personally watch.  It will be great if and when Apple decides to allow more apps on the ATV.  It has huge potential.  The biggest drawback for me is the lack of support for external storage.  I already have an HTPC setup so it was not difficult to keep iTunes open to watch all of my videos.  But if I could just attach an external HDD with all of my music and videos, that would be ideal.  Roku does this to a limited extent.  There are other devices that allow external storage I know, but they have drawbacks in support and function that just aren't worth it.  So I will stream ITunes for now and wait to see what Apple comes up with next.  I have an Xbox and previously used it for all of my streaming.  So far I am happy with both, but we'll see how they compare over time, especially with Netflix and Hulu Plus apps.

Reviews.Title: Keeps getting better
Reviews.Author: Splat Matt
Reviews.Content: When the revision of apple TV came out... I really didn't see the point but now that apple allows hulu and netflix, connects to your iTunes eco system, and allows content streaming from iDevices - the only question is why don't more people have them?

Reviews.Title: Works terrifically as advertised
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Bovee "draw bridge"
Reviews.Content: Great for Netflix and Youtube.  Just wish there was a way to connect to the internet to be able to watch shows from other websites, like Comedy Central (Daily Show, Colbert Report) and others.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: G. Rauh
Reviews.Content: Great product, very slick, intuitive user interface, love the Airplay mirroring feature (requires Mountain Lion OS). This is my second Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Super Great
Reviews.Author: Clauber Oliveira
Reviews.Content: Very useful, actually I think iTunes store(for movies) is too expensive, but I have an netflix account and there is a lot of great movies there.I can watch videos from my computer with homesharing but it doesnt have support for .srt file and a have trouble to convert(the video file) and embed them.Beside this, it meets my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Took some time to get working on the iPhone and iPad
Reviews.Author: Matthew J. Faulkner "AdobeDog"
Reviews.Content: I use iTunes match and watch a fair amount of Netflix streaming. The ability to use the apple remote on the iPhone and iPad is awesome, it makes search and YouTube much easier to use. However, it took 48 hours to stabilize and work correctly, I did not change any settings, just waited and there it was. I think Apple maybe watching me!Much better wireless network range than the previous version.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Adam Glowacki
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my daughter and she said she loves it. I got it at a great price too.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV - most excellent
Reviews.Author: K. Bilyeu "Student of the Word"
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is a great, fun addition to my living room and TV watching experience. The setup was easy and straight forward I had it up and running in less than 10 minutes.

Reviews.Title: TV adapter that gives your TV smart apps.
Reviews.Author: Delton C. Baker
Reviews.Content: Apple Products are always popular gifts for the kids I am sure they love it as much as I do.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: lonnie bates
Reviews.Content: best present i got for my daughter. she absolutely loves it. all her friends cant wait to get one for them selfs

Reviews.Title: awesome!
Reviews.Author: Jen "Jen"
Reviews.Content: we went from Netflix through our BlueRay to Apple TV and the picture, the sound, the speed, etc are all noticably better.  This is worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Nice interface
Reviews.Author: Dr. Z
Reviews.Content: After some initial pain of the apple server not being available it was very easy to set up.A very nice interface and allows good streaming from netflix or from my computer.I gave up on the cute little remote (that is too easy to misplace) and programmed my Logitech remote to control its functions.I do wish it had RCA audio out instead of just optical to make it more compatible and save me having to get an adapter.

Reviews.Title: Work great with all my Apple product
Reviews.Author: JoseZ
Reviews.Content: Come fast and set up fast. Everything works great on all my Apple product. Share your video and photos are so easy now with AirPlay. Must buy for all Apple fan :D

Reviews.Title: AWESOME Device for the Money...but beware of re-packaging
Reviews.Author: Erich Starrett
Reviews.Content: This is my third Apple TV.  Love it!  An excellent use of ~$100 if you have a solid iTunes library...and a dedicated "always on" computer/drive running your iTunes library 24x7 that you can tap into.I was surprised, however, to find out that a USED Apple TV was shipped to me...and part of the packaging that would hold a new Apple TV perfectly in place was gone -- the plastic wrap around the outside of the box, the protective plastic around the Apple TV and remotes were part of the mess, but haphazardly replaced, and the cardboard "guides" inside the box that keep eveything in place weren't there.  When I opened the box the remote control was "floating around" freely in the larger box's packaging...it had completely slipped out of the Apple TV box.  Scuffed up.  VERY unlike Amazon!  PLEASE DON'T LET YOUR AWESOME QUALITY CONTROL SLIP AMAZON!!!  I have been a happy customer for years and want to remain so.Also I think this was the FIRST time that my shipment has been late.  Usually UPS and on time or early.  This was FedEx and a day late!?!?!

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC!
Reviews.Author: Angela Reid Williams
Reviews.Content: I BROUGHT THIS AS A CHRISTMAS GIFT FOR MY HUSBAND AND HE LOVES THIS AND SO DO I!!! WE PLAN ON GETTING ANOTHER ONE SOON.

Reviews.Title: So easy
Reviews.Author: Timothy H. Pylant
Reviews.Content: Plug it into the wall, plug it into the TV, walk through the setup and you're cooking with gas. The interface to Netflix is the best out there. Be sure to get the Remote app if you have an iPhone.

Reviews.Title: I love my apple TV.
Reviews.Author: mimi
Reviews.Content: I love the apple TV, it was $20 cheaper at amozon! Very happy  and now i can see all my favorites show! Thanks amozon...

Reviews.Title: Small and Powerful
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: The box is so small I had hard time figuring where to locate so that my universal remote control signal would get to it.  If you have apple products in your house; I have three computers and three cell phones this is the way to easily display or listen to their content.

Reviews.Title: Great device!
Reviews.Author: Mike P
Reviews.Content: This is a great device at a very good price!  Allows you to do basically everything you do on your iPhone or iPad on your tv. Easy to set up and use!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Lui
Reviews.Content: Airplay is still under the infant stage. More apps need to support apple tv such as HBO Go and Netflix. However, so far it's great! Good product to play music videos or your song playlist without having to buy an expensive bluetooth speaker set.

Reviews.Title: My go to gift
Reviews.Author: Brandon C. Diamond "BDiamond"
Reviews.Content: I buy these things for every one for gifts. Everyone uses iTunes these days and this lets you easily integrate your home theater and TV. Great features also include access to things like Netflix!

Reviews.Title: They loved it!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: We bought this Apple TV as a gift for my in-laws.  They wanted it to stream videos from Netflix and to stream their iPad.  It works perfect for that.  It was really easy to install with step by step directions.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Joshua Kendrick "AlphaFox"
Reviews.Content: love my apple tv! works best with another iDevice for streaming and that kind of thing; pandora via iphone and such.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: Great companion to other Apple products.  I love the convenience of using Airplay.  Best device I've purchased in ~3 years!

Reviews.Title: Great addition to the TV
Reviews.Author: MSC
Reviews.Content: It is great to be able to stream all my iTunes TV, movie and music purchases to the television - from the cloud or my computer it works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Evan
Reviews.Content: Christmas Gift for myself :-)Absolutly love it.  I really enjoy being able to control everything from my iPhone or Macbook ProLove the Airplay feature and NetflixGreat gift and very affordable

Reviews.Title: Apple TV Gift
Reviews.Author: C. Mills "Book collector"
Reviews.Content: I purchased it for my son and he loves it.  He uses it on a TV that is not connected to cable.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: N. Stocks
Reviews.Content: This works great.  We have an older 720p flatscreen, and we set the Apple TV to 720p and it works great.  We use it for videos from our iMac, rentals, and YouTube.  I would say it has a slightly better-than-average interface to YouTube.  It could take some pointers from the Wii YouTube interface, though.

Reviews.Title: More than I expected
Reviews.Author: TerreHaute
Reviews.Content: I use only with an Iphone now but can't wait until I get the Ipad.  Already had a SmartTV for Hulu and Netflix that replaced the now obsolete Roku so I didn't need that feature.  Very simple to use with music, videos, pictures, YouTube, and probably more that I haven't seen.  It is great!

Reviews.Title: Airplay is limited to certain apps, no true "mirroring"
Reviews.Author: Smart Buyer "Josh"
Reviews.Content: This is astonishing to me that I cannot do a true "mirror" from my iPod screen to the big screen. Specifically I bought this device so that I could launch the HBO Go app and watch my paid subscription through Airplay on the Apple TV. But the app says it doesn't support HDMI output. It's unforgivable how limited the Airplay is and how it doesn't truly let you use all your device's apps on the big screen. This fractured experience just makes me want to veto the whole entertainment media establishment. Oh, BTW, the Apple TV is nice, as long as it lasts longer than my Roku (cheap box broke), and I like the movie trailers and all the other content in HD. Very nice.

Reviews.Title: Great Addition to Dorm Entertainment Setup
Reviews.Author: John S
Reviews.Content: I live in a dorm, so the Apple TV's wifi related features do not work correctly yet, (They work at home) such as the remote app and airplay from an iOS device. But it is hooked into the ethernet and connects to my MacBook Pro through the ethernet network. I play my iTunes and mirror my desktop to it perfectly. It's hooked up to an Onkyo TX-NR616 and does everything perfectly. It outputs to HDMI and Digital Optical at the same time, which is perfect for when I don't need video. Overall it's a perfect addition to make listening or watching your media easier and better.

Reviews.Title: Love this product
Reviews.Author: Kevin J. Keough
Reviews.Content: Has opened up a whole new set of possibilities, from TV to movies, to music.  My only complaint is that it does not have Pandora available as an ap.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Evil Lynn "Linda"
Reviews.Content: Great Christmas gift for my son and his family.  Cheaper than other places and fast shipping.  I Love Amazon.  He said it was really easy to set up and does much more than he thought it would.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: shirleyzhouzhou
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is Apple TV. $% cheaper than store. I use it to watch netflix, youtube and iTune movies. not quite developed other functions yet. I wish they can show Amazon instant movie soon, since their movie is often cheaper than itunes.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Robert K Sheehan
Reviews.Content: Easy to instal and use. A must for IPAD users. a a a a a a a a a a

Reviews.Title: Easy setup
Reviews.Author: victor schiller
Reviews.Content: On home videos, the WiFi has no problems streaming 720p from my server, computers, and iPad & iPhone but 1080p is too high bitrate.  Need to connect the cat5e to eliminate the intermittent buffering.  Other than that, works just fine.

Reviews.Title: Apple tv
Reviews.Author: Sandra R VonKannel
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my boyfriend and he loved it! It was shipped fast with no problems. It is a little confusing for ME of how to get certain apps to show on tv.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Carolina Moura "mom of 3"
Reviews.Content: I use this every day! All of my movies are in I tunes now. I can play a movie from it on the TV for my kids while I still use my computer. I can do music on it too. I dont have speakers anymore because my TV speakers are awesome and thats all I need. I have 2 of these for 2 different TVs. Great purchase

Reviews.Title: Works PERFECT !!
Reviews.Author: Dvalentine
Reviews.Content: Instant setup.  Works perfectly.  You can play YouTube and content on my iPhone video, audio and pictures...  I love it !

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Ms. M
Reviews.Content: I love my apple TV and use it in my classroom for interactive and video instruction. It's so easy to set up and the mirroring option makes it especially great for instruction.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Stark
Reviews.Content: Great item.  Need to have a subscription to Netflix or something like that to use, but fun to stream videos, movies and tv shows on my tv.

Reviews.Title: AppleTv
Reviews.Author: Steven B. Lekan
Reviews.Content: Bought to be able to watch YouTube videos and listen to music purchased on my iPhone and iPad. Because Apple doesn't support Adobe Flash, many video's I've watched on my laptop are not viewable on AppleTv. But I knew that when I purchased, just didn't realize the extent of how much on YouTube uses Adobe Flash Player. So video's are limited.I'm still a novice and learning as far as my AppleTv goes, but it seems that to be able to play my purchased iTunes from my iPhone and iPad, it seems I have to subscribe to iTunes Match to be able to do so? This is at a cost of $25 annually. I was under the impression I'd be able to listen to these like on my other Apple products.The remote is VERY flimsy. I have large hands and when using, I can feel the the thin body of the remote flexing when using.I have doubts about the lifespan of the remote.The Radio app is great though. I listen to hard rock and heavy metal mostly, and there are endless channel's to listen too. Every sub-genre of metal is covered. And International channels too! Excellent!Overall, pretty good device but not great. As I get more familiar with it, maybe my opinion will improve as far as my rating goes. Especially if I don't have to subscribe to another Apple product to listen to my iTunes on my tv. And please Apple, make a more robust remote!!!!

Reviews.Title: AppleTv
Reviews.Author: rocdharr
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic device!  I was able to connect it to my TV in about 5 minuets.  Very simple.  I highly recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: It works as expected.
Reviews.Author: Nelson Gorini
Reviews.Content: The product now works as expected with a Samsung LCD TV. Hopefully also with the new LED I've just bought.First, there was a lot of flickering at 1080P. It disappeared  when I told the TV that Apple TV was as a computer connected through HDMI. Then, even better resolution options became available.Maybe this is just a Samsung/Apple problem. There is no mention/recommendation about this in product documentation. There are a lot of complaints, though, in Internet forums.Problem is solved and I'm happy. The missing star goes for the initial frustration and the need to search for a solution.Nelson

Reviews.Title: My second one!
Reviews.Author: Rdawg "Next Day Shipping:)"
Reviews.Content: Love these little boxes, they give you all the stuff you want from itunes and netflix with the added ability to AirPlay! And if you have a mac, iPhone, or ipad you really should have an Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Cool gadget for any i-addicted person
Reviews.Author: Karen Furgerson ""taekwondo mom""
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift.  The receiver loves it. I don't really know the details of what it does, but my brother-in-law was excited to receive it. It arrived quickly and was packaged very well.

Reviews.Title: Must-Have for Apple Owners
Reviews.Author: Borris "gadget junkie"
Reviews.Content: Works as you'd expect an Apple product to work:  simple to set up and use.  Great for a variety of streaming content options, and if you have a Mac or i-device then it's worth the purchase price just for the convenience of AirPlay.  Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: for us, this little unit works VERY well...
Reviews.Author: D. Campbell "darwin346"
Reviews.Content: We have slowly walked over to the Mac side of the world over time simply because their products work and work well.  When this is coupled with the airplay any current mac device instantly has the ability to have what ever TV this is attached to as a monitor.  We've streamed movies from the laptop through this with fully acceptable results.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful product
Reviews.Author: Dadhertz
Reviews.Content: Apple TV doesn't disappoint. It is a quality, well conceived product with a clean logical interface as is the case with all of Apples products. It allows easy streaming of music and video directly from your computer, iPhone, iPad via AirPlay. Additionally, it provides complete access to iTunes. My only knock would be that I feel it should offer a few more channels.

Reviews.Title: The best streaming device on the market!
Reviews.Author: David Golombowski "dgolombowski"
Reviews.Content: I had several of the original hard drive equipped Apple TVs.  I still miss some of the features of having local storage but the new version has won me over.  I now have four of the new Apple TVs in my home and with each upgrade I love them more.  I have a dedicated home theater and the picture quality on my 123" screen is near Vudu HDX quality.  If Apple can get the HD audio codecs to stream there will be no reason to buy another Blu-ray.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Joe Wiedenmeier
Reviews.Content: There is always room for improvement with application offerings, but the hardware works flawlessly and it gets better with every OS upgrade.

Reviews.Title: love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: J. Hotrum "anotherjen"
Reviews.Content: I can't believe how small this is!!  It's real quick and very nice!!!  I'm going to replace all of our t.v. boxes with this little guy.

Reviews.Title: Fun Product
Reviews.Author: D. Rotoloni "shopper"
Reviews.Content: This TV was easy to set up and coordinate with my itunes account. It has many capabilities and is easy to use. It is fun to use photos as a screen saver while listening to playlists and other music. Videos from You Tube can be viewed on the TV screen, as well as Hulu Plus and Netflix streaming.The only reason I am not giving it five stars is because it seems to not hold my connection to my iphone 4S. I am able to connect my phone and complete a mirror image, but I then lose the connection. This may be due to the firewall on the WiFi, or may be due to using a slightly older phone? I will continue to explore this issue and update if a solution is found. Since I have many capabilities of viewing videos, I am not sure I will miss this feature. But, it would be an important feature for someone who planned to watch movies via the mirror image of the phone.

Reviews.Title: good item
Reviews.Author: Kanna
Reviews.Content: Its good item for ipad users.compact, easy setup and love it.I am enjoying to watch Youtube and movie with apple TV

Reviews.Title: Apple
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: This is a great product that does everything that it is suppose to do . makes a great gift also... highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: We love this
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Wilkie
Reviews.Content: To be honest we just hooked this up a couple of hours ago but we love it already. We were able to mirror our Macbook Pro screen onto our flatscreen with no problem. Now we don't have to look over each other's shoulder when perusing the net. The one downside that I see is that it looks like in order to play iTunes music we will have to pay about $25 a year for iTunes Match.Have not figured out how to do it otherwise. Also have not figured out if I can play my Amazon Cloud music either, probably not.All in all, we will probably not use the ROKU anymore, at least with this tv.

Reviews.Title: Nice product but
Reviews.Author: Subhash
Reviews.Content: Very few apps. I wish apple allow to install apps from app store. The quality is great for sound and streaming.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Device
Reviews.Author: jacomstephens
Reviews.Content: I have three of these throughout our house and we love them. We use them mostly to watch Netflix shows and movies as well as the more recent movies from the Apple store. The interface is super slick and easy to navigate. I just wish we could create shortcuts or favorites to minimize the number of clicks it takes to get to things we use frequently.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Just Saying
Reviews.Content: I wanted to give it 5 stars, but the use of a key board on the remote would help a lot.My netgear streamer has one.Over all easy to use and install, movies stream fast really fast.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Tamara
Reviews.Content: I expect for this amount of money, the product would exceed expectations....and it absolutely did. Apple products are wonderful...and it was packaged carefully.

Reviews.Title: I'm hooked on AppleTV
Reviews.Author: S. Terry
Reviews.Content: Great gadget to expand your viewing options and very affordable.  Great gift for those that already have wireless Internet in their home.  Easy install and setup -- we've added 2 to our house and will probably add a 3rd before long.

Reviews.Title: Great product from Apple to use with all other Apple devices
Reviews.Author: new
Reviews.Content: The ability to mirror with other Apple devices makes this product worth the money. No problems with set up or use.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic product.
Reviews.Author: E. Ward
Reviews.Content: Great for watching anything on Net Flix. Easy to use and install. An all around great product. View pictures from iCloud or do anything you want on your iPad and view on your TV screen. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Patrick Napoleão
Reviews.Content: I recommend this product because it's very useful for those that have ipad, iphone or ipod touch.Netflix is also useful too.

Reviews.Title: A must have for anyone who buys movies/shows on iTunes and has a HDTV
Reviews.Author: T. Malyszko
Reviews.Content: I have the 2nd generation unit, which I've been pleased with.  However, I recently upgraded a 2nd TV to a 50" Plasma.  My son wanted to watch "Frosty" and "Mr. Grinch" on the new TV, but since both were part of my iTunes Library, I could not easily stream them to the new Plasma.  Now that I have this unit hooked up to the Plasma, streaming is perfect.  Of course, it all depends on your Internet Connection, but it's nice to stream 1080p content directly from the Apple Servers to this device with no lags or loss in picture quality.Setup is a breeze.  All I had to do was select my preferred language, enter my Apple ID and Password and all my iTunes content was available.  It really cannot get any easier!

Reviews.Title: OK but...
Reviews.Author: Baton Rogue "The Rational Conservative"
Reviews.Content: I am trying to learn to use it with the remote, an old MacBook 13", and the small TV in my office while I wait for the spirit to move me to buy an iPad. Not a great experience yet, tho it does work.The Baton Rogue

Reviews.Title: It's A Good Buy
Reviews.Author: mcdboy
Reviews.Content: I really like my Apple TV! The only problem is it sometimes takes awhile to load a movie or TV show. Other than that it is awesome and streaming works wonderfully! I don't regret buying it!

Reviews.Title: Best thing ever!
Reviews.Author: BRIAN LAROCCO
Reviews.Content: Easy to be anywhere around the house and control the stereo plus it gives us access to radio stations we didn't have before.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: bklapierre
Reviews.Content: Just got it two days ago so still figuring out all the things it can do. Teenage son is quicker at learning the specifics to using the Apple TV. I was surprised about having to pay for certain features:( Home match. Took some time to connect to my home computers.

Reviews.Title: Love the Apple TV
Reviews.Author: IT Girl
Reviews.Content: I chose this so that I could play my movies and music through my sound system easily. My MacBook Pro is too old to mirror, but when I get a new one, I can mirror my screen to it if I want. Netflix works great on here - what I mainly use it for.

Reviews.Title: Verdict is still out
Reviews.Author: SLP
Reviews.Content: I have a bunch of apple products and use Netflix, Hulu, etc, but it is not as streamlined or user friendly as I would have hoped. First annoying thing is that when I use the remote it affects my laptop (i.e. it must be on the same frequency--so when I scroll on the tv, it messes with my laptop. I may be a little daft, but I can't always get it to play from my computer or ipad. Anyway, I think my boyfriend (who is very tech savvy) has figured it out (after quite a bit of effort). Have not been using as much as I would otherwise. I do like the ease of browsing itunes and Netflix.

Reviews.Title: Priced right, but a let down.
Reviews.Author: J. F.
Reviews.Content: Good:-Sub $100 price.-Size.-Itunes store connectivityBad:-Network issues. Doesn't connect well to my Apple router.-Couldn't see my itunes share. Couldn't resolve problem.-Limited media network.-Apple needs to add a back button. The combo menu/back button is annoying.Sending it back.

Reviews.Title: So easy to install
Reviews.Author: Charmor
Reviews.Content: Small, compact and extremely easy to install. This is my first venture into the MAC world and, so far, I'm impressed.  Tons of choices -- movies, TV shows, podcasts, iTUNES. The only downside (and I'll 'master' it) is that the remote is SO small. Easy to lose. I'm going to velcro it to a block of wood the size of my TV and cable remotes.  I've already recommended it to friends and bought one for my grown sons.  Oh, and I'm catching up on Seasons 1 and 2 of "Downton Abbey."

Reviews.Title: gift for hubby
Reviews.Author: carie martinez
Reviews.Content: he wanted this so i got it for christmas he likes it  not sure if i would but hes know more about  computer s then i do

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: James Pringle
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for two of our kids for Christmas and they love it!!!  Easy to hook up and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Our Second Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Rauol
Reviews.Content: Once we saw how much we used and enjoyed our Apple TV in our Media Center, we just had to buy another for our bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Works very well, no complaints. Set up very easy. Using with Apple Airport Extreme, very clear and sharp picture. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: Amazing little box!
Reviews.Author: J. Likens
Reviews.Content: So much functionality in such a little box! In less than 10 minutes out of the box my TV was interactive within my network, my laptop and two iPads.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Taun Stewart "TS"
Reviews.Content: Why buy one of those roku things when you can spend just a bit more and have this!  Awesome quality, great streamline compatibility with all things apple!  Have a couple of these hooked up in my home, love them

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: A. Dupuis
Reviews.Content: I can't believe how small this product is (I almost wish the remote was bigger, even--it's incredibly easy to loose in the sofa cushions). I use an older MacBook that you're not supposed to be able to do the screen mirroring with, but with the addition of the program Airparrot, mirroring works like a dream. All the apps are great, although it is a pity you can't access Amazon streaming through it--music and movies streamed through iTunes are much more expensive. Still, super nice and great for someone who likes watching international television. I can now download things onto my computer and easily watch them on my tv.

Reviews.Title: Don't know
Reviews.Author: robmac
Reviews.Content: I had problems renting a movie through the Apple TV. Apple replaced it but the new one had the same problem. I don't know if it is the Apple TV or my internet speed. I have increased the internet speed but haven't tried to rent a movie through it yet because it is a bi of a pain to get a refund--all rentals are final. I can rent on the computer and stream it from iTunes so I kept it.

Reviews.Title: Get item.
Reviews.Author: Sylvia Emmens
Reviews.Content: My son asked if we would give these to our grandchildren.  They live on a boat and this item works get from them.

Reviews.Title: second Apple TV I've bought
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Second Apple TV I've bought.  This one was a gift for my daughter and son-in-law.  They love it.  Works great.

Reviews.Title: As promised
Reviews.Author: Themis Kalogeris
Reviews.Content: Works fine, need to learn to use all the features. Overall good ourchase.  Good price too. Thanks for everything guys

Reviews.Title: Faulty remote
Reviews.Author: s
Reviews.Content: This is a great product, arrived quickly with Amazon Prime. Docking one star because we were unable to set it up due to the remote being broken and wasted a lot of time trying to figure out what was wrong. Eventually we had to go to an Apple Store to exchange for a new remote and everything has worked great since. We can now stream from Netflix or mirror directly from the iPad.

Reviews.Title: solid product
Reviews.Author: brente
Reviews.Content: Very solid product.  It was easy to step up and get working without having to mess with itunes.  It shares the screen with my ipad and has it's own adequate lineup of channels.  Great video quality.

Reviews.Title: Great way to make any TV and internet TV
Reviews.Author: BMilw
Reviews.Content: I bought a "basic" TV without internet connectivity due to quality and price and was able to get the TV connected to the internet using this little box that I got for less than $100 dollars. Hook-up is simple: one HDMI cord to the TV and the power cord to the wall and you're ready to go. It's a little hard to type/search using the on-screen keyboard but I think there is a way around that if you have a computer connected via Home Sharing... but I haven't tried it yet.The AppleTV ability to AirPlay anything from an iPhone or Macbook makes it well worth the money just by itself. The tiny box is also not an eyesore and is barely visible when sitting on a dark-colored entertainment center.

Reviews.Title: Love This!!!
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: This product is amazing!  We cannot tear ourselves away from watching series of shows available through the apple tv.  The walking dead seasons have been a hit and we are completely caught up now and ready for the new season in feb.  The only thing you need though is an hdmi cable to hook to your tv.  It did not come with one and had to make a run to a game stop store to get after christmas.

Reviews.Title: THE BEST GIFT EVER
Reviews.Author: Victoria Guerra
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for myself and I absolutely love it!!!! I recommend it to everyone! It's awesome! So happy!

Reviews.Title: works as promised
Reviews.Author: Paul Hoeper
Reviews.Content: Installed quickly and set up easily.  Worked first time!  Works every time as described it would.  I like it.  I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Take a bite of Apple TV
Reviews.Author: H. Albizo "Amazonian"
Reviews.Content: I have had this product for some time and am very satisfied with it. However, I don't recall seeing a lot of detailed operational instructions with it. Admittedly, I am one who installs first and reads the instructions later. It is a very easy installation and the quality of the programming such as movies is outstanding. The user interface is easy to navigate and I like the feature where I can see trailers for movies and if I don't have time to watch it now, I just place it in my wish list or queue. They also provide customer and critic's reviews. I am running both Apple TV and Roku 2 XS side by side. I did it because I wanted to see which one was the best overall with the intent to returning one of them. Instead I kept them both. I'll save the Roku evaluation for a little later but they are both very good streaming devices with different user interfaces and slightly different offerings. The quality of streaming HD movies on Apple TV is outstanding. I was pleasantly surprised. There is absolutely no freezing, choppiness (truncation) or any other distractions. I ran out of HDMI ports on the TV (which you must have to ensure the highest picture and sound resolution), so I purchased a HDMI switch to hook both Apple TV and Ruku 2 XS. So depending on which product I use, I just switch back and forth. I would also recommend that you not spend a lot of money on expensive HDMI cables. That is simply a lot of hype. You can buy very good HDMI cables for around $15.00 give or take. Just so you know you must have adequate bandwidth. I run at about 24 Mbps and am using a Linksys Gb router. I feel comfortable saying that you can have half the bandwidth that I have and still have a very satisfying experience.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Tracee
Reviews.Content: great product, easy to buy, easy to connect.i don't understand why you require a certain amount of words to describe this

Reviews.Title: I like apple stuff anyway
Reviews.Author: S B
Reviews.Content: It is an apple tv-  I have had these for a while and it is pretty much just like all the previous versions.  A little faster, a few more mild software tweaks.  Its good.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Joan
Reviews.Content: The hardware of the Apple TV is great and easy to set up, the picture is outstanding. However it is very expensive to rent movies & TV shows and the TV shows are not current. Needed to buy antenna for local TV.

Reviews.Title: It's OK but not quite what I thought.
Reviews.Author: Judy S.
Reviews.Content: I like the fact you can display you iPad screen on the TV, watch movies, video's, etc. but I would like to be able to choose more than one place for the bluetooth to be active.  I would like to use my soundbar while watching a movie or concert(haven't done either) but like my iTunes songs better through the soundbar than the tv.Played with it a lot when I 1st got it and now hardly use it.  I would recommend it, just noy with great passion.

Reviews.Title: Good but not great
Reviews.Author: Roadrunner
Reviews.Content: It's a handy little gadget to have in your entertainment system and Airplay works great on stuff that's not "only allowed to be played on your mobile device" which is why it didn't get 5 starts. Most of the interesting stuff that you want to watch using Airplay is blocked from being played over Airplay. It's very annoying. There is a crack you can use if you feel like jailbreaking your iPad. It's also missing the Amazon Video app but you wouldn't be able to watch the videos over Airplay anyway so I guess it doesn't make any difference.

Reviews.Title: Apple's best forgotten product
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Dezinno
Reviews.Content: There is not a single thing to not like about this. It has Netflix and Hulu. iTunes sharing couldn't be easier. I'm addicted to mine. If you are thinking about cutting your cable and getting this, don't hesitate one second.

Reviews.Title: if you have a MAC you should buy this also!
Reviews.Author: Suzi
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing and easy to use device!  Our primary use will be for viewing our pictures and videos with our family!  Great and easy way to relive those family memories!

Reviews.Title: Still not better than Roku 2 XS!
Reviews.Author: Adrienne
Reviews.Content: I purchased this device for my sister for Christmas because she has an iPod Touch, and I appreciate the app that she was able to download and use to push whatever she watches on her iPod Touch onto her TV through the Apple TV, but the lack of apps on Apple TV makes it hard for me to enjoy it more than I enjoy my Roku 2 XS. Still, the video quality is great, and my sister loves it, so it was worth purchasing!

Reviews.Title: Great addition to our Apple home
Reviews.Author: Claudia Webb
Reviews.Content: We are an Apple family:  two iPads, four iPhones, three Mac book pros, one Mac book Air & one time machine. It all works together seamlessly.  We are going to buy one for the Google TV that is great in its on right, but lacks 'AirPlay' which we love.

Reviews.Title: My son in law loves it!
Reviews.Author: Carol Snyder
Reviews.Content: Exellent product, great value. i would recommend this product. Easy to use and install. A big asset to HD TV.

Reviews.Title: Neat product!
Reviews.Author: Janet A. Gilles
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift for our family.  I am not technical in any way but was told by my kids that this was what I should buy to do what I wanted it to do.  I was looking for something to add to our tv to be able to access YouTube, Netflix, iTunes, etc., wirelessly.  So far it's done what I was hoping it would.  Even I can use it (after tutoring from my son, who also set it up) and have enjoyed watching YouTube videos, photos and listening to music.  It's only been in use for a couple of days, but so far, so good.It was reasonably priced and came in a very little box!  It came with a very small and thin remote, but can also be controlled with your iPad or computer (a windows laptop in my case).  I also liked that I could download my own music CD's  (through my iTunes account, I think) and listen to them through the Apple TV.  Overall I'm excited about it and hope to enjoy it for many years.

Reviews.Title: Makes sense for IPad/IPhone owners
Reviews.Author: Nix
Reviews.Content: There are tons of reviews out there about the specs and features of the Apple TV. So, I'll just say what I use it for. I primarily use it to watch Netflix or stream videos from my desktop via my IPad to the Apple TV. There are couple of ways I do it. I use Air Video or Air Playit to stream to my IPad, and Airplay to my Apple TV. I have a shared folder on my computer that these streaming apps can connect to. I haven't noticed any lag or delay in playing movies, even large files. MP4 files can play directly from Itunes to the Apple TV. No need for IPad to be in the middle in that scenario. Sometimes I also use Splashtop Remote desktop to connect to my computer and browse on the bigger screen. Splashtop only works with the Mirroring option. For those of you who are new to this, AirPlay and Mirroring are 2 different things and if you do a google search on it, will tell you how to do it.Netflix quality  is much better than what I used to get on my Wii netflix app. I haven't tried to play any games using mirroring, so can't speak to that.So far, I am really happy with my purchase. If you own a IPad or IPhone, this is a neat little toy for less than $99 right now on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful inside and out.
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Hickey
Reviews.Content: This purchase was actually a gift, because I have had my Apple TV for about 4 months. When first getting the product it's honestly amazing how tiny it is. Then you plug it in, and let me tell you, if your T.V. is Hi-Def you need the HDMI hook-up instead of the RGB Component, trust me.  Very Responsive and Aesthetically Pleasing UI, with just about every little "app" you could use.  The only real downside would be the fact that iTunes charges $5 to rent a movie, but I guess you just can't win them all.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: April
Reviews.Content: Love love love the Apple TV it does so much more then I even thought, worth the money, very happy with my purchase

Reviews.Title: Easy to Install
Reviews.Author: Roe, CT
Reviews.Content: Super easy to install. Love it. Works great with Netflix and other apps. I only wish it had come with more instructions. Had problems getting it to come on but put it in SLEEP NEVER mode and no more problems.

Reviews.Title: Love love love!!
Reviews.Author: Hedder08
Reviews.Content: So easy to use and fun to play with! Def a must for apple users. We love it! Thanks apple!

Reviews.Title: Works well within Apple ecosystem
Reviews.Author: Fox Hill
Reviews.Content: We use this for AirPlaying photos and videos from our iPhones and iPad. I also bought Real Racing HD2 to try it out while using the iPad as a controller - it is a fun game when you play it on a big screen TV. Lastly, the Netflix interface is more user-friendly than what we have with our Sony BDP-S590 DVD player (which is not bad on its).

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: A. Langefels "Happy Customer"
Reviews.Content: We are having so much fun playing with this Apple TV. It has so many cool features, and it was a breeze to set up. I would recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Perfect if you have an Apple "environment " at home
Reviews.Author: Brian Hill
Reviews.Content: We have an "un-smart" TV and so earlier this year bought a Sony SMP-N200, which is effectively the smart TV gubbins in a separate box.  I'm very pleased with the Sony for what it does.  But it's what the Sony doesn't do that caused me to want the Apple TV - I still have to watch ESPN 3, and non-Netflx/Hulu Plus streaming sites on my iMac - which is fine, but isn't in as comfortable a location as my TV is...The combination of the Apple TV and my iMac now means that by using Airplay Mirroring, I can watch anything streaming on my computer directly on the TV - which is just what I wanted.  Oh and we can also display whatever my wife is streaming on her iPhone directly on the TV.Purchasers do need to check the spec of their hardware though.  If you have an apple computer from before 2012, check the compatibility list on Apple's web site, to see if airplay mirroring will work for you.  If airplay mirroring won't work for you, and you don't intend to update your hardware, you may want to look at the Roku (no you-tube option to date) or another streaming device, which has more "in the box" streaming options than the apple TV has.However, for me and any other Apple devotees, this is the streaming device you want to attach to your "un-smart" TV (and possibly your smart TV as well).

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Nicholas James Jeffrey
Reviews.Content: I have become an Apple guy. I bought this because I have an iPad and an iPhone and I love the cross functionality. I love being able to mirror either device to the TV screen. If you have an Apple device this is a great addition.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Cathy M "Cam1615"
Reviews.Content: What a great idea everyone in my house has iphones we can all control it so cool! If you have a netflix sub like we do then its REALLY worth it!

Reviews.Title: Great apple tv, awesome with ipad
Reviews.Author: B. Clark "G35"
Reviews.Content: I replaced my original apple tv with this upgraded model and man is it faster!  I have an ipad 3 and using the screen mirroring is awesome!  I gave it 4 stars because I had to replace the first one I got because the ethernet port died on it.  I took it to apple and they replaced it, no charge.  Great customer service!  At least at the store I went to.

Reviews.Title: Can't live without it!
Reviews.Author: Michael Levinson
Reviews.Content: If you use iTunes & Netflix at all and have a HD TV this will be the best $99 you ever spend.I listen to all my music watch all movies through it. My bluray player is a giant paperweight now.Also bought an app for my iMac, Airfoil, and can now also stream Sirius Internet Radio through my TV using the Apple TV airplay feature.

Reviews.Title: As expected
Reviews.Author: dave
Reviews.Content: Being that this is an Apple product, it is just as I expected... Fantastic! There have been no issues thus far. A must buy!

Reviews.Title: Apple TV 3
Reviews.Author: Elisabeth Johnson
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is awesome!!  Nearly as good as my blu ray.  Product just runs very well.  This was a good buy from Amazon.  It functions even better in an Apple ecosystem using the Mac, iPod, or iPhone.  Make sure to load all of the TV website apps that you can like ABC, NBC, etc.  They will most likely play smoother when using airplay.  That will allow you to stream free TV shows.  Bye Bye cable bill!!  We now only pay $7.99/mo for Netflix.  The rest is free streaming and local channels using an HD antenna.  Save $$!!

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: victor lucas
Reviews.Content: Never seen it for less than MSRP before, great price and of course great product- but it's an apple product so you knew that!

Reviews.Title: Awesome product - just waiting for a jailbrake
Reviews.Author: Nathan Engel
Reviews.Content: Nothing on this thing is free except if you have any movies of your own (and you have to convert them into a special aTV format you cant watch .avi) 1080p is great, it even has that extra clarity that apple products have these days, Once this thing can be jailbroken it will be unstoppable.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV Newest Version
Reviews.Author: jr4356
Reviews.Content: This is the next best thing to cable or satelite if you have a decent over the air antenna for your local channels, it integrates seemlessly with most Apple products with Airplay.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Kim Kennedy
Reviews.Content: Purchased as a gift. Received in a timely manner. Works great and with no issues. Make sure you get proper cables.

Reviews.Title: Husband loves it
Reviews.Author: Mason09
Reviews.Content: Works great and has lots of options only bad thing is all the cool stuff to watch cost more money!!

Reviews.Title: Apple Rocks!
Reviews.Author: Indy
Reviews.Content: I had been reluctant to purchase this device for a long time because of the $99 price.  When I found it for $85 I was willing to give it a chance.  I am glad I took the chance!  I love that I can watch Netflix, all my shows purchased from Apple, and anything on YouTube.I do hate the little remote control, but was able to program another remote control to work with the device.  If I figure out how to turn it off without having to read any instructions, the device will be perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: karen a conrad
Reviews.Content: This was an awesome purchase! My son was so surprised to open this! He loves this addition to his electronics collection and uses it for sharing things with his youth group and friends. Great price, too!

Reviews.Title: pretty good buy!
Reviews.Author: madenbrazil
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my boyfriend for Xmas. He has a late 2010 MacBook Pro, running the latest OS system available right now. While he was able to connect it to the TV and get it running fairly easily, including streaming his music onto it, as well as his Iphone 5, he wasn't imeediatelly able to stream any of the movies we had downloaded onto his computer.After he did some research online he found something called "Air Parrot" that solved the problem. ps. he said iif his macbook had been a 2011 or newer it would've worked out of the box.Oh and it xcomes with a new remote too that works for his macbook as well. It was a good buy overall!I like my Roku better...but he's a Mac/Apple guy and I would recommend it if you are one too...otherwise go with the Roku.

Reviews.Title: I get tons of use out of it
Reviews.Author: Tom Pomponio
Reviews.Content: It is slowly taking over as the go-to choice for TV time. We are using the Apple TV more and more and cable less and less. I have a Roku device, which has a great content lineup, but the Apple TV interface is so much better. The remote control is too small and slick. I drop it all the time and because of its aluminum build it scratched my wood table.

Reviews.Title: Mostly happy with ATV 3
Reviews.Author: Kevin Neubauer
Reviews.Content: Love how easy it is to set up and get going with Netflix and the iTunes store. The product design is great. Small form-factor box and remote, not a lot of buttons to fumble around with. Netflix operation is nearly flawless compared with other media PC options I have used in the past (Windows Media Center, for example).What is missing from this product (and the rest of the Apple iTunes setup) is a server device so I can effectively play my movies that I have in mp4 format using the Apple TV. Currently you have to have another computer running iTunes with Home Sharing enabled to be able to play your movies that are not downloaded from the iTunes store. On top of that, the Home Sharing setup is not the most reliable. I have had to restart iTunes on my computer and restart the Apple TV to get the Home Sharing library to show up on the Apple TV. It just seems to stop working occasionally.Apple, get your act together. Put in some way to stream movies from either a NAS device or a home server to the Apple TV!

Reviews.Title: NICE
Reviews.Author: Rod Woods
Reviews.Content: This item came in the mail expeditiously and it works perfect.  Arrived before Christmas Day.  Looks good and works fine.

Reviews.Title: Great product, competitive price
Reviews.Author: Ruth D.
Reviews.Content: My husband had bought one of these units at the local Apple store.  He like it so much, he wanted another.  This was about $10 less expensive for the same product

Reviews.Title: exactly what we wanted
Reviews.Author: D. B. 47
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas present for my husband, and it made him extremely happy.  He played with it all day like a little kid.  Lol!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Thomas J. Frenier
Reviews.Content: This works great - the picture quality is amazing and it is very easy to set up - love it.

Reviews.Title: Another Great Apple Product!
Reviews.Author: Brandon Calhoun
Reviews.Content: Great product.  Airplay worked right out of the box with little configuration needed.  I hooked this up to my stereo and TV and it looks and sounds great, I love it.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: ERIC BANNISTER
Reviews.Content: My son recommended it because when he watched Roku on my 50" Vieja and he thought it was slow to load Neflix or Amazon Instant Video. Respecting his opinion, (he had just received an Emmy for his CGI work for "Rising:Rebuilding Ground Zero"), I bought the Apple TV. It was easy to set up and use. It has a large number of APPS, but unfortunately not Amazon Instant Video.I called Apple to ask why, the answerer replied that many people had asked the same question and he would pass on my request to his marketing department.

Reviews.Title: Bought for my kids' school
Reviews.Author: J. Rader
Reviews.Content: Their teacher wanted one to display some things from her iPad onto the TV.  It's worked great for that purpose.

Reviews.Title: Good not-smart-tv partner
Reviews.Author: Camilo F. Vargas
Reviews.Content: Excellent choice for not smart tv with FHD support, the airplay mirroring is good, but when displaying the pics and videos from iphone it takes quite a lot to load. More apps needed.

Reviews.Title: It's all that it promises!
Reviews.Author: R. Medeiros "shell collector"
Reviews.Content: Easy to operate after initial setup with home computer equipped with WiFi.  Viewing choices are good although Netflix is somewhat stale.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Joe D Tipps
Reviews.Content: I purchased the latest version of Apple TV for $89 on Amazon as a Christmas gift. It worked out of the box and was easy to setup with my wifi. As is typical for Apple products the software was intuitive to use and we'll organized (icons). I would recommend this product over the competition for these reasons and for Apple's excellent customer support.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV for 2 weeks
Reviews.Author: Lisa Sexauer
Reviews.Content: So this is really cool if you have a mac and/or iPhone. Setup was a dream and operation is simple. Just wish the streamign providers offered a better selection of newly released videos1 iTUNES is pricey

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product
Reviews.Author: Cesar Ramos
Reviews.Content: This is a very easy device to install and use.  I thought it would be a challenge, however that was not the case.  Apple products are amazing!!!

Reviews.Title: Great if you already have Apple everything!
Reviews.Author: Glenn
Reviews.Content: This product ties all of my Apple products together nicely. It's so easy to just put a pictures or videos off of your phone right up on the TV or to stream music off Pandora for a party without having to plug your receiver into the headphone jack. The part I use it for the most is watching movies stored on my Mac Mini downstairs. For $10 the program iFlicks will take video files and convert them so they will play in iTunes. It also adds them to the proper playlist and includes a picture and synopsis just as if you had bought it from iTunes making the Apple TV a great investment. Free shipping and no tax on Amazon seals the deal!

Reviews.Title: Good product to have
Reviews.Author: AM
Reviews.Content: I have a MacBook Pro and Iphone, so i bought this product inorder to make them sync easily and efficiently ...1) don't expect a lot of choices interms of content.  2) it's a kinda slow when i play online videos on my laptop and use airplay to display it on TV ..it's not the internet cause it plays well on my laptop but it hangs over now and then on the TV & sometimes loses connection ... except that it's good to have.

Reviews.Title: Amazing I would defiantly recommend buying this Apple product.
Reviews.Author: Jarrad Linden
Reviews.Content: Using this device with an iPod/iPhone/iPad makes it better. I love Apple products in general it's good if you have a net flicks account or Hulu plus.  Mirroring is another feature that I use very often.

Reviews.Title: Thrilled
Reviews.Author: Sybil Hussmann
Reviews.Content: My husband just loves his Apple TV, however that means that I won't be able to watch TV anymore.  But I knew that would happen when i got it for him.  LOL

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Matthew J. Hodgkins
Reviews.Content: Is it overpriced? Yes, probably. But it's still inexpensive, and works great. Netflix works great on it and is my primary use of it. If you have apple products, they wirelessly connect and play music/video. I love it and highly recommend it

Reviews.Title: Worth the investment
Reviews.Author: Ashish Gupta
Reviews.Content: Everything works as I was expecting, and is smooth.Tons of free radio stations with all kinds of music.Good quality choices.

Reviews.Title: Perfect gift
Reviews.Author: Mariela Trujillo
Reviews.Content: This is a great product, I really recommend it to all mu family and friends.Apple is always the best.

Reviews.Title: Great product, love it
Reviews.Author: Willyman0282
Reviews.Content: My wife loves this product, makes the connection between ipad and TV simple. It seems if Apple TV is too far from the ipad, then the connection isn't as good.

Reviews.Title: We've got 3 of these!!
Reviews.Author: Courtney M
Reviews.Content: We love our Apple TV and now have one for each tv in house. No more $100+ satellite bills every month. Woo hoo!!

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Sharon Rossino
Reviews.Content: I can't believe that I'm actually living in the future! AppleTV is a cinch to set up (Siri helps)- we were up and running with all of our music, videos, etc. from iTunes in a matter of minutes. Love that I can choose from Netflix or HuluPlus for streaming movies. Plus my photo stream scrolls through during downtown. I would highly recommend this if you are already loyal to Apple and iTunes.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Budrico
Reviews.Content: I love bing able to stream anything from my iPad, iPhone, and MacBook. Easy setup and great image and sound quality.

Reviews.Title: It's a great Apple product.
Reviews.Author: Evan Yang "Evan Yang"
Reviews.Content: Even though it's under $100, it's still has the great Apple quality.It's very easy to use. It looks cool no matter where you put it.The picture quality is great as well.

Reviews.Title: I love it but...
Reviews.Author: Scott Donato
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is awesome for HD tvs, but if you own an ipad like I do, I personally don't see a good enough reason to pay $100 plus another $25 for iTunes Match, just to use your iOS device on your TV. There's other, easier and cheaper methods which I cannot say ;) but its a cool apple item

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: 1txgal
Reviews.Content: The Fact that you can download the remote app on your iPhone and use it on the Apple TV is awesome! You can also view your iPhone on the TV. How cool is that ! Too many features ;)

Reviews.Title: AppleTV
Reviews.Author: Gina
Reviews.Content: Easy hook up! Like the instant look back at video just recorded on IPhone.  Great integration w/ my home set up.

Reviews.Title: Great way to watch TV
Reviews.Author: Sanjay Mandloi "Mandloi"
Reviews.Content: Great product. Works well, both Wired & Wireless. I have been looking for an alternative way to stream content and this makes it very easy to do that with the apple products i have at home.

Reviews.Title: Love this thing!
Reviews.Author: ERIC WATTERS
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly and is even smaller than I expected.  It uses a single HDMI connection for both audio and video.  The WIFI transmission is very fast, I have a 30+ mbps hardwire internet service to my router.  Netflix use is smooth with no pauses in streaming.  Playing a movie wirelessly from m iPad or Macbook is seamless and the audio and video match up perfectly with no synchronization issues.  If you own Mac devices and especially movies purchased through iTunes you should have an Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Simplest media player out there
Reviews.Author: Alex K.
Reviews.Content: A lot of people see my AppleTV and still aren't sure what it does. Simply put, it can rent or buy on-demand movies and TV shows, buy music form the iTunes store, stream videos from Vimeo, YouTube or Netflix, plus Hockey, baseball and basketball (with a subscription).The feature I use most, however, is to stream the music and movies I already have on my computers to the TV in my living room. It's so easy to set up; just join your home wifi network, enter a name and password and you're all set. Any Mac or PC in the house, running iTunes, will automatically show up and stream to your TV.Yes, Roku, Xbox, PlayStation and other devices can do some or all of the above features, and if you have one of those, you probably don't need this. But the AppleTV is the simplest solution of them all. If you want something that a babysitter can figure out immediately without a lengthy training session, or something you can put in a guest room for company, or a way for your small children to watch their favorite cartoons over and over again, this is the way to go.

Reviews.Title: Must have!
Reviews.Author: KDW
Reviews.Content: Easy set up. Works great with our home theater and tv. Another product from Apple that just works. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: PATRICK SERRATO
Reviews.Content: + Very easy to setup+ AirPlay feature is super easy to figure out.  As long as your iOS device is on the same network as your AppleTV, it automatically appears as an option when playing videos, pictures or audio from your iOS device.+ Beautiful interface- I wish there were more "apps" available for this device because there aren't anywhere near as many apps here than for iOS devices.  I wish they had Amazon Prime video app.

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Tyler Moore
Reviews.Content: What an upgrade from version 1!!! Way faster and great picture. So easy to use with Remote App on iPad or iPhone.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: BobR
Reviews.Content: Great product and works well. Put it in front of my Samsung 7500 not so Smart TV, which is actually a frustrating, dumb and slow implementation of a web interfacing TV. The problem is solved by just adding an Applle TV and turning the Samsung 7500 into an attractive monitor. Really why didn't Applle and Samsung just build a smart TV together and both sale a lot of product!Great product that installs easily and works well, recommend without reservation.Wish Amazon and/or Apple would let "Prime Video" through, and if they did I would give it 5 stars. Will avoid using the iTunes store for video until it happens.

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: Omar Ramirez
Reviews.Content: very good, it is one product excellent...wonderful tecnology, diseñ i like, this adadtabily at use of the news TIC...thanks!! excellent..

Reviews.Title: Outstanding product
Reviews.Author: CinciJ&J
Reviews.Content: This was a great addition to expand the use of other Apple devices such as an Apple laptop, iPad or iPhone. All these devices can be connected to your TV through this box. Set-up is simple and immediate. Hint: make sure that the operating software on ALL your items is up to date or you will have problems connecting.

Reviews.Title: Apple rules all
Reviews.Author: Washingtonian
Reviews.Content: This product is what Apple is about. Easy to use, convenient, and some provides great entertainment (hours of youtube videos). Extremly nice to rent new movies, eliminate the use of DVDs and so on. It's not a necessity, but a handy product.

Reviews.Title: Love my Apple TV!
Reviews.Author: Nathaniel
Reviews.Content: For $99 you can't beat this purchase, especially if you have other Apple products to take advantage of Airplay.  One of the most unexpected side affects of owning hit is my increased usage of Youtube.  I really didn't watch Youtube much because of the small size on my MacBook Air. With the Apple TV the full screen Youtube app is excellent. There are so many episodes of older TV shows, movies etc that I can now watch!

Reviews.Title: What's not to Love
Reviews.Author: D. Yost
Reviews.Content: Finally, I'm able to take advantage of my iTunes library without having to plug in my iPod, iPhone or iPad. Streaming, AirPlay, etc., etc., I'm just happy.

Reviews.Title: Must buy for Mac(Mountain Lion)/iPhone(iOS6)
Reviews.Author: YKJ
Reviews.Content: I AirPlay my videos and photos from my Mac and iPhone without having to connect them to the TV. Expecting more content on the Apple TV soon :). I use it to also play Netflix and youtube videos.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Daniel Ramirez "danramirez"
Reviews.Content: En cuanto vi el producto en casa de un amigo me quedé impresionado e inmediatamente lo compré.Excelente equipo para transmitir desde el iphone, ipad y macbook hacia el TV

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised.  This beats Roku because it has a shutdown feature.
Reviews.Author: Scott Cho "SwooP"
Reviews.Content: My Roku stays hot even when not in use.  Apple just makes a better polished product.  They may limit your use but nothing beats it.  I would go with this definitely if you have an iphone/ipad/itouch but also would recommend this over Roku unless you like 5000 channels of stuff you may not use.

Reviews.Title: AirPlay Works better than Expected... Netflix UI = So-So
Reviews.Author: B.H.
Reviews.Content: This item works very well with AirPlay... I did end up purchasing an inexpensive third party app in order to display my mid 2010 MacBook Pro via AirPlay, so all is well. It does have one Con: The Netflix user interface is not all that great on this AppleTV, compared to PS3's Netflix user interface.

Reviews.Title: Wish it had more apps
Reviews.Author: Amznmom
Reviews.Content: While this thing is pretty awesome I wish it had a few more apps on it. I also wish the mirroring feature, that I use to stream videos and music from my IPad straight to my tv, worked with everything I did on the IPad. For instance- I tried to pull up a map on the internet and wanted my parents- who needed a larger image- to be able to see it on the TV but it doesn't let you do that!

Reviews.Title: Great but dont lose the remote
Reviews.Author: Di.Li.
Reviews.Content: I am the biggest fan of Apple TV and use it for listening music on TV, watching movies, streaming Netflix etc.One hint: If you lose the remote you CANNOT set up the Apple TV in a new wifi. The remote application on smartphones works only AFTER you have set up your apple TV with the original remote.I tried to set it up with a friend's remote and didnt work, but you have to buy a new one (at a steep Apple price) to set it up.Apart from that, it's a great product and if you have a fast wifi connection it's really fast/no lag between your laptop/phone and the TV.

Reviews.Title: The Apple TV is best for watching movies. Easy installation Easy easy handling all
Reviews.Author: Rodolfo Araya Villalobos
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV is best for watching movies. Easy installation Easy easy handling allrecommend is high quality and is designed so that you can use even a child

Reviews.Title: Good produc
Reviews.Author: Hhall
Reviews.Content: I used to get on Netflix and Hulu etc. through my blu-ray or Wii and this is much easier. A great buy for the low price. It is sleek, works great, great picture and I love AirPlay.

Reviews.Title: Just great.
Reviews.Author: JKnapper
Reviews.Content: So I've had the original Apple TV with the 150gb hard drive since it came out.  Great device, only most recently I was getting more and more irritated by the effort necessary to sync the device with my library.  The latest TV model is awesome with the streaming ability.  That aspect along makes it worth the price.  Couple it with the Airplay functionality and its an amazing deal.

Reviews.Title: I wish I would have bought this sooner
Reviews.Author: R. Mayer
Reviews.Content: I've used in the past a Samsung DVD player that streamed Netflix and though it worked ok it required that you to use the computer to set up your queue. This is soooo much easier and the layout is all simple icon driven. You will say the same thing why did I not get this sooner. If you have an iPhone, ipad, itouch or Netflix you need this!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: F. A. Anikwe "Zubi"
Reviews.Content: This is awesome, good picture quality, easy to navigate. I love it . I will recommend this product. no freezing of picture over my WiFi.

Reviews.Title: The best streaming device ever
Reviews.Author: Steven M. Mcmahon "deal hunter"
Reviews.Content: This is probably the best ever streaming device. In y opinion it is better than roku or any of e other streaming boxes. At under a hundred bucks its a steal. The tech is proven and intuitive. If you've used an iPhone iPad or iPod touch you will figure this out in seconds. Those are some of the reasons I've given it 5 stars.You can get sports subscription streams, Netflix and Hulu plus, all require subscriptions. I'm unsure of amazon prime. I've read that there isn't an app but there is a workaround using amigos device and airplay.I use streaming apps quite a bit and even though I have cable uverse with all the pay channels I still find myself watching streaming media at home. I like being able to quickly find and watch a movie I want without any additional hook ups or hardware.When family or friends visit I like to stream a folder of pictures, maybe from the last holiday we spent together, maybe from an adventure, he'll maybe you enjoy the kinds of pictures that aren't appropriate for everyone. You can quickly separate your shots into folders or albums and share just the album you want with your guests on a nice tv screen. Beats passing your iphone around to everyone.Based on apple being the dominant force in streaming, media, streaming media and media streams I would recommend this over similar boxes. None at this point will fully replace the cable experience but if you subscribe to Hulu plus and Netflix you can watch most or all of your shows within a day or two of airing for under $20/month.

Reviews.Title: Good bye, Dish Network.
Reviews.Author: JDKMEDIA
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV is an excellent value.  Even if your Wii, Xbox, or TV with apps can access Netflix and Hulu this makes everything easier.  My only gripe is after updates you sometimes have to restart your router.  On one occasion I had to restore the settings to factory within iTunes.  I own two of them, and I'm thinking of purchasing another.It's an excellent complement to a Apple device house OR as a media hub for the Cable/Satellite free house.

Reviews.Title: Just another apple tv
Reviews.Author: Kory Davis
Reviews.Content: Nothing has really changed since the old apple tv. The box is smaller yes, and stilll does what it used to. The issue I had was airplay mirroring. Its laggy, so in order to stream from your ipad and so forth it wasnt the greatest solution. I am sure apple will perfect as they always do, but in my opinion this is just not quite ready.

Reviews.Title: I love Apple TV MD199LL/A
Reviews.Author: Li Yin
Reviews.Content: The price is good. It enables me to watch whatever I like from online, and provides high resolution. I love it.

Reviews.Title: As a Mac user this fits perfectly into my ecosystem
Reviews.Author: A. Storey
Reviews.Content: I have been a long time Mac user so all of my digital content is in iTunes, and iPhoto the AppleTV fits perfectly into my environment and allows me to access all of that digital content on my TV or through my stereo.
