I am also a Netflix user and I love the interface Apple created for browsing Netflix. I have even started renting movies from Apple and the quality is awesome. No problems with connection speed over my 15MB Cable broadband connection. Great device for anyone but really great if you are all ready a Mac user.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS!
Reviews.Author: AveryS2000
Reviews.Content: We purchased our Apple Tv about a year ago. My family are huge Apple Product users. So this met our Media needs perfectly!! Like Most people we can NEVER find The Remote...However with Apple Tv your iPod Touch,iPhone,iPad also work as a Remote Control!! Perfect!! I am buying this for several people in our Family for Christmas!

Reviews.Title: WHAT A GREAT TOY FOR DAD
Reviews.Author: Gerald L. Hill "JERRY2KONE"
Reviews.Content: We saw this in one of our friends homes and loved the setup.  We live in Eruope, and once you overcome certain IP address issues this thing is wonderful.  Its great to be able to watch some updated American TV shows and not have to fork out a ton of money for satelite fees.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV rocks
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I loved the ease of use of this product. It combined all of my streaming services into one easy location this product I recommend to all movie buffs. My only call out would be the fact that you can't stream vudu movies

Reviews.Title: Favorite Apple product
Reviews.Author: Mike1ch
Reviews.Content: Makes all my apple products sync up to my tv flawlessly. No more running vga cables from your laptop to share your screen

Reviews.Title: Great product to possess along with an Apple product
Reviews.Author: Self Review
Reviews.Content: If you own an apple product, this is really a great product to have and pair with.  This really become handy to share music, videos, streaming anything, photos, etc.  Must recommend to others

Reviews.Title: Enjoyed for over a year, cancel the cable!
Reviews.Author: Kellista "book lover and teacher"
Reviews.Content: If you buy into apple products then you MUST have apple TV. We bought this last Christmas not knowing much about it but knowing we loved apple and thought it would be cool to have. We had no idea what we stumbled upon. We canceled our cable and get all our shows on huluplus or netflix and anything we download on itunes plays beautifully on apple tv or we can take it to go on the iphone or ipad. If you're an apple nerd like me then you'll love apple TV. All your itunes playlists, movies, tv shows, etc play on here!You can also access youtube videos among other stuff like the Wall Street Journal channel and sports junk (that I obviously don't care about).Pros:Works right out of the box.Constant updates making it better and better!Can play anything you've purchased on itunes and can buy new movies, music, tv shows instantly.Beautiful picture on our large HDTV.Netflix! Need I say more?Huluplus! Again, need I say more?You can download the "remote" app on your iphone or ipad and use it instead of the apple TV remote from another room or even another location (at work).Cons:The remote is lovely and super thin which equals to it being lost 75% of the time in our house. This isn't really an issue with the remote app on all our other devices, mostly just annoying b/c I'm sure I wouldn't like the remote if it were larger. So not a true con.Wish there was pandora but I'm sure apple will never go for that.Would love more "apps" and offerings but I'm sure they're coming!

Reviews.Title: A must for iTunes users
Reviews.Author: James H
Reviews.Content: Love it for watching Netflix and for movies and music from my iMac or iPad. AirPlay is its best feature. Wish it supported Amazon Instant Video and MLS Live.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Indie Film Lover
Reviews.Content: I love my Apple TV. I love my Apple TV. I love my Apple TV.I love my Apple TV. No complaints.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Dont care
Reviews.Content: This product is amazing! Wish it would would wireless, So far working fast and great photo quality!! 5 star rating!

Reviews.Title: A good product
Reviews.Author: MICHAEL B YATES
Reviews.Content: As with all Apple products, it is a quality item. It is a must have for iPad owners. It has Netflix, Hulu plus, YouTube, and many other programs. It has Internet radio, with your choice of hundreds of stations. And for iPad owners, for the screensaver it uses your photo stream photos. It also mirrors your iPad on your TV set. I would however, like to see more features in the future.

Reviews.Title: neat product
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: I bought the apple tv for my son for his birthday! I am not sure how this works but I believe you can view your computer on tv? and also watch shows on tv from the internet.

Reviews.Title: The unit works very well with iPhone5, Ipad Mini, iPad, but a bit sluggish
Reviews.Author: Zeus
Reviews.Content: Recently I purchased this unit to be able to use the share function between the new devices.  I currently have the older 160GB Apple TV with the hard drive.  This one is small and sleek and doesn't seem to use as much energy as the prior one.  I did notice when using uTube and watching trailers that it was a bit sluggish compared to the older one I have.  I'm going to give it a few more try's and update.  I only took away one star due to the sluggishness and having to sometime wait for a Trailer to download.  in the past, I didn't have to wait as long.

Reviews.Title: Perfect I love it
Reviews.Author: JOSE TRINIDAD
Reviews.Content: It is perfect that I want and for that price much better. The delivere was faster and espected. It recommended for people that have apple article.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Stephen Sudholt
Reviews.Content: super nice. bought it so i wouldn't need to sit at my computer all the time to watch a movie, and hate cable b/c I can never find a show to watch.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Liz
Reviews.Content: Perfect gift to a lover of technology, easy to use for a non-techy too! :) Would definitely recommend to a friend!

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Carol Robinson
Reviews.Content: We already own one of these and are purchasing one for our son, it's so nice not dealing with cords when watching movies, or since we have a sound bar we even listen to music simply and easy to do.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Love this; use it more and more
Reviews.Author: R. Madden "Russ"
Reviews.Content: I had the last version of this, the 720P version. This new version has a faster processor, and I could tell with streaming from my computer or my iPad. Works much better. Also a great plus having access to all my 1080P videos and TV subscriptions. Well worth the upgrade.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: niu xiaoxu
Reviews.Content: perfect for apple fans who have everything apple.The air play is awesome to use, either from a mac, a iphone or a ipad.

Reviews.Title: Great gift idea.
Reviews.Author: sexy739
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift. They love it so i gave it 5 stars. It was easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Mountain Refuge
Reviews.Content: Works great.  Easy connection.  Walks you thru set up quite nicely.  Many options available once you set up so take the time to check it all out.

Reviews.Title: Great if you like watching Hulu and Netflix on your TV
Reviews.Author: don
Reviews.Content: I love the AppleTV I love using it for watching Netflix and Hulu on my big screen TV Also mirroring my  iPad and iPhone Display With airplay

Reviews.Title: Apple TV IRL
Reviews.Author: M. Xu
Reviews.Content: Very solid construction, its nice that apple puts thought into making a well built product even if it isn't meant to be moved around much. This has actually been really useful as someone who's on the move a lot, its my go to carry around netflix box. Airplay works well, but be aware that even on a good router system the streaming can stutter or require more than the initial buffering. These things being said, my initial concern with the apple tv was that it didn't do a lot on its own. However, the box is mostly designed to be an accessory to the apple ecosystem, so with the introduction of itunes match, screen mirroring etc. the utility of the device has improved. This of course means that if you're looking for a standalone box that does the streaming stuff on the big screen, its probably more worth your money to get a roku box, or an xbox both of which do the same things as the apple tv and more. If you're pretty invested in the apple ecosystem however, this box is extremely worth it because it's a quick and effortless way to get all your content onto the big screen.Weird things to note:Optical audio out doesn't work with netflix for some reason.Remote is small and easy to lose.Recommended that you get a sound system for your tv... the speakers on most tvs aren't great and with such an audio/video centered device, this is a big letdown. So not the fault of the box, but definitely something to watch out for.

Reviews.Title: Good if you have a lot of Mac Products!!!
Reviews.Author: Manuel Compres
Reviews.Content: is very nice out of the box, is very easy to setup but ones you are using it you will like to have more options like amazon instand video, Hulu.......

Reviews.Title: Apple TV

Reviews.Content: Wonderful product that my son wanted for the holidays. This will be a gift that should surprise him and I know he will enjoy.

Reviews.Title: An excellent product
Reviews.Author: Chow Lam
Reviews.Content: Love it. Works perfectly in my bed room sitting area. Easy to install and operate. AirPlay with my air book, iPad, and iPhone.

Reviews.Title: This is great if you are an Apple user with an itunes library...
Reviews.Author: leanbeanjean
Reviews.Content: With all of my music, movies, tv shows, pictures, and videos that I have on my Mac based library, the Apple TV is a great addition to the entertainment system that only makes sense. Its also impressively small, which is nice when adding to your entertainment center.

Reviews.Title: Great

Reviews.Content: Great item, rental of movies and tv shows is expensive but works perfect if you have Netflix which is a great option as well, I have an IPhone and a IPad Mini and has Been a great experience at least for me.I'm an Apple lover and this item works perfect if you have really good games on your IPad or IPhone, you can use them as controlls and probably with the great resolution that it has (1080P) I won't need any more my PS3 to play FIFA 2013.

Reviews.Title: Typical Apple product !
Reviews.Author: SK
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is a very typical product from the tech giant.Takes less than 5 minutes to setup once outside the box. The Apple TV integrates seamlessly with iTunes, Netflix, Huluplus, Youtube, and few other channels. It has VIMEO which has loads of videos.Compared to Roku or other boxes, Apple TV capability is limited as to the # of channels. Price is not cheap either. BUT remember, it is Apple, reliable, cool and classy and you'll love using it.

Reviews.Content: The quality if this ATV3 is as great as my ATV2, and the higher resolution is amazing, but if you are someone who wants to be able to jailbreak it, it's not there yet.

Reviews.Title: As described
Reviews.Author: Kev
Reviews.Content: It is an apple TV, was indeed the Model Number listed. Works well, I have absolutely no complaints at all.

Reviews.Title: eh, it's an apple product
Reviews.Author: R. Brown "R. Brown"
Reviews.Content: If your an Apple fanboy, go ahead and buy it. Decent interface and speed. However I'm not as impressed as I am with the Android TVs out there...It's still nice to have and for the price is a great addition.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: ed231
Reviews.Content: Ever since the upgrade that added Hulu, this is all that I need for TV.  It would be amazing if Apple or someone else could figure out how to get live sports added to the features but until then this does 90% of what you need to get rid of cable.The interface is very intuitive and quick to get around.  Setup was very easy and adding photos through iPhoto worked great.  I would have liked for the AppleTV to keep the component outputs or RCA audio outputs for those TVs that haven't been upgraded yet to HD.  But I understand the size and overall technology is moving towards HDMI for everything so eventually I would have this problem with any new device.

Reviews.Title: Worth it

Reviews.Content: If you have one or more of the following:1. Hulu2. Netflix3. iTunes contentThen you should pick one of these up.Plug and play it just works, and works fast.The interface is far better than my crappy Visio TV which takes an eternity to scroll through each page in Hulu/ Netflix.And far better than the PS3, which makes me install a new version of netflix monthly (and re-enter my user/ pwd everytime!!!!)At $97 doesn't seem like any reason why you wouldn't want to pick one up.

Reviews.Title: Review Two
Reviews.Author: aloispd "bubba"
Reviews.Content: I gave Apple TV a bad review when I first got it then pulled the review after I got it working as it should. I haven't watched cable TV for the past three months. I use it to watch You Tube and all the old movies and TV shows for free. The Untouchables, Amos N Andy, Bonanza, Jazz Videos, Old Boxing matches it's great. Reviews.Title: Easy to set up and learn

Streams H.D. video with very little buffering at the beginning.  I also ordered a new N network router to make sure the wireless speed in the house would support the box. Reviews.Title: Great little box!

Reviews.Content: Plug and play for Netflix, I tunes, home sharing ect. Love the ease of use and great set up. Highly recommend.

We love to use it for family gatherings and holidays to enable everyone to see pictures - new and old! Reviews.Title: I love them that is why I own 4 of them now

Reviews.Title: Apple TV

Reviews.Title: Bought it at a discount!

Reviews.Title: Solid Product

Reviews.Title: Lovely

This works flawlessly. In fact, it worked so well that we bough a second one for the chuch and plugged it to the overhead projector. I also connected it with an iPad 2 the results were the same, I streamed a youtube video, image quality was also very nice. 5/5

Reviews.Title: Best option for ditching cable
Reviews.Author: James Edwards
Reviews.Content: I've owned a roku since they came out several years ago.  I love my roku, that now lives in our bedroom.  We moved to the AppleTV mainly because I wanted to ditch cable and save some money.  Being in an Apple household (2 macs, 2 ipads) it just made sense for us to move to the Apple TV, but the main reason for us was the iTunes integration.  iTunes had everything we wanted to watch, so we knew moving to the AppleTV was going to give us the widest range of options for watching what we wanted.In addition to Netflix, Hulu & iTunes rentals and purchases, you can access anything that's in an iTunes library on your network.  So we've converted all of our DVD's to .mp4's and stored them in iTunes so we can quickly get to the videos we or the kids want to watch.  It's easy enough to operate that my 3 year old can use it, and has parental controls to block access to specific channels that I don't want my daughter getting to (like You tube). I do wish it would allow you to block content by rating, however I've yet to see that on any set top box to date.The one thing that really bothers me on this unit is that backing out of an app is a bit of a pain.... It's essentially hitting the back arrow on your browswer... back for every movie you've viewed till you get back to the home screen.  Not sure how Apple missed the boat on that, but overall I can live with that.

Reviews.Title: Not bad but flawed
Reviews.Author: Terry Golesworthy
Reviews.Content: First issue was that Apple TV seems to have quite a few compatibility issues with routers and this certainly was the case for me on my actiontec fios router. Tool ages to find workaround in some obscure forum which I am not convinced will hold long term.Second was that I purchased this to watch amazon instant video from my iPad. Seems logical route, buy an apple product from amazon to watch amazon on an apple. But due to licensing issues, it seems from forums again, amazon instant video does not work with Apple TV. ll you get is the audio which somewhat limits the entertainment value. Nothing in the information leads you to suspect this limitation which I think is a major oversight on amazons part.

Reviews.Title: The only device we need in the living room
Reviews.Author: Stefan Brundige
Reviews.Content: For those of us that like to keep it simple, this is the streaming device to own.Since we got the Apple TV, we haven't looked back. Its tiny size means no hard drive. This turns out to be a good thing, as it means one less hard drive to manage. The Apple TV can stream from any Mac's publicly shared files or iTunes library, or you can access Netflix, Hulu, Youtube, Vimeo, and more from the built-in apps on the main screen.We love the remote: it's small and to-the-point. There are two buttons and a navigation circle with four buttons. It may sound too simple to function well, but that's not the case at all. We've found that when we have guests over, they instinctively know how to use it when they first pick it up.There is a downside: You can't stream every format, so Apple TV may not be a good fit for some people with large movie libraries on their computers. This is minor, though, since the average user will just want to watch movies without hassle, which the Apple TV does perfectly. And simply.

Reviews.Title: So close to awesome
Reviews.Author: A. ROBERTS
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is great, but the price for episodes of most shows is still a little high. Cable is still a better deal, but not for long, I imagine.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Stanley D. Porter "stan porter"
Reviews.Content: I love this little box, I have almost replaced my cable with it.  My entertainment budget has gone down, and that includes the cost of this unit.

Reviews.Title: 2nd Apple TV
Reviews.Author: mario west
Reviews.Content: in my "MAN CAVE," I have a Apple TV that I store all my movies in the ICloud.  After converting all my VHS tapes and DVD disc, i bought my first Apple TV and stored everything on the ICloud.  This was the best plan ever done.There is no more bulky tapes and DVD.  Please this plays clearer than most DVD/VHS players.

Reviews.Title: Considering Purchasing a Second One
Reviews.Author: BrianD
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Apple TV (3rd Gen) directly from the Apple store about a week ago.  So far,I have been so impressed with it that I am considering purchasing a second one for the master bedroom.  Setup was quite easy.  Out of the box, you just plug it in, connect the HDMI cable (sold separately), then turn on the TV and select the appropriate input on your HDTV.  It then begins to search for WiFi, select your WIFI, enter the password, then your in.  After that it asked for an Apple ID and password that can be used to purchase movies and video.  The primary reason I purchased the Apple TV was to have access to Russian TV channels over the internet.  The provider had an App in the App store in which I downloaded to my IPad 2.  It took me quite some time to figure out how to stream the video and sound from the IPad to the HDTV.  When I selected "Apple TV" as the source from the IPad, it only projected the sound.  Finally, through some diligent Google searching, I finally figured out how to stream both video and sound.  If you quickly double click the main button on the IPAD it shows a list of your most recently used Apps.  If you then swipe your finger to the right you'll see a circle with an arrow on it.  Click on that and it allows you to choose between "IPad" and "Apple TV".  If you choose "Apple TV" you then choose to turn mirroring "On" or "Off."  If you choose "On" then you mirror your IPAD on the HDTV.  This is how I was able to stream video and sound from the App.  Airplay and Airplay mirroring are two features that make this product well worth it.I have also tried streaming music from Pandora to the TV from my IPhone 4 and it worked quite well with good sound.  However, I did learn that when Pandora shows a commercial, it shows the actual video on the TV which disrupted my photo slide show at the time.  I thought this was quite annoying because I had to go back in and reset the slide show.  I have rented a movie and previewed several movies.  For the previewed movies, the time for the Apple TV to start the preview was quite long because it had to download enough of the preview.  Therefore, I had to upgrade the speed of my DSL, which has helped quite a bit. We rented the new Avengers movies and the quality of the picture was top notch.  I have also tried NetFlix (free one month trial) and Hulu Plus (free 7 day trial).  However, I haven't been entirely impressed with the selection of videos.  However, I thought NetFlix was slightly better than Hulu.Overall, I give the Apple TV 4 stars instead of 5 because I think it is too limited in the programs available.  Plus Amazon instant video doesn't support Airplay mirroring which is a huge bummer because that would open it up to much more options for everyone.  Only the sound is projected from IPad without any video.  In the end, I would still highly recommend the Apple TV.  I am seriously considering purchasing a second one even after having it for only a week.

Reviews.Title: works sometimes
Reviews.Author: Matt Mccann
Reviews.Content: This product worked great when I first got it but after I installed the first updatemy iphone 4, iphone 5, and ipad 2 will not connect using the airplay anymore which is the main reason I bought this thing. Very dissapointing.

Reviews.Title: Does what it says.
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: Got it to AirPlay my Mac's screen so I wouldn't have to run wires everywhere. Says right on the box it can do it for newer macs. Now all I have to do is get that newer Mac. Good product, but I should have read up a bit more first.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV & Roku 2XD
Reviews.Author: JoMa
Reviews.Content: Did a bunch of comparisons on media receivers...Purchased both a Roku and this Apple TV.  Both work as expected and meet or exceed my expectations.  The bottom line:Apple TV - Of course it is intuitive and easy to set up.  Works like a charm --- and oh my, what stellar build quality compared to the competition.  Pros: Netflix works great, Airplay is awesome, Ethernet port is HUGE, and the digital audio output is so important depending on your setup.  Cons: No Amazon (no sh#t I understand why...but still a big issue given I'm an Amazon Prime member), who cares about NBA and MLB??  However, the lack of Amazon (for my dollar) makes the difference between buying 3 Apple TVs or 1 Apple TV & 2 Rokus.Roku 2 XD - Very nice interface and easy to set up.  Works like a charm -- but don't drop it or hit it against anything as it is likely to break easily (very, very flimsy build).  Pros - Amazon and other content.  Cons - No Airplay, no Ethernet, and no digital audio output.

Reviews.Title: Love it !
Reviews.Author: S. Pradhan "SP"
Reviews.Content: Excellent product - another great one from Apple.Excellent streaming from Netflix etc.Airplay works seamlessly - so you can stream stuff from your other Apple devices.Remote has a great modern design.

Reviews.Title: Just like I expected
Reviews.Author: Carlos Pina
Reviews.Content: Apple is Apple... so good. Since the packaging to the funtion is ok.........is what you expected about a tv box...

Reviews.Title: Great "Cut The Cord" Tool
Reviews.Author: GaryB
Reviews.Content: Being an devout Apple product purchaser and user, I never really had the desire to use or purchase an Apple TV (aTV). But just last week, my family "Cut The Cord" from our Dish Network, picked up Hulu and Netflix and have enjoyed the results. Partly because the aTV offers us the freedom of having all the services we have come to enjoy in such an easy device, but also this device isn't static. Clean interface and extremely easy setup, the aTV offers the ability for my family to use it anywhere (given there is an internet connection).Pros:-The Apple Tv is clean. Being slightly bigger than a hockey puck and almost as thin, this little device can be placed virtually anywhere.-With more than one service (Now) currently available, the device makes it really nice to watch different content without having to pay the large price tag that comes with cable.-With Netflix, Hulu, MLB, NBA, NHL, iTunes, Vimeo and many more available, the hours that have been spent and will be spent are going to be countless.-1080p content on the Apple TV is visually Astounding. Even at 720p, the graphics and display of the aTV making watching TV more enjoyable with crisp, clean graphics.-User interface is extremely simple. With navigation of the device with the Apple Remote (which comes with the device) or the Remote App for iPad, iPhone, iPod Touch, makes traversing the content and options easy and quite simple compared to the Roku  or Netgear Neo.Con: (Yes there are a few)-Unlike many other services (Xbox Live, Playstation Network, Roku, Netgear Neo, Boxee), Apple TV doesn't offer other options such as Crackle, Voodu, Ultraviolet, or other services. If Apple hasn't released it in an update, it's not there.-Although much of the content can be accessed via Netflix and other services, not being able to access downloaded movies from Amazon or even your external HardDrive is a huge Con especially if your not limited to just one service provider for content.-iTunes is great for movies, music and tv shows, but there are many networks that allow these to be streamed for free over the internet. The Apple Tv doesn't allow for any connection to them (Unless your willing to break your warranty by Jailbreaking (unsuggested)).-There is no music services like Pandora, Last.Fm, or Spotify available.-HDMI is the only connection and is not supplied with the device.Overall:If you are looking for a great media streamer, with NetFlix, Hulu, many sports and the ability to watch previous movies/shows that have been purchased or downloaded with iTunes. Then Apple TV is right for you. Unlike many of the other media streamers, the interface and controls are much smoother and the experience is more enjoyable. If you have ever used or owned an Apple Product, the same quality that is used to make those products is used here with the Apple TV.I have tried and used many other of the media players and can say that you get what you pay for. $100 is seems like nothing when you don't pay $100's of dollars a year for cable/Dish services.

Reviews.Title: Great Apple Accessory
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: This is a great add on for anyone with an iOS device and an HDTV.The ability to stream photos, music and video wirelessly from you iOS device is great for entertaining friends and show.You can also sync it with your Apple iCloud Photo Stream and it will display your iPhone or iPad's photos as your HDTV wallpaper...pretty cool!

Reviews.Title: Delivers exactly what it promises
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great Product. Easy set up. Good interface to the computer and to other Apple products. I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Pretty cool device

Reviews.Content: Another must have Apple gadget for any Apple geek, especially with your iPad or iPhone linked to it via the cloud (e.g. Playing your iTunes playlist through your tv via the Apple TV, via the iPhone by way of the cloud...)Throw in a ton of Sat radio stations, Netflix, iTunes and a host of other features and it's an easy buy at $100 or less.

Reviews.Content: I have tried a lot of methods of streaming movies from my computer to my tv, NOTHING works better than this. I just use my iPad, iPhone or macbook and its SO simple.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Neal
Reviews.Content: Great product. Easy setup and integration with my home network and other Apple devices that have iTunes. Definitely recommend for anyone who has a networked home theater system. Could use more Apps, but I use this device mostly for accessing and streaming the music/movies/tv shows/pics from multiple devices (Desktop, laptop, iPod Touch, iPad)

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Gregory J. Orme
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from the 2nd-generation version. That version is still very popular because it can easily be jailbroken, so I was actually able to make money on the deal while getting the latest version. The only issue I had with the device was that initially I was not able to stream audio from iTunes. It would play one song, then quit. As it turned out, the problem was with my Symantec AntiVirus software. I had to tweak the software to allow iTunes to communicate out. I primarily use the Apple TV to stream music and to watch Netflix. The video quality with the Apple TV is superior to the quality of Netflix streamed through the Sony PS3 or a stand-alone Blu-Ray player with Netflix capability.

Reviews.Title: AppleTV Rocks like crazy !!!!!
Reviews.Author: Dale B
Reviews.Content: I purchased AppleTV because I have come to appreciate almost all things apple.We have two iPhone4's and iPads, so it was only logical to cross into AppleTV country.I am totally pleased with my apple world and all my apple products.....BUT right now,I am astounded at the beauty and simplicity AppleTV brings into the house with all my media streaming tommy big flat screen TV, WHEN I want it to do so.Pairing it with an HDMI Projector makes Home Cinema instant fun.

Reviews.Title: Best remote presentation tool
Reviews.Author: Jon B. Olsen "prof berndt"
Reviews.Content: I use this teaching. I load a Keynote document onto my iPad and then display it through the Apple TV. The ability to walk around the room and not only advance slides by touch the iPad to display a "laser pointer" type image that is *much* easier to follow than any real laser pointer.

Reviews.Title: Terrific Product for the purpose!
Reviews.Author: P. L. MURPHY
Reviews.Content: Although we do not use this capability a lot. It works very well through the Apple N Router and a Samsung TV. It offers more options than TIVO for movies, etc. Of course it is not a DVR. If you want access to Netflix, You Tube, etc., this is a good product.

Reviews.Title: Best streaming we ever experienced
Reviews.Author: William Lee Christensen
Reviews.Content: Our ISP is slow and we were unable to use netflix  at all. We got the Apple tv and so far it has never failed to play whatever program we choose.Now we have used the Apple TV for several weeks longer and it has still not failed to load and play without interruption.

Reviews.Title: This is the shiznit.
Reviews.Author: PjcostaBgrt "mrdotcom"
Reviews.Content: I've have a Roku and a WDTV.., but Apple TV is the best by far. Apple mirroring is the ticket that opens up a world of goodies. Stream from your ipad or iphone directly to your TV. How sweet it is.

Reviews.Title: Help!
Reviews.Author: Hertzel Grotch
Reviews.Content: This latest "Black Box" is highly addictive! I'm stuck in a Netflix alternative universe! Seriusly, this will be a gift that keeps on giving.

Reviews.Title: Wires? Where we're going we don't need wires!
Reviews.Author: J.E.Mc
Reviews.Content: Got this as a birthday present for my sister.  She has numerous Apple products and I thought this would be a good way for her to access Netflix.  I heard her mention once about Airplay and how it let you "stream" content (a bit embarrassing that she heard about it before me, seeing as I'm the resident tech in the family), so I thought it would be nice for her...Once she received the gift and started using it, I was VERY impressed at the capabilities! Not only does she finally have Netflix access on the TV, but that Airplay...wow!  Anything from you ipad, ipod, iphone, macbook, imac.... all can stream straight to your tv!  No delay or anything!Wanna hear your playlist while cleaning a room on the opposite side of the house from your computer? No problem, stream it!Tired of playing the Sims on that small macbook screen? No problem, mirror your desktop on the 40" TV!I would've given it 5 stars if.... well you know what, I can't think of anything so it gets the 5!  The only gripe I WOULD have is that the Airplay doesn't work with any OS before Lion, and I haven't upgraded and don't want to.. but hey, it's not for me and all her computers are fully upgraded! She loves it.  This gift was so good, I could probably skip a year or two of presents haha.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: C. Hill "Yup"
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift and now I want one.  The manual is a bit lacking but once you get the hang of it it's great.

Reviews.Title: Netflix device
Reviews.Author: R. Mooney "Rick"
Reviews.Content: This tiny little box replaced an old "internet aware DVD player". The Netflix video resolution is better with the Apple TV and it even seems to sound better. I chose the Apple TV over the cheaper Roku box because we have 3 Apple computers in the house and it is fun to be able to show photos and play music from the computers.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying it
Reviews.Author: cabernet chick
Reviews.Content: Found it easy to use (ex: Netflix app). Like the AirPlay feature. I wish they supported more video streaming services.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Alec
Reviews.Content: I love the Apple TV it works great and is really cool. It's super fast and delivers great hd it's also great for air play. Now that I have the Apple TV I would not be able to live without it!

Reviews.Title: Perfect size, great media options.
Reviews.Author: Suriyun
Reviews.Content: Built-in wifi, and access to all of your itunes media, this is a great media device:  Provides access to hulu, netflix, and other subscription services through a great interface.  Easy access to youtube, and direct access to latest posts from the channels you subscribe to.  Showed the itunes music festival -- easier to navigate than on the computer.Also, a great device for airplay -- letting you see your whole computer, iphone or ipad screen on a large display, or just play a video file at full screen size.By itself, it doesn't do anything (no free TV channels, etc.. - though you do get youtube).  But as a conduit for access to your media library and subscription services or for showing stuff from your other devices on the big screen wirelessly without having to plug anything else in, it excels!Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: jitu pandya
Reviews.Content: this is apple product, what to say, just excellant , just fine, price is higher then other device, but excellant.

Reviews.Title: good for airplay and mac fans
Reviews.Author: thomajc "thomajc"
Reviews.Content: i am using this to pair with my slingplayer and large screen TV.. It works great and would recommend to anyone who has apple branded products

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Product
Reviews.Author: gnow
Reviews.Content: Like all Apple products, the Apple TV is a fantastic product that is easy to use and durable. I just hooked it up to my tv and follow the onscreen instructions. It's that easy!

Reviews.Title: Great Apple Tv
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: I bought this apple TV as my second unit, My first apple tv was the 720 p modeland it was good but this one if a lot better 1080 p,And also has more internal memory,What more can I say Its Apple,,,,,,A+++++

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: nicole handcock
Reviews.Content: We love this!! You can view Netflix through this.  We LOVE playing our music from our phones through out TV surround sound.  Plus all the additional stuff.  Definetly worth the money!

Reviews.Title: As always, the smooth Apple experience!
Reviews.Author: Santosh Iyer
Reviews.Content: High quality packaging, high quality product. Remote is small, feels great in your hand and works well. Was a breeze to set up, the only real question I answered was the language of choice! I did not even have to enter Wireless credentials, since I chose the Ethernet connection option. I have tried AirPlay, Netflix and Youtube so far, and the experience is great. Like the Netflix interface much better than the old clunky one my previous Vizio Blue Ray player had. I wish this supported Amazon Instant Video also.

Reviews.Title: Very good, would be 5-stars if Apple would really embrace it more
Reviews.Author: Audio Nut "Computer and recording nut"
Reviews.Content: This is a great, simple product overall.  Apple just needs to commit further to it.  They did add Hulu Plus recently, and that is a BIG plus indeed.  However, they keep adding new iPads, etc but they refuse to bring the App Store or any real app ecosystem to the Apple TV.While it is a far more polished experience than Roku (which I also have), they need more apps.  Obviously they can handle an app ecosystem based on their success with iOS apps and the Mac App Store on OS X but they choose not to with Apple TV.If you use iTunes a lot (I would say I'm more on the music side, and have iTunes Match) and like to use AirPlay from your devices, this is still a killer product.  But I'd love to see more apps.Also, this is a far better option than using other devices like your gaming system.  I used to use my Xbox all the time for this type of media but Apple TV is far less power hungry and I feel that any long use of Xbox is just that much time spent moving closer to hardware failure so I save that time for gaming on it.

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: Amit Hasky
Reviews.Content: works great, you can see your aperture photos, itunes music and itunes movies and tv series.works with Hebrew  subtitles.i use a third party app to edit my movies metadata to match apple look and feel.a wonderful product,

Reviews.Title: Great, easy to use product.
Reviews.Author: D. Georgi "Davin"
Reviews.Content: I do not regret this purchase at all. First it is easy to set up. You do have to buy the HDMI cable though. Really easy to navigate and use. The only drawback is that Amazon Prime does not work with it yet. I am still hopeful as this would be really great.

Reviews.Title: Almost too elegant.
Reviews.Author: Hank
Reviews.Content: While the Apple TV is a wonderful addition to your media setup if you have other products from the Apple family such as an iPod or an iTunes playlist that will sync up with it.  However, since the default remote that comes with the Apple TV does not have a keypad or many shortcut buttons.  With a better default remote, this would be a 5/5 product.  As such, it's only 4/5.

Reviews.Title: my second apple tv
Reviews.Author: Jean Pierre Boechat
Reviews.Content: i have two in my home. it's a great product of apple.i love it. this new HD version is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great for Apple users
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: First off, if you own multiple Apple products such as iPhone, iPad and etc, this is the perfect compliment to your i products. The airplay works great and you can stream music / photos and video to your TV (even though at a compressed format for high quality videos). It's a great way to share media with friends and family at home.If you are getting a streaming box to watch movies from the internet such as Hulu and Netflix, this is also the device to get. I think it has the most user-friendly interface out there for the most popular apps (but the lack of back button on the remote was confusing initially). Unfortunately, it doesn't have the Amazon Instant Video app, so it might be a deal breaker if you are a Amazon Prime user. Everything you buys from iTunes is also available to stream from Apple TV. And it also streams everything you have on your iTunes library.The only people I would not recommend to get this are the PC users looking to stream stuffs from their PC without going through iTunes. Since iTunes does not play a lot of video format that are popular on PC such as MKV, AVI, WMV, you would need to convert your video library to iTunes compatible format e.g. mp4. It may not be your best use of time. Some people had success jailbreaking an older generation of Apple TV that allows them to stream media without iTunes but as of the date of this review, it does not look like this Apple TV is jailbreakable. I would recommend getting the Roku 2 XD or XS for such users. They are available at Amazon at similar, if not lower, price.So if you are invested in iTunes and Apple hardware, definitely get this. If not, look for alternatives mentioned.

Reviews.Title: Great item for your "I" devices
Reviews.Author: Roland
Reviews.Content: I bought before the hdmi extension in order to project my iphones and ipads on my Tv but they weren't very useful because you always need to be near your TV in order to be able to use it, this one very practical you only need to connect it to your router and it works smoothly  from any place from your house you will be able to stream your videos and play your songs on your TV also you just need a program like Airparrot or others you will be able to mirror your PC also on your TV.This is a very useful item and i recommend it for anyone who has Iphone and Ipad.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Seller...
Reviews.Author: rbolivar720
Reviews.Content: I received the product in perfect condition as it indicated the seller, I recommend it 100%, it has worked very well! owns iOS which allows me to enjoy many applications, including use much to my studies because it is very useful in every way!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Ken Minyon
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and use. Expanded use of You Tube, etc. viewing on the large screen digital, makes all programs enhanced.

Reviews.Title: NICE
Reviews.Author: Gregory Walsh
Reviews.Content: Very neat, can play music, watch movies, sound and picture quality is amazing.  I have seen Roku and playstations interface, and for the price I think Apple TV is the way to go, especially if you have other Apple products.

Reviews.Title: Nice Product
Reviews.Author: V. Cucuzza "vjc"
Reviews.Content: I compared this to the Roku and believe it was worth the money being that I have other apple devices.  It works great, its fun and it makes my 2 year old tv feel like new again.

Reviews.Title: I love it!!
Reviews.Author: Ricky
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is just great and will change the way you listen to music and watch TV at home. Basically, now I arrive home and set the music I want from my iPhone wirelessly and listen it through a LG sound system connected to the Apple TV. All hassle free.The same works for watching videos I have in my iPhone or in my computer at home. Just send it via AirPlay and watch on your TV.Additionally, the home screen from the Apple TV let you stream media from your computer or iCloud or Hulu or Netflix or YouTube which is nice if you pay for any of these services.I'm totally happy with this purchase. The 99 bugs are totally worth it.

Reviews.Title: Very easy to use
Reviews.Author: Maximzodal
Reviews.Content: I use this handy device to stream movies, music and TV programs, podcasts, etc. I got rid of Satellite as was costing me about the cost of this little device a month! I built an antenna from clothes hangers for local channels and installed it in the attic. This gives me two to three channels for each of the big four networks! You can get Hulu and Netflix and more. Programs I can't get from all these sources I can usually buy from the iTunes store. I bought full seasons for three programs cheaper than what one month of satellite was costing me!Setting it up is a bit of a hassle as you have to use the remote to enter IDs and passwords. Its four-way toggle makes it easy to hit the wrong thing.  But, once set up, you're through!  I have no streaming issues.I also have Ruku which offers access to Amazon, Netflix and other channels, plus a hard disk via USB. Between these two I have access to all the media I can stand.Update:  June 15, 2013Still very pleased with this purchase.  The user interface is much easier to use than the Roku.  Between it and Roku, if I could buy only one, the Apple TV would be my choice.  I've dropped satellite and use cable only for internet. Definitely recommended.

Reviews.Title: Addition to my Home theater.
Reviews.Author: alaskajon
Reviews.Content: Works great, it is the second one I have in two different locations and they both are a great help.

Reviews.Title: apple TV is incredible!
Reviews.Author: sha
Reviews.Content: I love it a LOT! It works great with my netflixs & it was so easy to setup.  I also downloaded the apple remote app for my iphone & it too is incredibly simple to use.

Reviews.Title: muito bom.
Reviews.Author: Felipe Santiago
Reviews.Content: poderia ser melhor apenas se pudesse instalar aplicativos da app store.would be better if allowed to install applications app store.

Reviews.Title: Hulu stopped working on Ethernet with Latest Firmware Upgrade
Reviews.Author: WarWagon
Reviews.Content: The latest Firmware upgrade prevents Hulu from working if you are connected via Ethernet.Apple is working on a fix in the next Firmware upgrade.If you can't get Hulu to work, disconnect your Ethernet cable and run it on wifi.

Reviews.Title: doesnt need to say anything
Reviews.Author: Upendar Garg "UG"
Reviews.Content: perfect product, air play an amazing feature. Totally loved it and if you have any other apple product at home (ipad, iphone, mac book) then just buy it. Worth every penny!!

Reviews.Title: AppleTV
Reviews.Author: Theresa C. Campbell "Caper"
Reviews.Content: This is the second Apple TV I've bought.  I wanted my daughter to enjoy it as much as I do.She can log into her Netflix account from it, and also stream movies.  We both enjoy thatwe can view content from our iPhones and iPads on it.  No wires needed!!!

Reviews.Title: Best Player
Reviews.Author: Airbus
Reviews.Content: Best player I ever had, really good picture, Really compact remote control, fast connection, easy to hook up, best than roku and other brands I have

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Edison Viteri // Att: Gustavo Madrigal// Gust...
Reviews.Content: In combination of HD TV and High speed internet Apple TV is excellent stuff for entertainment, I will get another one  for other TV

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Review
Reviews.Content: I was a little unsure at first. It was highly recommended to me to buy it. I love the thing. I like having the ability to play my music directly from my computer, use netflix, hulu plus, YouTube, etc. Awesome buy.

Reviews.Title: Nice Little Device
Reviews.Author: Evaku
Reviews.Content: I use this device to stream movies and shows on the web to my HDTV with great results. Picture quality on HD content may not be as good as that from my Oppo bluray player but it is good enough for me. Will recommended.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV is as good as promised!
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV is easy to set up like most Apple products. Streaming Netflix is great, but the big plus is that this syncs up with my iTunes account so I can play any of my purchased Movies, TV shows, plus all of my music library from the cloud. Watching my photo stream is also a cool feature. I haven't tried using it as a big screen for games from my iPhone or iPad, but I'm looking forward to that. For under $100, its a great product!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: louannalorette
Reviews.Content: This product is wonderful, especially with the addition of the HULU Plus option. I barely even watch cable anymore! Make sure you purchase the HD chord along with the Apple TV. I also love that I can listen to my iTunes library from my television.

Reviews.Title: MOVIES IN BED
Reviews.Author: Sharpster
Reviews.Content: Easy to set-up and easy to use, I like my Apple TV. Best of all, I can now watch Netflix Streaming movies from my bed.

Reviews.Title: Awesome, easy, and nice
Reviews.Author: Larns
Reviews.Content: I own this Apple TV v3, and I own a Roku LT.  Both are great devices, with similar function.The Roku works great for Netflix and Pandora.  I love both of those services, and Roku delivers.  Roku is also expandable - there are hundreds of other "channels".  But in general all those other Roku channels stink.  Sorry "other channel" guys (including you, huge online retail store named after a south american river).The Apple TV is a little more closed, but what it provides is excellent.  I can still use Netflix with the Apple TV, and plus I can stream all my music, movies, and  TV shows to the device with nearly zero setup.  "It just works" is very true.  I also love the wireless remote display capability - it is easy to "stream" my Mac's display, or my iPhone display, or my iPad display to my TV.  Again, it just works.  Roku?  I do technical work all day for my job.  I don't also want to do it all night at my house.In all, I love both Apple TV and Roku.  Roku is now on the back burner due to the great features of the Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: It's great!
Reviews.Author: Barinr
Reviews.Content: As always Apple does it right.  Sleek, good looking, easy to hook up ( if you have a newer TV) and intuitive if you have used Apple privets before.

Reviews.Title: Another Apple winner
Reviews.Author: srrogers50
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with our new Apple TV and all of the alternatives it gives us. Can't  recommend it enough.

Reviews.Title: easy to hook up!
Reviews.Author: djspookay
Reviews.Content: I really didnt need this product, but i love all "apple" product XD $100 is not bad a all. it has a HDMI hook up and the picture looks great!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Albert
Reviews.Content: It works very fast, amazing compression from iTunes movies, and Netflix works perfect too, YouTube software is a little uncomfortable but works fine.  I'm happy with it :-)

Reviews.Title: So much better than Roku!
Reviews.Author: S. Millspaugh
Reviews.Content: We purchased this to replace our Roku player and it was by far the best decision. It is much more user friendly and it also streams quicker with less lag time and buffering. On the Roku it was constantly stopping during play to buffer or load and we rarely have that issue with the Apple TV.The layout is also extremely user friendly and actually makes logical sense compared to the Roku which had a horrible layout.Also the Roku would always freeze up and become unresponsive if you pressed one too many buttons, and would force you to unplug the entire device in order to reset it. We have never had to do this with the Apple TV.Best streaming device!

Reviews.Title: Wii No More
Reviews.Author: Skip
Reviews.Content: The title "Wii No More" is because no longer do I use the Wii for playing YouTube or Netflix videos through my TV. In fact, since getting the Apple TV I haven't even turned on the Wii. The Apple TV is much faster at downloading content for play and rarely pauses during playback. For that alone, I would have given the Apple TV 3 stars. Because there's so much more to love about the Apple TV, I've given it 5 stars.Things I love:1. Airplay Mirroring - if I want people to see something I'm doing on my MacBook, I turn on Airplay Mirroring and just like that, it's on the TV. No more trying to squeeze in to see the MacBook screen or dragging a cable across the room to connect the MacBook to the TV.2. Playing content from a computer - as long as Home Sharing is setup I can pull music and video directly from a computer and play it on my TV. The perfect exercise music is always easily accessible.3. Customizing the Home Screen - with the latest Apple TV update, I can remove the home screen icons that I don't use. With parental controls I was able to remove some of them before, but now I have complete control, minus a few "required" icons.4. The Remote App - conducting a search on the Apple TV can be somewhat of a hassle if you are using the Apple Remote that it comes with. Once I started using the Remote App on my iPhone, a keyboard pops up on my phone that I can type the search query in. Down, down, right, right arrow pushing is not required to get to the next letter.5. Size matters - the Apple TV is so small, making it easy to place anywhere. I set it on top of my DVR along with a Kinivo 501BN Premium 5 port High speed HDMI switch with IR wireless remote and AC Power adapter - supports 3D, 1080p, which is on a OmniMount Tria 1 B - 1 Shelf Wall Furniture (Black/Dark Glass) mounted behind/above my TV.6. iTunes integration - renting or purchasing new movies/TV shows from iTunes is so fast and easy. If I have subscribed to a TV show, the show automatically downloads to the Apple TV. And I can also choose to download purchases to my MacBook if I want.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV is awesome
Reviews.Author: Gerry
Reviews.Content: This product as usual was awesome. It works so easily with my system and it allows me to access everything I need.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: E Hemingway "tropic_traveler"
Reviews.Content: Everything works as they say it would! Super simple set up. Easy integration to our laptops and iPhones. I would recommend to anyone with kids!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Overall, but Ideal if you have Apple Products
Reviews.Author: David R. "Abide"
Reviews.Content: I love our Apple TV. If you have Apple products (an iMac, but especially an iPhone), you will appreciate the interface and ease in using this over other streaming boxes. I love being able to share photos and videos with company in the comfort of my living room, listening to my entire music collection from another room (my iMac is upstairs), and playing my movies onmy 60" v. my 21" computer screen. And being able to type with the Apple remote is beyond easy and better than any alternatives I've found. For $100, this is a no-brainer for anyone who wants to be able to do what I've described easily.

Reviews.Title: Novice Apple product user
Reviews.Author: Gma
Reviews.Content: I had no problem using the Apple TV to view movies or listen to music.  Just plugged it in and started using itBut, I struggled connecting my iPad and Apple TV.  I had wanted to view pictures taken on my iPad using the Apple TV. Apple support was great!!

Reviews.Title: If you are an apple person - you should own this
Reviews.Author: Tahir Popat
Reviews.Content: With the release of Mountain Lion (OS X 10.8), the Mac has gotten the ability to mirror screen content to the AppleTV. To me, this means the AppleTV has gone from being a useful enough product to one whose flexibility and multitude of uses make it something you should own if you have any toehold into Apple's ecosystem.I will keep it short and simple! Below are some simple pros and cons too:Pros:++ Simple set up++ Very pretty and smooth++ AirPlay (for music and video)Cons:-- Very limited channels/content-- iTunes only for content, even for in network- iTunes match dependent for musicI wouldn't have bought it for myself but my friends got together and got it for me on my birthday on VenTribe.comI like it, and I think you will too!

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: roger
Reviews.Content: I love this product. Very easy to set up and very easy to use. The price was competitive and the delivery was as advertised. I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Juanjo
Reviews.Content: Great ! This Apple TV meets my expectations. Easy to set up and running. Very good image quality. Product arrived to my home in time in accordance with the schedule given by Amazon.com

Reviews.Title: Little monster!
Reviews.Author: B. Thompson
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV device is so much sleeker than I had anticipated, yet it beats out most such devices I have tried in the past. It is unobtrusive kept beside our TV. It took probably 5 minutes or less to set up. Connected wirelessly to my iTunes account, I was vowed by this long. Of course it connects to Netflix , Youtube etc. The thing I would like to see improved is the search feature. I understand the sleek remote and limited buttons on it make it tedious to search for videos, but typing names becomes a little bit of a stretch with it. Hopefully this issue will be resolved some day, which would then make this an even more excellent product!

Reviews.Title: Apple TV is so cool!
Reviews.Author: sn315on
Reviews.Content: I bought this about 6 months ago to put in my jewelry studio so I could watch some great shows while I work. I haven't had any issues with it at all. I bought a HDMI cable and put it directly into the TV so I can switch from Apple TV to a DVD player easily. I like having all the shows I've purchased on my iPad or Mac ready to watch on a TV. I'm seriously considering buying another one for a main room TV as well. I like the remote that came with it, no problems with that either. Everything just works. :)

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!
Reviews.Author: Mickey
Reviews.Content: Apple does it again. After having a Logitech Review with Google TV that gave me nothing but trouble, I upgraded to the Apple TV. Can't say enough about it, it is like all other Apple products, FLAWLESS!! Have only had it a month and not played a lot with it but what I have seen of it makes the Google TV look sad in comparrison. Highly recommend this one!

Reviews.Title: The best set top box
Reviews.Author: Mr. J. R. T. Lloyd "JRTL"
Reviews.Content: I love my Apple TV. Very highly recommended, especially if you already own a Mac, or an iPad or iPhone. These products work together beautifully. User friendly and energy efficient too.

Reviews.Title: Another great Apple product
Reviews.Author: Amalia Blondet
Reviews.Content: As soon as I got the  Apple TV, I plugged to the TV and that was it! I love how the Apple products are so easy to use. This was a great buy and a great product!!!

Reviews.Title: Useful, Not Excellent
Reviews.Author: J. Guyton
Reviews.Content: I bought the Apple TV principally to stream my ITunes music to my main audio system, which is a good one. The music is easy enough to access and play, however the fidelity is not first-rate quality. My ITunes library is mostly recorded from CDs in Wave or Apple Lossless  format, which works perfectly when copied to CDs, yet the sound of the same music is decidedly thinner and sibilant when streamed through the Apple TV. It is OK for background or casual listening, but critical listening sessions are unrewarding. Likewise, eventhough the promotion makes the case that the steaming is 1080P, the video shows decided compression effects.The result is a useful product, but do not expect the sound or video to be a mirror of the same content one generation prior.

Reviews.Title: Everything I wished for and more
Reviews.Author: BMS "As I see it."
Reviews.Content: I was astounded by the capabilities of this little device and it's ability to deliver crisp clear HD clarity over wi-fi. I won't get into the details as all the other reviews cover most of the plus points. I'll just offer some lessons from my learning curve.For those with a high-end A/V system and planning on using a Logitech 900 remote, I'll just say this was fairly easy to set up under "activities". Tip: you won't find a "logical" category for it in the remote set-up guide, so instead look for it under "computers/Media PC" and type in Apple TV as the device. I have this little guy tucked away in a closet in the bedroom and controlled by the RF blaster. It's hooked up to my Harmon Kardon A/V system using the optical cable for sound with video through HDMI. Wi-fi is over a newer dual-band Cisco router. No problems at all streaming HD movies at 1080i!One other tip for those planning to stream video through iTunes. When converting/ripping HD movies (720 or 1080) using handbrake or some other program make sure to set your fps rate to 30. Anything less, and you'll get very "choppy" almost slow-motion output to the TV. I tested every scenario to try to fix this problem until realizing it was the fps setting! Also keep in mind that ATV does NOT play all types of files and MPEG4 (MP4) is the preferred type. Some formats such as MKV, AVI and others will not load into iTunes and subsequently ATV. You'll need to "jailbreak" it to be able to use other formats (Someone please let me know when you figure it out..haha!!).

Reviews.Title: Great technology, if you have the right system
Reviews.Author: Mark S. England
Reviews.Content: The Apple TV module is everything it says it is.  But it only works if you have blazing fast Internet service.  Six Mbps DSL won't cut it.  You have to have at least twice that much or there are unacceptable buffering issues.  I'd also recommend the latest Apple AirPort wireless router.  BUT, after you have all the pieces together, you can do all sorts of cool things.  I'm not here to tell you about all the features.  Just to tell you what you need to access them.  I'd recommend this over digital cable any day.  Thanks again, Apple.

Reviews.Title: Buy This
Reviews.Author: Tim Smith
Reviews.Content: I've really loved my Apple TV. The quality of video it streams is great and I can access all the things I want. I have Netflix, my favorite shows, movies, video podcasts and more. Also the airplay integration with my Mac has been great to watch Conan, Late Night and other shows that are online.

Reviews.Title: If you have Apple deices, this is the way to go
Reviews.Author: gaedfly
Reviews.Content: After researching the differences between the Apple TV and Roku, I grabbed the top end Roku for a great price one of the times it was offered on Woot because it offers more services and was less expensive than the Apple TV. I never did hook it up, always next weekend's project, although the hookup is ridiculously easy. I never could get the Apple TV out of my head. Yes, it offers less services than Roku but as with all or most Apple products, the ease of use and seamless integration with other Apple devices can't be beat. I hooked up the Apple TV the day I got it. Just FYI, if you go through an HDMI switch you can't get sound without a toslink digital audio cable, at least I couldn't. No problem, I bought a toslink 1:3 switch on Amazon a while back so connecting the Apple TV with HDMI for video and toslink for audio was a breeze. Using Air Play in Mountain Lion and iOS 5 and 6 (Macbook Pro and Air, iPad 3rd gen, and iPnone 5 respectively) was just as seamless as advertised. There is a bit of lag but that's to be expected in Central Florida with the broadband traffic. Even with the slight lag, the ability to stream video and audio so easily is terrific. My iTunes Match music showed up almost immediately on my Samsung HD TV and in another couple of seconds the music started playing through my theater system. I inevitably have to bring work home so seeing my desktop on the big TV screen is a nice alternative, especially when I'm using my 11" MAcbook Air.Because I haven't hooked up the Roku, i can't say how its video and audio compare. Of course it doesn't do Air Play so there is no streaming from Apple devices to the TV.So why the 4 stars for the Apple TV? Even with my small hands, using the remote is frustrating. It's just so small that I'm forever pressing it incorrectly, causing delays when trying to navigate or type in passwords etc. I actually have to press it with my nail instead of the pad of my finger in order to be accurate. Also, the display on the Macbooks becomes so tiny when using Air Play that I can barely see it, although there's probably a way to adjust this other than by increasing the magnification manually.All in all, I don't regret my purchase. I'm not reinventing the wheel when I say that if you have a lot of Apple stuff, the Apple TV is the way to go. If not, the Roku may be the better choice.

Reviews.Title: Almost Perfect... most definitely worth the price
Reviews.Author: Adam V
Reviews.Content: I love the the Apple TV. Although it isn't mature enough for myself, it still feels like there is room to grow, it is growing and becoming a better product and is already a great device for most people. I bought it once Hulu was announced because I ditched TV and wanted a low power media streamer that had Netflix and Hulu. With this last update to iOS 5.1 for the Apple TV, it added the ability to move icons which I think is pretext to Apps, which would make this a killer device. I am already exited for the possibilities this brings to it. I would recommend buying if you already have any of the Apple Ecosystem like the iPad, iPhone, iPod or Macbook.Pros:Low Power UsageHas Netflix and HuluCan stream my media from iTunesCan use my iOS devices as a remoteCan stream pictures and video from my iPhone to Apple TV with easeCan stream my Macbook screen to Apple TV with easeNEW: Can stream from Apple TV to Airplay speakers!Cons:Making it sleep is kind of a pain, you need to force it in settings or wait 15 mins. I wish there was a button combo...No Apps... yet...Apple UI paradigm is forced on Netflix and Hulu, which isn't optimal for themWish i could remove/delete/hide sports apps

Reviews.Title: Very Useful Product!
Reviews.Author: bribri87
Reviews.Content: Before purchasing an Apple TV, I was using the Apple HDMI Cable to connect my iPhone/iPad to my TV.  Because I already had that cable, I wasn't sure if buying an Apple TV was going to be any improvement for me. I'm glad I took the chance.  Now I can do Airplay mirroring all wirelessly!  I can easily share photos and videos from my iPhone/iPad on my TV without needing to stand nearby for the wire.  I am a Netflix customer and another great benefit is being able to access the on demand Netflix movies right from Apple TV.  The Netflix interface is beautifully designed and easy to use.  I also like the fact that the Apple TV will automatically power down after a period of inactivity, so you can leave it plugged in all the time.  The only thing I didn't like about the Apple TV is that when you have to type something such as your Netflix login, you have to navigate an on-screen keyboard with the Apple TV remote, which is not very easy.

Reviews.Title: APPLE TV.. BUY IT BUY IT BUY IT!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: Been debating the whole AppleTV thing for about six months now! Bought Google TV Logitech review set-top box found out I hated it!! My built-in Samsung smart TV's web browsers three times faster than Google TVs chrome browser with their Logitech review.. So I bought the Apple TV. Love it the remote is very cool wafer thin the box is nice and Compact.. First of all YouTube has zero problems buffering and streaming Unlike some of the other devices I have tried with YouTube.. including Google TV!! And the newest model has Hulu. The navigation menus are very user-friendly to navigate. Netflix YouTube and Hulu it works great. Also if u have a iPhone you can download the remote control and link it to your AppleTV so when you type you don't have to scroll using the remote to type each painstaking letter one by one.. If you already own any other type of Apple device then this is a must for you to get!! You won't be sorry!! I'm just sorry that I didn't get this thing in the first place when I considered it Months ago..

Reviews.Title: Apple TV, Nice.
Reviews.Author: Tom Singer
Reviews.Content: I purchased Apple TV so I could stream live video from my computer to my TV. It is easy to set up and it works as advertised. I can now see player numbers on the big screen so I can see who is doing what.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV
Reviews.Author: W. Seifert "Cristina A."
Reviews.Content: I got my apple tv for about a month now and I have no problem on using it, it is amazing. Its easy to use, its not big, its fits in any place and you can take it on your bag.I highly recommended this product if you are a apple lover and you like your devices connected on the tv.

Reviews.Title: Small and very usefull
Reviews.Author: Mike Long
Reviews.Content: Very compact and easy to install. As an Apple product, completely integrated with the others Apple products. The function mirroring for pictures and videos is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Not To Shabby
Reviews.Author: Karnsy
Reviews.Content: I'm a huge Apple (Steve Jobs) fan and I purchased this after I obtained several iOS devices so that I could AirPlay content. I also wanted to have a device that could connect to Netflix. So far, I do like the Apple TV but I do think there is room for improvement. Search can sometimes be slow since you have to go from letter to letter (Maybe a model with Siri will come out soon but who knows). Also, I'm bummed that my 2010 i7 MacBook Pro cannot AirPlay, that was a real bummer after I upgraded to Mountain Lion. Also, streaming speeds can be a little unpredictable, sometimes AirPlay or streaming content just doesn't work. All in all, it's good, maybe great, but not perfect.

Reviews.Title: Perfecto!!!
Reviews.Author: Pastor Shane Wall
Reviews.Content: Meets all my expectations! I could not believe that I was able to purchase the new Apple TV for cheaper price than what many are selling the old one!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: randyb1858
Reviews.Content: This does everything its supposed to do and does it well! Very simple to set up, operate, and the quality is terrific. Shipping was fast and came earlier than expected.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Firoz Desai
Reviews.Content: It is a great product . I wish I could see my laptop on it too. Worth buying  apple tv.

Reviews.Title: must have
Reviews.Author: George J. Rivers "BUGMANN"
Reviews.Content: i never thought that a small little box could make a difference but the apple tv did.  the box is easy to set up and all our computers and iphones can connect to it

Reviews.Title: Love my Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Zachary L Hill
Reviews.Content: PROS: easy to setup, easy to navigate, works consistentlyCONS: No App Store, on smaller TVs it's difficult to read text on the screen and no way to update it.My wife and I love our Apple TV... it works wonderfully and we have not had any issues with streaming at all. We gave up Cable and have been using this exclusively for a month with no issues. The only real issues we are having is reading some of the text descriptions of Movies or Shows on the NetFlix or iTunes Movies apps. We think with a bigger TV this shouldn't be a problem.

Reviews.Title: Wonderfull easy to use
Reviews.Author: eddy villalta
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect match for any iPhone or iPad, because you can seamlessly share content between devices. It also has a great picture and sound quality. It is very easy to set up and very easy to use.Love the current apps and can't wait for more.

Reviews.Title: Apple TV 1080p
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: I love the Apple TV. I own two. The system is fairly easy to install. I use it primarily to play music through my TV systems using iTunes library. I also love the screen saver feature allowing photos to be displayed while listening. If football could be watched using this system, I would let my cable company reclaim its box. This will happen, but sooner than later would be best.

Reviews.Title: Apple tv
Reviews.Author: DIANE NEVITT
Reviews.Content: I use the Apple TV in a room where there is TV which is not connected to any cable or DISH/DIRECTTV line. It is used to let my grandchildren watch shows from HULU PLUS and NetfLex and I can easily rent movies through iTunes if need be.  It was easy to set up and works great.

Reviews.Title: Fun device
Reviews.Author: G. Smith
Reviews.Content: Really like my Apple TV. I end up spending more time using it than regular TV. It's nice playing my iTunes content on my home stereo. I only wish it came with Pandora.

Reviews.Title: Fun Product
Reviews.Author: Rj
Reviews.Content: Apple TV is a great addition to the Apple product line. Stream any thing to your tv from macbook, iPad or iPhone. Easy to set up, fast and reliable.

Reviews.Title: Still the best interface out there!
Reviews.Author: ARI J COMET
Reviews.Content: We've tested all the devices out there in this segment, and the Apple TV remains the best!  The latest version added Hulu Plus which we use a lot and really enjoy.  Hands down this is one of the best units, just wish it had NAS storage playing and wasn't so locked in Apple's little world.  But, still really nice and worth the price!

Reviews.Title: Another good effort from Apple
Reviews.Author: Snowflake
Reviews.Content: Works well and as advertised. Only issue is documentation. Apple still thinks their products are so simple they need little explanation. That has not been true for a LONG time.

Reviews.Title: I love this little thing
Reviews.Author: Chris Spencer
Reviews.Content: Personally, i use this thing all the time. If you have an ipod or ipad and use youtube non-stop, I feel this is a must buy. I use it to watch youtube vids from my ipod to my hd tv everynight before bed. I love it, is compact and easy to use.
